englishText: prasidda kabIra adhyetA, puruShottama agravAla kA yaha shodha Alekha, usa rAmAnaMda kI khoja karatA hai
kintu Adhunika pAMDitya, na sirfa eka brAhmaNa rAmAnaMda ke, eka julAhe kabIra kA guru hone se, balki donoM ke samakAlIna hone se bhI, inakAra karatA hai
usa para, ina chAra kaviyoM kA gaharA asara hai
ise kaI bAra maMchita bhI kiyA gayA hai
yahA.N prastuta hai, hindI kavi kathAkAra, tejI grovara ke aMgrezI ke mArfata kie gae anuvAda ke, kuCha aMsha
mUla se, aMgrezI meM lAne kA kAma, mInA kaMdasAmI ne kiyA hai, aura aMgrezI se hindI anuvAda, girirAja kirADU ne
dUsarI tarafa, sAkShAtkAra meM ve suMdara ke virUddha, apanI raNanIti ke bAre meM bAta karate haiM
ustAda bismillAha khAna, bhAratIya saMgIta hI nahIM, samUche kalA saMsAra meM, eka vilakShaNa upasthiti rahe
apane vyaktitva aura vAda, donoM se, ve shAstrIya saMgIta meM eka nae TAIpa the
una para do hindI kaviyoM kA gadya, isa fIchara meM shAmila hai
yatIndra mishra kA sura kI bArAdarI, isa nAma se, peMgvina yAtrA se shIghra prakAshya pustaka se liyA gayA hai, jo unakI kalA, sthAnIya paramparA, unake vyaktitva ko, eka sAtha pa.DhatI haiM
ustAda ko TribyUTa kI taraha likhA gayA vyomesha shukla kA gadya, unakI kalA ko, sAMskRRitika rAjanIti ke, pratirodha ke, saMketoM kI taraha dekhatA hai
isa aMka se hama, eka nayA khaMDa, una kalA rUpoM para AraMbha kara rahe haiM, jinheM loka priya yA paॉpulara kahA jAtA hai
basa itanA patA hai ki usa zamAne meM, eshiyA yUropa afrIkA, aura shAyada amerikA mahAdvIpa bhI, Apasa meM ju.De hue the
yUropa kA bAyA.N hissA afrIkA ke dAhine meM, aura AsTreliyA kA UparI pashchimI kinArA, Aja ke tamilanADu ke bagala meM thA
matalaba ki, yU ena o jo sapanA hamAre bhaviShya ke lie dekhatA hai, vo hamAre itihAsa meM, pahale hI pUrA ho chukA hai
matalaba ki, bhAShA eka ekshana nahIM, prakRRiti ko dekhakara diyA gayA hamArA riekshana mAtra hai
sUraja ko dekhakara, hara prajAti ke manuShya ke mu.Nha se, rA hI nikalA
isalie, misra meM bhI sUrya bhagavAna, rA haiM, aura siMdhu ke isa pAra bhI, sUryavaMshI bhagavAna kA nAma, rAma hai
usameM kahA gayA hai, ki eka zamAnA thA, jaba pUrI duniyA bAbilU nAma ke eka shahara meM basatI thI, aura eka hI bhAShA bolatI thI
usa shahara ke logoM ne, eka bAra, eka ba.DI sI mInAra banAne kI koshisha kI, itanI U.NchI, ki jisa pe cha.Dha ke iMsAna bhagavAna ke pAsa pahu.Ncha jAe
usake dosta, premikAe.N, aura rishtedAra, use isI nAma se bulAte the, aura vo bhI, aksara samajha jAtA thA, ki kvaiM usI ko saMbodhita hai
kvaiM kI umra takarIbana aThAraha sAla rahI hogI, yAni ki, vo navakishora thA, Aja kA TInejara
shikAra karanA anivArya thA, lekina isa mAmale me, kvaiM thoDA kamazora thA
use jaMgalI jAna varoM se Dara lagatA thA
matalaba ki, kvaiM sirfa maChaliyA.N pakaDa kara, bahuta dina chaina se nahIM raha sakatA thA
usake aMdara, jAne kahA.N se, eka ajIba sA gussA panapane lagA thA
kabIle meM bhI jhaga.De ba.Dhane lage, aura kvaiM ke mUka samarthaka, yAni ki kabIle ke ba.De loga bhI, aba dhIre dhIre, usase kaTane lage
vo rAta ko dera taka jAgatA, jhA.DiyoM kI AvAza meM nae nae svara sunatA, aura unheM jo.Dakara, kuCha banAne kI koshisha karatA
para jhA.DiyoM se AI eka AvAza dubArA nahIM AtI, hara bAra, naI taraha kA svara nikalatA, aura kvaiM, unheM yAda karate karate, jo.Date jo.Date, pareshAna ho jAtA
jina dinoM bArisha hotI, kvaiM kI ye ulajhana, aura baढ़ jAtI
isalie aba vo, dina bhara AvAzeM ikaThThI karatA phiratA
jahA.N bhI koI naI dhvani sunatA, turaMta use doharAtA
nadI kinAre, do kAle gola patthara the, jo eka dUsare se raga.Dakara, vahI AvAza de rahe the
kvaiM ba.DI dera taka vahA.N baiThA, unako raga.DatA rahA, usake sAmane eka khazAnA khula gayA thA
pattharoM meM vo AvAzeM kaida thIM, jinheM vo duniyA bhara meM DhU.NDhatA phiratA thA
aba kvaiM kA dina, do hissoM meM ba.NTa gayA
isake bAda, vo Aja kI AvAza vAle pattharoM ko, alaga alaga guchChoM meM bA.NdhatA, aura unheM apane ka.Ndhe para, laTakA letA
kaI dina to aisA hotA, ki shAma ko, kabIle kI ora lauTate vaqta, usake pAsa, pattharoM ke pachAsa se zyAdA samUha hote
kuCha logoM ko to Dara thA, ki kvaiM kisI kAle devatA kI ArAdhanA karatA hai
isa bIcha, kvaiM ne apane kabIle vAloM ke sAtha, khAnA bilkula hI baMda kara diyA
aba vo kachchI maChalI, aura phaloM para hI ziMdA rahatA
mahIne bItate gae, aura kvaiM kA pattharoM vAlA khazAnA, ba.DA hotA gayA
khU.N beDhaMga se unheM bajAtA, aura ajIba sI AvAza sunakara, khUba ha.NsatA
kabhI kabhI kvaiM gusse meM patthara uThAkara, pheMka bhI detA
aise hI eka jhaga.De meM, eka dina, kvaiM ne khU.N ko mAra DAlA
gusse meM Akara, usane zora zora se chillAnA shuru kara diyA
khU.N kA gussA, abhI bhI harA thA, aura vo phira se, kvaiM pe hI jhapaTa pa.DA
lekina isa bAra, kvaiM ke hAtha meM, vo bArisha vAle patthara the, kAle gola patthara, jo Tapa Tapa karate the
khU.N ke nazadIka Ate hI, ye pUrI tAkata se, usake mAthe para jA pa.De
shAyada eka hI vAra meM, khU.N aMdhA ho gayA
usake bAda, kvaiM ne nukIle patthara uThA kara, khU.N kI eka eka nasa kATa DAlI
tIna kabIlevAle bIcha meM Ae, lekina vo bhI mAre gae
subaha hote hote pUrA kabIlA khAlI ho gayA
mAna liyA gayA, ki kvaiM sachamucha rAta kI hI ArAdhanA karatA haiM
usake aMdara, koI kAlI shakti A gaI, jo pUre kabIle ko khAne pe AmAdA thI
jina pattharoM pe khUna laga gayA thA, unheM vo DainyUba meM dho lAyA
kabIle meM aba ajIba sI shAMti thI, sirfa kvaiM, aura usake patthara hI bolate the
para use aise hI achChA lagatA thA
unhoMne apanI rAga adAyagI meM, jisa eka chIza para sarvAdhika mehanata kI hai, vo unakA mIM.Da kA kAma hai
prasiddha saMgIta vidvAna, chetana karanAnI likhate haiM, bismillA khAna kI kalA kI sabase ba.DI khUbI ye hai ki, unake dhvani vinyAsa kI shuddhatA, uttejanA jagAtI hai
unakI sAMgItika pratibhA apratima hai
ve rAga kA vistAra karane, usakI saraMchanA ke byauroM ko ubhArane meM, hameshA behada sadhe hue aura jAgarUka rahe haiM
bismillA khAna kI mIM.Da, jo unakI vAdana kalA kA sabase sashakta pakSha bana gayI hai, dekhane lAyaka hai
vAdana ke samaya, mIM.Da lete vakta, ve suroM meM jo mo.Da ghumAva aura daivIya sparsha mahasUsa karAte haiM, vo sunane vAle ko, apUrva anubhava detA hai
lagatA hai ki bismillA khAna, mIM.Da lete vakta, shahanAI nahIM bajA rahe, balki sharIra ke kisI ghAva para, marahama kara rahe haiM
shahanAI meM mIM.Da bharane kI yaha divyatA, unakI kalA yAtrA kA sabase pramukha bindu bana gayI hai
shahanAI meM mIM.Da ke kAma para, chetana karanAnI kI yaha bAta, bismillA khAna ke usa ghanaghora riyAza kI ora ishArA karatI hai
yadi eka sura kA koI kaNa, sahI paka.Da meM A gayA, to samajho ki sArA saMgIta, tumhArI phU.Nka meM utara AyegA
sA aura re kA pharka karane kI tamIza, unheM mIM.Da ko baratane ke vyA karaNa ke sandarbha meM hI, bachapana se sikhAyI gayI thI
saMgIta ke vyA karaNa kA anushAsana milA huA hai, aura pUraba kI loka laya va desI dhuneM, shahanAI ke pyAle meM Akara Thahara gayI haiM
vo isI bAta kI ora bAra bAra ishArA karatI haiM, ki saMgIta ke mIM.Da, va tAna kI taraha hI, unake jIvana meM kalA aura rasa, eka sura se dUsare sura taka, binA TUTe hue pahu.Nche haiM
ve eka sAdhAraNa insAna haiM, jinake bhItara, Apako anAyAsa hI, sahaja mAnavIyatA ke darshana hote haiM
ye khAna sAhaba koI dUsare haiM
unase milanA, momina ke usa shera se milanA hai, jahA.N ve yaha darja karate haiM, tuma mere pAsa hote ho, jaba koI dUsarA nahIM hotA
ye koI dUsarA na hone jaisA vyakti, eka ustAda hai, jo prema meM pa.De huye haiM
unheM kAshI se be panAha muhabbata hai
vo shahanAI ko, apanI prastuti kA eka vAdya yantra nahIM mAnate, balki, use sakhI, aura mahabUbA kahate haiM
apanI patnI ke guzara jAne ke bAda se, unakI yaha mahabUbA hI, unake sirahAne bistara para, sAtha sotI hai, aura apane premI ko do eka kShaNa, khuda kI khushI baTorane kA, bahAnA detI hai
ve Aja bhI, bachapana meM kachau.DI khilAne vAlI kulasuma ko, pUrI vyagratA se yAda karate haiM
apane ba.De bhAI, shamsuddIna kA jaba bhI zikra karate haiM, bhItara ke jazbAta, donoM A.NkhoM kI koroM meM, pAnI banakara, Thahara jAtA hai
ha.DahA sarAya se alaga, ve kahIM jAnA nahIM chAhate, phira vo lAhaura ho, yA landana, koI farka nahIM pa.DatA
apane bhare pUre kunabe ke sAtha rahanA, aura pA.NchoM vakta kI namAza meM saMgIta kI shuddhatA ko milA denA, unheM bakhUbI AtA hai
gaMgA ke pAnI ke liye unakI shraddhA dekhate banatI hai
desha meM, jaba bhI koI fasAda hotA hai, to hara eka se ustAda kahane lagate haiM, ki bhaiyA, gaMgA ke pAnI ko ChU lo, aura surIle bana jAo, phira la.Da nahIM pAoge
ve prema ko itane nazadIka se mahasUsa karate haiM, ki prema kA vitAna rachane vAle rAgoM ke pIChe pagalAye se ghUmate haiM
apane kamare meM jaba baiThate haiM, taba Upara AsamAna kI ora tAkanA, unakI fitarata meM shAmila hai
lagatA hai unakI shahanAI ke sAta suroM ne hI, Upara sAta AsamAna rachA hai
khudA aura sura, saMgIta aura azAna, jaise unake sharIra kA pAnI, aura rUha hai
unakA pUrA sharIra, aura vyaktitva hI, jaise laya kA bAgIchA hai, jise unhoMne DheroM gharAnoM se, achChe achChe phUla to.Dakara, sajAyA huA hai
isa bAgIche meM, Apa shurU se anta taka ghUma Aiye, to duniyA bhara kI sundara chIzoM ke sAtha, eka ananyatA mahasUsa kareMgeM
kula milAkara kissA kotAha ye, ki bismillA khAna, sirfa eka kalAkAra nahIM haiM, vo mAnavIya garimA kI sabase saralatama abhi vyakti haiM
unake sAtha hone meM, hameM apane ko tho.DA ba.DA karane meM, madada milatI hai
AdhA gA.Nva upanyAsa kI pahalI paMkti hai
gAzIpura ke purAne tele meM, aba eka skUla hai, jahAM gaMgA kI laharoM kI AvAza to AtI hai, lekina, itihAsa ke gunagunAne, yA ThaMDI sAMseM, lene kI AvAza, nahIM AtI
ajIba sI paMkti nahIM hai, gaMgA kI lahareM, jitanI mUrta aura yathArtha haiM, itihAsa utanA hI amUrta
gaMgA kI laharoM kA, kyA koI itihAsa nahIM, bilAshaka hai, rAhI mAsUma razA, tIsarI hI paMkti meM batA dete haiM
gaMdale pAnI kI ina mahAna dhArAoM ko na jAne kitanI kahAniyA.N yAda hoMgI
islAma aura anya kisI bhI dhArmika asmitA ke saMdarbha meM, yaha dekhA jA sakatA hai ki, ve ilAkAI AdhAra para badalatI rahatI haiM, aura dUsare, unake bhItara ke kaI dvaMda, dekhe jA sakate haiM
rAShTravAda sAmudAyika pahachAna kI talAsha meM, AsAnI se dharma kI ora mu.DatA hai
rAhI mAsUma razA, usa sAMskRRitika pahachAna ko talAshane kA prayAsa karate haiM, jo zamIna se upajI hai, dharma se nahIM
lauMDA ThiTholI aura ha.NsI kara rahA thA, to funnana miyA.N ne uThakara eka aisA tamAchA mArA, ki ustAda jI ke bAyeM kI gamaka daba gaI
mahafila meM sannATA ChA gayA
taba funnana miyA.N, shAMti se kahate haiM, vo gAliba kI gazala gA rahI thI
isake bAda, khAna sAhaba ko lAkha samajhAyA jAtA hai, ki funnana miyA.N kA thappaDa, usa lauMDe ke mu.Nha para nahIM paDA thA
shAyada use gAMdhI jI se adhika, isa TopI kI zarUrata thI, jisakI vajaha se sarakArI loga, usase Darane lage the
vo koI kAma nahIM karatA thA, aura ArAma se thA
pahale vo dina rAta kAma kiyA karatA thA, aura beArAma thA
aba vo eka lIDara thA
gaMgaulI meM to, kabhI koI aMgreja dekhA nahIM gayA
vahA.N jaba rAShTravAdI Andolana kI lehara AI, to loga, AzAdI ke KayAla se nahIM, apane apane, aura bahuta vAjiba kAraNoM se, usase ju.De
bhArata ChoDo Andolana ke AsapAsa, bhI.Da, thAne ko ghera letI hai
isa majame meM, aise loga kama the, jinheM hindustAna Cho.Da do ke nAre kI khabara rahI ho
unameM aise loga bhI nahIM the, jinheM AzAdI kA mahafUma patA ho
godAna, ChattIsa meM AyA thA, lekina chUMki rAyasAhaba kAMgresa kI membarI meM, jela bhI ho Ae the
isalie saiMtAlIsa ke bAda bhI unakI riyAsata, badale rUpa meM chalatI rahI hogI, aisA hama mAna sakateM haiM
funnana miyA.N ise jhela nahIM pAte, aura bIcha takarIra meM kha.De ho jAte haiM
unakI vo gU.NjatI AvAza, isa upanyAsa se bAhara nikalakara AtI hai
funnana miyA.N kA la.DakA, bahAdurI se, la.Date la.Date hue, kAma A gayA, to isameM kauna sI tAjjuba kI bAta hai
gulazAra kI smRRiti daMsha kI yaha kavitAe.N, da rasala, unakI bhAShA meM, bharosA karane kI vajaha se hI, likhI gayI haiM
ve chAhate to, AsAnI se, DheroM kavitAoM ko, kisI filma kI paTakathA kI shakla dekara, chitrita kara sakate the
isa bAta se gulazAra kA kahAnIkAra bhI, gaharAI se bhIgA huA hai
unakI gazaleM bhI, isa bAta se aChUtI nahIM haiM
kuCha gazaloM kI paMktiyA.N, isI sandarbha meM dhyAna dene yogya haiM
ve apane Arambhika jIvana kI, nitAnta sahaja aura AtmIya chIzoM ko, shAyarI ke parivAra kA sadasya banAte haiM
ye saba milakara, gulazAra kI kavitA aura shAyarI kA Anandaloka, gaढ़tI haiM
ina bimboM ke dvArA, ve behada mAmUlI sI lagatI bAta meM bhI, jIvana kA eka ba.DA fala safA darja karate haiM
isa artha meM, ve hindI aura urdU kI milanabhUmi para kha.De hue, akele aise lokadharmI shAyara haiM
eka anUThe DhaMga kI rUmAniyata aura begAnepana ke mishraNa ke bAvajUda, gulazAra kI kavitAe.N, sAdhAraNa AdamI ke saMvAda meM, apanI pahachAna DhU.Nढ़tI haiM
eka hada taka, hama yaha AsAnI se kaha sakate haiM ki, nihAyata sAdhAraNa jIvana jIne vAle samAja kI chaukhaTa para jAkara, gulazAra kI kavitA, apanA shikhara pAtI hai
ye apanatva aura utkarSha, gulazAra kI pUrI zidagI, aura unake aneka anya kAryoM meM, AsAnI se lakShita ho jA sakatI hai
ye sAre tathya milakara gulazAra kI kavitA kA, aisA karishmAI sthApatya rachate haiM, jisakA koI dUsarA vikalpa, jaldI DhU.Nढ़e nahIM milarA
to kabhI banArasa meM gaMgA kI ghATa para, kabIrI ThATha oढ़e hue, nazara AtI hai
kabhI ye nazmeM, sUfI kaviyoM kI birAdarI meM, baiThe hue, udAsI kA raMga, DhU.NDhatI haiM
gulazAra kI kavitA kI kaI parateM haiM, aura una paratoM ke bIcha meM, jIvana aura usakI visaMgatiyoM kI anaginata raMgate haiM
hama ina nazmoM kI paratoM ko eka eka kara, alaga karate chalate haiM
isa shAyara kA apanA fala safA, pUrI rUmAniyata, aura jazbAta ke sAtha khilatA jAtA hai
anaginata nazmoM, kavitAoM, aura GazaloM kI duniyA hai gulazAra ke yahA.N, jo apanA sUfiyAnA raMga liye hue, shAyara kA jIvana darshana, vyakta karatI haiM
isa abhivyakti meM, jahA.N eka ora hameM kavi ke antarmana kI mahIna bunAvaTa kI jAnakArI milatI hai

vahAM, dUsarI ora sUfiyAnA raMgata liye hue, lagabhaga nirguNa kaviyoM kI bolI bAnI ke karIba pahu.Nchane vAlI unakI AvAza, yA kavitA kA sthAyI phakka.Da svabhAva, hameM ekabAragI, udAsI meM tabdIla hotA huA nazara AtA hai
ina nazmoM kI sabase ba.DI tAkata banakara, hamAre sAmane AtA hai
zAhira hai, isa taraha kI kavitA meM, dukha aura udAsI, usa taraha se apanA Ashraya pAte haiM
jisa taraha, nirguNa padoM aura sUfiyAnA kalAmoM meM, prema va AtmIya kShaNa, pI.DA kA rUpa dharakara, apanI paribhAShA gaढ़te haiM
yaha akAraNa nahIM hai, ki gulazAra ke lie filma gIta bhI, isI kAraNa apanA saMvedAtmaka utkarSha, gaharI mArmikatA meM pAte haiM
eka do gItoM ke udAharaNa se yaha mArmikatA, samajhI jA sakatI hai
eka hada taka, kAvya rUढ़i kI taraha, jisa sAhityashAstra meM, hama moTifa ke taura para jAnate haiM
vaha chA.Nda kI upasthiti hai
vo akele meM hI kabhI pUrA kA pUrA dRRishya banatA hai, yA kisI nazma meM, apane pravesha ke sAtha, sArI dRRishyAvalI ko eka vishiShTa kisma kA, gulazAraTaipa banA detA hai
eka taraha se chA.Nda, unakA sarvapriya pratyaya hai, jisa para, ve apane se bhI zyAdA bharosA karate haiM

isa bimba ko lekara, unakA Agraha itanA gAढ़A aura mukhara hai ki, ekAka, yaha vishvAsa karanA mushkila ho jAtA hai ki, bAkI ke anya sAre prAkRRitika bimba, unake shAyara ke lie, kuCha kama mahattva ke haiM
hAlA.Nki ye gulazAra hI haiM, jinake yahA.N sarvAdhika prAkRRitika pratIkoM kI bharamAra rahI hai
phira vo sUraja, tAre, pahA.Da, bArisha, patajha.Da, dina rAta, shAma, nadI, barfa, samudra, dhuMdha, havA, kuCha bhI ho sakatI hai
magara, chA.Nda shAyada akelA hI aisA, vazanI va arthavAna pratIka hai jo, unake sAhitya ke, rasAyana ko, aura gAढ़A banAtA hai
Apa unakI GazaleM leM, yA koI kavitA, kisI gIta ko TaToleM, yA triveNiyoM kI ChoTI ChoTI sArthaka upasthitiyA.N, sabhI jagaha, chandramA para AsthA, gaharAyI hI hai
gulazAra kA bukhAra kI hada taka pahu.NchA huA yaha chA.Nda prema, unake filmI gItoM meM bhI, kuCha bahuta naye DhaMga ke dRRishya le AyA hai
jaise bimba aura pratIkoM, khAsakara, prAkRRitika rUpakoM se sAdRRishya rachane meM, mahArata pAye hue gulazAra ke yahA.N, eka ajIba bAta
eka tarIke se, rUढ़igata arthoM meM, gulazAra aise kShaNa, urdU shAyarI kI usI paramparA kA anugamana karate, nazara Ate haiM
hazAra sAloM se, anaginata nazmeM, apane darda va ta.Dapa ko tafasIla se bayA.N karane meM, likhI gayI haiM
zAhira hai, udAsI kA ye Alama, kavitA meM aishvarya, aura chakAchauMdha rachane kI jagaha, saMvedanA aura karuNA se, dhAra paidA karatA hai
gulazAra ke rachanA karma meM, visheShakara unakI kavitA aura gazaloM ke sandarbha meM, prema bahuta garimA ke sAtha pratiShThita huA hai
unake svabhAva meM jo eka ajIba sA begAnApana hai, saMkocha kA ThaharA huA sA pardA hai

phira bAta jaba gulazAra kI ho rahI ho, jo svayaM apanI abhivyakti kI sahaja ChAyAe.N, bAbA farIda, kutuba kulIshAha, shamsa tabarezI, evaM nAnaka meM DhU.NDhate hoM

visheShakara kailAsha parvata kI, hinduoM, bauddha ke lie, kailAsha mAnasarovara ke darshana hI, puNyakArI haiM
kaI mela alaga alaga videsha saMsthAoM ke nAma se Ae
jinameM eka, sukhada sUchanA hotI hai, ki mere Imela pate ko, lakI DrA ke AdhAra para, alAM yA falAM puraskAra ke lie chunA gayA hai
puraskAra kI rAshi, lAkhoM Daॉlara yA pAuMDa meM hotI hai
piChale mahIne, eka mela AyA, jisameM laMdana ke pate vAlI eka saMsthA ne, mujhe sUchita kiyA, ki unakI puraskAra samiti ne mujhe, pA.Ncha miliyana pAuMDa kI puraskAra rAshi ke lie, chunA hai
agalA mela AyA, ki itanI ba.DI puraskAra rAshi, videsha meM Apake pAsa bhejane ke lie, kuCha kAgazAta banavAne pa.DeMge
puraskAra kI rAshi chU.Nki Apako chekasvarUpa dI jA rahI hai, isalie kAgazAta Adi banavAne kA kharcha, Apako vahana karanA pa.DegA
yaha kharcha nakada meM karanA hogA, isalie bhArata meM, Apa hamAre nimna baiMka ke khAte meM, pachAsa hazAra rupae jamA karavA deM
tuma to jAnate ho, ela AI sI kI naukarI meM itanA paisA bachatA kahA.N hai, ki nakada bhijavA sakUM
tabhI maiMne dillI ke TAimsa ऑfa iMDiyA meM samAchAra pa.DhA, ki iM TaraneTa ke mAdhyama se, dillI se saTe gu.DagAMva meM Chaha mahIne ke daurAna, karIba darjana bhara loga, Thage jA chuke haiM
muzaffarapura ke, esa Ara orieMTala skUla se, hamane maiTrika kI parIkShA, sAtha hI pAsa kI thI
barasoM bAda eka dina, Trena meM unase bheMTa ho gaI
kahate haiM kAfkA kI zyAdAta rachanAe.N, usake marane ke bAda hI ChapIM, Aja usakI ginatI, duniyA ke mahAnatama lekhakoM meM kI jAtI hai
abhI maiMne usI dina eka vebasAiTa para pa.DhA ki sheksapiyara ke bAda, saMsAra meM sabase adhika shodha, kAfkA kI rachanAoM ko lekara hI ho rahe haiM
phira ve muskurAte hue, kusumAkara jI se kahate, eka dosta ke kAraNa hI kAfkA kI rachanAeM, pAThakoM ke samakSha, prakAshita hokara A sakIM
nahIM nahIM, yaha kahAnI itanI sahaja itanI sarala hotI, to na kusumAkara ne mujhe sunAI hotI, na hI maiM ise Apako sunA rahA hotA
kyA karUM, vakta hI aisA Ana pa.DA hai, ki kuCha bhI sahaja sarala nahIM raha gayA hai
usa samaya muzaffarapura meM, esa DI o banakara Ae hue the, harinArAyaNa gautama
jisane yahA.N Ane ke bAda, eka muslima parivAra ke sAtha, sAjhedArI meM vyApAra AraMbha kiyA
dhArAvAhika meM unake vyApAra ke utthAna patana ke sAtha hI, desha meM AzAdI ke bAda, hiMdU muslima saMbaMdhoM meM Ae badalAvoM kI kahAnI bhI, sAtha sAtha chalegI
jabaki unhoMne jo bhI kahAnI, yA unake shabdoM meM sAhitya likhA, use mujhe pa.DhavAe binA, unhoMne pUrA nahIM samajhA, kusumAkara ne ba.De Ashcharya ke sAtha batAyA
maॉrTena kI nigAheM, iMDIza ko phira, jItadilAne para
mAikala vaॉna ne, krikeTa ko alavidA kahA
kaptAnI ke lie hI paidA hue vaॉna, fliMTAfa
bukAnana ne, flaॉvara ko batAe, ऑsTreliyA ke rAza
vesTa iMDIza TIma meM, koI badalAva nahIM
agale varlDa kapa taka khelanA chAhate haiM, jayasUryA
paॉnTiMga kareMge kaiMsara pI.Dita bachchoM kI madada
pAThaka chAheM, to ina nibaMdhoM ko, tIna eka do ke mUla krama meM paढ़ sakate haiM
krama kA yaha kautuka, anAyAsa huA hai, para do tIna eka krama se paढ़ne para, ibArata kuCha badala jAtI hai, yaha pAThakoM se ChupA na rahegA
yahA.N prastuta mA.NDaNA bhitti chitroM kA saMchayana, unake dvArA kie gae foTogrAfIya dastAvezIkaraNa kA, eka namUnA hai
mA.NDaNA korane vAlI striyA.N, jo saMsAra banAtI hai, vaha lagabhaga, manuShyetara saMsAra hai
isameM pashu pakShI haiM, vastueM haiM, amUrta DizAIneM haiM, manuShya nahIM
usake bilkula bagala meM devI devatAoM, aura baॉlIvuDa kI abhinetriyoM ke posTara bhI, dRRishya kA hissA bana jAte haiM
chitrakAra haku shAha, evaM lekhaka sampAdaka pIyUSha dariyA kI, prakAshanAdhIna vArtA rUpa mAnuSha ke, kuCha aMsha
anivArya kavitA kI dhAraNA, aura brAzIlI kavi, mainuela bAndierA kI eka kavitA para, tejI grovara kA aMgrezI nibaMdha
unakI haMsamukha jijIviShA meM nirahaMkArI namratA, va lAkShaNika sajjanatA kA rUpAyana hai, aura unakA kalAtmaka antaHkaraNa, RRijuChandoM meM sAMsa letA hai
gaharA AtmAnushAsana, unakA bIjakoSha hai
da rasala haku shAha, svadeshI pahachAna ke jauharI, va maramavettA hai
ve akA damika dhAraNAoM ke rUढ़ chaukhaToM, tathA kathita koShThakoM se bAhara Akara, sRRijanA kA apanA urvara upajIvya pAte haiM
jisameM, sArvabhaumika mAnavIya mUlyoM para, aDiga Agraha, ahiMsA, prema, va Ananda kA saMdesha, yUM ujAgara hai
goyA unake vajUda kA shilAlekha ho, jise bAMchane kA matalaba, svAvalambI samAja rachanA, va jIvana ke sahaja chitrArthana ke suMdara kAvya meM khilanA, va sAMsa lenA hai
jana varI se jUna do hazAra sAta ke daramiyAna, haku shAha ke sAtha, unake kRRititva va vyaktitva para, lagabhaga sattara ghaNTe kA vArtAlApa, sampanna huA thA
jo rAja kamala prakAshana, dillI se shIghra prakAshya pustaka kA, eka sampAdita hissA hai
hAlAki duniyA kI nazaroM meM, ve koI bahuta vyAvahArika vyakti nahIM the
alasubaha, do yA tIna baje, Apa unheM gItA paढ़te, yA dopahara meM apane kisI muslima dosta ke ghara kI ArAma kursI para, nIMda lete dekha pA sakate the
kabhI kabhI AdhIrAta ke qarIba, unheM khojate hue, nadI taTa kI reta para jaba eka safeda kapa.DA, phara pharAtA dikhatA, to Apa yaha samajha jAte the, ki vahAM jo soye haiM, vaha bAdashAha haiM
AdivAsiyoM ko ve apanA dosta mAnate the, aura unhIM ke sAtha chAya banAte, khicha.DI pakAte, vahIM khAte sote, uThate baiThate
merI tIsarI bahana dakShA bhI, vahI vanasthalI sUrata meM, janajAtIya vidyArthiyoM ko paढ़AtI rahI
mere bhAI bAbUbhAI aura bhAbhI taralA ne, apane jIvana kA zyAdAtara samaya, janajAtIya samudAya meM paढ़Ate hue hI bitAyA hai
unake donoM bachche, urvina va svAti, vahIM Adi vAsI bachchoM ke saMga hI pa.Dhate haiM
unheM chikitsakIya madada sulabha karAnA, nRRityanATikA va garabA karanA, gAMva gAMva ghUmanA, charakhA chalAnA, prArthanA karanA shAmila thA
samAjavAdI gItakAra va chitrakAra, kulina paMDyA, hamArI preraNA ke mukhya strota the
kuCha dera bAda ma~NgalA shrImukha ne kahA, mere khyAla meM ApakA shodha, tarka saMgata to hai, ki.Ntu usase vaha lakShya prApta na hogA, jo Apa chAhate hai
kodaI chau.Nke, isa taraha kI bAta sunane ke ve Adi na the
aisI AshaMkAoM kA eka artha, apanI rUgNa vAstavikatA kA doSha galpa, vyavasAyika sinemA para maDhanA bhI ho sakatA hai
hamAre paॉpulara sAMskRRitika pratibimnoM ne saMbhavataH, usa vAstavikatA ko, bahuta karIba se, sAmane raMgA hai
jise hamane svayaM nirmita kiyA hai
lekina jo aisI bhUtahA vAstavikatA hai, ki hama isake hone ko nakArate haiM, aura isako nirmita karane meM, hamArI saMlagna zimmevArI ko bhI
tejAjI ke balidAna kI mUla kathA saMkShepa meM kahane kA maukA, A gayA hai
eka aitihAsika vyakti ke rUpa meM, tejAjI kA janma, bhAdrapada kI shukla pakShIya dashamI, tadAnusAra, unatIsa jana varI eka hazAra chauhattara ko, dhuliyA gotra ke, jATa parivAra meM huA thA

yahA.N, yaha bhI batA dU.N, ki tejAjI ke janma kI aMgrezI tithi, unatIsa jana varI, eka hazAra chauhattara ke anta meM, itihAsakAra mahodaya ne, svayaM apanI tarafa se, koShThakoM ke ghere meM, eka prashnavAchaka chihna bhI, aMkita kiyA hai
usameM varNita, unakI kathA, isa prakAra hai
jyeShTha mAsa meM hI, RRitu kI prathama varShA, ho chukI hai
bAteM, jo jIta leMgI Apake vaileMTAina kA dila
vaileMTAina De, kyA kareM, kyA na kareM
tere gifTa ne merA dila jIta liyA
romeMTika kaॉmeDI se TUTegA, pyAra kA rishtA
skUla meM sirfa dasa laMcha Tebalsa haiM
lekina, ise chalAne vAle vijetA ko, yaha lutfa sirfa Adhe ghaMTe taka uThAne dete haiM
re lAfAyate, pArka meM, sImeMTa kI eka shataraMgI meza para baiThA, blUta ke kisI pUrvaja vRRikSha kA, skecha banA rahA hai
usake pIChe, amerikI izarAyala, aura amerikI filistInI, eka dUsare se dasa fITa kI dUrI para, pradarshana kara rahe haiM
filistIna meM hiMsA, phira se phUTa pa.DI hai
pAkistAnI, visheSha taura para Tempala mAuMTa gaye, aura filistIniyoM se apanI pAka sImA ke ullaMghana kA virodha kiyA
aThThAIsa filistInI aura chAra pAkistAnI mAre gaye haiM
ye shAkhAe.N, kisI surakShita mohalle kI galiyAM jaisI nahIM, khataranAka DaMDoM jaisI laga rahI hai
maiM nIle kAMTekTa leMsa nikAla detI hU.N, aura DAyarI meM noTa kara letI hU.N, ki DaॉkTara ko binA raMgoM vAle leMsa ke liye bolanA hai
mujhe besameMTa se usakI AvAza AtI rahatI hai, jaise koI bachchA, maithsa kI Tebalsa sIkhatA hai, aura bIcha meM bAra bAra bhUla jAtA hai
vaha bhI ghere meM usa biMdu ko bhUla chukA hai, jo ghere ko pUrNa karatA hai
jaba saMhAra ke deva shiva ne, trishUla aMdhaka ke pAra karake, use trishUla kI noMka pe bIMdha kara tAMDava kiyA, aisA nRRitya, jisakI laya AraMbha sI taraMgita, aura aMta sI bhayaMkara hotI hai
eka inTaravyU meM vo kahatI hai ki usane kampyUTara se kahA, ki aMka DhUMDha nikAle, aura usane nikAle, bAraha, sAta, unnIsa, ChabbIsa, paॉvara baॉla, ikkIsa
vAlTara beMjAmina ne likhA hai, hameshA se hI kalA kA eka sarvAdhika mahatvapUrNa prAkriya hai, eka aisI mAMga paidA karanA, jisakI pUrti, pUrI taraha hone kA samaya, abhI na AyA ho
zAhira hai, beMjAmina aura breMtA, kalA ke lie kalA jaisI dhAraNA, yA AMdolana se upayukta kathanoM dvArA, alagAte hue dikhAI pa.Date haiM
echa shAradA prasAda, pradhAnamaMtrI ke sUchanA salAhakAra ne, pradhAnamaMtrI ko eka noTa bhejA hai, ki amRRita nAhaTA kI filma, kissA kursI kA, sarAsara unake aura sarakAra ke virUddha hai
pradhAnamaMtrI para, ba.DA painA aura tIvra vyaMgya, isa filma meM kiyA gayA hai
Aja, ela ke sheShana, pradhAnamaMtrI ke nijI sachiva ne yaha kAryakrama banAyA, ki hama chAra loga, chupachApa kissA kursI kA dekheM
kalA mAnava jAti kI mAtRRibhAShA hai
vyakti, apane bhItara kI anubhUti, saMvedanA ko, kalA meM pUrNa sRRijita karatA hai, aura kalA se vaha apanI saMvedanA anubhUti ko, pagAtA bhI hai
arnesTa fishara ko, eka bAra phira isa saMdarbha meM yAda karanA hogA, ki kalA hI manuShya ko vikhaMDita avasthA se Upara uThAkara, pUrNatA kI avasthA meM lA sakatI hai
samAja ke lie kalAkAra sabase ba.DA jAdUgara hai, aura samAja ko, isa saba ko yaha mAMgane kA adhikAra hai, ki kalAkAra apane sAmAjika kAma ke prati, sacheta ho
kalA manuShya ko aura aMtataH samAja ko, pUrNatA pradAna karatI hai
hiMsA kI hara hAlata meM niMdA kI jAnI chAhie
patrakAra aura samAchAra patra, aisI jana afavAhoM, yA gappoM, yA pramANika samAchAroM ko bhI prasArita nahIM karegeM, jinase kisI kA nijI jIvana prabhAvita hotA hai
asala meM eka rachanAkAra kalAkAra ke lie, isa bAta se koI farka nahIM pa.DatA ki sattA meM kauna baiThA hai
fraMTiyara ke saMpAdaka samara sena ko dhamakI dI gaI
ApAtakAla ke daurAna yaha silasilA, kabhI thamatA huA dikhalAI nahIM pa.DatA hai

shrImatI iMdirA gAMdhI ke purAne mitra kuladIpa naiyara, jinakI mitratA, isa hada taka thI ki jaba shrImatI gAMdhI ne, apane laMbe bAloM ko ChoTA karavAyA, taba unhoMne kuladIpa naiyara se savAla kiyA thA, ki aba maiM kaisI dikha rahI hU.N
usameM kuladIpa naiyara ne likhA hai, ki chaubIsa julAI ko subaha chAra baje, jaba pulisa ne mere ghara kA daravAzA khaTakhaTAyA, taba maiM hairata meM pa.Da gayA
isa ghoShaNA ke do dina ke bAda, mere AhRRivAna para dillI ke presa klaba para, eka sau pA.Ncha patrakAroM ne, ekatra hokara, presa para lagAe gae pratibaMdhoM kA purazora virodha kiyA

asala meM kisI bhI rAShTra rAjya meM presa para pratibaMdha lagAe jAne ke kAraNa, yaha hotA hai, ki Ama janatA ke pAsa, sattA dvArA uThAe gae sattApoShI kadama kI jAnakArI, vichAra taMtra kA hissA hai
akhabAroM aura patrikAoM ke sAtha, isa taraha kA laMbA khela, ApAtakAla ke daurAna chalatA rahA
sabase pahale ajIba lagane vAlI bAta ye hai, ki patra patrikAoM kI svataMtratA ko, vyavasAya kI svataMtratA meM shAmila kiyA gayA hai
para kuCha bhI ho, hama vaktA ke vichAra ko nahIM ThukarA sakate
rembraॉ ne maiDonA ko nIdaralaiMDa kI kisAna mahinA ke rUpa meM chitrita kiyA thA
hamArA vakta svataMtratA ko kyoM aise rUpa meM vyakta nahIM karatA jo use priya, aura bodhagamya hai
AMkhe mUMdakara, muMha para paTTI bAMdhakara, isa taraha kAryarata the, mAno AsapAsa jo ho rahA hai, vo saba naॉrmala hai
yadi Aja hama ina patrikAoM ke tatkAlIna aMkoM ko ulaTa palaTa kara dekheM, to shAyada hI anumAna lagA pAeM, ki hama una dinoM kaise saMkaTa kI gha.DI se guzara rahe the
AtaMkavAda ke nAma para nyUza chainaloM meM jo kuCha bhI dikhAyA jA rahA hai, use kAfI hada taka, khabaroM ke badalane kA eka paiTarna bhara mAnA jA sakatA hai
lekina eka sthiti ye bhI hai, ki rozamarrA ke taura para, AtaMkavAda kI khIMchI gayI Chavi, hameM kisI bhI hada taka AtaMkita nahIM karatI, bechaina nahIM karatI
isalie ina ChaviyoM ke prati hamArA vivekashIla aura AlochanAtmaka ravaiyA nahIM, balki, unase sammohita ho jAnevAlA eka rishtA bana gayA hai
filahAla, muMbaI AtaMkavAda ke saMdarbha meM bAta kareM, to AtaMkavAda aura usase paidA honevAlI bhayAvaha sthiti ko dekhane ke lie, kuCha vizualsa esTaiblisha kie gae
agara hoTala tAja, narImana hAusa, aura hoTala ऑbaroya ko Cho.Da de, to bAkI ke vizualsa, Apako kisI bhI AtaMkavAdI ghaTanA ke hone para, mAmUlI hera phera ke sAtha dikhAyI deMge

AtaMkavAdI ghaTanAoM ke vizualsa dekhate hue, koI bhI AsAnI se batA sakatA hai ki, chAhe sthiti kitanI bhI bhayavAha ho, kuCha bhI kavara karane kI sthiti, na banane pAtI ho, lekina AtaMkavAda ke mAhaula ko, esTaiblisha karane ke lie, itanA saba kuCha dikhAnA, anivArya hai
ina vizualsa ke sAtha, jina shabdoM kA, jaise ki esTarna aura slaga kahate haiM, vo bhI lagabhaga, nirAdhrita hotA hai
eka stara, vo jisameM AtaMkavAda usakI sthiti, usase banane vAle hAlAta ko, adhika se adhika asaradAra tarIke se dikhAe jA sakeM
bAda meM, isameM sarakAra kI nAkAmI, rAjanItika peMcha, saMbaddha logoM kI bAiTa Adi, A jAtI haiM
aura dUsarA stara, jisake zarie jazbAta, bhAvanA, rAShTrIyatA, aura iMDiyananesa hone ke sabUta ko prastuta kie jAeM
AtaMka ko ghaMTe meM batAe jAne se, AtaMkavAdiyoM kI taiyArI aura prashAsana kI asaphalatA kI eka tasvIra, hamAre sAmane ubharatI hai
hAlAMki bAda meM yaha avadhi jitanI ho, aura batAyI jAe, usase jazbAta ko utanA upara taka uThAyA jA sakatA hai, ki desha ne AtaMkavAdiyoM kA mukAbalA, kitane ghaMToM taka kiyA

isa artha meM Apa kaha sakate haiM ki shabdoM ke zarie, TelIvizana chainaloM dvArA prayukta Chavi, yUnIimaijinarI hote haiM, jo do virodhI pakShoM, aura viparIta dashA meM, eka hI sAtha kAma meM lAe jA sakate haiM
eDITiMga mashIna se paidA kI jAnevAlI varchuala TUra ko samajhane ke krama meM, silvarasTona ke TelIvizana aura takanIka saMbaMdhI vichAra para nazara DAla lenA, dilachaspa hogA
silvarasTona kA mAnanA hai, ki TelIvizana apane Apa meM eka takanIka hai, auRa yaha eka aisA takanIka hai, jo ki do prakAra ke arthoM se ju.DA huA hai
isase paidA honevAle artha, eka to nirmAtA aura upabhoktA ke zarie hotA hai, aura dUsarA, svayaM isa takanIka ke dvArA, jo ki prasAraNa aura vya vahAra ke daurAna paidA hotA hai
dUsarI bAta, ki TelIvizana se paidA honevAle artha, sirfa unake nirmAtAoM kI sakriyatA se nahIM hotI, balki svayaM usakA upabhoktA, yAni ऑDi eMsa bhI, artha paidA karane meM sakriya hoteM haiM
yahAM para, mArshala maiklUhana kI yaha mAnyatA khaMDita hotI hai, ki TelIvizana, kolDa mAdhyama hai, kyoMki yaha upabhoktA ko paisiva banAtA hai
mArshala maiklUhana ke bAda, TelIvizana vimarsha meM, eka a vadhAraNA, tezI se vikasita huI, jisake antargata, ऑDi eMsa ko bhI, artha paidA karanevAlA, yAni, proDyUsara ke taura para samajhA gayA

sUzana soMTAga kI mAnyatA ke AdhAra para, jaba loga DrAiMga ruma meM baiTha kara AtaMkavAda kI khabareM dekha rahe hote haiM, to itminAna hote haiM, unake bhItara, eka nishchiMtatA kA bodha hotA hai, ki hama surakShita haiM
piChalI rAta maiM eka mitra ke ghara thI, jaba TIvI para maiMne ghAyaloM ko sTrechara para DAla, logoM ko idhara se udhara bhAgate dekhA

pulisa asahAya sI kha.DI thI, logoM meM dahashata vyApta thI, TIvI kA udaghoShaka usI taraha kI uttejanA ke sAtha, sUchanAeM die jA rahA thA, jisa taraha kI uttejanA, vo taba paidA karanA chAhatA hai, jaba rAkhI sAvaMta, apane premI kI piTAI kara detI hai
eka stara para, saba kuCha vyartha nazara AtA hai
lekina kyA ve sabhI asAmAnya yA bure loga haiM, yA ve aise loga haiM, jinase hama TakarAte haiM, jinameM se koI, shAyada hamAre sAtha kAma karatA ho, yA hamAre Asa pAsa hI maujUda ho
vyaktigata Akrosha bhI sAmuhika Akrosha, aura isa taraha ghRRiNA kI rAjanIti ko baढ़AvA detA hai
khaira, yahAM hama ghRRiNA kI tAkata ko samajhane kI, saiddhAMtika koshisha, nahI kara rahe hai
maiM, apane bhItara, Akrosha kI isa bIja ko, aura sIMchanA nahIM chAhatI
kyoMki, jo huvA, usake asara ko, miTane meM to laMbA samaya lagegA, lekina, hamArI eka eka sakArAtmaka UrjA, duniyA ko, badala sakatI hai

yaha ArAma se kaha diyA jAtA hai ki, jiMdagI meM pahale hI bahuta tanAva haiM, aise meM, yathArtha vAdI filmeM dekha kara, apane dimAga para, aura bojha kyoM DAleM, jabaki palAyanavAdI manoraMjaka filmeM dekhakara, usa yathArtha se, kuCha dera ke lie hI sahI, muMha churAyA jA sakatA hai
lekina, taba kyA, jaba aisA hI koI yathArtha, hamArI ThaharI huI jiMdagI meM, achAnaka se, ghusapaiTha kara AtA hai, taba hama usakA mukAbalA karane meM, svayaM ko, asamartha pAte haiM

taba hama kyA karate haiM, maiM jisa daurAna isa dvaMda se jUjha rahI thI, usa vakta, subaha kI bhayAnaka khabaroM, aura tasvIroM ko dekhane se bachI huI thI, kyoMki muMbaI meM, maiM apanI jisa dosta ke ghara meM ThaharI thI, usake ghara meM, na to TIvI hai, aura na akhabAra hI maMgavAyA jAtA hai
aura taba, dillI vApasI ke lie, havAI jahAza meM baiThane ke bAda, maiMne akhabAroM meM, ve bhayavAha tasvIreM dekhIM, jinheM shAyada, bAkI sabha loga, rAta bhara dekhate rahe hoMge

ina tasvIroM ne, mujhe aMdara taka vichalita kara diyA, aura isase bhI zyAdA vichalita kara diyA, anya pRRiShThoM para ChapI, una tasvIroM ne, jo sAmAnya kArya vyApAra ke chalate rahane kI, sabhI paribhAShAoM kA, atikramaNa kara jAtI haiM
inameM, eka peja para yaha batAyA gayA thA, ki ghuMgharAle bAla, aba phira faishana meM haiM
to, kyoM sirfa eka dina inheM nahIM Cho.DA jA sakatA thA
kyA sAla meM koI aisA dina nahIM hai, jaba hama apane shoka ko, prakaTa kara sakeM, aura isa taraha kI hiMsA ke khilAfa, apanA pratirodha, darja karA sakeM

paMdraha dinoM ke bAda, eka rAta ko, jaba yuvarAja bhojana ke bAda, sone kI taiyArI kara rahA thA, taba parichArikA, pIne ke lie dUdha le AyI, aura palaMga ke baGala meM, eka meza para rakhakara, chalI gayI

kyA desha para garva mahasUsa karane ke lie karo.DoM rupae kharcha kara, apane yAna ko chAMda para bhejane ke alAvA, koI aisA tarIkA bhI hai, jisase behatara surakShA upAya kara, mAsUma logoM ko, isa taraha mAre jAne se bachAyA jA sake
kyA koI aisA tarIkA hai, ki Akrosha ko itanI gaharI ja.De jamAne se rokA jA sake, jisakI pariNiti, isa taraha kI hiMsA meM hotI hai

jaba maiM ina bIsa bAIsa sAla ke yuvAoM ko dekhatI hUM, to eka gaharI udAsI se bhara jAtI hUM, aura mere mana meM, yahI sahaja savAla uThatA hai, ki Akhira, vo kyA vajaha rahI hogI, jisane unheM yahAM lA Cho.DA hai

kyA isake pIChe yahI kAraNa hai, ki sabhI ko jIvana meM eka makasada kI talAsha rahatI hai, aura jaba koI yuvA isa rAha para AtA hai, jise mishana kA nAma diyA jAtA hai, to achAnaka se, use jIne kA makasada mila jAtA hai, aura usakI nigAha meM, usakI apanI ahamiyata baढ़ jAtI hai, aura ve usI rAha para chala pa.Date haiM
kyA yaha saMsAra unheM itanA nAkuCha hone kA ahasAsa karAtA hai, ki jaisI hI, unheM koI eka pahachAna milatI hai, ve usase chipaka jAnA chAhate haiM, use oढ़ lenA chAhate haiM
lekina jaisA ki hama jAnate haiM, ki janma se koI bhI burA nahIM hotA, aura dasa varSha kI umra taka koI bhI bachchA, mahaza bachchA hI hotA hai
taba phira, isa komala mastiShka meM, bAda meM aisA kyA ghaTita ho jAtA hai, ki jisake lie, use khuda apane prANoM kA bhI moha nahIM raha jAtA hai
jaba knUta hAmsuna, lagabhaga tIsa ke the, ve bhUkha se mara rahe the, eka aTArI meM, jo chandramA se sirfa, tIna fuTa kI dUrI para thI, aura unakA, aba taka kA hAsila, kuCha bhI nahIM thA

eka upanyAsa kI adhUrI pANDulipi unake pAsa thI, jisakA pahalA vAkya thA, ye usa samaya kI bAta hai, jaba maiM kristiyAniyA meM bhUkha se mara rahA thA, usa shahara meM, jisakI ChApa lie binA, koI use Cho.Da nahIM sakatA

duniyA ke nakshe meM, uttara yUropa ke nanhIM sI illI numA isa desha meM, jahAM mIloM mIla loga DhU.NDhe nahIM milate, hAmsuna ko paढ़ne aura chAhane vAle loga, ba.DI saMkhyA meM pAye jAte haiM, yaha sAhitya meM, shiddata se jIne marane vAle loga haiM

ho sakatA hai, ve hAmsuna nAma kI pahelI se kShubdha, Ahata, aura achambhita hoM, lekina ve hAmsuna ko, isa kautUhala se to nishchita hI nahIM pa.Dhate, ki dekheM to sahI, ki hiTalara ke samarthaka, isa vikShipta lekhaka kI kitAboM meM, usa khaufanAka vichAradhArA ke koI saMketa maujUda bhI haiM, yA nahIM

sAhityika kRRitiyoM ko junUna kI hada taka chAhane vAle logoM kA, laghutama, samApavartya, Akhira kyA ho sakatA hai, aura ina kRRitiyoM ke lekhakoM ke kore tathya, isa prakAra haiM
pulisa kI hirAsata meM hAmsuna para mukadamA chalAyA gayA, aura isa prasaMga kA itihAsa, aba nArve taka hI mahadUda nahIM raha gayA hai

jisa krUratA se, manochikitsIya jA.Ncha ke bahAne, vRRiddha hAmsuna ko yAtanA dI gayI, vaha DenamArka ke lekhaka thaॉrakilDa hAmsuna kI pustaka, proseshana meM paine aura mArmika vivaraNoM ke sAtha, darja hai
isa pustaka se, aura isake lekhaka ke prati huI pratikriyA se, isa bAta kA anumAna, sahaja hI lagAyA jA sakatA hai, ki kevala nAzI hI, nAzI nahIM the

hAmsuna ko burI taraha to.Da dene kI koshisha kI gayI, binA isa jIvana ko bArIkI se dekhe, jisameM vaha lekhana maujUda thA, jo ऑsmaMDa brinilasana ke anusAra, usa mUढ़ falasafe kA a na varata vikhaNDana thA

apane saMyaMtra meM maujUda padArthoM ke kAraNa, saMbhAvita KataroM ke bAre meM jAnie

isa saMdarbha meM, aMgrezI meM prakAshita, jina do anya upanyAsoM kI visheSha charchA kI jA sakatI hai, unameM eka upanyAsa, salamAna rushdI kA, shAlImAra da klAuna hai

vaise, isa upanyAsa meM, vyaktigata saMbaMdhoM ke kAraNa, bhArata meM, amerikA ke pUrva rAjadUta kI eka kashmIrI dvArA, hatyA kI jAtI hai, lekina, isI visheSha saMdarbha ke kAraNa, yaha ghaTanA, apane Apa meM, AtaMkavAdI ghaTanA, pratIta hone lagatI hai
muslima, anya kI Chavi kA nirmANa, kisa taraha kiyA jA rahA hai, isakI eka jhalaka, isa upanyAsa meM dikhAI detI hai
kisa taraha, amerikA meM musalamAnoM ko lekara dhAraNAeM, ruढ़ hotI jA rahI haiM, kisa taraha samAja meM, unako shaMkA kI nigAha se, dekhA jAtA hai
UparI taura para, yaha kahAnI, satraha varShIya ahamada ke, eka masjida ke nau javAna, imAma shekha rAshida ke prabhAva meM Akara, suisAiDa bAmbara ke rUpa meM rUpAMtaraNa kI hai
salamAna rushdI ke upanyAsa, shAlImAra da klAuna kI taraha, isameM bhI jAsUsI upanyAsoM kI taraha, thrila hai, jisake sUtra dharma, rAjanIti sAMskRRitika pahachAna se, ju.De savAloM se ju.Date haiM
kathA kI eka visheShatA, yaha hai ki isameM ahamada nAmaka usa AtaMkavAdI ke nazarie se, kathA kahane kI koshisha, kI gaI hai
upanyAsa ke AraMbha meM, vaha pAshchAtya, sabhyatA ke pratIkoM ko, Devila kahakara, yAda karatA hai
vaha, dharma ke anurUpa AcharaNa karatA hai, aura isa bAta ko lekara, dukhI rahatA hai ki, samAja meM sarvatra anaitikatA, baढ़tI jA rahI hai
lekhaka ne, usakI pArivArika jIvana kI jaTilatAoM kA kAMTrAsTa, usake dhArmika jIvana kI saralatAoM ke sAtha dikhAyA hai
bahulatAvAdI samAjoM ke lie, Adarsha samajhe jAne vAle desha, amerikA ke yuvAoM kA, sTaiMDapAiMTa kyA hai, yaha upanyAsa kI kathA meM ubhara kara AtA hai
upanyAsa meM, musalamAna aura IsAI dharma ke logoM kI, eka dUsare ke prati ghRRiNA dikhAI detI hai
yaha, vo pradatta simeNTika paryAvaraNa hai, jisameM, AtaMka ke bAre meM, kuCha bhI kahA jA sakanA, saMbhava hai
jo isa karma ke lakShya haiM, ve isameM haiM, yA nahIM haiM, yA adRRishya haiM, mauna haiM, yA sajjA haiM

AtaMka ko, niShpAdita karane vAloM, use aMjAma dene vAloM kA vimarsha hai, usake vikTima kA nahIM
bama dhamAkoM aura sIriyala blAsTsa ke sAtha, hama manuShya ke itihAsa meM, eka naye charaNa meM pravesha kara gaye hai, hama eka sarvathA, naye vikTima ke samukha haiM

eka aisA manuShya, jo apanI chama.DI ke raMga, rAShTrIyatA, dhArmika, jAtIya laiMgika pahachAna, yA sampatti, yA usake abhAva ke kAraNa nahIM, balki sirfa isaliye eka vikTima hai, ki vo, eka sthAna visheSha para, samaya visheSha ke liye, upasthita thA
isa vikTima ko, usakI anUThI avasthiti ko, usa pUre vimarsha meM, kendrIya banAne kA artha hogA, isakA pratishodha, saMbhava nahIM hai
yadi yaha eka rainDama hiMsA ho, to prati hiMsA ko uchita, nyAyochita banA pAnA, bohota mushkila hai
aisI hiMsA ko, jisakI koI, naslIya, dhArmika, jAtIya, laiMgika, vichAradhArAtmaka, vargIya varIyatAe.N nahIM haiM, vaha hameM sabase vichitra, asamaMjasa meM DAlatI hai

yaha aMka AtaMka ke vimarsha hai, usake sArvajanika, mukhyadhArA vachana meM, isa sarvathA naye vikTimsa kI trAsadI ko, usakI anupasthiti, usake mauna, usakI AvAza ko, sunane pa.Dhane kI eka ChoTI sI, kaI taraha se, aparyApta koshisha hai

ina chAra barasoM meM, hiMdI meM durbhAgya se, mazabUta lAibrerI, sAMskRRiti hai
usakI prasiddhi kA kAraNa, yaha tathya hai ki, use, eka pradarshanavAdI, TIvI prastotA, gunara benera kI hatyA ke liye, zimmevAra mAnA jAtA hai

mA.N to basa ghara bAra aura laDaqI kI sundaratA para, aura unakI shAnadAra mehamAna navAzI para, rIjha gaIM

shAdI ke tAma jhAma ke bAda, jaba apanI jIvana saMginI se milane kI, eka dUsare ko jAnane kI rAta AI, to shAdI ke shAnadAra palaMga para, phUloM kI sajAvaTa ke bIcha, use lAla joDe meM, apanI dulhana nahIM milI
mujhe ChUnA mata, yaha shAdI nahIM hai, avinAsha samajhautA hai
vaha sundara cheharA, vitRRiShNA se bhara gayA thA

usake bAda, jaba vaha agale dina mAyake gaI, to usakI jagaha lauTa kara, vivAha ko shUnya sAbita karane ke liye, usake vakIla kA noTisa AyA, jisameM Aropa thA ki, vaha napuMsaka hai, aura vivAha ke yogya nahIM

use malAla ho rahA hai, usane sochA thA, ki isa bAra, enuala lIva lekara, mA.N ke sAtha, zyAdA se zyAdA samaya bitAegA, aura mA.N ke sAtha, lambI yAtrAoM para jAegA, pUrA bhArata ghUmegA

bI esa sI saikeNDa Iyara meM paDhatI hai
beTA jAo, mammI ko bhejo, aura kichana meM chAya aura snaiksa ke liye kahanA

shrImati sinhA, eka sundara va sabhrAnta mahilA lagI
chAya kI aupachArikatA ke bAda, vaha farsTa flora para bane gesTa rUma meM A gayA
rUma kyA thA, eka ChoTA moTA sA samasta suvidhAoM se yukta, flaiTa hI thA

ye sudhA hai merI bahana, je je ArTasa meM, fAIna ArTasa kI laika charara hai, vaise baॉmbe rahatI hai, para abhI mere sAtha vekeshansa bitAne AI hai

usane pahalI bAra, sudhA ko gaura se dekhA, tAmbaI raMga, snigdha tvachA, baDI baDI qAjala se ladI A.NkheM, bhare hoMTha, aura thoDI chauDI nAka, chehare para, bohota paripakva sadhA huA bhAva
bhare sAnupAtika jisma para, bAtika prinTa kA bharA kurtA, aura jInsa, ghane kAle lambe bAloM ko, AkarShaka magara betaratIba jUDe meM lapeTA huA
bAta karane ke DhaMga, aura shabdoM ke chayana se lagatA hai ki, budhdijIvI aura kalAkAra bAta kara rahA hai
phira nazara ghUmI, to nIlA para jA TikI, champaI raMga, buA kI sI hI baDI baDI lambI A.NkheM, para nAka aura hoMTha mAM jaisI sughaDha
subaha, vaha dera se uTha sakA, uThate hI khiDaqI meM AyA, to dekhA nIche mayaMka, aura usakA dosta, jipsI meM sAmAna rakha rahe the
vaha nahA dhokara nIche utara AyA, nIlAMjanA jaldI jaldI brekafAsTa kara, kaॉleja jAne kI taiyArI me thI, usake liye bhI, vahI chAya A gaI
merA mana nahIM kara rahA kaॉleja jAne kA, para Aja merA prekTikalsa pIrIyaDa hai, bAhara buA, eka penTiMga banA rahI hai, dekhate rahiyegA, bora nahIM hoMge

isake bIcha, na jAne kitanI penTiMgsa banA DAlI
yaha aTakI huI hai, da rasala baॉmbe hotI to, pUrA ho jAtI, ise nIlA, le nahIM jAne detI hai
hasI ke chehare para se, gaMbhIratA ke mukhauTe ko, khisakA jAtI hai
usane penTiMga ko dhyAna se dekhA, use vaha, nIlA kI porTreTa lagI
sudhA ne bAloM se, lakaDI qA, maChalI ke sira vAlA kAMTA nikAlA, jo ki, usakI ruchi ke anusAra, kalAtmaka thA, aura bAla kamara taka phaila gaye, aura pahADI bayAra meM, uDane lage

vaha bhI shAyada, yahI socha rahI hogI, apanI apanI AzAdiyoM kI, lata laga gaI hai hameM

nakkI leka para pahuMchate pahuMchate shAma ho gaI thI, sudhA ko, boTiMga meM zarA bhI dilachaspI nahIM thI, so vaha, shaॉla lekara, kinAre rakhI eka baincha para baiTha gaI, maiM, na chAha kara bhI, nIlA ke sAtha, boTiMga para chalA gayA
avinAsha jI, sana seTa ke vakta sabakI A.NkhoM kA raMga, badala jAtA hai, dekho, ApakI aura merI
nIlAMjanA kI A.NkhoM meM samudra uphAna para thA, usake khule sIdhe sIdhe bhUre bAla, sone ke tAra, laga rahe the
havA meM uDatA usakA laisa vAlA kaॉlara, avinAshajI, kyA dekha rahe the, yahI, ki tuma bahuta sundara ho
prakRRiti meM, hara chIza sundara hai, mujhe to, hara chIza sundara lagatI hai
sabakA sochane kA DhaMga hai, apanA apanA, kyA ye jhIla riyala nahIM, vo jalapAMkhiyoM kA jhuNDa riyala nahIM
tumheM kyA mAlUma, zindagI kitanI baDI grima riyeliTI hai, jise tumheM batA kara, DarAnA nahIM chAhatA
Ishvara kare, tumheM zindagI unhIM sundara satyoM ke rUpa meM mile, DarAvane mukhauTe pahana kara nahIM
thoDI chaDhAI chaDha qara, hama semI preshayasa sTona, aura chAMdI kI jyUlarI kI dukAna para, A gaI
patA hai, Apane jo firozA kA penDenTa DizAina kara ke banavAyA thA, vo, faॉrinarsa meM bahuta paॉpulara huA
kahA.N kahA.N se AdivAsiyoM ke DijAIna kaॉpI karavA ke, silvara kA ऑksIDAIz.Da karavA kara pahanatI hai
merA basa chale, to kAnoM meM, babUla ke gola phUla pahanUM, bAloM meM raMgabiraMge paMkha lagA lUM

aba Apa donoM hI, apane apane mana meM, apane ghuTana kA kAraNa DhUMDho
kuCha dera bAda, seTha ne, chuppI toDI, aura kahA, he rAjagurU, sArA kusUra, merA hai
