DaॉkTara ne, unheM kuCha TesTa karAne ko kahA, aura unhoMne karAe bhI.
unako isakA anumAna bhI na thA, ki unako kyA huA hai.
aura tabhI DaॉkTara ne kahA, ki Apa ke peTa meM, eka mAMsa kA Tuka.DA hai, jisakA AkAra, eka geMda kI bhAMti hai.
para vo insAna bilkula bhI nahIM DarA, aura ghabarAyA, kyoMki usako jIne kI chAha thI.
usake kaMdhoM para zimmedArI thI.
usane DaॉkTara ko kahA, DaॉkTara sAhaba, Apa basa mujhe davAI dIjie, bAkI saba maiM saMbhAla lU.NgA.
phira usa vyakti ne davAI lenI shurU kara dI, aura apanI zindagI vyatIta karane lagA.
jaise usako kuCha huA hI nahIM thA, eka Ama AdamI kI taraha, apanI zindagI vyatIta kara rahA thA.
usakI beTI kI shAdI to pahale hI ho chukI thI, aba usane apane pahale beTe kI bhI shAdI kara dI.
dhIre dhIre vaqta bItatA gayA, aura sAla bIta gae.
aba vo apanI sarakArI naukarI se bhI sevAnivRRitta ho chukA thA.
aba usa vyakti ne apane ChoTe beTe kI shAdI bhI taya kara dI, para aba usakI hAlata pahale jaisI nahIM thI.
vo sharIra se bahuta zyAdA kamazora ho chukA thA.
zyAdA ghUma phira nahIM sakatA thA, para phira bhI, usane kabhI kisI se isa bAta kA zikra nahIM kiyA.
basa apanI zimmedArI, ghara ke lie, aura jisa saMsthA se ju.DA huA thA, usake lie kAma karatA chalA gayA.
usane apane ChoTe bachche kI bhI shAdI kara dI, para usakI hAlata, dhIre dhIre aura KarAba hotI chalI gaI.
gharavAloM ke lAkha kahane para, usane phira se kisI aura DaॉkTara ko dikhAyA, aura kuCha TesTa karavAe.
paraMtu aba kI bAra jo DaॉkTara ne kahA, vaha suna kara, kuCha pala ke lie sehama gayA.
para usa vaqta to usane apane Apa ko saMbhAla liyA, paraMtu mana hI mana meM, vo Dara sA gayA.
yahI vaqta thA, jaba usakA Dara, usakI jIne kI chAha para, bhArI pa.Dane lagA.
dostoM, inhI chaMda lamhoM ne, usakI zindagI badala dI.
aba dhIre dhIre usakI hAlata aura biga.DatI chalI gaI, aura vo, bistara ko paka.Dane lagA.
aba vo zyAdA bistara para hI leTA rahatA thA.
aba kI bAra usake ghara vAle bhI bahuta zyAdA Dara gae the.
kyoMki usa vyakti ne apanI jIne kI chAha hI Cho.Da dI thI.
mAno unhoMne apane mana meM ye ThAna hI liyA thA, ki vo aba ThIka nahIM ho sakate.
gharavAloM ne bhI unako josha, naI ummIda dilAne kI bahuta koshisha kI.
paraMtu saba bekAra thA, dhIre dhIre unakI hAlata, aura biga.DatI chalI gaI.
isI sAla ke jana varI mAha ko unakA svargavAsa ho gayA, aura usI dina, ekA dashI bhI thI.
kahate hai kI jo insAna ekAdashI vAle dina jAtA hai, vo bahuta hI bhAgyashAlI hotA hai.
unakI mRRityu ke pashchAta, jaise mAno saba thama sA gayA ho.
sabhI ghara vAle aura unakI saMsthA vAle vilApa karane lage, aura sAtha hI sAtha, bhagavAna kA kIrtana karane lage.
unakI saMsthA ke loga, isI maMtra kA jApa kie jA rahe the.
lekina mere pAsa shabda nahIM hai, usa vaqta ko bayAna karane ke lie.
para mAno vo maMtra, jaise unake parivAra vAloM ko shakti de rahA ho.
usa pitA ke, ChoTe beTe ne tho.DI himmata dikhAI.
vo jAnatA thA kI kisI nA kisI ko himmata karanI hogI, tAki unakI aMtima yAtrA ho sake.
vo Upara se to bahuta koshisha kara rahA thA, na rone kI.
kyoMki vo apanI mA.N, bhAI bahana ko hauMsalA de sake.
parantu mana hI mana, vo bahuta TUTa chukA thA, aura abhI taka, vo saMbhala nahIM pAyA thA.
sabhI loga apane kartavya pUrNa karake ghara vApasa A gae.
unake jAne ke bAda, sabhI loga unake gharavAloM ko hauMsalA dene lage.
unake jAne ke bAda, mAno sabhI parivAra vAloM kI bhI, jIne kI chAha nahIM rahI thI.
sabhI ke sabhI ghara vAle TUTa chuke the, aura abhI taka, vo saMbhala nahIM pAe the.
hara vaqta aisA lagatA hai, kI abhI vo kIrtana kara ke vApasa A jAyeMge, para vo nahIM Ae.
aura unakI rAha, Aja taka unakA parivAra dekhatA hai.
ye bAta vo bhI jAnate haiM, jo jAtA hai, vo vApasa kabhI nahIM AtA.
para usa mana ko kaise samajhAyeM, jo jAna kara bhI anajAna bana jAtA hai.
dosto, merI ye kahAnI Apa logoM ke sAtha bA.NTane kA sirfa yahI makasada hai.
jIne kI chAha bahuta zarUrI hotI hai, vo jIne kA jazbA hameshA insAna ke aMdara honA chAhie.
agara unhoMne bhI apanI jIne kI chAha na Cho.DI hotI, to shAyada, vo hamAre bIcha meM hote, aura apane parivAra vAloM ke sAtha, haMsa bola rahe hote.
shAyada abhI taka unake parivAra vAloM kA darda mahasUsa na kara pAeM.
kyoMki aisA dukha, jisake sAtha hotA hai, vahI isa darda ko samajha sakatA hai.
apanI jIne kI chAha ko kabhI kama nahIM karanA chAhie, aura agara Apa aisA karate haiM, to Apa khuda mahasUsa kareMge kI Apa, apanI bImArI se ThIka ho rahe haiM.
eka dina bIrabala kI beTI ne bAdashAha se milane ke lie bahuta zora diyA.
vo bhI apane pitA ke samAna buddhimAna tathA chatura thI.
bIrabala use khusha karane ke lie mehala meM le gayA.
mehala meM jAkara, usane sabhI kakSha, tathA shAhI udyAna dekhe.
usake bAda, vaha shAhI darabAra meM gaI.
usa samaya bAdashAha darabAra meM baiThe the.
unhoMne bIrabala kI beTI ko dekhA, tathA usakA svAgata kiyA.
usake bAda, vaha bhojana karane chalI gaI.
bhojana ke bAda bAdashAha ne usase pUChA, beTI, kyA tuma jAnatI ho, ki kisa prakAra bAta karanI chAhie.
aura yaha javAba sunakara bAdashAha hairAna ho gae.
unheM samajha nahIM AyA, ki vaha kyA batAnA chAhatI hai.
isalie unhoMne usase pUChA, tuma kyA kahanA chAhatI ho beTI.
merA matalaba hai, ki mujhe ba.DoM se kama bAteM karanI chAhie, aura mitroM ke sAtha adhika.
bIrabala kI beTI kA itanA uttama javAba sunakara, bAdashAha bahuta prasanna hue, aura bole, to tuma bhI apane pitA ke samAna chatura ho.
eka sAdhu, tIrtha yAtrA para nikale.
vaha mArga meM pa.Dane vAle gA.NvoM, aura kasboM meM Thahara jAte the.
jahA.N jo bhI bhakta unheM prema aura Adara se bulAte, ve chale jAte.
eka gA.Nva meM eka aisA bhakta milA, jisane unheM eka gAya dAna de dI.
vaha bolA, mahArAja, ise Apa sAtha rakhie.
rAste meM ghAsa pAta legI aura Apako dUdha bhI degI.
sAdhu ne gAya le lI, aura Age chala pa.De.
abhI kuCha dUra hI gae hoMge ki eka vyApArI milA.
vaha bhI sAdhu ke sAtha-sAtha chalane lagA.
vyApArI ne sAdhu ko apanA parichaya diyA.
phira utsukatAvasha pUCha baiThA, yaha gAya lekara Apa tIrtha yAtrA ke lie kyoM nikale hai.
sAdhu ne kahA, maiM to akelA hI chalA thA.
paraMtu eka bhakta ne ise bhI sAtha kara diyA, tAki dUdha milatA rahe.
vyApArI ne dekhA kI gAya bahuta sundara hai.
agara kisI taraha ise maiM kharIda lU.N, to isake achChe dAma mila jAyeMge.
yaha sochakara vyApArI bolA, mahArAja, jisa gA.Nva meM DerA DAla deMge, Apake lie bhalA dUdha kI kyA kamI hogI vahA.N.
vahA.N bhaktta loga dUdha hI dUdha le AeMge.
para itanA zarUra hai kI jaMgala kA mAmalA hai, agara gAya ko khatarA ho gayA, to vyartha hI Apako pApa lagegA.
merI bAta mAnie, Apa ise becha dIjie.
sAdhu ne kahA, dAna meM milI gAya ko bechanA bhI to pApa hai.
maiM to sochatA hU.N, Age jo gA.Nva AegA, vahA.N agara koI sachchA bhaktta mila gayA, to use hI de dU.NgA.
vyApArI kA lobha, aba aura bhI ba.Dha gayA.
vaha bolA, subaha shAma bhagavAna kI pUjA karanA, brAhmaNoM ko dAna denA, sachchAI aura ImAnadArI se rahanA to merI bhI visheShatA hai.
kyA maiM isa gAya ko prApta karane yogya nahIM hU.N.
sAdhu usa vyApArI ke mana kI bAta samajha gae.
tuma bhI isa gAya ko prApta karane ke adhikArI bana sakate ho, lekina usase pahale eka kAma karanA hogA.
tuma apanA yaha loTA mujhe de do, aura maiM isameM gAya kA dUdha dohakara tumhe dU.NgA.
yaha loTA lekara tuma usa gA.Nva taka mere sAtha chaloge.
yadi rAste meM loTe kA eka bU.Nda dUdha bhI Chalakakara gira gayA, to tuma gAya prApta karane kA adhikAra kho doge.
vyApArI ne sochA, isameM kauna sI mushkila bAta hai.
usane apanA loTA sAdhu ko de diyA.
sAdhu ne usameM dUdha dohakara use de diyA, aura ve phira chala pa.De.
dUdha se labAlaba bharA loTA liye, vyApArI bhI chalane lagA.
vaha bahuta khusha thA kI use itanI sundara gAya mufta meM hI mila jAegI.
usane sochA, mAna lo isa gAya ke lie mujhe mu.NhamA.Nge dAma na mile, to ise maiM ghara para hI rakha lU.NgA.
ghara ke dvAra para ba.NdhI itanI suMdara gAya dekhakara, loga bAra bAra yahI pUCheMge ki are lAlAjI, ise kahA.N se le Ae.
itanA sochate hI usakA eka hAtha, mUChoM taka pahu.Ncha gayA, aura dUsare hAtha ne, loTe kA saMtulana kho diyA.
phira to dUdha Chalaka gayA.
sAdhu muskarAe, aura bole, aba to tuma gAya nahIM prApta kara sakoge.
lekina eka bAta gA.NTha bAMdha lo, kabhI kisI chIza ko prApta karane ke lie, mana meM lobha na lAnA, aura na hI shAna dikhAnA.
agara tuma ekAgra aura shAMta mana se dUdha ke loTe ko saMbhAlakara gAya prApta karane kI bAta sochate, to zarUra saphala ho jAte.
aba to isa sIkha ko prApta karake saMtoSha karo.
sacha aura jhUTha, ju.DavA.N bhAI the, donoM ki eka sI shakla thI.
donoM eka hI taraha ke, eka hI raMga ke kapa.De pahanate the, eka sAtha khelate, eka sAtha pa.Dhate.
donoM ko dekhakara loga yaha nahIM samajha pAte the, ki inameM kauna sacha hai aura kauna jhUTha.
para donoM ko sabhI pasaMda karate the.
donoM suMdara the aura ha.Nsamukha bhI.
taba unake nAma kA matalaba vaha na thA jo Aja hai.
ve to basa mamatAmayI mA.N ke do pyAre beTe the.
donoM kA bachapana to khela kUda meM bIta gayA.
lekina kishora hote hI, donoM apane-apane mana kI karane lage.
jaba jhUTha koI shaitAnI karake AtA, to loga shikAyata sacha kI karate.
jaba sacha koI achChA kAma karake AtA, to prashaMsA luTane meM jhUTha bAzI mAra le jAtA.
jhUTha bhrama kA fAyadA uThAne meM kabhI na chukatA.
sacha ne kaI bAra yaha sochakara sahana kara liyA, ki chalo merA bhAI hai, shAyada sudhara jAegA.
mA.N ne bhI jhUTha ko sudhArane kI bahuta koshisha kI, kintu jhUTha burI AdateM nahIM Cho.Da sakA.
mA.N ne unheM alaga-alaga taraha ke kapa.De pahanAne shurU kara die, aura loga unheM pahachAnane lage.
kintu isase bhI samasyA hala na huI.
jhUTha ko jaise hI maukA milatA, vaha sacha jaise kapa.De pahanakara, manachAhe kAma kara AtA, aura doShI sacha ko ThaharAyA jAtA.
eka dina mA.N bImAra pa.DI, usake bachane kI koI AshA na rahI.
taba usane donoM beToM ko bulAyA aura unase bolI, maiM aba marane vAlI hU.N.
kyA tuma merI aMtima ichChA pUrI karoge.
donoM beTe Aj~nA mAnane ke lie taiyAra ho gae.
mA.N ne kahA, tuma donoM eka dUsare kI tarafa pITha karake kha.De ho jAo.
jaba taka maiM tumase Ane ke lie nA kahU.N, taba taka aise hI rahanA.
itanA kahakara mA.N ne aMtima sA.Nsa le lI.
taba se sacha aura jhUTha eka dUsare ke sAmane nahIM A rahe haiM.
Aja taka mA.N ke Adesha kI pratIkShA kara rahe haiM, lekina jhUTha ne jo bhrama phailAyA thA, usakA asara Aja bhI bAkI hai.
isI kAraNa kaI bAra sacha ko bhI loga jhUTha aura jhUTha ko sacha mAna baiThate hai.
hiMdustAna meM chAra dhAma mAne jAte hai.
ye dhAma haiM badrInAtha, kedAranAtha, gaMgotrI aura yamunotrI.
inase juDI huI kaI paurANika aura dhArmika kathAe.N haiM.
ye mahatvapUrNa darshanIya sthala bhI haiM.
ina chAro dhAmoM meM sabase adhika prAkRRitika saundarya se paripUrNa aura sabase kama kharchIlI yAtrA hai, yamunotrI.
samudra tala se, fITa kI U.NchAI para, yamunA nadI kI udgama sthalI yamunotrI, uttarAMchala ke uttara kAshI ke bIcha meM sthita hai.
yaha gaMgotrI ke viruddha dishA meM RRiShikesha aura uttara kAshI ke bIcha meM sthita hai.
isa tIrtha sthala ke lie RRiShikesha se hanumAna chaTTI ke lie baseM Adi milatI hai.
Age kI sheSha yAtrA paidala pAlakI TaTTU yA kuliyoM kI pITha para kI jAtI hai.
haridvAra aura kShetra ke anya mukhya sthAnoM se bhI, hanumAna chaTTI AsAnI se pahu.NchA jA sakatA hai.
isake darshana ke lie buzurga aura apaMga vyakti bhI kisI devI utsAha se bhare hue, vahA.N pahu.Ncha kara hI dama lete hai.
ve haDDiyAM kaMpA dene vAlI ThanDa kI bhI paravAha nahIM karate.
eka tarafa unakI AsthA hai, aura dUsarI tarafa, svayaM yamunA nadI hai, jo gupta rUpa se bahatI huI maidAnoM meM utaratI hai.
yamunA nadI, yamunotrI meM kAliMda parvatoM meM sthita gleshiyara se nikalatI hai, aura prayAga meM A kara, isakA astitva gaMgA meM vilIna ho jAtA hai.
lekina isase isakA mahattva zarA bhI kama nahIM hotA.
gaMgA yadi AdhyAtmikatA pavitratA aura pApa se mukti kI nadI hai, to yamunA prema kI pratIka hai.
sardI meM akTUbara se lekara apraila-maI taka, Chaha mahIne barfa jama jAne ke kAraNa, badrInAtha maMdira ke dvAra baMda rahate haiM, isalie isa daurAna yAtrA bhI sthagita rahatI hai.
barfa pighalane para, apraila-maI meM yaha yAtrA phira se shurU hotI hai.
usa samaya yAtriyoM kI saMkhyA bhI sabase adhika hotI hai.
badrInAtha ke bAda, yAtrI gaMgotrI aura kedAranAtha dhAma Ate haiM.
yahAM taka achChI sa.DakeM aura dharmashAlAaiM Adi haiM.
yamunotrI pahu.Nchane ke lie moTara vAhana kA rAstA syanA chaTTI taka jAtA hai.
yAtrI apanA sAmAna yahIM Cho.Da kara hanumAna chaTTI pahu.Nchate haiM.
yahA.N hanumAna gaMgA DoDitAla se AtI huI yamunA se milatI hai.
yahA.N kA prAkRRitika dRRishya ba.DA hI suhAvanA hai.
yahA.N yAtrI jIpa dvArA phUlachaTTI pahu.Nchate hai.
yaha yAtrA jokhima bharI hotI hai.
yahA.N kI pahA.DiyA.N khaDiyA miTTI kI haiM, aura naI banI sa.Daka dhumAvadAra hai.
barasAta se, isa sa.Daka para phisalana bhI hotI hai, jisase hara kShaNa, durghaTanA kI AshaMkA banI rahatI hai.
phUlachaTTI se yAtriyoM ko paidala hI jAnA pa.DatA hai.
adhika se adhika yahA.N se TaTTU kirAe para lie jA sakate haiM.
yAtrA ke samaya bhI, yahA.N ThaMDa hotI hai, aura agara barasAta ho to ThaMDa bahuta baढ़ jAtI hai.
yAtrIgaNa phUlachaTTI se yamunotrI taka kI Chaha kilomITara kI yAtrA paidala hI taya karate haiM.
lekina bahuta se loga TaTTU kAMdhI yA DAMDI meM yAtrA karate haiM.
dUsare dina sUrya udaya ke sAtha hI yAtrI yamunotrI ke lie nikala pa.Date haiM.
samudra tala se, mITara kI U.NchAI para sthita isa sthAna kI yAtrA phUlachaTTI se aura bhI kaThina ho jAtI hai.
yaha rAstA isa sthAna se patharIlA saMkarA phisalana bharA khataranAka hai.
yamunotrI meM shikhara para eka ChoTA sA maMdira nazara AtA hai, jisameM yamunA aura shrI kRRiShNa kI mUrtiyA.N haiM.
maMdira kA shikhara, samudra tala se, U.NchA hai.
yamunotrI pahu.Nchane para sabase pahale yAtrI, vahA.N ke svachCha aura shItala jala meM snAna karate haiM.
yahA.N yamunA, bAlyAvasthA meM hai.
yamunA kA nirmala mAno hara yAtrI ke hradaya meM, svataH hI bhakti kA bhAva jagAtA hai.
snAna ke bAda yAtrI divya shilA kA pUjana karate haiM, jo sUrya kuMDa ke nikaTa hai.
isa shilA se salfara yukta garma pAnI ke strota nikalate haiM.
yahA.N yumanA kI pUjA, shrI kRRiShNa kI rAnI ke rUpa meM kI jAtI hai.
aura unheM vahI vastue.N bheMTa kI jAtI haiM, jo hama nava vadhu ko dete haiM.
jaise pUjA kI thAlI meM miThAI, lAla sunaharI chunarI, chU.DiyA.N, siMdUra, shIshA, nAriyala, phUla Adi.
bIrabala, kyA tuma jAnate ho ki eka mUrkha aura j~nAnI vyakti meM kyA aMtara hai.
jI mahArAja, maiM jAnatA hU.N, bIrabala ne kahA.
kyA tuma vistAra se batA sakate ho.
mahArAja vaha vyakti jo apanI buddhi kA prayoga mushkila chunautI pUrNa tathA pratikUla paristhitiyoM meM apanA niyantraNa khoe binA karatA hai, vaha j~nAnI hotA hai.
vaha vyakti jo pratikUla paristhitiyoM ko isa prakAra sulajhAtA hai ki ve ora pratikUla ho jAtI hai, mUrkha kahalAtA hai.
bAdashAha akabara ne sochA, kI bIrabala kahanA chAhatA hai, kI eka paढ़A likhA vyakti hI j~nAnI hotA hai.
use patA hotA hai ki kaba kisa samasyA kA samAdhAna kaise karanA hai.
bIrabala ke chatura javAba se bAdashAha ke hradaya meM usakA sthAna aura pakkA ho gayA.
eka AdamI bUढ़A ho chalA thA.
usake chAra beTe the.
kintu bolachAla aura AcharaNa meM chAroM eka jaise na the.
pitA ne kaI bAra unase kahA, yadi tumane apanI bolachAla aura AcharaNa nahIM sudhArA, to jIvana meM kabhI saphala nahIM ho sakate.
kintu pitA kI bAta ko korA upadesha samajhakara beToM ne kabhI dhyAna nahIM diyA.
chAroM beTe aura pitA laMbI yAtrA para jA rahe the.
isa yAtrA ke bIcha unake pAsa khAne pIne ko kuCha bhI na bachA thA.
jo dhana thA vaha bhI Katma ho chUkA thA.
ve loga kaI dina se bhUkhe the.
basa yahI chAhate the kI kisI taraha jaldI se jaldI apane ghara pahu.Ncha jAyeM.
pA.Ncho eka jagaha sa.Daka ke kinAre vishrAma kara rahe the.
tabhI eka vyApArI apanI bailagA.DI ko hAMkatA huA nikalA.
vaha vyApArI kisI mele meM jA rahA thA.
usane bailagA.DI meM taraha-taraha ke pakavAna aura miThAI bhara rakhI thI, vaha unheM bechane ke lie jA rahA thA.
pakavAna aura miThAiyoM kI mahaka se, pA.Ncho ke mu.Nha meM pAnI Ane lagA.
bUढ़e ne kahA, jAo vyApArI se mA.Ngo, shAyada kuCha khAne ko de de.
pitA kI Aj~nA sunakara beTA vyApArI ke pAsa gayA.
are vyApArI, itanA mAla le jA rahA hai, tho.DA mujhe de, bhUkha bahuta lagI hai.
vyApArI ne sochA, yaha kitanA mUrkha hai, dUsare se mAgaMte samaya mIThI vANI bolanI chAhie.
yaha jitanI kaThora vANI bola rahA hai, ise utanA hI kaThora pakavAna dU.NgA.
yaha sochakara usane eka sUkhA huA pakavAna de diyA.
vyApArI tho.DI dUra hI gayA ki dUsarA bhAI usake pAsa pahu.NchA.
bolA, ba.De bhAI praNAma, kyA ChoTe bhAI ko khAne ke lie kuCha bhI nahIM doge.
ChoTe bhAI ko denA merA kartavya hai.
usane kahA, lo bhAI, miThAI khAo.
usane eka kaTorA bhara kara miThAI de dI.
aba tIsarA bhAI vyApArI ke pAsa gayA.
vaha bolA, Apa mere pitA samAna hai, mujhe kuCha khAne ko de.
vyApArI ne sochA, yaha mujhe apane pitA jaisA Adara de rahA hai.
ise to bharapeTa miThAI denI chAhie, aura usane kaI kaToro meM pakavAna aura miThAI bharakara de dI.
aMta meM chauthA putra gayA.
use dekhakara vyApArI muskurAyA, to vaha bhI muskurA diyA.
usane kahA mitra, isa musIbata kI gha.DI meM tuma sahArA de sakate ho.
kyA tuma mujhe bhUkhA hI rakhoge?
vyApArI ne sochA, mitra para loga saba kuCha nyauChAvara kara dete hai.
phira yaha mitra to musIbata meM hai, isakI madada karanI chAhie.
merA kyA hai, shahara jAkara aura mAla bhara le AU.NgA.
usane kahA, mitra, isa gA.DI se lade sAre pakavAna aura miThAI, tumhAre lie haiM.
pitA ne una sabase kahA, aba tuma saba apanI apanI mA.NgI huI bhojana sAmagrI kI tulanA karo.
jisane jaisA bolA aura AcharaNa kiyA, use vaisA hI milA.
kyA aba bhI apane bola kA mola nahIM samajhe.
kAshI meM eka karmakAMDI paMDita kA Ashrama thA, jisake sAmane eka jUte vAlA baiThatA thA.
vaha jUtoM kI marammata karate samaya koI na koI bhajana zarUra gAtA thA.
lekina paMDita jI kA dhyAna kabhI bhI usake bhajana kI tarafa nahIM gayA thA.
eka bAra paMDita jI bImAra pa.Da gae aura unhoMne bistara paka.Da liyA.
usa samaya unheM vo bhajana sunAI pa.De.
unakA mana roga kI tarafa se haTa kara bhajanoM kI tarafa chalA gayA.
dhIre dhIre unheM mahasUsa huA ki jUte banAne vAle ke bhajana sunate sunate, unakA darda kama ho rahA hai.
eka dina eka shiShya ko bheja kara unhoMne use bulAyA aura kahA, bhAI, tuma to bahuta achChA gAte ho.
merA roga ba.De-ba.De vaidyoM ke ilAja se ThIka nahIM ho rahA thA.
lekina tumhAre bhajana suna kara maiM ThIka hone lagA hU.N.
phira unhoMne use sau rUpaye dete hue kahA, tuma isI taraha gAte rahanA.
rupaye pA kara jUte vAlA bahuta khusha huA.
lekina paise pAne ke bAda se usakA mana kAmakAja se haTane lagA.
vaha bhajana gAnA bhUla gayA.
dina rAta yahI sochane lagA, rupaye ko kahA.N saMbhAla kara rakhU.N.
kAma meM lAparavAhI ke kAraNa usake grAhaka bhI usa para gussA karane lage.
dhIre-dhIre usakI dukAnadArI chaupaTa hone lagI.
udhara bhajana baMda hone se, paMDita jI kA dhyAna phira roga kI tarafa lagane lagA aura unakI hAlata phira se KarAba ho gaI.
eka dina achAnaka jUte vAlA paMDita jI ke pAsa pahu.Nchakara bolA, Apa apane paise rakha lIjiye.
paMDita jI ne pUChA,kyoM kyA kisI ne kuCha kahA tumase.
jUte vAlA bolA, kahA to nahIM, lekina isa paise ko apane pAsa rakhU.NgA to Apa kI taraha maiM bhI bistara paka.Da lU.NgA.
isI rUpaye ne merA jInA harAma kara diyA.
merA gAnA bhI ChUTa gayA aura kAma meM bhI mana nahIM lagatA, isaliye kAmakAja Thappa ho gayA hai.
maiM samajha gayA ki apanI mehanata kI kamAI meM jo sukha hai, vaha parAye dhana meM nahIM hai.
Apa ke dhana ne to paramAtmA se bhI nAtA tu.DavA diyA.
usake bAda phira se saba kuCha ThIka hone lagA.
eka bAra kAshI naresha ne meraTha para AkramaNa karake usa para adhikAra kara liyA.
akShaya ne AtmasamarpaNa nahIM kiyA, aura vahA.N se palAyana kara gayA.
meraTha kI prajA apane rAjA ke jAne se atyaMta dukhI thI aura unheM hameshA yAda karatI rahatI thI.
kAshI naresha ko yaha sahana nahIM huA.
unhoMne ghoShaNA kI, ki jo koI bhI meraTha ke parAjita rAjA ko jIvita paka.Dakara unake sAmane lAegA, use paryApta dhana diyA jAyegA, aura meraTha kA maMtrI, niyukta kara diyA jAyegA.
isa ghoShaNA kA prajA para koI asara nahIM pa.DA.
udhara meraTha ke rAjA jaMgaloM meM bhaTaka rahe the.
eka dina unakI mulAkAta eka bhikhArI jaise vyakti se huI.
rAjA ne usakA parichaya pUChA, to bolA maiM bahuta ba.DA vyApArI thA.
magara merA jahAza pAnI meM DUba gayA jisase merA sArA mAla baha gayA.
aura maiM dAne dAne kA mohatAja ho gayA hU.N.
aba maiM meraTha ke rAjA ke pAsa madada mA.Ngane jA rahA hU.N.
yaha sunakara rAjA atyaMta dravita ho gayA.
unheM kAshI naresha ki ghoShaNA kA patA chala gayA thA, isalie unhoMne isa vyakti kI sahAyatA kI eka yojanA banAI.
vaha use lekara meraTha pahu.Nche aura vahA.N kAshI naresha se bole, maiM meraTha kA rAjA tumhAre sAmane hU.N.
aba tuma mujhe paka.Da lo aura apanI ghoShaNA ke anusAra isa vyakti ko maMtrI pada aura dhanarAshI de do.
kAshI naresha meraTha ke rAjA ko hataprabha dekhate raha gayA.

vaha siMhAsana se utara kara rAjA ke charaNoM meM girakara kShamA mA.Ngate hue bole, mahArAja mujhe kShamA kareM, jo rAjA prajA ke bIcha lokapriya ho, atyaMta nirbhaya ho, mauta se bhI na Dare, aura apanI jAna para khelakara dUsaroM kI madada ke lie sadaiva taiyAra rahe, use maiM to kyA koI bhI parAjita nahIM kara sakatA.
yaha kahakara unhoMne meraTha ke rAjA kA hAtha paka.Dakara unheM siMhAsana para biThA diyA, aura vahA.N se chale gae.
eka jaMgala meM totoM kA samUha thA.
ve tote hara roza subaha hazAroM mIla kI yAtrA para jAte.
shAma ko apane ghoMsaloM meM lauTa Ate.
totoM ke samUha meM sabhI ke apane apane parivAra the.
tote apanI teza gati kI u.DAna ke lie sadA se prasiddha rahe haiM.
isaliye buढ़Ape meM sabase pahale unakI A.NkheM kamazora ho jAtI hai.
totoM ke eka parivAra meM mAtA pitA bUढ़e ho chale the.
unakA beTA unake lie phala Adi le AtA thA.
bUढ़e mAtA pitA ghoMsale meM baiThe baiThe hI khA lete aura sukha se rahate.
vaha totA, apane mAtA pitA kI sevA meM koI kamI nahIM rakhatA thA.
svabhAva kA manamojI thA.
mAtA pitA kA kahanA na mAnanA aura manachAhe saira sapATe karanA, usakI Adata bana gaI thI.
eka dina, usa tote ne samudra ke bIcha meM eka suMdara dvIpa dekhA aura vahA.N pahu.NchanA chAhA.
usake sAthiyoM ne samajhAyA ki samudra bahuta vishAla hai.
usa dvIpa se samudra kA kinArA paka.DanA sarala kAma nahIM hai.
lekina usa tote ne kisI kI bAta na sunI.
vaha dvIpa kI ora u.Da chalA.
dvIpa para pahu.Nchakara usane Ama ke pe.DoM ko dekhA.
unameM ba.De ba.De rasIle aura mIThe Ama lage hue the.
aise Ama to usane dekhe hI nahIM the.
usane jaldI jaldI kuCha Ama khAe, aura eka Ama lekara vApasa chala diyA.
apane ghoMsale meM Akara usane, vaha Ama bUढ़e mAtA pitA ko khilAyA.
usake mAtA pitA aMdhe avashya the, kiMtu unhoMne Ama khAte hI kahA, kyA tuma samuMdara pAra hazAro mIla dUra sthita usa dvIpa para gae the.
lekina vaha sthala hamArI sImA se bAhara hai.
lAlacha meM pa.Dakara sImA to.Dane se hAni uThAnI pa.DatI hai.
kiMtu vaha totA bhalA kahA.N mAnane vAlA thA.
vaha roza hI vahA.N jAne lagA.
usake mana meM hara dina una phaloM ke lie lAlacha baढ़tA gayA.
eka dina usane AvashyakatA se adhika phala khA liye.
usa dina usane apane mAtA pitA ke lie bhI roza se zyAdA ba.DA phala to.DA.
yAtrA lambI thI aura bojha adhika thA.
zyAdA phala khAne ke kAraNa vaha jaldI hI thakane lagA.
ba.De phala kA bojha bhI u.Dane meM bAdhA uttapana kara rahA thA.
vaha jitanA zora lagAtA utanA hI thaka rahA thA.
samudra pAra se usake sAthiyoM ne use isa taraha u.Date dekhA to pareshAna hone lage.
para karate bhI kyA, Akhira vaha totA chakkara khAkara samudra meM girA aura DUba gayA.
aba anya totoM ne usake mA.N-bApa ko yaha khabara dI, taba ve bole, hama jAnate the ki eka dina lAlacha meM pa.Dakara vaha apanI jAna kho degA.
lAlachI AdamI kA yahI hAla hotA hai.
eka bAra bAdashAha akabara ki sabase priya patnI ne bAdashAha se milane ke lie apanA saMdesha bhejA.
kyoMki bAdashAha shAhI darabAra meM the.
isaliye vaha saMdesha lekara darabAra meM hI pahu.Ncha gayA.
bAdashAha ne sochA ki maiM kArya samApta karake hI jAU.NgA.
kuCha samaya pashchAta mahArAnI ne saMdesha bhejA.
bAdashAha apanI patnI se bahuta prema karate the.
isaliye, vaha turaMta kArya Cho.Da kara chalane lage.
bAdashAha kI rAnI se milane kI utsukatA ko dekhakara, bIrabala apanI muskurAhaTa nahIM roka pAyA.
use isa prakAra muskurAtA dekha, bAdashAha krodhita ho gae.
mujha para isa prakAra ha.Nsane kI tumhArI himmata kaise huI.
tumhe tumhAre isa vyavahAra ke lie daMDa diyA jAyegA.
maiM tumhe Adesha detA hU.N ki tuma apane paira zamIna para nahIM rakhoge.
tuma yahA.N se chale jAo.
bIrabala ne bAdashAha kI Aj~nA kA turaMta pAlana kiyA, aura shAhI darabAra Cho.Da diyA.
kaI haftoM taka vaha darabAra meM nahIM gayA.
kaI darabArI, jo usase IrShyA karate the, ve prasanna the.
bAdashAha akabara bhI chiMtita ho uThe.
vaha bIrabala kI anupasthiti meM khuda ko asahAya mahasUsa kara rahe the.
samasyAoM se unheM akele jUjhanA pa.Da rahA thA, jinakA ve koI samAdhAna nahIM kara pA rahe the.
bIrabala chuTkiyoM meM bAdashAha ko samAdhAna batA detA thA.
eka shAma bAdashAha akabara mahala kI khi.DakI se bAhara dekha rahe the.
unhoMne bIrabala ko eka ratha meM jAte dekhA.
bIrabala tumane merI Aj~nA kA pAlana kyoM nahIM kiyA.
maiM to Apake Adesha kA pAlana kara rahA hU.N mahArAja.
Apane kahA thA ki maiM isa rAjya kI zamIna para paira na rakhU.N kyoMki yaha rAjya ApakA hai.
mere pAsa anya koI vikalpa nahIM thA.
maiM dUsare desha meM gayA aura vahA.N se kuCha miTTI lekara AyA hU.N.
isa ratha meM maine vahI miTTI phailA rakhI hai.
aba maiM ApakI zamIna para nahIM kha.DA hU.N.
mujhe sArI ziMdagI isI ChoTe se ratha meM guzAranI hogI.
bIrabala ke buddhimAnI bhare uttara ne bAdashAha kA dila jIta liyA, aura bAdashAha ne use kShamA kara diyA.
varSha meM garmI ke dinoM kI shuruAta thI.
makkA aura bagadAda kI apanI yAtrA pUrI kara, guru nAnaka, aura unake sAthI maradAnA, peshAvara aura rAvalapiMDI hote hue, amInAbAda pahu.Nche.
isase pahale ki ve apane ghara kI ora baढ़te, vahA.N bAbara kI senA kA hamalA ho gayA.
hamalAvaroM ne bahuta zora-zulma kiyA, aura unake logoM ko baMdI banA liyA.
guru nAnaka aura maradAnA bhI kaida kara lie gae.
jaba bAbara ko patA chalA ki eka bahuta pahu.Nche hue saMta ko baMdI banA liyA gayA hai, to usane turaMta unakI rihAI kA Adesha diyA.
lekina, guru nAnaka ne sAfa-sAfa kaha diyA, ki jaba taka anya kaidiyoM ko nahIM Cho.DA jAegA, taba taka, ve bhI kArAvAsa se bAhara nahIM nikaleMge.
unake isa nirNaya se chakita ho kara bAbara ne unase milane ki ichChA zAhira kI.
guru nAnaka deva jI ne nirbhaya ho kara dharma kA mArga samajhAyA.
sabhI insAna Ishvara yA khudA kI hI saMtAna hai, ata:, kisI para atyAchAra mata karo.
bAbara unase itanA prabhAvita huA, ki usane tatkAla sabhI kaidiyoM ko rihA kara diyA.
hAlAMki isake bAda bhI, guru nAnaka deva jI ne amInAbAda nahIM Cho.DA.
ve kAfI samaya taka una logoM ke bIcha rahe, jinhoMne hamale ke daurAna bahuta duHkha darda sahA thA.
ve unheM taraha-taraha se sAMtvanA dete rahe aura hoMsalA ba.NdhAte rahe.
isa prasaMga se guru nAnaka ke vyaktitva ke do mahatvapUrNa pakSha khula kara sAmane Ate haiM, eka pUrNa nibharyatA aura dUsarA apAra karuNA.
isake alAvA eka tIsarA pakSha bhI jo.DanA chAhie jisane unakI lambI yAtrAoM ke daurAna bAra-bAra unakA sAtha nibhAyA.
daraasala unakI eka khAsa visheShatA thI unakI hAzira javAbI, jaTila se jaTila masaloM ko bhI bahuta sarala shabdoM evaM kriyAoM meM abhivyakta karane kI kShamatA.
apanI isa kShamatA kA upayoga ve prAyaH isa taraha karate the.
binA kisI jhaga.De yA vivAda ke hI virodhI unakI bAta kA lohA mAna lete the.

haridvAra ke bahucharchita prasaMga meM unhoMne jaba aneka logoM ko apane pUrvajoM ko gaMgA jala arpaNa karane ke nAma para, pUrva kI ora jala Chi.Dakate hue dekhA, ve chupachApa pashchima kI ora ghUma kara, jala Chi.Dakane lage.
unheM aisA karate dekha kara hairAna pareshAna logoM ne jaba unake ajIba AcharaNa para savAla uThAyA, to unhoMne ba.De bholepana se javAba diyA.
maiM pashchima kI ora jala isa kAraNa Chi.Daka rahA hU.N, tAki paMjAba meM sthita mere khetoM kI siMchAI ho jAe.
maiMne sochA kI jaba ApakA Chi.DakA jala svarga taka pahu.Ncha sakatA hai, to mere dvArA Chi.DakA jala mere gA.Nva taka to pahu.Ncha hI jAnA chahiye.
isa taraha ke kaI prasaMga hai jaba guru nAnaka ne ba.DI mAsUmiyata se aisI bAta kaha dI.
virodhI pakSha ko svayaMM apane vyartha ke ADaMbara yA aMdhavishvAsa kA khokhalApana nazara A gayA.
unhoMne kabhI bhI apanI kShamatA kA upayoga apane kisI virodhI ko nIchA dikhAne ke lie nahIM kiyA.
yaha to unake isa jIvana bhara chalane vAle abhiyAna kA eka hissA thA.
dharma ke pAkhaMDI aura bAharI ADaMbara vAle pakSha kA pardAfAsha kiyA.
manuShya pavitra jIvana aura sachchI bhakti vAle vAstavika dharma ko pahachAna sake.
sachchAI taka pahu.Nchane ke lie pahale bhrama aura asatya ke AvaraNa ko haTAnA zarUrI ho jAtA hai.
guru nAnaka ne pAkhaMDa aura karmakAMDoM ke viruddha kie gae apane prachAra ke mAdhyama se yahI batAne kI koshisha kI.
sachchA dharma utanA hI sarala hai jitanA vaha gaharA hai.
jAtigata bhedabhAva ke binA hara koI usa taka pahu.Ncha sakatA hai.
ChattIsaga.Dha meM davA dukAnadAra ne eka maMtrI ko Galata davA de dI, jisake bAda prashAsana ne usakI dukAna para tAlA lagavA diyA hai.
amara agravAla, ramana siMha sarakAra meM nagarIya prashAsana aura AbakArI maMtrI haiM.
pahale vo sUbe ke svAsthya maMtrI the.
Kabara ke mutAbiqa maMtrI jI kA eka karmachArI, rAjadhAnI rAyapura ke eka meDikala sTora meM pahuMchA.
usane DaॉkTara kI parchI dikhA kara kuCha davAiyAM lIM.
Aropa hai ki davA khAne ke bAda, maMtrI jI kA blaDa preshara lo ho gayA.
hAlata ye huI, ki maMtrI jI ko baiThaka Cho.Dakara, ghara lauTanA pa.DA.
DaॉkTaroM ko bulAyA gayA, to patA chalA ki meDikala sTora ke dukAnadAra ne, Galata davA de dI hai.
isakI pUrI jAnakArI zile ke kalekTara ko dI gaI.
kalekTara ne khAdya aura auShadhi vibhAga ko talaba kiyA.
khAdya aura auShadhi vibhAga ne, turaMta dukAna para ChApA mAra kara, kArravAI shurU kara dI.

Ala iMDiyA kemisTa eMDa DisTrIbyUshana feDareshana ke mahAsachiva, gIteshvara chaMdrAkara ne batAyA, davA dukAna ko baMda kara diyA gayA, aura phira nagarIya prashAsana vibhAga kA amalA, pulisa ke sAtha, dukAna to.Dane ke lie A pahuMchA.
hamAre virodha ke bAda kahIM jAkara, kArravAI rokI gaI.
chaMdrAkara kA kahanA thA, ki isa ghaTanA ke bAda, rAjya bhara ke meDikala aura kemisTa kA vyavasAya karane vAloM meM, bhaya kA vAtAvaraNa hai.
hamane isa bAre meM maMtrI amara agravAla se bhI saMparka karane kI koshisha kI.
lekina unakA pakSha, hameM nahIM mila pAyA.
bIbIsI hindI ke eMDraॉeDa aipa ke lie, yahAM klika kareM.
Apa hameM fesabuka aura TviTara para faॉlo bhI kara sakate haiM.
bihAra sarakAra, bArahavIM kI parIkShA meM avvala rahe chaudaha ChAtroM kI, phira se parIkShA legI, kyoMki aisA kahA jA rahA hai, ki ina logoM ne naqala kI hai.
sarakAra ne yaha faisalA eka TIvI chainala para Ae satraha varShIya rUbI rAya ke iMTaravyU ko dekhane ke bAda liyA hai.
rUbI ne isa sAla ArTsa sabjekTa meM Taॉpa kiyA hai.
rUbI ne sthAnIya patrakAra se bAtachIta meM, rAjanIti vij~nAna ko khAna-pAna se ju.DA viShaya batAyA thA.
piChale sAla bhI kaI abhibhAvaka jaba skUla kI dIvAra para cha.Dha kara, apane vidyArthiyoM ko chorI karA rahe the, taba unakI eka foTo lI gaI thI.
piChale varSha bhI parIkShA ke daurAna naqala karAe jAne kI lagAtAra ChapI KabaroM se, sarakAra ko kAfI sharmiMdagI kA sAmanA karanA pa.DA thA.
isa varSha sarakAra ne parIkShA ke daurAna karAI jAne vAlI naqala para aMkusha lagAne ke lie, zurmAnA aura jela kI sazA kI ghoShaNA kI thI.
isa ghoShaNA kA asara, piChale dinoM Ae rizalTa meM dekhane ko milA.
isa varSha, bahuta hI kharAba pariNAma dekhane ko milA hai.
sarakAra ne rUbI ke sAtha-sAtha, sAiMsa sabjekTa meM avvala Ane vAle saurabha shreShTha ke rizalTa ko, tatkAla prabhAva se nirasta kara diyA hai.
saurabha bhI patrakAra dvArA rasAyana vij~nAna ke pUChe gae sAdhAraNa savAloM kA javAba, nahIM de pAe the.

bihAra shikShA borDa ke adhyakSha, lAlakeshvara prasAda siMha ne, mIDiyA ko batAyA, ki ina dono ChAtroM ke sAtha bAraha anya ChAtra, jinhoMne isa parIkShA meM bahuta achChe aMka prApta kie haiM, unakI tIna jUna ko, phira se likhita parIkShA lI jAegI.
inakA iMTaravyU bhI liyA jAegA.
pAkistAna kI rAjadhAnI islAmAbAda sahita, paMjAba, aura Kaibara pakhtUnakhvA ke vibhinna kShetroM meM, tUfAna ne bhArI tabAhI machAI hai.
tUfAna ke kAraNa imArateM aura pe.Da girane se, kama se kama chaudaha loga mAre gae, aura eka sau unachAsa loga ghAyala ho gae haiM.

islAmAbAda aura rAvalapiMDI meM pe.DoM ke sa.DakoM aura vAhanoM para gira jAne se, kama se kama unnIsa loga ghAyala hue, jabaki islAmAbAda kI eka kachchI bastI meM makAna girane se, nau logoM kI mauta ho gaI hai.
islAmAbAda pulisa ne batAyA ki marane vAloM meM eka mahilA aura tIna bachche shAmila haiM.
rAvalapiMDI pulisa ne bIbIsI saMvAdadAtA shahazAda malika ko batAyA, ki .Dhoka hassU kShetra meM imArateM girane, aura karaMTa lagane se pAMcha logoM kI mauta ho gaI hai.
jabaki shahara meM eka sau tIsa ke qarIba loga ghAyala hue haiM.
teza AMdhI ke kAraNa, islAmAbAda ke sekTara AI ilevana meM sthita, sabzI maMDI meM Aga laga gaI.
bAda meM Aga para kAbU pA liyA gayA.
Aga aura teza havAoM ke kAraNa, bijalI kI tAreM girane lagI.
pe.Da aura bijalI ke khaMbhe sa.Daka para girane se sa.DakeM baMda ho gaIM, aura yAtAyAta prabhAvita huA.
mausama vibhAga ne batAyA ki rAvalapiMDI meM eka sau a.DatAlIsa kilomITara kI gati se, aura islAmAbAda meM, eka sau bIsa kilomITara prati ghaMTe kI raftAra se, AMdhI AI thI.
rAvalapiMDI aura islAmAbAda ke bIcha chalane vAlI meTro basa sevA ko bhI, kuCha dera ke lie baMda karanA pa.DA.
islAmAbAda ke alAvA, Kaibara paKtUnaKvAha ke kaI shaharoM meM, tUfAnI havAoM ke sAtha, bArisha huI.

peshAvara ke adhikAriyoM ne batAyA, ki tUfAnI havAoM ke kAraNa eka makAna kI Chata gira gaI, jisameM eka mahilA, aura unake Chaha mahIne ke bachche kI mauta ho gaI, jabaki do anya loga ghAyala ho gae.
pI DI ema e ke pravaktA ke anusAra, zilA ApadA prabaMdhana ikAI peshAvara aura naushaharA ko nirdesha jArI kiyA hai, ki prabhAvita logoM taka, jalda se jalda sahAyatA pahuMchAI jAe.
tUfAna meM hue nuqasAna kA Akalana lagAne ke lie, kaI TImeM bhI gaThita kI gaI haiM.
udhara pIAIe ke pravaktA ke anusAra, islAmAbAda meM mausama kI KarAbI ke kAraNa, havAI yAtAyAta para bhI asara pa.DA hai.
yahAM Ane vAlI gharelU aura videshI u.DAnoM kI AvAjAhI prabhAvita huI hai.
unakA kahanA thA ki dubaI, lAhaura, karAchI, aura anya shaharoM se, islAmAbAda Ane vAlI u.DAnoM kA rukha, lAhaura eyaraporTa kI ora, mo.Da diyA gayA hai.

bIcha rAta meM merI mAM uThakara mere kamare meM AtI hai, aura mere mAthe para hAtha rakhakara, chalI jAtI hai, kyoMki vo apane Apako ye bharosA denA chAhatI hai, ki maiM vAqaI, jela se bAhara A chukA hUM.
ye koI sapanA nahIM hai.
nisAruddIna ye bAta ba.DI AsAnI se kaha jAte lagate haiM.

isa jumale ke pIChe ke bepanAha darda ko samajhanA, shAyada tabataka sahaja na hogA, jabataka ye mAlUma na ho, ki nisAruddIna ziMdagI ke bAIsa beshaqImatI sAla, kAlakoTharI meM bitAkara, hAla hI meM ghara lauTe haiM.
sAla unnIsa sau chaurAnave meM haidarAbAda pulisa ne unheM hirAsata meM liyA thA.
una para Aropa thA, epI eksapresa meM hue blAsTa meM shAmila hone kA.
laMbI qAnUnI la.DAI ke bAda AKirakAra piChale mahIne, suprIma korTa ne unakI aura unake bhAI zahIruddIna kI sazA, nirasta kara dI, aura nisAruddIna ko faurana Cho.Dane kA hukma diyA thA.
kyoMki pUrA kesa unake, unake bhAI zahIruddIna, aura do anya abhiyuktoM ke kathita qabUlanAme para TikA thA.
isake alAvA unake KilAfa aura koI sabUta nahIM thA.
nisAruddIna kahate haiM ki pulisa ne unheM isa kesa meM, nAhaka hI phaMsAyA.
jasTisa kalIphulA aura yUyU lalita kI beMcha ne apane faisale meM kahA, nisAra para koI Aropa sAbita nahIM hotA, lihAzA, unakI qaida ko jArI nahIM rakhA jA sakatA.
korTa ne kahA ki puKtA sabUtoM ke abhAva meM, sirfa saha abhiyaktoM ke qabUlanAme ke AdhAra para, nisAra aura unake bhAI kI sazA ko, jArI nahIM rakhA jA sakatA.
donoM bhAiyoM ko Aja taka nahIM patA hai, ki pulisa ne unheM isa kesa meM kyoM phaMsAyA.
haidarAbAda meM paMdraha janavarI unnIsa sau chaurAnave ko, vo ghara se apane fArmesI kaॉleja jAne ke lie nikale.
eka saptAha bAda unake imtihAna shurU hone vAle the, taba unheM haidarAbAda pulisa ne uThA liyA.
nisAra ne batAyA, mujhe taiMtAlIsa dinoM taka Gaira qAnUnI tarIqe se hirAsata meM rakhA gayA.
usake bAda, mujhe majisTreTa ke sAmane pesha kiyA gayA.
unhoMne eka managaDhaMta qabUlanAme para jabarana mere dastaKata karA lie.
unhoMne kahA, ki ye merI rihAI ke lie hai.
lekina mujhe bAda meM patA chalA, ki mujhe TADA meM phaMsA diyA gayA.
do sAla bAda sthAnIya TADA adAlata ne kahA, ki TADA ke niyama-qAyade, mujha para lAgU nahIM hote.

nisAra ke vakIla shAdAM farAsata ne kahA, sAmAnya taura para eka pulisa afasara ke sAmane die gae qabUlanAme ko, adAlata meM vaidha nahIM mAnA jAtA, lekina TADA ke aMtargata, qabUlanAme ko vaidha mAnA jAtA hai, agara vo esapI raiMka ke afasara ke sAmane diyA gayA ho.
lekina nisAra ke kesa meM, binA kisI sIniyara pulisa adhikArI kI anumati ke, usakA qabUlanAmA liyA gayA thA, jo mAnya nahIM hotA.
unhoMne Age kahA, korTa meM kesa usI samaya KArija ho jAnA chAhie thA, lekina phira, sIbIAI ne kesa apane hAtha meM le liyA, aura vahI qabUlanAmA, ajamera TADA korTa meM pesha kiyA.
taba adAlata ne nisAra ko umraqaida kI sazA sunA dI.
nisAra ke bhAI zahIra ne kahA, mujhe to bela mila gaI, kyoMki mujhe phepha.DoM kA kaiMsara ho gayA thA.
lekina hameM suprIma korTa meM jAne aura kesa radda karAne meM, bAraha sAla laga gae.
nisAra ne kahA, jaba maiM jela se bAhara AyA, to mujhe yaqIna nahIM huA, ki maiM ChUTa gayA hUM.
jaba loga jela se bAhara Ate haiM, taba unheM KushI hotI hai.
lekina rihA hone ke bAda bhI, maiM vo KushI mahasUsa hI nahIM kara pA rahA thA.
jaba maiM apane ghara pahuMchA, taba jAkara mujhe ahasAsa huA, ki maiM rihA ho chukA hUM.
lekina saba badala chukA thA.
maiM apane shahara meM hI ajanabI jaisA mahasUsa kara rahA thA.
mere bhatIjoM aura bhatIjI ko, mujhase milAyA gayA.
merI rihAI kI la.DAI la.Date-la.Date, mere abbA duniyA se ruKasata ho chuke the.
merA purAnA ghara vaisA hI thA, TUTI dIvAreM aura lIka hotI Chata.
javAnI kA laMbA daura, jela meM bitA chuke nisAra taya nahIM kara pA rahe the, ki unheM Age karanA kyA hai.
maiM jaba bIsa sAla kA thA, taba pulisa paka.Da kara le gaI.
aba maiM taiMtAlIsa sAla kA hUM.
mujhe ziMdagI nae sire se shurU karanI hai.
nisAra aura zahIra, apanI javAnI KarAba karane ke evaza meM, muAvaze ke haqadAra haiM.
lekina apanI rihAI ke lie, itanI laMbI la.Dane vAle donoM bhAiyoM ko patA hai, ki isake lie eka aura laMbA saMgharSha, unakA iMtazAra kara rahA hai.
abhinetA oma purI kA kahanA hai, ki nareMdra modI achChA kAma kara rahe haiM, lekina desha ko KushahAla banAne ke lie, unheM saradAra paTela bananA pa.DegA.
oma purI jalda hI kisAnoM kI durdashA para banI filma, marAThavA.DA meM dikhAIM deMge.
modI sAhaba ne gujarAta meM bahuta achChA kAma kiyA, lekina gujarAta, ChoTA parivAra thA.
desha saMbhAlanA, gujarAta kI tulanA meM pachAsa gunA ba.DA kAma hai.
ve mAnate haiM ki vartamAna sarakAra, achChA kAma to kara rahI hai, lekina desha ko isa vaqta kisI bahuta mahAna pratibhA kI zarUrata hai.
isalie modI ko saradAra paTela bananA hogA.
mahaMgAI ko oma purI ba.DI samasyA to mAnate hai, sAtha hI isakA eka samAdhAna batAte haiM.
sarakAra ko saMpUrNa khAdya sAmagrI vitaraNa praNAlI, apane hAthoM meM le lenI chAhie.
desha ke hara hisse meM pratyeka samAna kA bhAva ho.
vo kahate haiM ki desha ko isa vaqta, jaya javAna-jaya kisAna nAre kI zarUrata hai.
ye donoM hI hara paristhiti, aura qudarata, donoM se la.Date haiM.
isalie inakI jaya honI chAhie.
Aja logoM kI bhAvanAeM Katma ho chukI haiM, marAThavA.DA filma, logoM kI bhAvanAeM jagAegI.
vo kahate haiM ki kisAna ko lekara, hamArI saMvedanahInatA kA Alama ye hai, ki usakI mauta ke bAda, parivAra ko milane vAlA sarakArI muAvazA bhI, binA rishvata die nahIM milatA.
amarIkA meM pulisa kA kahanA hai, ki yUnivarsiTI ऑfa kailiforniyA laॉsa eMjilsa meM, golIbArI kI ghaTanA meM baMdUqadhArI sahita, do loga mAre gae haiM.
pulisa kA mAnanA hai ki yUnivarsiTI parisara meM, aba koI baMdUqadhArI maujUda nahIM hai.
parisara ko baMda kara diyA gayA thA, jise aba phira khola diyA gayA hai.
do shava iMjIniyariMga DipArTameMTa kI imArata meM mile haiM, jinameM se kisI kI bhI pahachAna nahIM ho pAI hai.
laॉsa eMjilsa pulisa pramukha, chArlI beka ne saMvAdadAtAoM ko batAyA, ki ghaTanAsthala se, eka baMdUka barAmada huI hai.
yUsIelae meM lagabhaga taiMtAlIsa hazAra ChAtra pa.Dhate haiM.
yUnivarsiTI ne kakShAoM ko eka dina ke lie radda kara diyA hai.
guruvAra se pa.DhAI shurU hone kI saMbhAvanA hai.
piChale mahIne durghaTanAgrasta hue ijipTa eyara ke vimAna ke eka blaika baॉksa se, kuCha signala milane kI KabareM haiM.
frAMsa ke jAMchakartAoM kA kahanA hai, ki bhUmadhya sAgara meM khoja meM lage frAMsIsI pota, lAplAsa ko, ye signala mile haiM.
unnIsa maI ko ChiyAsaTha yAtriyoM ko lekara, perisa se qAhirA jA rahA eyarabasa e thrI TveMTI, durghaTanAgrasta ho gayA thA.
binA kisI saMkaTa kI sUchanA die, vimAna grIka aura misra ke reDAra skrIna se GAyaba ho gayA thA.
frAMsa ke byUro ऑfa iMnavesTigeshana eMDa enAlisisa ke remI jUTI ne batAyA, flAiTa rikaॉrDara se signala mile haiM.
frAMsa ke lAplAsa ke mutAbika, ye signala, ijipTa eyara ke kisI eka DATA rikaॉrDara kA ho sakatA hai.
misra ke jAMchakartAoM ne sabase pahale Kabara dI, ki frAMsIsI jahAzoM ko malaboM kI khoja karane vAlI jagaha se, kuCha signala mile haiM.
durghaTanA ke kAraNoM kA aba taka patA nahIM laga pAyA hai.
vimAna ke blaika baॉksa kA milanA behada zarUrI hai, jisase patA lagAyA jA sake, ki AKirI kShaNoM meM kyA huA thA.
hAdase ke bAda agale tIsa dinoM taka, blaika baॉksa saMketa dete rahate haiM, jisase khojI TImoM ke pAsa, baiTarI Katma hone se pahale, use DhUMDhane ke lie zyAdA vakta nahIM hotA.
vimAna kA kuCha malabA, samudra se barAmada kiyA gayA hai, jo misra ke baMdaragAha shahara, sikaMdariyA ke uttara meM sthita hai.
lekina vimAna kA adhikAMsha hissA, aura yAtriyoM ke shava, samudra kI gaharAI meM hI hone kI saMbhAvanA hai.

vimAna meM savAra logoM meM tIsa misra ke, paMdraha frAMsa ke, do irAka ke, do ka.cnADA ke, aura aljIriyA, beljiyama, briTena, chAda, purtagAla, saUdI araba, aura sUDAna kA eka eka nAgarika, maujUda thA.
gujarAta meM do hazAra do meM hue daMgoM ke eka ahama muqadame kA faisalA, Aja Ane vAlA hai.

ahamadAbAda ke gulabarga hAusiMga sosAiTI meM, aTThAisa faravarI do hazAra do ko eka ba.DI aura uttejita bhI.Da ne ghusa kara, unahattara logoM kI hatyA kara dI thI, jina meM kAMgresa ke pUrva sAMsada, ehasAna jAfarI bhI shAmila the.
ye daMge isase eka dina pahale, sAbaramatI eksapresa Traina meM hue hamale ke bAda hue the, jina meM, unasaTha kArasevaka mAre gae the.
gulabarga hAusiMga sosAiTI kA muqadamA, suprIma korTa kI nigarAnI meM chalA hai.
gujarAta daMgoM se sambaMdhita nau aura muqadame, suprIma korTa kI nigarAnI meM hue haiM.
28 faravarI ke hamale meM, firozaKAna gulazAra KAna paThAna ke parivAra ke pAMcha sadasya, mAre gae the.
vo kahate haiM, unheM isa dina kA besabrI se iMtazAra thA.
maiM chAhatA hU.N ki doShiyoM ko phAMsI kI sazA ho.
muqadamA, sa.DasaTha logoM ke KilAfa chalA thA, lekina muqadame ke daurAna, chAra logoM kI mauta ho chukI hai.
pI.DitoM ke vakIla, esaema voharA ne bIbIsI ko batAyA, ki Aja kA faisalA ahama hogA.
mujhe ummIda hai, ki kama se kama paiMtIsa logoM ko sazA milegI.
maiM chAhatA hU.N ki unheM umra qaida kI sazA mile.
muqadame meM jiraha ke daurAna adAlata ko batAyA gayA, ki usa dina hazAroM kI saMkhyA meM uttejita bhI.Da aMdara ghusa AI, aura chAra ghaMTe taka mAra-kATa kA silasilA chalatA rahA.
bachche, bU.Dhe aura aurateM, pUrva sAMsada ehasAna jAfarI ke do maMzilA ghara meM, panAha lie hue the.
AKira meM ehasAna jAfarI khuda bAhara Aye, aura uttejita bhI.Da se kahA, ki vo unakI jAna le leM, lekina bachchoM aura auratoM ko baKsha deM.
unheM ghasITa kara bAhara lAyA gayA, una para hamalA huA.
usake bAda bhI.Da ne unake ghara ko Aga lagA dI.
firozaKAna gulazAra KAna paThAna bhI hamale meM ghAyala hue the.
vo sAmane vAle ghara kI Chata se, sArA nazArA dekha rahe the.
merI ammI ehasAna jAfarI ke ghara jA rahI thIM.
bIcha meM hI merI A.NkhoM ke sAmane, unhoMne mA.N ko mAra DAlA.
mere abbU aura do bhAI aura eka bahana ko bhI mAra DAlA.
isa hamale meM saIda KAna ke parivAra ke dasa sadasya, mAre gae the.
unhoMne kahA, hameM insAfa chAhie.
agara adAlata meM insAfa nahIM milA, to allAha insAfa karegA.
lekina mujhe lagatA hai, insAfa hogA.
usa dina saIda KAna bhI ehasAna jAfarI ke ghara meM panAha lene vAloM meM the.
vo mauta ke kAfI nazadIka the, lekina allAha ne mujhe bachA liyA.
vo kichana ke pIChe, daravAze ke ThIka bAhara dIvAra kI A.Da meM Chupe rahe.
saIda KAna se kuCha logoM ne kahA, ki aba pIChe jo huA bhUla jAo, aba Age ba.Dho.
lekina unakA javAba thA, ki kaise bhUla jAe.N, insAfa hogA, to bhUla jAeMge.
unake vakIla esaema voharA bhI bhUla jAo kI salAha dene vAloM se nArAza haiM.
kisI ke parivAra ke dasa loga mAre gae, kisI ke chaudaha.
Apa unheM bhUla jAo kI salAha, kaise de sakate haiM.
aba se kuCha ghaMTe bAda, ahamadAbAda kI visheSha adAlata, apanA faisalA sunAegI.
mAmale kI sunavAI ke daurAna, chAra jajoM ke tabAdale ho chuke haiM, aura tIna sau a.DatIsa logoM kI gavAhI huI hai.

iMDiyana eksapresa kI eka Kabara ke mutAbiqa, gRRiha maMtrAlaya ne mashahUra vakIla, iMdirA jayasiMha kI saMsthA, lAyarsa kalekTiva ke efasIArae rejisTreshana ko, Chaha mahIne ke lie sthagita kara diyA hai.
saMsthA para videsha se chaMdA lene ke niyamoM ke durupayoga kA Aropa lagAte hue, gRRiha maMtrAlaya ne noTisa bhejakara pUChA hai, ki unakA rejisTreshana, kyoM na radda kara diyA jAe.
lAyarsa kalekTiva ko javAba dene ke lie, eka mahIne kA samaya diyA gayA hai.
lAyarsa kalekTiva, vakIloM kA eka saMgaThana hai.
iMdirA jayasiMha isakI sachiva, aura AnaMda grovara, isake adhyakSha haiM.
sarakAra ke isa qadama kI lAyarsa kalekTiva ne niMdA karate hue, ise iMdirA jayasiMha, aura AnaMda grovara ko pareshAna karane vAlA batAyA hai.

saMgaThana kA kahanA hai, ki iMdirA jayasiMha, aura AnaMda grovara, peshevara tarIqe se kaI mAmaloM meM sarakAra aura usase ju.De logoM ke KilAfa, adAlata meM pesha hue haiM, isameM bhAjapA adhyakSha, amita shAha kA, soharAbuddIna mAmale se barI hone kA mAmalA bhI shAmila hai.
lAyarsa kalekTiva ne kahA hai, ki vo sarakAra ke isa faisale ko chunautI degI.
TAimsa ऑfa iMDiyA meM ChapI Kabara ke mutAbiqa, paTanA hAIkorTa ne kahA hai, ki bihAra meM sharAba ko sirfa apane pAsa rakhanA, koI aparAdha nahIM hai.
eka mAmale kI sunavAI ke daurAna adAlata ne kahA, ki bihAra AbakArI qAnUna ke mutAbiqa, sharAba bechanA aura pInA hI aparAdha kI shreNI meM Ate haiM.
yaha qAnUna, sharAba rakhane ke mAmale meM kuCha nahIM kahatA hai.
hAIkorTa kI isa vivechanA ke bAda, janatA dala yUnAiTeDa kI netA, manoramA devI ke jela se rihA hone ke AsAra, ba.Dha gae haiM.
manoramA devI ko unake ghara se kathita taura para sharAba barAmada hone ke bAda, giraftAra kara liyA gayA thA.
TAimsa ऑfa iMDiyA kI hI eka dUsarI Kabara ke mutAbiqa, aMtararAShTrIya vaij~nAnika, hara taraha ke kaiMsara se nipaTane ke lie, eka sarvamAnya TIke kI khoja ke behada nazadIka pahuMcha gae haiM.
hiMdustAna TAimsa meM ChapI Kabara ke mutAbiqa, bihAra shikShA borDa, bArahavIM kakShA meM kalA aura vij~nAna ke Taॉpara ChAtroM kI parIkShA, phira se lene kI yojanA banA rahA hai.
kuCha TIvI chainaloM ne, ina donoM viShayoM ke Taॉpara ChAtroM kA iMTaravyU dikhAyA thA.
isameM ye ChAtra, apane viShaya se saMbaMdhita sAmAnya prashnoM kA uttara bhI, nahIM de pA rahe the.
isake bAda bihAra kI shikShA vyavasthA kI kAfI AlochanA huI thI.
aKabAra ke mutAbiqa, isa vajaha se borDa ne ina ChAtroM kI dobArA parIkShA lene kA faisalA kiyA.

hiMdustAna TAimsa kI hI eka aura Kabara ke mutAbiqa, naMbara eka puruSha Tenisa khilA.DI, novAka jokovicha kI kula inAmI rAshi se kamAI daulata, sau miliyana Daॉlara, yAnI, Chaha sau chauhattara karo.Da rupae ho gaI hai.
vo Tenisa ke itihAsa meM, sabase zyAdA inAmI rAshi kamAne vAle khilA.DI bana gae haiM.

da iMDiyana eksapresa kI eka Kabara ke mutAbiqa, bhAratIya janatA pArTI, gujarAta kI mukhyamaMtrI AnaMdI bena paTela ko haTAne kA mana banA chukI hai, kyoMki vo janatA se sIdhA saMvAda banA pAne meM, nAkAma rahI haiM.
isase rAjya meM pArTI kI lokapriyatA kama hone kA KatarA paidA ho gayA hai.
hAlAMki nae mukhyamaMtrI ke nAma para, abhI sahamati nahIM bana pAI hai.
sachina teMdulakara, kerala meM sharAba virodhI abhiyAna ke brAMDa eMbesaDara hoMge.
isa Kabara ko, da hiMdU ne apane pahale panne para jagaha dI hai.
aKabAra meM sachina teMMdulakara, aura unakI patnI, aMjali teMdulakara kI rAjya ke mukhyamaMtrI, pinarAI vijayana ke sAtha, tasvIra bhI ChapI hai.
sIriyA ke dAreyA shahara meM, do hazAra bAraha navaMbara ke bAda, pahalI bAra mAnavIya sahAyatA pahuMchAI gaI hai.
mAnavIya sahAyatA saMsthA, reDa kraॉsa ne, ye jAnakArI dI hai.
apraila meM saMyukta rAShTra ke adhikAriyoM ne kahA thA, ki dAreyA meM khAne, pIne ke sAfa pAnI, aura davAoM kI zabaradasta kamI ho gaI hai.
damishka ke dakShiNa meM sthita isa shahara meM, a.DatAlIsa ghaMToM kA yuddhavirAma, budhavAra subaha se lAgU kiyA gayA hai.
saMyukta rAShTra ke mAnavIya sahAyatA vibhAga ne kahA hai, ki vaiksIna, bachchoM ke lie dUdha, davAeM, aura svAsthya vardhaka khAne kA sAmAna, shahara meM pahuMchAyA jA rahA hai.
vidrohiyoM ke kabze vAle muAthAmiyA meM bhI, mahIne bhara bAda, khAnA aura gehUM kA ATA, pahuMchAyA gayA.
apraila meM saMyukta rAShTra ne kahA thA, ki sIriyAI senA ke niyaMtraNa meM, dAreyA shahara meM, karIba chAra hazAra loga phaMse hue haiM.
tIna sAla pahale, yahAM para bijalI kI saplAI kATa dI gaI thI.
apraila meM saMyukta rAShTra ke ApAta sahAyatA vibhAga ke saMyojaka, sTIfana o brAyana ne kahA thA, ki sIriyAI sarakAra ne logoM taka madada pahuMchAne kI apIleM, ThukarA dI haiM.
piChale mahIne sahAyatA ke lie bheje gae kAfile ko bhI, shahara meM nahIM jAne diyA gayA thA.
dAreyA, usa sainika havAI aDDe ke pAsa sthita hai, jisakA istemAla, rUsI vimAnoM ke lie kiyA jAtA hai.
rUsI senA, sIriyAI rAShTrapati, bashara ala asada kA samarthana kara rahI hai.
Apane bahuta se ba.De logoM ke nijI sahAyaka dekhe hoMge, jo unake hara kAma kA dhyAna rakhate haiM.
masalana, unakA dina kA rUTIna plAna karate haiM.
ye parsanala asisTeMTa, ba.De logoM ko mITiMga kA vaqta yAda dilAte haiM.
unake kahane para logoM ko fona lagAte haiM.
flAiTa ke TikaTa buka karate haiM.
isa taraha, vo ba.De logoM kI ziMdagI, AsAna karate haiM.
Apa sochate hoMge, ki kAsha, Apake pAsa bhI parsanala asisTeMTa hote.
aba Apa bhI parsanala asisTeMTa rakha sakate haiM.
hAM, vo hA.Da-mAMsa kA banA iMsAna nahIM hogA.
vo ApakA varchuala parsanala asisTeMTa hogA, jise Apa AvAza dekara, kAma le sakeMge.
ye parsanala asisTeMTa, Apake fona para upalabdha hai.
takanIka kI duniyA meM roza naI krAMti A rahI hai.
Aja epala ke sIrI se lekara, mAikrosaॉfTa ke korTAnA, aura amezana ke aleksA se lekara, gUgala ke nAU taka, tamAma DijiTala varchuala parsanala asisTeMTa, A gae haiM.
hAM, isa mAmale meM epala kA sIrI kA naMbara pahalA hai.
isake bAda, mAikrosaॉfTa ne korTAnA ke nAma se, varchuala nijI sahAyaka, bAzAra meM utArA.
isake bAda to mAno varchuala parsanala asisTeMTa ko banAne kI ho.Da laga gaI.
saba dAvA karate haiM, ki vo ApakA kAma, ApakI ziMdagI, AsAna kara deMge.
lekina Aja bhI loga varchuala duniyA ke ina nijI sahAyakoM se kAma lene meM hichakate haiM.
Apako varchuala sahAyakoM kI duniyA meM le chalate haiM.
aura jAnane kI koshisha karate haiM, ki kaise inakI madada se, ApakI bhAgadau.Da bharI ziMdagI ko, tho.DA AsAna banAyA jA sakatA hai.
shuruAta meM apane fona ko AvAza dekara koI kAma karane ke lie kahanA, ba.DA ajIba lagatA hai.
phira lahaje kA masalA kha.DA hotA hai.
Apa kahate kuCha haiM, ApakA varchuala sahAyaka, samajhatA kuCha aura hai.
kaI bAra khIjha hotI hai, GussA bhI AtA hai, aura kaI bAra, haMsI bhI AtI hai.
kuCha varchuala parsanala asisTeMTa, vAqaI ba.De kAma ke hote haiM.
epala kA sIrI, piChale pAMcha sAloM se bAzAra meM hai.
takanIka ke ba.De-ba.De ustAda bhI, usase ThIka se kAma nahIM le pAte.
jaise ki kalTa ऑfa maika ke saMpAdaka, lieMDara kAne.
vo kAfI dinoM se koshisha kara rahe haiM, ki epala ke sIrI saॉfTaveyara ko, apanA sachchA nijI sahAyaka banA leM.
lekina ye kAma hai ba.DA mushkila.
lieMDara kahate haiM, ki jaba taka Apa zabaradastI Kuda ko varchuala sahAyaka se kAma lene ko majabUra nahIM karate, taba taka, Apa isakA fAyadA nahIM uThA sakate.
sabase ba.DA masalA hotA hai, bolI samajhane kA.
aMgrezI meM hI vaॉyasa kamAMDa dete vaqta, bahuta se logoM kA lahajA, alaga-alaga hotA hai.
jaise ki, ye lekha likhane vAle bIbIsI ke nika kleTana ko hI lIjie.
vo briTena se, amarIkA ke mishigana shahara pahuMche, to unhoMne apane fona ko kahA, ki merA I-mela cheka karo.

isake javAba meM, sIrI sAhaba ne faurana hI, unake sAmane, mishigana shahara kA nakshA, vahAM TarkI kA mAMsa parosane vAle ba.DhiyA resToreMTa ke nAma, unake khulane-baMda hone kA vaqta, saba talAshakara, nika ke supurda kara die.
nika ke AI fona ke varchuala asisTeMTa sIrI ne kaI bAra aura bhI ga.Daba.Da kI.
eka bAra to mITiMga kA vaqta eka dina bAda kA taya kara diyA.
to ina varchuala parsanala asisTeMTa mahAshaya para aitabAra karanA, nika kleTana ko bahuta mahaMgA pa.DA.
nika kahate haiM, ki kuCha kAmoM ke lie varchuala pIe kAfI kAma kA ho sakatA hai.
lekina kaI bAra aisA hotA hai ki Apa zora-zora se koI kAma apane varchuala pIe ko batAte haiM, aura vo samajhatA kuCha aura hai.
phira Apa jhallAhaTa meM, hAtha-paira paTakate haiM.
nika ne sIrI se pareshAna hokara, apane eMDraॉyaDa fona para, gUgala nAU kI madada lI.
magara isa mAmale meM bhI, tajurbA milA-julA hI rahA.
hAlAMki kuCha kAma haiM, jinameM ye varchuala pIe, kAfI madadagAra ho sakate haiM.
jaise kisI ko fona lagAnA ho, to Apa apane fona ke varchuala sahAyaka ko AvAza dekara kaha sakate haiM, ki falAM ko fona lagAo.
kAma sahI DhaMga se ho, isalie apane vAkya, ChoTe hI rakhie.
jaise ki Apa kaheM, ki rAkesha ko fona lagAo.
ApakA varchuala pIe, faurana kaॉla karegA.
varanA, fonabuka meM pahale nAma khaMgAlie, phira kaॉla kIjie.
isake badale, sirfa eka ChoTI sI bAta, zubAna se adA karanI hai.
Apa apane fona ko ye bhI sikhA sakate haiM, ki raMjIta Apake baॉsa kA nAma hai.
phira Apa apane varchuala sahAyaka ko Adesha de sakate haiM, ki fona lagAo.
yA ye kaha sakate haiM, ki baॉsa ko maiseja karo, ki mujhe daftara pahuMchane meM dera hogI.
Apa varchuala pIe ko ye bhI batA sakate haiM, ki ye maiseja, esaemaesa se bhejA jAe, yA phira vhATsaaipa se.
ye kamAMDa Apa meTro paka.Dane ke lie bhAgate vaqta bhI, apane fona ko de sakate haiM.
sochie, ha.Daba.DI meM maiseja TAipa karake bhejane se, ye kitanA AsAna hogA.
phira kisI Galata AdamI ko saMdesha jAne kA Dara bhI nahIM hogA.
agara Apako jaldI-jaldI kuCha logoM ko I-mela bhejanA ho, to bhI ye varchuala pIe, kAfI kAma A sakatA hai.
hAM, isa bAta kA KayAla rakhanA hogA, ki I-mela kA TeksTa, ChoTA rahe.
varanA, itane savAla kareMge ye varchuala sahAyaka mahodaya, ki Apa khIjha uTheMge.
aba bhI takanIka ko iMsAna kI AvAza sahI se samajhakara usa para amala karanA sIkhanA, bAqI hai.
sabase ba.DI diqqata bAta kahane ke lahaje ko samajhane kI hotI hai.
Apa apane varchuala asisTeMTa kI madada se, logoM se milane kA, mITiMga kA, yA phira dUsare kAma nipaTAne kA vaqta, taya kara sakate haiM.
kala kA laMcha, raushanI ke sAtha, dopahara eka baje, rivaॉlviMga restarAM meM.
apane sahAyaka ko pUrI jAnakArI dIjie.
varanA vo, apanI tarafa se kuCha, jo.Da-ghaTAkara, sArA gu.Da-gobara kara degA.
Apa apane fona para, rimAiMDara bhI seTa kara sakate haiM, vo bhI, vaॉyasa kamAMDa dekara.
basa Apako apane varchuala sahAyaka ko batAnA hai, ki mujhe yAda dilAnA, ki kala shAma, mujhe misa mUDI ko fona karanA hai.
yA phira, mujhe yAda dilAnA, ki kala kapa.De silane ko denA hai.
isa kAma meM tho.DI diqqata A sakatI hai.
kyoMki kaI bAra Apake Ane-jAne kA rAstA alaga hotA hai.
phira bhI tho.DI koshisha karake, Apa apane varchuala asisTeMTa se ye kAma le sakate haiM.
ApakA varchuala sahAyaka, Apake lie TAimara seTa karane kA kAma bhI AsAnI se kara sakatA hai.
basa Apako ChoTe se vAkya meM usako batAnA hai, ki mere lie eka ghaMTe kA TAimara, seTa kara do.
Apa apane varchuala sahAyaka se, kisI KAsa dina ke lie poshAka chunane meM bhI madada mAMga sakate haiM.
agara Apane koI kaileMDara seTa kiyA hai, to sone se pahale, Apa isa varchuala pIe se pUCha sakate haiM, ki kala kA merA kyA ejeMDA hai.
phira Apa nayA kamAMDa de sakate haiM, ki mujhe vaqta-vaqta para, yAda dilAte rahanA.
yaqIna jAnie, jaise-jaise Apa isa varchuala sahAyaka para yaqIna ba.DhAeMge, ye ApakA madadagAra hotA jAegA.
ye ChoTe-ChoTe kAma, ApakI ziMdagI ko kAfI AsAna banA deMge.
hAM, isase kisI iMsAna kI kamI to nahIM pUrI ho sakatI.
isake lie takanIka ko abhI laMbA safara taya karanA hogA.
kanADA ke takanIkI eksaparTa husaina rAhanAmA kahate haiM, ki vaij~nAnika, unnIsa sau pachAsa ke dashaka se hI, varchuala sahAyaka banAne kI koshisha kara rahe haiM.
hara sAla, kuCha behatara chIza hI sAmane AI hai.
isa mAmale meM sabase ba.DI diqqata ye rahI hai, ki ye banAvaTI aqla, yA ArTifishiyala iMTelijeMsa, aksara iMsAnI ehasAsoM ko samajhane meM nAkAma rahI hai.
jaise ki nika kleTana kA hI tajurbA lIjie, vo shAkAhArI haiM.
aise meM agara unakA nijI sahAyaka koI iMsAna hotA, to vo ye pahale se jAnatA hotA, ki amarIkA pahuMchakara, vo TarkI kA mAMsa, nahIM talAsheMge.
lekina rAhanAmA ye bhI kahate haiM, ki takanIka kI duniyA tezI se badala rahI hai.
to isameM bhI jalda hI kuCha aura behatara sAmane AegA.
Aja Apake fona meM, bIsa se chAlIsa seMsara lage hue hote haiM, jo ApakI tamAma harakatoM para nazara rakhate haiM.
usameM jo prosesara lagA hotA hai, vo pachAsa ke dashaka ke kaMpyUTara se, karo.DoM gunA behatara hai.
abhI kuCha dina pahale hI, gUgala ne eka aisA aipa banAne kA elAna kiyA hai, jo Apake ThikAne, Apake kAma, Apake Asa-pAsa ke mausama para, nigAha rakhegA.
yahI nahIM, ye aipa, ye bhI patA lagA legA, ki Apane heDafona pahanA hai, ki nahIM.
isakA matalaba ye, ki agara Apa mITiMga meM hai, to isa aipa ko patA hogA, ki Apako abhI taMga nahIM karanA hai.
hAM, mITiMga ke bAda ye Apako pAsa kI qitAba kI dukAna, yA kisI kaॉfI shaॉpa meM jAne kA mashavirA de sakatA hai.
Aja nae nae aipa banAne meM, takanIka ko behatara karane meM araboM rupae Karcha kie jA rahe haiM.
gUgala, fesabuka, mAikrosaॉfTa aura epala jaisI kaMpaniyAM, ApakI hara harakata para, nigAha rakhanA chAhatI haiM.
to jalda hI, hara iMsAna kI jeba meM eka varchuala pIe hogA.
aura agara Apa apanI prAivesI ko bahuta ahamiyata nahIM dete, to Apa isase apane rAza, sAjhA kara sakeMge.
ye Apako tamAma masaloM para mashavire bhI degA.
ho sakatA hai ki Age chalakara ye varchuala nijI sahAyaka, ApakI DeTa taya karane meM bhI madadagAra ho.
jaba Apake zehana meM, kisI iMsAna yA kisI jagaha kA KyAla AtA hai, to faurana hI dimAGa, usakA tasavvura kara letA hai.
kisI iMsAna kA KyAla Ane para usakI sUrata, usakI AMkhoM kA raMga, bAloM kA sTAila, sabakI tasvIra dimAGa meM A jAtI hai.
magara kyA Apako mAlUma hai, ki kuCha loga aisA nahIM kara sakate.
kisI jagaha yA iMsAna kA nAma lene para, unakA zehana, koI tasvIra nahIM yAda kara pAtA, na apane tasavvura meM hI, ye loga koI tasvIra ga.Dha pAte haiM.
hairAna raha gae na, ho sakatA hai kuCha paloM ke lie, Apa yaqIna hI na kareM.
magara hai ye sau fIsada sacha.
duniyA meM aise bahuta se loga haiM, jinakA dimAGa koI tasvIra nahIM ga.Dha pAtA.
ye eka bImArI hai.
isakA nAma hai, efainTAsiyA.
asala meM ye iMsAna kI kalpanAshIlatA, hamAre tasavvura kI qAbiliyata kI kamI hotI hai.
yUM to isa bImArI kA patA unnIsavIM sadI meM hI chala gayA thA.
aThAraha sau assI meM isa bImArI kI khoja huI thI.
lekina hAla ke dinoM meM, vaij~nAnikoM ne isa bImArI ko samajhane meM, phira se dilachaspI dikhAI hai.
vo isase hone vAle nafe-nuqasAna ko samajhane kI koshisha kara rahe haiM.
tAki isakA iMsAniyata ke hita meM istemAla kara sakeM.
isakI madada se kuCha bImAriyoM jaise kisI burI lata, fikra karane kI Adata se nipaTane ke tarIqe bhI talAshe jA rahe haiM.
efainTAsiyA kI tarafa logoM kA dhyAna khIMchA, briTena kI eksaTara yUnivarsiTI meM hue eka risarcha ne.
ye tajurbA piChale hI sAla, eDama zemana aura unake sAthiyoM ne kiyA thA.
ye una logoM para kiyA gayA, jinake dimAGa, koI tasvIra nahIM ga.Dha pAte.
isakI sabase achChI misAla haiM, filipa nAma ke shaKsa.
unake dimAGa meM koI bhI bAta Ae, magara usase ju.DI koI tasvIra nahIM banatI.
dilachaspa bAta ye hai ki jaba filipa so rahe hote haiM, to unake KvAba, kisI Ama iMsAna jaise hI hote haiM.
jisameM kuCha loga hote haiM, kuCha jagaheM hotI haiM.
lekina jaba filipa jAga rahe hote haiM, to unake dimAGa meM koI tasvIra nahIM banatI.
vo jaba AMkheM baMda karate haiM, to unheM sirfa apanI palakeM dikhAI pa.DatI haiM.
vo ye jAnakara hairAna haiM, ki loga jaba kisI ke bAre meM sochate haiM, to dimAGa meM eka tasvIra bana jAtI hai.
aba agara Apa Ama iMsAna haiM, kisI kA KyAla Ate hI, koI tasvIra zehana meM ubhara AtI hai, to Apake lie ye samajhanA mushkila hai, ki efainTAsiyA ke marIza, kaisA mahasUsa karate haiM.
mAna lIjie ki Apako kahA jAe, ki Apa shAMti kI kalpanA kIjie.
aba amana koI shaKsa to hai nahIM, jo usakA tasavvura kara leM.
phira vo koI chIza bhI nahIM.
vo to mahaza eka KAsa taraha kA mAhaula hai.

aisI sUrata meM, amana kA tasavvura Apa kareMge, to ApakA dimAGa, pahale to koI tasvIra hI nahIM ga.Dha pAegA, aura kuCha sochA bhI, to shAMti ke pratIka mAne jAne vAle safeda kabUtara kA KayAla, zehana meM AegA.
filipa jaise efainTAsiyA ke bImAra loga, aise hAlAta se, roza guzarate haiM.

masalana, vo apane pitA kA KyAla karate haiM, to bhI unakA cheharA, nahIM yAda kara pAte.
unheM ye to yAda hai, ki unakI AMkheM, nIlI thIM.
yA unakI nAka kA sAiza, kyA thA.
magara isase zyAdA, filipa ke zehana meM, kuCha nahIM AtA.
do logoM ke bIcha meM farqa karane ke lie, hameM unake chehare kI, apanI kalpanA se hI mApa lenI pa.DatI hai.
lekina ApakA dimAGa kaisA chala rahA hai, ye patA lagAnA mushkila kAma hai.
isa bAre meM ऑsTreliyA kI nyU sAutha velsa yUnivarsiTI ke joela piyarsana ne risarcha kI hai.
vo logoM ke tasavvura ko nApa sakate haiM.
piyarsana unake KayAla badala bhI sakate haiM.
isake lie, vo kisI ko do ekadama alaga tasvIreM dikhAte haiM.
eka tasvIra, dAhinI AMkha se, to dUsarI, bAMyIM AMkha se.
isake bAda vo logoM se kahate haiM, ki donoM AMkhoM se, eka sAtha, donoM tasvIreM dekheM.
aba kisI kA dimAGa, donoM tasvIroM ko ekabAragI jo.Dakara to nahIM dekha pAegA.
isIlie, pUre sIna para eka tasvIra, hAvI ho jAtI hai.
Apa logoM kI kalpanA meM isa taraha hera-phera kara sakate haiM, ki koI KAsa tasvIra, pahale dikhA sakate haiM.
isase, pahale dikhAI gaI tasvIra hAvI ho jAtI hai Apake dimAGa para.
phira jaba Apako donoM meM se kisI eka tasvIra kA tasavvura karane ko kahA jAtA hai, to aksara, pahalI tasvIra hI loga yAda karate haiM.
filipa ko apanI bImArI kA ehasAsa eka kAryakrama sunate hue huA.
unheM aMdAzA huA, ki unhoMne bahuta logoM se alaga ziMdagI jI hai.
pahale to unheM yaqIna nahIM huA.
to unhoMne apanI beTI se pUChA, ki batAo, seba kA raMga kaisA hotA hai.
beTI ne faurana kahA, harA.
filipa ko taga.DA jhaTakA lagA.
isa jhaTake se unakI ziMdagI ke kaI anasulajhe pahalU, eka jhaTake meM, sulajha gae.
filipa kI yAdadAshta, hameshA se kamazora thI.
unheM logoM ke nAma aura chehare yAda nahIM rahate the.
lekina aba unheM samajha meM A rahA hai ki isakI vajaha, kyA thI.
dUsare loga kisI nAma ko sunakara, dimAGa meM usakI tasvIra banA lete the.
vahIM, filipa ke lie ye kAma karanA mushkila thA, kyoMki vo dimAGa meM, kisI kI koI tasvIra hI nahIM banA pAte the.
aksara filipa ko kAra pArkiMga meM apanI kAra khojane meM, pareshAnI hotI thI.
kyoMki jahAM bhI vo gA.DI kha.DI karate the, usa jagaha ko, bhUla jAte the.
phira ghaMToM, gA.DI ko khojate rahate the.
kyoMki usa jagaha kI koI tasvIra hI, filipa ke zehana meM nahIM hotI thI.
isase nipaTane ke lie, unhoMne kAra pArka karane ke bAda, usa KAsa jagaha kI tasvIra lenI shurU kara dI.
vo Asa-pAsa kI dukAnoM ke nAma bhI noTa kara lete the.
tAki bAda meM kAra khojane meM pareshAnI na ho.
hamAre dimAGa kA jo hissA kisI chehare ko, yA kisI jagaha ko yAda rakhatA hai, use vizuala korTeksa kahate haiM.
isakA sAiza hI, hamArI kalpanAshIlatA kI tAqata, taya karatA hai.
agara dimAGa kA ye hissA kama ekTiva hotA hai, to hama zyAdA behatara tasavvura kara pAte haiM.
joela piyarsana aura unakI TIma ne, dimAGa ke isa hisse ke kAma karane ke tarIqe ko achChe se samajhA hai.
vo aba, ise tho.DA sA, sTimuleshana dekara, kisI ke kalpanA karane kI tAqata meM tabdIlI bhI lA sakate haiM.
agara vo aisA karane meM bAra bAra kAmayAba hote haiM, to isase, efainTAsiyA ke marIzoM kI madada ho sakegI.

ye sabhI pareshAniyAM, dimAGa meM kuCha KAsa tasvIroM ke bAra-bAra Ane se ba.DhatI jAtI haiM.
to agara kisI ke dimAGa para asara DAlakara, burI tasvIroM kA KayAla zehana se nikAlA jA sake.
to bImArI bhI dUra ho jAegI.
piyarsana kahate haiM, ki isake ulaTa, kuCha logoM kI tasavvura karane kI kUvata, isI takanIka se ba.DhAI bhI jA sakatI hai.
isase logoM kI yAdadAshta bhI behatara ho sakatI hai.

kyA unakI pareshAnI aura ba.Dha jAne vAlI hai.
piyarsana kahate haiM ki efainTAsiyA ke marIza, behatara kAma karate haiM.
vo kisI bAta ko, kisI iMsAna ko, yA kisI jagaha ko, tasvIra se jo.Dakara nahIM dekhate.
vo aura tarIqe apanAte haiM.
jaise jagaha kI dUrI kA aMdAzA lagAkara, kisI shahara ke bAre meM sochate haiM.
kahane kA matalaba ye, ki vo binA tasvIra ga.Dhe, dUsare tarIqoM kI madada se apanI mushkiloM kA hala DhUMDhate haiM.
piyarsana kahate haiM, ki agara Apa kisI iMsAna kA, yA phira kisI jagaha kA tasavvura kara lete haiM, to unakI madada se kAma kara leMge.
agara koI aisA nahIM kara pAtA, to vo dUsare tarIqoM se apanA kAma chalAtA hai.
filipa isa bAta para razAmaMda haiM.
vo logoM kI AvAza kI naqala kara lete haiM.
kisI bhI taraha kI AvAza nikAla lete haiM.
unheM lagatA hai, ki qudarata ne, unase eka KUbI ChInI, to dUsarI nemata baKshI hai.
efainTAsiyA ke kuCha aura marIzoM se ऑnalAina saMparka sAdhane para, milI julI rAya, sAmane AI.
eka ne kahA, ki isa bImArI kI vajaha se, vo Aja meM jIte haiM.
kyoMki kala kI plAniMga hI nahIM kara sakate.
kuCha aura logoM ne bhI, isa bAta para hAmI bharI.
eka ne kahA, ki chUMki vo kisI KAsa pala ko dobArA nahIM jI sakatA.
isalie, vo hara pala kI ahamiyata samajha kara, use achChe se guzArane kI koshisha karatA hai.
filipa bhI ye bAta mAnate haiM.
vo kahate haiM, ki vo kisI masale kA faurI hala khojane meM yaqIna rakhate haiM.
laMbI-chau.DI plAniMga unake basa kI bAta nahIM.
kyoMki ye kAma tasavvura se hogA.
zehana meM binA tasvIreM ga.Dhe, vo ye kAma kara nahIM sakate.
kuCha aura logoM ko bhI lagatA hai, ki efainTAsiyA kI vajaha se, unheM kisI bure pala ko dobArA jIne ko majabUra nahIM honA hotA.
vo Aja meM jIte haiM.
kala jo huA use bhUlanA vaise bhI achChA hI hotA hai.
jaise hama ye kalpanA nahIM kara pAte, ki agara hamAre KayAla meM koI tasvIra nahIM A pAtI hai, to hamArI ziMdagI kaisI hogI.
vaise hI, efainTAsiyA ke marIza ye sochate haiM, ki agara vo kalpanA karane lage, tasavvura meM tasvIreM banAne lage.
eka mahilA ne kahA, ki chUMki vo koI tasvIra nahIM socha pAtI, so vo hara chIza ko likhakara rakhatI hai.
ziMdagI ke ahama lamhoM kA hisAba-qitAba bhI, vo noTa karake rakhatI hai.
vo kahatI haiM, ki shabda, bahuta KUbasUrata hote haiM.
koI tasvIra unakI jagaha nahIM le satI.
sochie, kuCha bhAvoM ko lafzoM ke bajAya, tasvIroM meM bayAM kiyA jAe, to kaisA hogA.
kisI bAta ko bayAM karane kA aMdAza hI, ekadama alaga hogA.
filipa abhI ina saba bAtoM ko samajha rahe haiM.
unheM patA hI nahIM thA, ki loga kisI bAta yA iMsAna kA KayAla Ane para, faurana usakI tasvIra, ga.Dha lete haiM.
kisI ne unheM ye bAta batAyI hI nahIM.
hai na chauMkAne vAlI bAta.
kuCha logoM ke zehana meM koI tasvIra hI nahIM banatI.
sviTzaralaiMDa meM duniyA kI sabase laMbI aura sabase gaharI rela suraMga chAlU ho gaI hai.
ise banAne meM, qarIba bIsa sAla lage.
sattAvana kilomITara laMbI isa doharI suraMga kA nAma, goTahArDa hai, jo Alpsa parvatoM ke nIche se, uttarI aura dakShiNI yUropa ko, teza gati vAlI rela sevA se jo.DegI.
sviTzaralaiMDa kA kahanA hai ki ye suraMga, yUropa meM mAlavAhaka parivahana meM krAMtikArI qadama hogA.
emanesTI iMTaraneshanala kA kahanA hai, ki piChale tIna sAloM meM, afaGAnistAna meM visthApita logoM kI saMkhyA, dogunA se bhI zyAdA ho gaI hai.
saMsthA ke anusAra abhI bAraha lAkha afaGAna, visthApita haiM.
isa bAre meM aura jAnakArI ke lie tho.DI dera pahale, maiMne bIbIsI kI pashto sevA se saMparka kiyA.
jeneTikalI maॉDifAiDa yA jIema fasaloM kI khetI honI chAhie yA nahIM, ise lekara kAfI vivAda rahA hai.
magara aba eka riporTa meM kahA gayA hai, ki jIema fUDa meM koI KatarA nahIM.
vaij~nAnikoM kI eka TIma ne, do dashakoM ke daurAna hue saika.DoM risarcha ke adhyayana ke bAda, ina dAvoM ko KArija kara diyA hai, ki jIema fUDa, iMsAnoM ke khAne lAyaqa nahIM haiM.
pAkistAna ke rAShTrapati, mamanUna husaina ne Aropa lagAyA hai, ki bhArata, bAtachIta se bachane kI koshisha kara rahA hai.
unhoMne kahA ki pAkistAna kI ora se, paThAnakoTa hamale kI saMyukta jAMcha kI peshakasha ke bAvajUda, bhArata aisA kara rahA hai.
pAkistAna ke rAShTrapati ne kashmIra mudde ko bhI uThAyA, aura ise AdhA-adhUrA vibhAjana batAyA.
unhoMne ise kShetrIya tanAva kA pramukha kAraNa batAyA.

samAchAra ejeMsI pITIAI ke mutAbika, pAkistAna kI saMsada ke saMyukta satra ko saMbodhita karate hue, mamanUna husaina ne kahA, hama mAnate haiM ki kShetra meM tanAva kI mukhya vajaha, kashmIra kA muddA hai.
ye upamahAdvIpa ke vibhAjana kA aisA ejeMDA hai, jo pUrA nahIM huA hai.
kashmIra kA muddA kashmIra ke logoM aura saMyukta rAShTra ke prastAvoM ke mutAbika, jaba taka hala nahIM hogA, taba taka, isa kShetra kI samasyAoM kA samAdhAna nahIM hogA.

chIna kA zikra karate hue unhoMne kahA ki pAka-chIna sAjhedArI, desha kI Arthika vRRiddhi ke lie mahatvapUrNa hai, aura araboM Daॉlara kI lAgata vAlA chIna-pAkistAna ikonaॉmika kaॉriDora, hara kImata para pUrA kiyA jAegA.

vesTa zona kI aMDara siksaTIna TIma meM, praNava dhanAva.De kA selekshana na hone, aura sachina teMdulakara ke beTe arjuna teMdulakara ke salekTa hone ko lekara, soshala mIDiyA meM jamakara bahasa ho rahI hai.
praNava dhanAva.De ne bIbIsI ko batAyA, vesTa zona kI TIma kA chunAva muMbaI aura sTeTa ke maichoM ke parafaॉrmeMsa ke AdhAra para hotA hai.
merA parafaॉrmeMsa sahI nA hone kI vajaha se, maiM kuCha sTeTa ke maichoM ke lie nahIM chunA gayA thA.
merA rikaॉrDa banane se pahale hI sTeTa kI TIma bana gaI thI.
praNava kahate haiM, arjuna ne sTeTa ke sabhI maicha meM achChA parafaॉrma kiyA thA.
isalie vesTa zona meM unakA selekshana huA.
maiMne arjuna ko isa selekshana ke lie badhAI bhI dI thI.
aba mujhe aMDara nAinaTIna chayana hone kI ummIda hai.
vo kahate haiM, maiM aura arjuna bahuta achChe dosta haiM.
hamane pUre pAMcha sAla eka sAtha eka hI klaba, emaAIjI ke lie khelA hai.
maiM yahI kahanA chAhatA hUM ki ye afavAha, jalda baMda ho.
praNava kahate haiM, arjuna eka bahuta mehanatI khilA.DI haiM.
vo apanI mehanata ke dama para chune gae haiM.
maiM sabase yahI kahUMgA KabU mehanata karanI chAhie.
mehanata kA phala zarUra milatA hai.
maiM sachina sara kA bahuta ba.DA faina hU.N.
mujhe sabase achChI bAta, unakA DisiplIna meM honA achChA lagatA hai.
arjuna kI sabase achChI bAta ye hai, kI vo hameshA grAuMDeDa hai.
kabhI havA meM nahIM hotA.
usako kisI bhI bAta kA koI aiTiTyUDa nahIM hai.
vo batAte haiM ki isa taraha kI KabaroM para, maiM bahuta saॉfTalI riekTa karatA hU.N.
arjuna se isa mAmale meM koI bAta nahIM huI hai, abhI arjuna, vesTa zona kI taiyArI meM vyasta haiM.
vahIM praNava dhanAvaDe ke pitA, prashAMta dhanAvaDe ne kahA, ki arjuna teMdulakara aura praNava ko lekara, mIDiyA meM Galata Kabara, phailAI jA rahI hai.
vo kahate haiM, arjuna kA chunAva unake khela aura TaileMTa ke hisAba se, bilakula sahI huA hai.
praNava ke rikaॉrDa ke pahale hI, muMbaI kI TIma, selekTa ho gaI thI.
TIma meM jo sTeTa vAiza khelatA hai, vahI bAda meM, zonala ke lie chuna liyA jAtA hai.
praNava ne muMbaI nahIM khelA thA, to zonala ke lie chunA jAnA saMbhava hI nahIM thA.
praNava ke pitA kahate haiM, jisane bhI pahalI bAra ye afavAha vAlA maiseja, soshala mIDiyA meM DAlA hogA, use krikeTa TIma meM chunAva kI pUrI prakriyA kI jAnakArI nahIM hogI.
vo batAte haiM, praNava ke rikaॉrDa ‎banAne se pahale hI, aMDara siksaTIna TIma kA chunAva aura maicha, ho chuke the.
praNava muMbaI hI nahIM khelA, to zonala meM kaise jAegA.
usakA parafaॉrmeMsa hI nahIM thA, jo bhI chunAva huA hai, bilakula sahI, aura niyamoM ke mutAbiqa huA hai.
prashAMta dhanAvaDe batAte haiM ki chAra dina pahale, unheM isa afavAha kA maiseja milA.
use dekhakara pahale to unhoMne mazAka samajhA.
lekina bAda meM ye gaMbhIra mAmalA ho gayA.
sachina sara kA beTA hai, aisA bolakara kisI kA nAma badanAma karanA, bilakula Galata bAta hai.
vo batAte haiM, ki praNava, khuda sachina sara kA bahuta ba.DA faina hai.
praNava jaba sachina jI se milane gayA thA, to unhoMne use tohafe meM eka baiTa bhI diyA thA.
unhoMne kahA, ki khela ko khela kI nazara se dekhanA chAhie.
isa taraha kI afavAha, bilakula nahIM phailAnI chAhie.
praNava dhanAva.De ne s{}kUlI krikeTa meM, eka hazAra nau rana kI apanI pArI khelakara, desha hI nahIM, balki aMtararASh{}TrIya stara para, charchA kA viShaya bana gae the.
unakI usa pArI ke lie, sachina teMdulakara sameta, desha aura duniyA ke kaI mashahUra krikeTaroM ne, unheM badhAI dI thI.
gUgala Taiksa ne ऑnalAina duniyA meM khalabalI machA dI hai.
ऑnalAina vij~nApana dene vAlI kaMpaniyoM ke lie, ye Taiksa, Aja se lAgU ho gayA hai.
kaI TeknolaॉjI kaMpaniyAM apane vij~nApana, sirfa ऑnalAina hI detI haiM.
isa gUgala Taiksa se, aba ina kaMpaniyoM ko, sarakAra Taiksa ke dAyare meM lAne kI koshisha kara rahI hai.
fesabuka aura gUgala para jo bhI vij~nApana dete haiM, unake lie ye burI khabara hai, kyoMki, aba unheM Chaha fIsada Taiksa, denA pa.Da sakatA hai.
gUgala jaisI kaMpanI, hara sarcha aura ऑnalAina vij~nApana para, paisA banAtI hai.
sarakAra kI koshisha hai, ki kaMpaniyoM ko iMTaraneTa para vij~nApanoM se hone vAle fAyade para, vo Taiksa lagAe.
jo bhI bhAratIya kaMpaniyAM aba gUgala aura fesabuka para vij~nApana deMgI, unheM Taiksa ke rUpa meM paise sarakAra ko dene pa.DeMge.
yUropa ke kaI deshoM meM sarakAreM aisA hI Taiksa lagAtI haiM.
sarakAra kI apratyakSha kara kI sabase ba.DI saMsthA, seMTrala borDa ऑfa eksAija eMDa kasTamsa, kaI mahInoM se isakI taiyArI kara rahA thA.
DijiTala duniyA meM ho rahe munAfe para Taiksa lagAne kI, ye sarakAra kI pahalI koshisha hai.
hAla meM sarakAra ne DijiTala iMDiyA, aura sTArTa apa iMDiyA nAma ke kAryakrama shurU kie haiM, jinake tahata ChoTI kaMpaniyoM ko ba.DhAvA diyA jA rahA hai.
lekina gUgala Taiksa se aisI kaMpaniyoM ke bIcha, jo utsAha dikhAI de rahA thA, vo tho.DA phIkA pa.Da sakatA hai.
filahAla, ise DijiTala vij~nApanoM kI shreNI ke lie lagAyA gayA hai.
lekina ummIda ye kI jA rahI hai, ki ise dUsarI sarvisa ke lie bhI ba.DhAyA jA sakatA hai.
unnIsa sau chaurAnave meM, sarakAra ne alaga-alaga sarvisa para Taiksa lagAnA shurU kiyA thA.
unnIsa sau sattAnave meM, jaba tatkAlIna vitta maMtrI ne bajaTa kI ghoShaNA kI thI, taba sarakAra ko, sarvisa Taiksa se, sirfa ATha sau karo.Da rupae milate the.
aba dasa lAkha se zyAdA loga, sarvisa Taiksa ke tahata apanI jAnakArI, sarakAra ko dete haiM.
sarvisa Taiksa, taba pAMcha fIsada thA, aura Aja se, ba.Dhakara, paMdraha fIsadI ho gayA hai.
sarvisa Taiksa se sarakAra kI kamAI, aba De.Dha lAkha karo.Da rupae se bhI zyAdA hai.
sAla unnIsa sau chaurAnave meM, sarakAra ne chune hue sarvisa para, ye Taiksa lagAyA thA.
dhIre dhIre isa lisTa ko ba.DhA diyA gayA hai.
aba TelIkaॉma, iMTaraneTa, eyara kaMDIshana resToreMTa, aura usake jaisI, sau se bhI zyAdA sevAoM para, sarakAra Taiksa lagAtI hai.
seMTrala borDa ऑfa eksAija eMDa kasTamsa kI Taiksa risarcha yUniTa ne, aisI kaI aura sarvisa kI sUchI taiyAra kI hai, jisapara Ane vAle dinoM meM Taiksa lagAyA jA sakatA hai.
gUgala Taiksa lagAkara, sarakAra ऑnalAina bizanasa para, apanI nazara rakha kara, kamAI kA bhI srota banAnA chAhatI hai.

chUMki gUgala, fesabuka, yA dUsarI kaMpaniyAM, bhArata meM sarvisa para Taiksa nahIM detI haiM, yA nahIM ke barAbara detI haiM, isalie sarakAra ko Ama bolachAla meM kahe jAne vAle gUgala Taiksa kA rAstA, ifatihAra karanA pa.DA.
bhAjapA adhyakSha, amita shAha se merI pahachAna, ekatarafA hai.
yAnI, sirfa merI tarafa se.
laMbe samaya pahale, jaba amita shAha ahamadAbAda meM the, taba unase fona para saMparka karanA, bAtachIta karanA, AsAna huA karatA thA.

soharAbuddIna pharzI muThabhe.Da mAmale meM, adAlatI Adesha ke bAda, jaba unheM gujarAta Cho.Dakara dillI AnA pa.DA, taba gujarAta bhavana meM unake nivAsa kAla ke daurAna, maiMne unase milane kI koshisha kI, lekina safalatA, nahIM milI.
taba se aba taka amita shAha ne laMbA safara taya kara liyA hai.
aba vo bhAjapA adhyakSha haiM, aura unake nareMdra bhAI, bhArata ke pradhAnamaMtrI, aura ye desha kI shAyada, sabase shaktishAlI jo.DI hai.
piChale kuCha vaqta se maiM amita shAha ko, patrakAroM ko javAba dete hue dekha rahA hUM.
aura kaI bAra, ise lekara mere mana meM utsukatA, aura pareshAnI ke bhAva haiM.

utsukatA ye jAnane kI, ki amita shAha, mIDiyA ke bAre meM kyA sochate haiM, aura pareshAnI isalie, ki kaI bAra, vo jisa taraha javAba dete haiM, use dekhakara lagatA hai ki mIDiyA ko lekara, unake mana meM eka mazabUta dhAraNA hai.
apane javAboM meM amita shAha, AkrAmaka hote haiM, hAlAMki kabhI-kabhI unake chehare para, muskurAhaTa bhI dikhatI hai, aura vo patrakAroM ko, bhaiyA kahate dikhate haiM.
savAla ke hara shabda ko vo dhyAna se sunate haiM, aura javAba meM, usa shabda kA havAlA dekara, TippaNI turaMta chipakA bhI dete haiM.

vo mIDiyA se behada KafA dikhate haiM, jaise unheM lagatA ho, ki mIDiyA kA eka hissA unake khilAfa hai, hAlAMki, vo jalda bhUla jAte haiM, ki jaba mIDiyA meM yUpIe ke khilAfa kahAniyAM hotI thIM, to unhIM kA dala, isI mIDiyA kI tArIfa karatA thA.
udhara eka dUsare pakSha kI shikAyata hai, ki mIDiyA meM sarakAra ke khilAfa likhanA, mushkila hotA jA rahA hai.
amita shAha ne nareMdra modI sarakAra ke do sAla pUre hone para, presa kAnfreMsa bulAI thI.
manamohana siMha ko maunamohana siMha bulAne vAle nareMdra modI, usa dina aKabAroM, soshala mIDiyA para to maujUda the, lekina patrakAroM ke savAloM ke lie nahIM.
sarakAra ke dUsare maMtrI bhAratIya mIDiyA para sAkShAtkara de rahe the, lekina sarakAra ke mukhiyA ne, sAkShAtkAra ke lie vaॉla sTrITa jarnala ko chunA.
mIDiyA ke savAloM ke lie usa dina maMcha para kamAna saMbhAlI amita shAha ne.
safeda kurte para baiganI neharU jaikeTa pahane amita shAha, maMcha para baiThe the.
chehare para jAnI pahachAnI halkI dA.DhI.
sAmane patrakAroM kA jamAva.DA, aura maiM unheM daftara meM, TIvI para dekha rahA thA.
amita shAha ne mazabUtI se sarakAra kI do sAla kI upalabdhiyoM ko ginavAyA.
aura phira, savAla-javAba kA silasilA, shurU huA.
pahalA savAla, piChale do sAloM meM sarakAra ko kisa taraha kI chunautiyAM pesha AIM haiM.

amita shAha ne agale tirtAllisa sekeMDa meM, pUrva yUpIe sarakAra kI kathita KarAba nItiyoM ke kAraNa, khazAnA khAlI hone, paॉlisI parAlisisa Ane, janatA meM nirAshA phailane ke alAvA, naI AshA ke saMchAra kA zikra kiyA.
mujhe isase kahIM behatara, vichArashIla javAba kI talAsha thI.
phira amita shAha ne eka patrakAra se tho.DA mazAka kara, mAhaula ko AsAna banAyA.
eka patrakAra ne sarakArI yojanAoM meM chunautiyoM se ju.DA savAla uThAyA, to javAba milA, ki sarakAra yojanAoM para nigarAnI rakhatI hai, aura jAnakArI chAhie, to nareMdra modI aipa dekhie.
eka dUsare patrakAra ne kisI sarve kA havAlA dete hue, behada gaMbhIra aMdAza meM pUChA, logoM ko to sarakArI kAryakramoM ke bAre meM jAnakArI hI nahIM hai.
amita shAha ne bAeM hAtha se ishArA karate hue, nATakIya aMdAza meM kahA, are bhaiyA, mIDiyA kA bhI to dAyitva hai, Apa dikhAo zarA, eka-eka yojanA ke bAre meM.
hara eka yojanA ke bAre meM TIvI para dikhAo, hara yojanA, prasidda ho jAegI.
sarakAra ke do sAla pUre honA behada mahatvapUrNa vaqta thA.

aisA vaqta, jaba desha eka ba.DA hissA, sUkhe se jUjha rahA ho, mahaMgAI eka chunautI ho, pArTI ke kaI chunAvI vAdoM ke pUrA hone para savAla ho, aise meM mujhe ummIda thI ki eka likhe parche ko pa.Dhane ke alAvA, amita shAha, logoM se sIdhe bAtachIta kareMge, muddoM, pareshAniyAM, aura unake upAyoM para bAta kareMge, lekina aisA kuCha nahIM huA.

yA phira merI ummIda hI Galata thI, kyoMki ye sarakAra, yA phira sarakAra kA eka hissA, soshala mIDiyA ke mAdhyama se, logoM se sIdhe ju.Dane meM vishvAsa karatA hai, na ki patrakAra mIDiyA ke mAdhyama se.
