kuCha mahIne pahale jaba amita shAha, kiraNa bedI kA nAma dillI ke mukhyamaMtrI pada ke dAvedAra ke taura para ghoShita kara rahe the, to eka patrakAra se unhoMne kahA, hamAre sIToM ke chayana kA faisalA Apake savAla ke AdhAra para nahIM hotA, hamArI pArTI kI anukUlatA ke AdhAra para hotA hai.
eka anya savAla para muskurAte hue taMza kasA, Apa merI pArTI chalAnA mujhapara Cho.Da do, Apa chainala chalAnA chAlU rakho.
iMDiyA TuDe kaॉnkleva, shAyada ekamAtra aisA maMcha thA, jahAM amita shAha, tho.DA khule, aura mIDiyA ke bAre meM unakI socha, sAmane AI.
patrakAra, rAhula kaMvala ke eka savAla ke javAba meM amita shAha ne kahA, svara kitanA hai, aura usake Age lAuDaspIkara kauna lagAtA hai, vo dekhanA pa.DegA.
maiM batAtA hUM, kaise Apa loga karate ho.
AgarA meM dalita yuvA kI hatyA huI, kisI ne nahIM dikhAyA.
aba usakI shraddAMjalI ke kAryakrama meM koI kuCha bola gayA, pUre desha meM mIDiyA kAUM kAUM karane meM laga gayA.
kerala meM Araesaesa ke eka kAryakartA kI hatyA para, mIDiyA riporTiMga para unakI TippaNI thI, Apane kerala meM mArane vAloM kA ullekha nahIM kiyA.
Apake Duela sTaiMDarDa kyoM haiM.
savAloM ko TAla jAnA, sIdhA javAba na denA, netAoM ke lie naI bAta nahIM hai.
jayalalitA, mAyAvatI, soniyA gAMdhI, navIna paTanAyaka, ina netAoM kA piChalA sAkShAtkAra, Apako shAyada hI yAda ho.
lekina hAla ke dinoM meM, jisa taraha amita shAha, patrakAroM ko javAba dete dikhe haiM, usase mIDiyA para unakI socha, zarUra patA chalatI hai.
patrakAra ke taura para unase sAkShAtkAra, shAyada sabase mushkila kAmoM meM se eka ho.
kyoMki kama vAkyoM meM vo pArTI lAina ko jasa kA tasa parosa dete haiM.
yahAM yUpIe daura kI eka bAta zarUra yAda AtI hai.

yUpIe kI hAra ke pIChe eka tarka ye bhI diyA jAtA hai, ki bhraShTAchAra, DhalatI arthavyavasthA ke alAvA, jisa bAta ne sarakAra kI Chavi KarAba kI, vo thI mIDiyA, khAsakara TIvI para, pArTI pravaqtAoM kA javAba dene kA aMdAza, sInA ThoMkakara ye kahanA, ki sabakuCha ThIka hai.
ise kaI logoM ne sattA ke GurUra kI nishAnI mAnA.
kapila sibala, manIsha tivArI, saMjaya jhA kI dIvAra ke pIChe, pradhAnamaMtrI manamohana siMha kyA sochate haiM, ye logoM ko patA nahIM chalA.

agara Apa, kAMgresa adhyakSha, soniyA gAMdhI iMTaravyU pa.Dhane ke lie gUgala kareM, to bhUrI sharTa aura TAI pahane hue, aura mUCha dhare, rAjIva shuklA ko diyA gayA unnIsa sau ninyAnave kA sAkShAtkAra, sabase Upara dikhatA hai.
usake bAda enaDITIvI ko do hazAra chAra kA shekhara guptA se kiyA gayA sAkShAtkAra hai.
aura isake alAvA, soniyA gAMdhI ke ikke dukke iMTaravyU hI, mujhe nazara Ate haiM.
amita shAha se behatara ummIde thIM, kyoMki ye sarakAra, janatA se bAtachIta meM kahIM behatara mAnI gaI thI.
lekina unake tAzA mIDiyA saMvAda se kaI loga nirAsha hue hoMge.
yahAM gujarAta, soharAbuddIna, farzI muThabhe.Da, kathita GairakAnUnI snUpiMga Cho.Die, AsAna rAjanItika savAloM para javAba milanA mushkila ho gayA hai.
amita shAha jI savAla pUChanA hamArA kAma hai.
ummIda hai, Apa hameM tho.DA aura gaMbhIratA se leMge.
ba.DhiyA kIborDa vo hotA hai, jo Apake lie TAipiMga AsAna kara detA hai, aura ApakI galatiyoM ko sudhAra detA hai, yA sudhArane meM madada karatA hai.
gUgala ple sTora para Apako kaI taraha ke kIborDa mila jAeMge, jinake fIchara, alaga alaga haiM.
ina sabhI kIborDa meM svAipa nAma kA aipa, kAfI pasaMda kiyA jAtA hai, kyoMki usameM Apake TAipiMga kI raftAra, kAfI teza ho jAtI hai.
ise istemAla karate samaya Apako eka akShara se dUsare para jAne ke lie, apanI uMgalI nahIM uThAnI pa.DatI hai.
lekina agara Apa gUgala kIborDa istemAla karate haiM, to usameM eka KAsiyata milegI, jo Apako kisI aura kIborDa meM nahIM mila sakatI hai.
Apa jo shabda, apane smArTafona para TAipa karate haiM, use ye kIborDa sIkha letA hai, aura kuCha dina bAda, Apa vo shabda jaba TAipa kareMge, to vo use, sahI mAnane lagegA.
ye shabda Apake smArTafona kI parsanala DiskshanarI kA hissA bana jAte haiM, aura Apake lie, pareshAnI dUra ho jAtI hai.
bAda meM jaba bhI Apa nayA eMDrAiDa DivAisa kharIdeMge, to usa gUgala akAuMTa kA istemAla karake, nae DivAisa para laॉga ina kara lIjie, aura ApakA DikshanarI Apake sAtha nae DivAisa para bhI milegA.
apane eMDrAiDa DivAisa para DikshanarI ko inebala karane ke lie, Apako, apane gUgala akAuMTa se laॉga ina kiyA honA chAhie.
isake bAda seTiMga meM jAiye, aura laiMgveja eMDa inapuTa ke vikalpa ko chuna lIjie, aura phira, gUgala kIborDa chuna lIjie.
agara Apa eka se zyAdA jImela akAuMTa apane smArTafona para istemAla karate haiM, to Apako chunanA hogA, ki kisa akAuMTa se apane kIborDa ko liMka karanA chAhate haiM.

jaba bhI Apa nayA eMDrAiDa DivAisa kharIdeMge, to nae DivAisa para laॉga ina karate hI, Apako kIborDa para zyAdA samaya nahIM bitAnA hogA, kyoMki ApakI DikshanarI, aba nae smArTafona para bhI kAma karegI.
kabhI kabhI ghara Ae mehamAna ke sAtha, Apa chAheM, yA nahIM, vAI fAI pAsavarDa, shera karanA hI pa.DatA hai.
lekina koI zarUrI nahIM hai ki Apa hameshA aisA kareM.
Apake ghara jo bhI mehamAna AyA hai, agara unake pAsa eMDrAiDa yA aipala kA aisA fona hai, jo kyUAra koDa pa.Dha sakatA hai, to Apako pAsavarDa shera karane kI zarurata nahIM hai.
apane vAI fAI ke peja kA eka kyUAra koDa taiyAra kara lIjie, aura jo, use istemAla karanA chAhatA hai, usako vo kyUAra koDa, de dIjie.
Aie, isakA pUrA tarIkA batAte haiM.
Apa isake alAvA kisI bhI vebasAiTa se kyUAra koDa taiyAra kara sakate haiM.
basa isa bAta kA dhyAna rakhie ki vo Apako vAI fAI kanekshana ke lie, kyUAra koDa banAne kI ijAzata detA hai.
eka bAra vahAM sabhI jAnakArI de dene ke bAda bAda, jenareTa likhe hue baTana para klika kara dIjie.
usake bAda ApakA koDa taiyAra ho jAegA.
usake bAda, jo bhI ApakA pAsavarDa mAMgatA hai, use Apa kyUAra koDa, skaina karane ko kaha dIjie.
skaina karate hI, vo DivAisa Apake neTavarka se, kanekTa ho jAegA.
jaba Apako usa DivAisa ko DisakanekTa karanA hai, to apane rAUTara ko eka-do minaTa ke lie, ऑfa kara dIjie.
agara usa DivAisa se phira se kanekTa karanA hai, to use, kyUAra koDa ko phira se skaina karanA pa.DegA.
sekeMDa haiMDa smArTafona Ajakala bAzAra meM dhUma machA rahe haiM.
jaise jaise logoM ne mahaMge smArTafona kharIdanA kama kara diyA hai, kaMpaniyoM ne sekeMDa haiMDa proDakTa ko, aba bAzAra meM lAne kA sochA hai.
lekina jaba bhI Apa sekeMDa haiMDa smArTafona kharIdane kI socheM, to bahuta sAvadhAna rahane kI zarurata hai.
Aie Apako batAte haiM, kina bAtoM kA dhyAna rakhie, tAki Apako koI bevaqUfa na banA de.
kaI vebasAiTa para Aja kala sekeMDa haiMDa smArTafona mila rahe haiM, isalie inheM DhU.N.Dhane meM koI dikkata nahIM honI chAhie.
sabase pahale Apako ye taya karanA hogA ki eMDrAiDa kA kauna sA ऑpareTiMga sisTama, aura skrIna sAiza, Apako chAhie.
agara apanA bajaTa shurU meM taya kara leMge to smArTafona chunane meM tho.DI AsAnI hogI.
jaba bhI kisI brAMDa ke fona ke nae maॉDala laॉncha hote haiM, to usake purAne maॉDala, tho.De kama samaya meM mila jAte haiM.
isalie, Apako aise mauke kI talAsha meM rahanA hogA.
ye patA kara lIjie, ki jisa bhI vebasAiTa se Apa sekeMDa haiMDa smArTafona kharIda rahe haiM, kyA usakI koI riTarna paॉlisI hai.
agara eka-do dina ke istemAla ke bAda, smArTafona pasaMda nahIM AyA, to Apa use vApasa kara sakate haiM.
fona kharIdate samaya apane sima kArDa ko bhI usame DAla kara dekha lIjie.
kAfI Ama bAta hai, para isase ye cheka kara sakate haiM ki DivAisa kAma kara rahA hai ki nahIM.
bechane vAlI kaMpanI se ye ga.craMTI mAMgie ki ye fona chorI kA nahIM hai.
jaba Apa fona ko dekhane jA rahe haiM, to laipaTaॉpa, mAikro esaDI kArDa aura haiDafona bhI sAtha rakhiye, sirfa ye cheka karane ke lie, ki fona ke sabhI fIchara, kAma kara rahe haiM.
fona sirfa dikhane meM ba.DhiyA nahIM honA chAhie, usake sabhI fIchara, kAma bhI karane chAhie.
eka fona kaॉla bhI kara lIjie, foTo le lIjie, aura maiseja bhI bheja kara dekha lIjie, ki sabhI fIcharsa se, Apa saMtuShTa haiM.
ApakA smArTa fona hara samaya iMTaraneTa se kanekTeDa rahatA hai, aura ye, sirfa eka kAraNa hai ki usame vAyarasa kA KatarA, hameshA banA rahatA hai.
kabhI kabhI haikaroM ke kAraNa Apake smArTa fona meM vAyarasa bhI pahuMcha sakatA hai.
aksara ye salAha hotI hai, ki agara vAyarasa hai, to Apake smArTa fona ko faikTrI riseTa karanA pa.DegA, tAki use pUrI taraha se dUra kiyA jA sake.
faikTrI riseTa karane meM dikkata ye hai ki ApakA sabhI DeTA, gemsa, foTo, maiseja, smArTafona se miTa jAtA hai.
Aiye Apako vAyarasa se bachane ke kuCha tarIqe batAte haiM, tAki agara faikTrI riseTa karanA bhI pa.De, to vo ApakA aMtima vikalpa ho.
pahale to ye dekhie ki vAyarasa kI pareshAnI kyA sirfa usI samaya hotI hai, jaba Apa eka aipa chalAte haiM.
kyA Apane gUgala ple sTora ke alAvA kahIM se koI aipa DAunaloDa kiyA thA.
aura kyA ye pareshAnI taba shurU huI, jaba Apane koI aipa DAunaloDa kiyA thA.
agara ApakA javAba inake lie hAM hai, to Apako vAyarasa ke lie cheka karanA pa.DegA.
sabase pahale eMTI vAyarasa inasTaॉla karake apane smArTa fona ko skaina kara lIjie.
smArTa fona ke lie sabase jAne mAne eMTI vAyarasa aipa meM, kaI nAma A sakate haiM.
unameM se agara Apa koI eka chunanA chAhate haiM, to yahAM para aura jAnakArI mila jAegI.
eMDrAiDa smArTa fona ko sefa moDa meM bhI bUTa kiyA jA sakatA hai.
jisake bAda dhIre dhIre Apa fAila chuna karake, unheM DilITa kara sakate haiM.
jaba smArTa fona sefa moDa meM chalegA, to sabhI aipa kAma karanA baMda kara dete haiM, aura unakA DeTA kanekshana, baMda ho jAtA hai.
aisA Apake DivAisa kI surakShA ke lie kiyA jAtA hai.
lekina usase purAne DivAisa ke sAtha bhI aisA kiyA jA sakatA hai.
apane DivAisa ke ऑna-ऑfa baTana ko, tho.DI dera taka dabA kara rakhie.
jaba Apako apane smArTa fona kA logo dikhatA hai, to vaॉlyUma Upara, aura nIche vAle baTana ko dabA kara rakhie, jaba taka DivAisa kI bUTiMga, pUrI nahIM ho jAtI.
usake bAda Apa sefa moDa meM hoMge.
usake bAda, Apako oke ko klika karanA hogA, jisase ApakA DivAisa, sefa moDa meM bUTa hogA.
usake bAda Apa apane una fAila ko DilITa kara sakate haiM, jo Apako nahIM chAhie.
sabase ba.DhiyA hogA ki Apane jo bhI aipa DAunaloDa kie haiM, unheM DilITa kara dIjie.
usake bAda vAyarasa kI pareshAnI, turaMta kAbU meM A jAegI.
smArTafona hai to usameM surakShA ke upAya hone, zarUrI haiM.
smArTafona meM sikyoriTI laॉka karane ke pina, paiTarna laॉka, pAsavarDa, fiMgara priMTa ke alAvA, aura dUsare bhI tarIke haiM.
fona kA pina vAlA pAsavarDa, sirfa Apake pAsa hotA hai, aura pAsavarDa ke lie agara fiMgarapriMTa istemAla karanA hai, to vo sirfa, ApakI uMgalI ke ishAroM para kAma karegA.
aise meM Apa kaise taya kareMge, ki phiMgarapriMTa vAlA pAsavarDa ba.DhiyA hai, yA pina vAlA.
pAsavarDa ke rUpa meM fiMgarapriMTa aura pina ke istemAla karane ke kaI fAyade haiM, to kaI nukasAna bhI haiM.
sabase pahale bAta karate haiM, pina pAsavarDa kI.
smArTafona meM sikyoriTI laॉka ke lie jaba bhI pina kA istemAla kiyA jAtA hai, to sahI pAsavarDa kA aMdAza lagAnA, AsAna nahIM hotA hai.
lekina ye isa para bhI nirbhara karatA hai ki Apa kauna sA fona, istemAla kara rahe hai.
blaikaberI aura AIfona meM Apa dasa bAra taka, galata pina DAla sakate haiM.
usake bAda, smArTafona laॉka ho jAtA hai.
lekina eMDraॉyaDa meM aisA fIchara, nahIM hotA hai.
jo sikyoriTI eksaparTa haiM, unakA mAnanA hai ki agara Apake eMDraॉyaDa fona meM, isake alAvA aura sikyoriTI fIchara nahIM hai, to koI bhI pAsavarDa patA kara hI legA.
basa, use Apake fona ke sAtha tho.DA vakta chAhie.
aisI sthiti se nipaTane ke lie Apako apane eMDraॉyaDa DivAisa meM rakhe DATA ko, enkripTa zarUra karanA chAhie.
DivAisa kI seTiMgsa badala kara, DATA enkripTa kIjie.
isake bAda jaba bhI Apa DivAisa ko ऑfa karake ऑna kareM, to Apako eka pAsavarDa DAlanA zarUrI hogA.
DivAisa para DATA kI surakShA karane, aura kisI anachAhe vyakti kI agara Apake smArTafona para nazara hai, to usase bachane kA, ye bahuta ba.DhiyA tarIkA hai.
lekina Ajakala parsanala inafaॉrmeshana kI chorI itanI ba.DhatI jA rahI hai, ki apane smArTafona meM rakhI jAnakArI kI surakShA ke lie, Apako kuCha aisA hI sochanA pa.DegA.
sikyoriTI ke lihAza se pina pAsavarDa ko hama likhakara nahIM rakhate, lekina fiMgarapriMTa ke bAre meM aisA nahIM kahA jA sakatA hai.
zyAdAtara logoM ke lie smArTafona kI surakShA ke lie fiMgarapriMTa, sabase AsAna tarIkA hai.
lekina sikyoriTI eksaparTa kI nazara meM fiMgarapriMTa ko sau fIsadI surakShita mAnanA, sahI nahIM hai.
agara kisI ko Apake smArTafona se DATA churAnA hai, to vo ApakA fiMgarapriMTa DhUMDha nikAlegA, aura phira, usa firAka meM rahegA, ki ApakA smArTafona, use tho.DI dera ke lie, mila jAe.
haikaroM ke isa lekha para yadi vishvAsa kareM, to fiMgarapriMTa se kuCha bhI surakShita nahIM hotA hai.
ye lekha pa.Dhakara Apa ye to samajha hI jAeMge, ki Apake bAre meM hara chIza, jisa DivAisa ko patA hai, use Apako bahuta saMbhAlakara rakhanA hogA.
sabhI loga apane smArTafona aura TaibaleTa kI sikyoriTI ko lekara pareshAna haiM.
sikyoriTI ke lie taraha-taraha kI koshisha kI jA rahI hai.
kabhI paiTarna laॉka lagAyA jAtA hai, kabhI pina istemAla kiyA jAtA hai, to kabhI pAsavarDa lagAkara dekhA jAtA hai.
sabhI ke apane fAyade haiM.
yahI sikyoriTI Apake lie taba siradarda bana jAtI hai, jaba hara bAra Apako apane pina, pAsavarDa, yA paiTarna laॉka kA istemAla karanA hotA hai, tAki apane DivAisa ko istemAla karanA pa.DatA hai.
eMDrAiDa DivAisa para, Apake chehare ko pahachAna kara bhI, aisA karanA, aba saMbhava hai.

agara apane DivAisa para Apa ye inebala kara dete haiM, to ye pina, pAsavarDa, yA paiTarna laॉka kI zarUrata hI Katma ho jAegI, aura sikyoriTI ke lihAza se, ye bahuta surakShita bhI hogA, kyoMki Apake jaisA dikhane vAlA, duniyA meM koI nahIM hai.
aisA shAyada sirfa filmoM meM hotA hai.
fesa rikagnishana, eMDrAiDa DivAisa, aura kroma buka ke smArTa laॉka nAma ke fIchara kA, hissA hotA hai.
isako shurU karanA bahuta hI AsAna hai.
basa sikyoriTI meM jAie, aura usake bAda, Apako smArTa laॉka dikhAI degA.
isako dekhane ke lie apane DivAisa meM Apako skrIna laॉka ko ekTiveTa karanA hogA.
smArTa laॉka kA istemAla karake Apa apane DivAisa ko alaga alaga tarIke se analaॉka karane ke lie seTiMga kara sakate haiM.
ise Apa kisI bhI apane dUsare DivAisa ke sAtha jo.DA banA sakate haiM, apane chehare ko bhI pAsavarDa banA sakate haiM, yA phira, apanI AvAza ko.
apane chehare ko pAsavarDa banAnA chAhate haiM, to basa, TrasTeDa fesa kA vikalpa, chuna lIjie.
eMDrAiDa DivAisa para jaba Apa apane chehare ko pAsavarDa banA rahe haiM, to apanI tasvIra lete samaya, roshanI ba.DhiyA honI chAhie.
skrIna para Apako eka gola dikhAI degA, jisake aMdara ApakI tasvIra honI chAhie.
eka bAra pAsavarDa ke lie apane chehare ko Apane seTa kara liyA, usake bAda, basa skrIna ko kuCha sekeMDa ke lie dekhie, usake bAda, Apa skrIna ko svAipa kara analaॉka kara sakate haiM.
lekina kuCha eMDrAiDa DivAisa meM Apako ye fIchara nahIM milegA.
aise meM agara ye fIchara Apako chAhie, to ye kAma karane vAle Dhera sAre aipa, Apako gUgala ple sTora para mila jAeMge.
vaise hI, vaॉisa laॉka karane vAle aipa bhI kaI mila jAeMge.
Ajakala ke saste se saste smArTafona para jIpIesa para chalane vAlI lokeshana besDa sarvisa, mila jAtI hai.
smArTafona para Apake lokeshana, usakA rikaॉrDa, aura phira kisI aipa taka vo jAnakArI pahuMchanA, koI naI bAta nahIM hai.
kabhI kabhI hameM patA hotA hai ki kyA jAnakArI hamAre smArTafona se lI jA rahI hai, lekina kaI bAra Apako patA bhI nahIM chalatA, aura smArTafona se jAnakArI, chalI jAtI hai.
Apa kaimare se jo bhI tasvIra leMge, kaimarA usake meTA DeTA meM tasvIra ke bAre meM jAnakArI rakhatA hai, foTo kI lokeshana, dina, tArIKa aura samaya.
ho sakatA hai jaba Apane kaimarA aipa istemAla karanA shurU kiyA, usa samaya, aipa ne Apase ye ijAzata mAMgI thI.
ye DeTA dikhAI nahIM degA, lekina fesabuka jaise aipa para jaise hI ise sheyara kareMge, ye jAnakArI usa tasvIra se lI jA sakatI hai.
agara Apane aisI koI tasvIra ऑnalAina posTa kara dI, to usake bAre meM patA karanA, bahuta mushqila nahIM hai.
fesabuka para eka fIchara hai niyara bAI freMDsa, jo Apako aura Apake dostoM kI lokeshana, eka dUsare ko batAtA hai.
Apa yahAM para apane lokeshana ko eka yA do ghaMTe ke lie sheyara karane kI ijAzata de sakate haiM.
itane samaya meM agara koI dosta usa jagaha mila gayA, to vo Apako DhUMDha sakatA hai, lekina agara ye jAnakArI sArvajAnika ho gaI, to chora uchakke usakA fAyadA uThA sakate haiM.
TviTara para apane akAuMTa kI seTiMga karate samaya, agara Apa tho.DI sAvadhAnI se laॉga ina nahIM kara rahe haiM, to Apake hara posTa ke sAtha, lokeshana bhI A jAtA hai.
kaI mesejiMga aipa para jaba bhI Apa apanA maiseja bhejate haiM, to Apake lokeshana se ju.DI jAnakArI, usameM shAmila hotI hai.
logoM ko isake bAre meM jAnakArI nahIM hotI hai.
ho sakatA hai Apane shuruAta meM, apane lokeshana sheyara karane ke lie hAmI bhara dI hogI.
isako cheka karane ke lie Apa seTiMga meM jAiye, usake bAda prAivesI chunanA hogA, aura phira lokeshana sarvisasa.
usake bAda Apako sheyara mAI lokeshana dikhAI degA, jahAM para Apa ise, A.cna yA A.cfa kara sakate haiM.
kaI DeTiMga sarvisa aipa para Apake lokeshana kI jAnakArI bhI lI jAtI hai.
aise aipa kA kahanA hai ki vo chAhate haiM, ki Apake pasaMda kA koI pArTanara Apake ilAqe meM hI mila jAe.
isalie lokeshana kI jAnakArI lenA zarUrI hai.
kabhI kabhI to ye Apase riyala TAima lokeshana apaDeTa bhI lene kI koshisha karate haiM.
aisI jAnakArI denA KataranAka ho sakatA hai, aura aise aipa ke lie lokeshana ko ऑfa kara ke rakhanA hI, ApakI surakShA ke hita meM hogA.
fesabuka para kauna nahIM chAhatA hai ki usakI posTa, foTo, yA vIDiyo para, Dhera sAre lAika mileM.
kaI bAra dostoM ke bIcha zyAdA lAika pAne ke lie, ho.Da sI machI hotI hai, aura yuvAoM meM, aksara ye bAta dekhane ko milatI hai.
fesabuka para dostoM aura dostoM ke dostoM taka apanI bAta pahuMchAne ke lie, Aie, Apako kuCha tarIke batAte haiM.
basa eka bAta kA dhyAna rakhanA hai, ki jaba Apa posTa kareMge, to vo hameshA karanA hogA.
hafte meM eka dina, yA mahIne meM kuCha dina karane se, loga fesabuka para Apase bAta karane, nahIM AeMge.
jo bhI vIDiyo yA tasvIra Apa posTa karate haiM, vo aise hone chAhie, jo Apake dostoM ke chehare para, eka muskAna lA de.
agara Apa khuda bhI kaMTeMTa nahIM taiyAra kara rahe haiM, to aisA vIDiyo yA tasvIra DhUMDhanA, AsAna nahIM hai.
lekina agara Apa aise tasvIra aura vIDiyo DhUMDha sakate haiM, to dostoM ke bIcha Apa hiTa ho jAeMge.
kabhI kabhI kisI tyauhAra ke daurAna, yA apane janmadina ke dina bhI, Apake posTa se logoM ko KushI hogI, aura vo Apake posTa, foTo yA vIDiyo ko lAika kara sakate haiM.
fesabuka para apanI posTa DAlane ke lie sabase ba.DhiyA samaya kyA hai, isa para logoM kI taraha taraha kI rAya hai.
AzAdI ke lagabhaga sAta dashaka bAda, aba birasA muMDA kI mUrtiyAM, be.DiyoM se AzAda hoMgI.
jhArakhaMDa ke mukhyamaMtrI raghuvara dAsa ne budhavAra ko, isa Ashaya ke Adesha para dastaKata kie haiM.
rAjyapAla draupadI murmU ke Agraha para, mukhyamaMtrI ne ye faisalA liyA hai.
birasA muMDA ko AdivAsI apanA bhagavAna mAnate haiM, aura unakI pUjA kI jAtI hai.
unhoMne aMgrezI hukUmata ke khilAfa, AdivAsiyoM kI ba.DI Tuka.DI kA netRRitva kiyA thA.
jhArakhaMDa ke itihAsa meM ise ulagulAna kahA jAtA hai.
mukhyamaMtrI raghuvara dAsa ne kahA hai, ki be.DiyoM meM jaka.DI birasA kI pratimA, aMgrezI dAsatA kI pratIka hai.
isase yuvA pI.DhI kI manobhAvanA para galata asara pa.DatA hai.
isalie be.DiyoM meM jaka.DI tasvIra aura pratimAeM tatkAla prabhAva se haTA dI jAeM.
mukhyamaMtrI ke isa Adesha ke bAda paryaTana, kalA saMskRRiti, khelakUda, aura yuvA kArya vibhAga ne, isase saMbaMdhita saMkalpa, jArI kiyA hai.
vibhAga ke nideshaka anila kumAra siMha ne bIbIsI ko batAyA, ki paMdraha maI ko eka baiThaka ke daurAna, rAjyapAla ne mukhyamaMtrI se yaha Agraha kiyA thA.
unhoMne batAyA ki rAjya meM lagI bhagavAna birasA kI be.DiyoM vAlI pratimAeM, aura tasvIreM, haTA lI jAeMgI.
unakI jagaha binA be.DiyoM vAlI tasvIreM aura pratimAeM lagAI jAeMgI.
isake lie sabhI ziloM ke upAyuktoM ko mela kara diyA gayA hai.
isa saMbaMdhita Adesha kA mela sarakAra ke sabhI vibhAgoM ko bhI bhejA gayA hai.

ye pUChe jAne para ki mUrtiyoM aura tasvIroM ko badalane kA kharcha kauna uThAegA, anila kumAra siMha ne batAyA, ki jisa vibhAga yA upakrama ne aisI mUrtiyAM yA tasvIreM lagAI haiM, vahI vibhAga, isakA kharcha bhI uThAeMge.
jhArakhaMDa ke pUrva gRRiha sachiva aura TrAibala eDavAizarI kAuMsila ke sadasya, jebI tubida ne bIbIsI se kahA, ki ye sarakAra kA behatara nirNaya hai.
isase yuvAoM meM achChA saMdesha jAegA.
budhavAra se deshabhara meM ba.DhA huA sarvisa Taiksa lAgU ho gayA, jisase ApakI jeba para asara pa.Da sakatA hai.
sarakAra kRRiShi kalyANa sesa ke zarie, kRRiShi kShetra ke lie dhana juTAnA chAhatI hai.
isIlie sarvisa Taiksa eka jUna se chaudaha.
pA.Ncha fIsadI se ba.DhAkara, paMdraha fIsadI kara diyA gayA hai.
vitta maMtrI aruNa jeTalI ne do hazAra solaha satraha ke Ama bajaTa meM, kRRiShi kalyANa ke lie sesa lagAne kA ailAna kiyA thA.
yaha sesa, sabhI chIzoM aura sabhI sarvisasa para lAgU kiyA jAegA.
bIbIsI saMvAdadAtA dinesha upretI se bAtachIta meM, arthashAstrI shubhadA rAva ne kahA, ki kRRiShi sesa lagAe jAne se mahaMgAI para bahuta zyAdA asara, nahIM pa.DegA.
bhAratIya arthavyavasthA ko lagAtAra do sUkhoM kA sAmanA karanA pa.DA hai.
shubhadA batAtI haiM, sarakAra kI koshisha hai ki kRRiShi udyoga, aura kRRiShi kShetra ke lie nivesha, AnA chAhie.
bhArata ko sUkhe se hone vAle nukasAna kA asara arthavyavasthA para na pa.De, isake lie isa sesa se milane vAle faMDa ko, zariyA banAyA jA sakatA hai.
kRRiShi sesa kA upayoga, sUkhe se nipaTane ke lie kie jAne vAle kharchoM, aura faMDiMga para kiyA jAegA.
unake mutAbika saMbhava hai ki ye sesa, kama avadhi ke lie lagAyA jAe, lekina agara kRRiShi ke utpAda ko ba.DhAnA hai, to nivesha AnA bahuta zarUrI hai.
arthashAstrI, shubhadA rAva ke mutAbika, bhAratIya arthavyavasthA raph़tAra paka.Da rahI hai, aura chauthI timAhI ke jIDIpI AMka.De, kAfI achChe Ae haiM.
shubhadA rAva ne kahA, ki bijalI ke kShetra meM bhI ba.DhotarI dekhI jA rahI hai.
hAlAMki kaMsTrakshana ke kShetra meM, girAvaTa darja kI gaI hai.
lekina mAiniMga aura bijalI utpAdana se desha kI arthavyavasthA ko kAfI madada milI hai.
laMbe samaya taka pAkistAna meM, apane gAnoM se KAsa muqAma banAne vAlI mashahUra gAyikA, salamA AGA ko bhArata sarakAra kI ora se, hAla hI meM ovarasIza siTizana ऑfa iMDiyA, osIAI kA kArDa milA hai.
osIAI kArDa kI madada se vo bhArata, binA vIzA ke A jA sakatI haiM.
isase pahale pAkistAna ke lokapriya gAyaka, adanAna sAmI ko bhArata kI nAgarikatA dI gaI thI.
isa para, pAkistAna meM kAfI vivAda bhI huA.
hAlAMki aise pAkistAnI kalAkAroM kI kamI nahIM hai, jo bhArata meM bhI utane hI lokapriya haiM, jitane pAkistAna meM.
TIvI chainala ziMdagI ke sIriyaloM se, bhArata meM lokapriya pAkistAna ke mashahUra abhinetA, favAda KAna ne baॉlIvuDa meM kuCha nAmachIna kalAkAroM ke sAtha kAma kiyA hai.
sonama kapUra ke sAtha filma khUbasUrata meM abhinaya karane ke bAda, unhoMne filma kapUra eMDa sansa meM bhI kAma kiyA hai.
Aja bhAratIya darshakoM ke lie vo eka jAnA pahachAnA cheharA bana chuke haiM.
baॉlIvuDa meM eka aura pAkistAnI charchita cheharA haiM, alI zafara.
abhinetA aura gAyaka zafara ne, tere bina lAdena se baॉlIvuDa meM kariyara kI shuruAta kI thI.
isake bAda zafara, mere bradara kI dulhana, laMdana perisa nyUyArka, ToTala siyApA, aura kila dila jaisI filmoM meM abhinaya kara chuke haiM.
kuCha sAla pahale, eka bhAratIya patrikA ne apane mukhya pRRiShTha para, vInA malika kI nirvastra tasvIra ChApI thI, jisameM unakI apanI bAMha para bane TaiTU meM, AIesaAI gudA huA thA.
ise lekara vo kAfI vivAdoM meM rahIM.
vInA malika ne riyaliTI sho biga baॉsa se lekara, baॉlIvuDa filmoM meM bhI kAma kiyA hai.
baॉlIvuDa meM kAma karane vAlI pAkistAnI abhinetriyoM meM mIrA, irtijA rubAba kA nAma bhI shAmila hai.
do hazAra pA.Ncha meM filma nazara meM ashmita paTela ke sAtha kAma kara, mIrA ne baॉlIvuDa meM qadama rakhA.
filma meM chuMbana ke eka dRRishya ke kAraNa vo vivAdoM meM bhI ghirIM.
isI ka.DI meM humaimA malika kA nAma bhI AtA hai.
unhoMne imarAna hAshamI ke sAtha, rAjA naTavaralAla meM kAma kiyA.
somAliyA kI rAjadhAnI mogAdishu meM eka hoTala para baMdUqadhAriyoM ke hamale meM, kama se kama dasa loga mAre gae haiM.
marane vAloM meM do sAMsada bhI shAmila haiM, jo usa hoTala meM raha rahe the.
pratyakShadarshiyoM ke mutAbika hamalAvara, embesaDara hoTala ke bAharI geTa para dhamAkA karane ke bAda, hoTala meM dAKila hue.
mAnA jAtA hai ki isa hoTala meM netA aura sarakArI adhikArI Thaharate haiM.
hamale ke faurana bAda charamapaMthI saMgaThana ala-shabAba ne, isa hamale kI zimmedArI lI thI.
mogAdishu meM bIbIsI kI somAliyA sevA ke saMvAdadAtA, ibrAhima adana kA kahanA hai, ki isa dhamAke se imArata ko kAfI nukasAna pahuMchA hai.
isa dhamAke kI vajaha se kama se kama chAlIsa logoM ke ghAyala hone kI Kabara hai.
somAliyA meM ala shabAba, saMyukta rAShTra samarthita sarakAra se la.Da rahA hai.
ala shabAba ko, varSha do hazAra gyAraha meM mogAdishu se khade.Da diyA gayA thA, lekina phira bhI, ye samUha, mogAdishu ke lie KatarA banA huA hai.
ye rela liMka, nIdaralaiMDsa ke roTaraDaima aura iTalI ke genoA ko jo.DegA.
abhI taka isa mArga para sAmAna kI DhulAI, lAkhoM TrakoM se hotI rahI hai, lekina aba vo sAmAna, isa suraMga ke zarie rela se jA sakegA.
lekina aba ye upalabdhi, goTahArDa ke nAma ho gaI hai.
pA.Ncha kilomITara laMbI chainala suraMga, aba tIsare sthAna para A gaI hai.

goTahArDa rela suraMga ke bhavya udghATana samAroha meM, svisa adhikAriyoM ke sAtha, jarmana chAMsalara aMgelA mairkela, frAMsa ke rAShTrapati frAMsvA olAMda aura iTalI ke pradhAnamaMtrI, maito reMzI bhI maujUda raheMge.
sviTzaralaiMDa ke feDarala TrAMsaporTa ऑfisa ke nideshaka pITara fyUgalisTara ne, raॉyaTarsa samAchAra ejeMsI ko batAyA, ye svisa pahachAna kA hissA hai.
goTahArDa duniyA kI sabase gaharI suraMga hai.
isake Upara UMche UMche pahA.Da haiM.
goTahArDa suraMga kI khudAI ke daurAna, iMjIniyaroM ko, tihattara vibhinna prakAra ke pattharoM kI khudAI karanI pa.DI.
inameM se kuCha grenAiTa kI taraha saKta, aura kuCha chInI kI taraha, mulAyama the.
AMka.DoM ke mutAbiqa suraMga ke nirmANa ke daurAna, nau mazadUroM kI mauta huI.
suraMga aba bana kara taiyAra hai.
isakA nirmANa taya samaya aura bajaTa meM huA hai.
yaha suraMga disaMbara meM pUrI taraha kAma karane lagegI.
isake bAda se zyUriKa aura milAna kI dUrI meM, eka se do ghaMTe chAlIsa minaTa kI kamI AegI.
dillI kA dasa sAla kA sonU ina dinoM bAMglAdesha ke jasora meM eka shelTara homa meM raha rahA hai.
hAlA.Nki usakI mA.N kA patA chalane ke bAda, sonU ko dillI bheje jAne kI taiyArI shurU ho gaI hai, aura sonU apanI mA.N se bAta bhI kara rahA hai.
usane batAyA hai ki mA.N ne bharosA diyA hai, ki vo use jaldI apane pAsa bulA legI.
sonU ke bAMglAdesha pahu.Nchane aura yahA.N pA.Ncha sAla bitAne kI kahAnI, yAtanAoM se bharI hai.
sonU ne bIbIsI bAMglA sevA ko batAyA, pAMcha sAla pahale maiM yahA.N AyA, eka mahilA mujhe yahA.N le AI thI.
jahA.N maiM rahatA thA vahA.N loga khAnA pakavAte the, kapa.De dhulavAte the, bahuta kAma karavAte the, aura nahIM karane para, mArate-pITate the.
isa mArapITa se taMga Akara sonU eka dina vahAM se bhAga nikalA, aura pa.Dosa ke logoM ne usakI madada kI.
betAgI thAnA prabhArI rafIqa-ula-islAma kA kahanA hai, ki jo parivAra sonU ko bAMglAdesha le AyA, usake sAtha kuCha sthAnIya logoM ke virodha ke bAda, yaha mAmalA korTa taka jA pahu.NchA.
bachche kI mA.N mAdhurI ne bIbIsI bAMglA ko batAyA ki pA.Ncha sAla pahale, unakA bachchA GAyaba ho gayA thA, aura rohimA nAmaka bAMglAdeshI mahilA, use lekara bhAga gaI thI.
mAdhurI ne batAyA ye do hazAra dasa ke maI kI ghaTanA hai.
sonU bAhara khela rahA thA, aura khelane ke daurAna, ve use uThAkara le gae.
chaubIsa tArIkha ko subaha, hamane thAne meM riporTa likhavAI.
binA sabUta ke hama kisI kA nAma nahIM le sakate, to hamane gumashudA hone kI riporTa likhavAI.
sonU shelTara homa taka kaise pahu.NchA, ye jAnane ke lie bIbIsI kI bAMglA sevA ne, shelTara ke sahAyaka nideshaka, mohammada shahAbuddIna se bAta kI.
unhoMne batAyA, ye bachchA baragunA kI adAlata ke nirdesha se, bAIsa disaMbara ko hamAre yahA.N lAyA gayA.
adAlata ke nirdesha ke anusAra, jaba taka usake abhibhAvaka nahIM mila jAte, taba taka use yahIM rakhA jAegA.
shahAbuddIna ne kahA jamAla nAma kA eka vyakti bhArata gayA, aura bahuta khojane ke bAda, use bachche kA abhibhAvaka mila gayA.
abhibhAvaka ne hamase bAta kI.
hamane use sAbita karane ke lie kahA hai.
isa bIcha bhAratIya uchchAyoga ne hamase sabUta mAMgA hai.
ye do deshoM kA mAmalA hai, isalie yAtrA kI ijAzata lenA, korTa kI ijAzata lenA zarUrI hai.

mAnavAdhikAra saMgaThana jasora rAiTsa ke pramukha, binaॉya kRRiShNa mallika kaha rahe haiM, ki baragunA ke sthAnIya nivAsI, jAmAliba-e-musAI ne mAmalA korTa meM uThAyA, aura bAda meM, dillI jAkara bachche kI mA.N ko bhI DhUMDha nikAlA hai.
jamAliba-e-musAI ke beTe firadausa ne batAyA, mere pitA ne bachche ke mAtA-pitA kA patA, ba.DI mashakkata ke bAda DhUM.DhA, usake bAda vo dillI gae.
dillI meM bahuta khojane ke bAda unhoMne bachche kI mAM, aura unake pitA ko, DhUM.Dha nikAlA.
phira vo vahA.N ke mukhyamaMtrI se mile, aura unake sAmane pUre mAmale ko pesha kiyA.
firadausa kA Aropa hai, ki isa ghaTanA ke kAraNa rohimA begama ke parivAra kI tarafa se, unheM alaga-alaga tarIke se pareshAna kiyA jA rahA hai.
lekina sabhI AropoM ko Galata batAte hue rohimA begama kI bahana, hAshI begama kaha rahI haiM, ki sonU dillI meM raha rahI unakI bahana rohimA behama ke pati kI, pahalI patnI kI saMtAna hai.
hAshI begama ne batAyA, merI bahana ne fona kiyA ki unake pati, ChaH mahIne se lApatA haiM.
vo kaise bachchoM ko pAleMgI.
ba.DI mushkila se khAne ke lie paise juTA pA rahI haiM.
isalie beTA-beTI ko mere pAsa Cho.Da gae.
phira vo kAma karane dillI chalI gaIM.
hAlA.Nki isa mAmale ko bhArata aura bAMglAdesha ke bIcha hone vAlI bachchoM kI taskarI se jo.Dakara dekhA jA rahA hai.
hAshI begama kA kahanA hai ki taskarI ke nAma para, unake parivAra ko badanAma kiyA jA rahA hai.
dakShiNa koriyA kI senA kA kahanA hai, ki uttara koriyA kA apane pUrvI taTa para eka bailisTika misAila kA parIkShaNa, asaphala mAlUma ho rahA hai.
hAlA.Nki ye aba taka sAfa nahIM hai, ki ye kisa taraha kA misAila thA, lekina apraila meM madhyama dUrI ke misAila, musudAna ke tIna parIkShaNoM ke fela hone ke bAda, ye eka aura asaphalatA hai.

dakShiNa koriyA ke eka adhikArI ne kahA ki parIkShaNa kI yaha koshisha, uttara koriyA ke pUrvI taTa para, sthAnIya samaya ke mutAbiqa, subaha qarIba pA.Ncha baje kI gaI, lekina usake bAda isakI koI jAnakArI nahIM hai.
samAchAra ejeMsI yonhaipa ne eka riporTa meM sUtroM ke havAle se kahA hai, ki saMbhavataH, musudAna kA chauthA parIkShaNa bhI, fela ho gayA hai.
uttara koriyA para saMyukta rAShTra ne kisI bhI misAila takanIka ke istemAla para pAbaMdI lagA rakhI hai.
uttara koriyA ke kaI misAila parIkShaNoM aura janavarI meM chauthI bAra paramANu parIkShaNa karane ke bAda, isa ilAqe meM tanAva kAfI ba.DhA huA hai.
baॉlIvuDa ke jAne-mAne saMgItakAra amita trivedI kA kahanA hai, ki gAyikA latA maMgeshakara aura AshA bhosale, unakI pahuMcha se bAhara haiM.
luTerA, kvIna, aura deva DI jaisI filmoM meM saMgIta dene vAle amita trivedI kahate haiM, latA jI aura AshA jI ko to ye bhI nahIM patA hogA, ki maiM kauna hUM.
ye donoM hI lejeMDa haiM, aura unheM, aprocha karane meM bhI Dara lagatA hai.
bIbIsI se KAsa bAtachIta meM amita ne, hAla hI meM sTaiMDaapa kaॉmeDiyana tanmaya bhaTTa ke banAe, latA maMgeshakara aura sachina teMdulakara para vIDiyo kI bhI AlochanA kI.
vo kahate haiM, ye donoM hI bhArata ratna haiM, aura ina para aisA mazAka uchita nahIM hai.
ina dinoM Amira khAna ke proDakshana meM bana rahI filma sIkreTa suparasTAra meM, vyasta amita, aॉskara vijetA saMgItakAra, e Ara rahamAna ke sAtha kAma karane kI ichChA jatAte haiM.
vo kahate haiM, mujhe rahamAna sAhaba ke sAtha kAma karanA hai.
kuCha maiM unake lie gAnA gA sakUM, aura kuCha vo mere lie gAeM.
amita baॉlIvuDa ke eka chalana se kuCha khafA-khafA se nazara Ae.
unhoMne kahA, bhArata meM gAnoM ko shoharata bhI abhinetAoM se hI milatI hai, jo kAfI durbhAgyapUrNa hai.
lekina isa ka.DavI sachchAI ko mAnane ke alAvA aura koI rAstA bhI nahIM hai.
abhiSheka chaube kI filma, u.DatA paMjAba ko amita ne saMgIta se sajAyA hai.
filahAla, yaha filma, seMsara borDa ke chaMgula meM phaMsI hai.
isa para amita kahate haiM ki filma kA saMgIta vivAda se pare hai, aura filma ke gAnoM meM, gAlI-galaucha nahIM hai.

sAla unnIsa sau assI meM AI filma, karza ke mashahUra tarAne, eka hasInA thI, eka dIvAnA thA kA tarza banAne vAle, gorakha sharmA kA kahanA hai, ki saMgIta kI duniyA meM iMsAno kI jagaha, mashInoM ne le lI hai.
hiMdI filma iMDasTrI ko besa giTAra kI sauGAta dene vAle gorakha sharmA, mashahUra saMgItakAra jo.DI, lakShmIkAMta-pyArelAla ke, pyArelAla ke ChoTe bhAI haiM.
iMDasTrI ke vartamAna daura ko gorakha, mashInI batAte hue kahate haiM, saMgIta kI duniyA meM iMsAno kI jagaha mashInoM ne le lI hai.
jaba unase pUChA gayA ki ba.De bhAI kI taraha, unhoMne saMgIta nirdeshana meM hAtha kyoM nahIM AzamAyA
isake javAba meM vo kahate hai, maiM una dinoM mainDolina aura giTAra kI parafArmeMsa aura unakI rikaॉrDiMga meM itanA vyasta rahatA thA, ki saMgIta nirdeshana ke lie vaqta hI nahIM mila patA thA.
gorakha batAte haiM ki bAraha sAla kI umra se hI, maiM mainDolina bajAne lagA thA.
yahAM taka ki maiM saMgItakAra aura gAyaka, hRRidayanAtha maMgeshakara ke shoza meM mainDolina bajAtA thA.
mahaza chaudaha sAla kI umra meM, unhoMne guru datta kI filma, chaudavIM kA chAMda gAneM meM mainDolina bajAyA thA.
gorakha kahate haiM ki giTAra bajAne kA hunara, maiMne anibAla kesTro se sIkhA thA.

abhI taka gorakha ne shaMkara jayakishana, lakShmIkAMta pyArelAla, AnaMda jI, kalyANa jI, paMDita hariprasAda chaurasiyA, ravi, nadIma shravaNa, rAjesha roshana jaise ba.De saMgItakAroM kI dhunoM meM, apane giTAra, mainDolina, aura rubAba se jAna DAlI hai.

bIte zamAne ko yAda karate hue gorakha batAte haiM, usa samaya aMgrezI saMgItakAroM kA dabadabA thA, lekina bahuta kama loga aMgrezI meM saMgIta pa.Dha pAte the, jisakI vajaha se, unheM kAma nahIM mila patA thA.
ve kahate haiM apane sTaॉfa meM, maiM una chuniMdA logoM meM se thA, jo sTaॉfa noTeshana pa.Dha letA thA.
halAMki isakA shreya, mere saMgItakAra pitA paMDita rAmaparasAda sharmA, urfa bAbAjI ko jAtA hai.
bIte dinoM ko yAda karate hue ve kahate haiM, taba pUrA dina rikaॉrDiMga chalatI thI, aura sattara se sau saMgItakAroM ko, eka sAtha, eka gAne kI sahI dhuna nikAlanI hotI thI.
kisI eka se bhI chUka ho jAtI, to sabako dobArA phira se bajAnA pa.DatA thA.
vo batAte haiM taba esI to hote nahIM the, to hama eka baMda kamare meM, ghaMToM rikaॉrDiMga karane ke bAda, turaMta sAre khi.DakI daravAzeM khola dete the, yA saba paMkhe ke Age kha.De ho jAte.

eka hazAra se bhI zyAdA suparahiTa gAne, unake khAte meM darja haiM, jaise kishora kumAra kI filma, misTara eksa ina baॉmbe kA, mere mahabUba qayAmata hogI, amara aqabara eMthonI kA mAya nema iza eMthonI goMsAlvisa, Dara filma kA jAdU terI nazara haiM.
lagabhaga sattara varSha ke gorakha jI, Aja bhI sTeja shoza karate haiM.
apane sUfiyAnA aMdAza kI gAyikI se mashahUra hue gAyaka, kailAsha khera kahate haiM, ki vo starahIna gAnoM ko bhI, sUfiyAnA banA dete haiM.
filmI gAnoM ke sAtha vo myUzika elbama bhI laॉncha karate rahate haiM.
isI ka.DI meM kailAsha ne ATha gAnoM kA eka nayA elbama bhI jArI kiyA.
ishka anokhA nAma ke isa myUzika elbama meM, kula ATha romAMTika gAne haiM.
kailAsha kahate haiM ki nAma se hI zAhira ho rahA hai, ki bAta, ishqa kI ho rahI hai.
kailAsha Age kahate haiM, ki AThoM gAne, prema ke alaga-alaga mUDa ke haiM.
maiM prakRRiti ke hara tatva meM, prema dekhatA hU.N, jaba taka jIvana hai, taba taka ishqa hai.
kailAsha kahate haiM, maiMne mAtra teraha sAla kI umra meM apanA ghara Cho.Da diyA thA.
ghara Cho.Dane ke bAda, ATA, tela aura namaka kA mola, samajha AyA.
pa.DhAI aura naukarI, donoM kA sAmaMjasya karanA, bahuta mushkila thA.

saMgharSha ke dinoM ko yAda karate hue kahate haiM, ki usa samaya na to paisA thA, aura na hI samaya, ki saMgIta kI shikShA, kisI iMsTiTyUTa se le sakUM, lekina maiMne saMgIta sIkhane ke lie khUba pApa.Da bele.
vo batAte haiM ki saMgIta sIkhane ke lie, mere pAsa, sirfa eka purAnA vaॉkamaina aura heDafona thA.
una dinoM kaiseTsa kA zamAnA thA.
dillI ke pAlikA bAjAra se klAsikala saMgIta ke kaiseTsa, maiM khUba kharIdatA, aura sunatA thA.

klAsikala saMgItakAra paMDita kumAra gandharva, latA maMgeshakara, abhaMga, paMDita bhImasena joshI, paMDita jasarAja, paMDita prabhAkara kArerakara, paMDita gokulostava mahArAja, ustAda Amira khAM sAheba jaise mahAna saMgItakAroM ko khUba sunA, aura unase sIkhA.
asala meM ye gAnA paMjAbI gAyaka rabbI sheragila ko gAnA thA.
lekina skraicha hI logoM ko itanA pasaMda A gayA, ki ye gAnA mere nAma ho gayA, aura mujhe baॉlIvuDa meM eMTrI mila gaI.
kailAsha basa gAyikI se hI nahIM ju.De rahanA chAhate haiM, unhoMne eka proDakshana hAusa bhI shurU kiyA hai, jisake tahata, pahalA bAraha episoDa kA eka dhArAvAhika bhI banAyA gayA hai.

isa dhArAvAhika ke TAiTala Traika ko, jaya jaya kedArA ko, amitAbha bachchana, hemAmAlinI, shAna, shreyA ghoShAla, prasUna joshI, shaMkara mahAdevana, sonU nigama, anUpa jaloTA anupama khera, suresha vADekara, viveka oberaॉya, bAbula supriyo, arijIta siMha, shivamaNi, aura kailAsha khera ne, apanI AvAza dI hai.
isake alAvA sAmAjika kAryoM meM bhI ba.Dha-cha.Dha kara hissA lene vAle, kailAsha, pIema modI ke svachCha bhArata abhiyAna se ju.De haiM.

vo kahate haiM, ki desha bhara meM jahAM bhI unakA saMgIta kA kAryakrama Ayojita hotA hai, vahAM vo apanI muhima ke tahata, logoM ko unake apane shahara ke prati jAgarUka kara, svachChtA kA pATha pa.DhAnA, nahIM bhUlate.
arjeMTInA aura bArsilonA ke mashahUra fuTabaॉlara, liyonela mesI para Taiksa meM herApherI ke mAmale meM, spena meM mukadamA shurU kiyA jA rahA hai.
liyonela mesI aura unake vittIya mAmale saMbhAlanevAle unake pitA para, do hazAra sAta aura do hazAra nau ke bIcha, spena meM paiMtAlIsa lAkha Daॉlara kI dhokhAdha.DI kA Aropa hai.
adhikAriyoM kA kahanA hai, ki donoM ne imeja rAiTsa se hone vAlI AmadanI ko ChupAne ke lie, belIza, aura urUgve jaise kara panAhagAha deshoM kA sahArA liyA.
spena ke kara vibhAga ne liyonela mesI aura unake pitA jaॉrja ke KilAfa, ba.DA jurmAnA lagAne, aura jela bhejane kI mAMga kI hai.
hAlAMki mesI aura unake pitA ina AropoM se iMkAra kara rahe haiM.
mAnA jA rahA hai ki mukadame kI sunavAI, tIna dina chalegI, aura liyonela mesI guruvAra ko adAlata meM pesha ho sakate haiM.
mesI ke imeja rAiTsa se hone vAlI kamAI jina kaMpaniyoM se hotI hai, unameM, bAMko saibaDela, Dainaॉna, eDiDAsa, pepsI kolA, praॉkTara eMDa gaiMbala, aura kuvaita fUDa kaMpanI shAmila haiM.
unake vakIla kI dalIla hai, ki mesI ne kabhI eka minaTa ke lie bhI, apane anubaMdhoM ko nA pa.DhA, aura nA hI usa para Gaura kiyA.
lekina bArsilonA meM hAIkorTa ne jUna do hazAra paMdraha meM kahA thA, ki mesI ko apane vittIya mAmaloM ke bAre meM anajAna hone ke kAraNa, nirdoSha nahIM mAnA jA sakatA.
mesI aura unake pitA ne svechChA se agasta do hazAra teraha meM, sudhAra ke nAma para, Taiksa ke sAtha byAja ke rUpa meM, Chappana lAkha Daॉlara chukAe the.
mesI pAMcha bAra duniyA ke behatarIna fuTabaॉla khilA.DI chune gae haiM, aura sabase amIra ethalIToM meM se eka haiM.
jisa dina bhAratIya soshala mIDiyA meM, sachina teMdulakara ke beTe kI vajaha se, praNava dhanAva.De ko ekalavya ThaharAyA jA rahA hai, usI dina, sachina teMdulakara kA eka rikaॉrDa, TUTa gayA hai.
iMglaiMDa ke kaptAna elisTara kuka ne, TesTa krikeTa meM sachina teMdulakara ke sabase kama umra meM dasa hazAra TesTa rana pUre karane kA rikaॉrDa, to.Da diyA hai.

shrIlaMkA ke KilAfa Darahama TesTa kI dUsarI pArI meM, iMglaiMDa ke kaptAna elisTara kuka, jaise hI pAMcha rana pahuMche, ve TesTa krikeTa meM, sabase kama umra meM dasa hazAra rana pUre karane vAle ballebAza bana gae.
TesTa itihAsa meM dasa hazAra rana pUre karane ke lihAja se, kuka, bArahaveM ballebAza haiM, lekina iMglaiMDa kI ora se isa upalabdhi ko hAsila karane vAle, ve pahale krikeTara bana gae haiM.
itanA hI nahIM, sabase kama samaya ke kariyara grAfa meM elisTara kuka, isa upalabdhi taka pahuMche haiM.
elisTara kuka ne karIba dasa sAla ke apane kariyara meM, isa mukAma ko hAsila kiyA hai.
kisI bhI khilA.DI kI mahAnatA ko nApane kA sabase ba.DA paimAnA hai, ki usake sAtha kitanI kiMvadaMtiyA.N ju.DI haiM.
usa hisAba se to mejara dhyAnachaMda kA koI javAba nahIM hai.
haॉlaiMDa meM logoM ne unakI haॉkI sTika tu.DavA kara dekhI, ki kahIM, usameM chuMbaka to nahIM lagA hai.
jApAna ke logoM ko aMdeshA thA, ki unhoMne apanI sTika meM goMda lagA rakhI hai.

ho sakatA hai ki inameM se kuCha bAteM, ba.DhA cha.DhA kara kahI gaI hoM, lekina apane zamAne meM isa khilA.DI ne kisa hada taka, apanA lohA manavAyA hogA, isakA aMdAzA isa bAta se lagAyA jA sakatA hai, ki viyanA ke sporTsa klaba meM unakI eka mUrti lagAI gaI hai, jisameM unake chAra hAtha, aura unameM chAra sTikeM, dikhAI gaI haiM, mAnoM ki vo koI devatA hoM.

unnIsa sau ChattIsa ke barlina olaMpikasa meM, unake sAtha khele, aura bAda meM pAkistAna ke kaptAna bane AIenaesa dArA ne, varlDa haॉkI maigazIna ke eka aMka meM likhA thA, dhyAna ke pAsa kabhI bhI teza gati nahIM thI, balki vo dhImA hI dau.Date the.
lekina unake pAsa, gaipa ko pahachAnane kI gazaba kI kShamatA thI.
bAeM flaiMka meM unake bhAI rUpa siMha, aura dAeM flaiMka meM, mujhe unake baॉla DisTrIbyUshana kA bahuta fAyadA milA.
DI meM ghusane ke bAda, vo itanI tezI aura tAkata se shaॉTa lagAte the, ki duniyA ke behatarIna se behatarIna golakIpara ke lie bhI, koI maukA, nahIM rahatA thA.
do bAra ke olaMpika chaiMpiyana keshava datta ne hameM batAyA, ki bahuta se loga, unakI mazabUta kalAIyoM, ora DribliMga ke kAyala the.
lekina unakI asalI pratibhA, unake dimAGa meM thI.
vo usa .DhaMga se haॉkI ke maidAna ko dekha sakate the, jaise shataraMja kA khilA.DI chesa borDa ko dekhatA hai.
unako binA dekhe hI patA hotA thA ki maidAna ke kisa hisse meM, unakI TIma ke khilA.DI, aura pratidvaMdI mUva kara rahe haiM.
yAda kIjie unnIsa sau ChiyAsI ke vishva kapa fuTabaॉla kA fAinala.
mArADonA ne bilkula blAiMDa eMgila se binA Age dekha pAe, tIsa gaza laMbA pAsa diyA thA, jisa para buruchAgA ne, vijayI gola dAgA thA.
kisI khilA.DI kI saMpUrNatA kA aMdAzA isI bAta se hotA hai, ki vo A.NkhoM para paTTI bA.Ndha kara bhI, maidAna kI jyomeTrI para mahArata hAsila kara pAe.
keshava datta kahate haiM, jaba hara koI sochatA thA, ki dhyAnachaMda shaॉTa lene jA rahe haiM, vo geMda ko pAsa kara dete the.
isalie nahIM ki vo svArthI the, jo ki vo nahIM the, balki isalie, ki virodhI, unake isa mUva para hataprabha raha jAeM.
jaba vo isa taraha kA pAsa Apako dete the, to zAhira hai, Apa use hara hAla meM gola meM DAlanA chAhate the.
unnIsa sau saitAlisa ke pUrvI afrIkA ke daure ke daurAna, unhoMne keDI siMha bAbU ko geMda pAsa karane ke bAda, apane hI gola kI tarafa, apanA muMha mo.Da liyA, aura bAbU kI tarafa dekhA taka nahIM.
jaba unase bAda meM unakI isa ajIba sI harakata kA kAraNa pUChA gayA, to unakA javAba thA, agara usa pAsa para bhI bAbU gola nahIM mAra pAte, to unheM merI TIma meM rahane kA koI haqa nahIM thA.
isa hAra ne hameM itanA hilA kara rakha diyA, ki hama pUrI rAta, so nahIM pAe.
hamane taya kiyA ki inasAiDa rAiTa para khelane ke lie, AIenaesa dArA ko turaMta, bhArata se havAI jahAza se barlina bulAyA jAe.
dArA semI fAinala maicha taka hI barlina pahu.Ncha pAe.
maicha se pahale, mainejara paMkaja guptA ne, achAnaka kAMgresa kA jhaMDA nikAlA.
use sabhI khilA.DiyoM ne selyUTa kiyA.
usa samaya taka bhArata kA apanA koI jhaMDA nahIM thA.
vo gulAma desha thA, isalie, yUniyana jaika ke tale, olaMpika kheloM meM bhAga le rahA thA.
barlina ke haॉkI sTeDiyama meM usa dina, chAlIsa hazAra loga, fAinala dekhane ke lie maujUda the.
dekhane vAloM meM, ba.DaudA ke mahArAjA, aura bhopAla kI begama ke sAtha sAtha, jarmana netRRitva ke choTI ke loga maujUda the.
tAjjuba ye thA, ki jarmana khilA.DiyoM ne bhArata kI taraha, ChoTe ChoTe pAsoM se khelane kI takanIka apanA rakhI thI.
hAfa TAima taka, bhArata sirfa eka gola se Age thA.
usake bAda, dhyAna chaMda ne apane spAika vAle jUte aura moze utAre, aura naMge pAMva khelane lage.
isake bAda to goloM kI jha.DI laga gaI.
dArA ne bAda meM likhA, Chaha gola khAne ke bAda, jarmana, rafa haॉkI khelane lage.
unake golakIpara kI haॉkI dhyAna chaMda ke mu.Nha para itanI zora se lagI, ki unakA dAMta TUTa gayA.
upachAra ke bAda maidAna meM vApasa Ane ke bAda, dhyAna chaMda ne khilA.DiyoM ko nirdeSha die, ki aba koI gola na mArA jAe.
sirfa jarmana khilA.DiyoM ko ye dikhAyA jAe, ki geMda para niyaMtraNa, kaise kiyA jAtA hai.
isake bAda hama bAra bAra geMda ko, jarmana DI meM le kara jAte, aura phira geMda ko baika pAsa kara dete.
jarmana khilA.DiyoM kI samajha meM hI nahIM A rahA thA, ki ye ho kyA rahA hai.
eka aKabAra maॉrniMga posTa ne likhA, barlina laMbe samaya taka, bhAratIya TIma ko yAda rakhegA.
bhAratIya TIma ne isa taraha kI haॉkI khelI, mAno vo skeTiMga riMka para dau.Da rahe hoM.
unake sTika varka ne, jarmana TIma ko abhibhUta kara diyA.

dhyAnachaMda ke putra, aura unnIsa sau bahattara ke myUnikha olaMpika khelo meM kAMsya padaka vijetA, ashoka kumAra batAte haiM, ki eka bAra unakI TIma, myUnikha meM abhyAsa kara rahI thI, tabhI unhoMne dekhA, ki eka buzurga se shaKsa, eka vhIla cheyara para baiThe chale A rahe haiM.
unhoMne pUChA, ki isa TIma meM ashoka kumAra kauna haiM.
jaba mujhe unake pAsa le jAyA gayA, to unhoMne mujhe gale lagA liyA, aura bhAvapUrNa .DhaMga se, apanI TUTI phUTI aMgrezI meM batAne lage.
tumhAre pitA, itane mahAna khilA.DI the.
unake hAtha meM, unnIsa sau ChattIsa ke KabaroM kI pIlI ho chukI kataraneM thI, jisameM mere pitA ke khela kA guNagAna kiyA gayA thA.
olaMpiyana naMdI siMha ne, eka bAra bIbIsI ko batAyA thA, ki logoM meM ye bahuta ba.DI GalatafahamI hai, ki dhyAna chaMda, bahuta DribaliMga kiyA karate the.
vo bilkula bhI DribaliMga nahIM karate the.
geMda ko vo apane pAsa rakhate hI nahIM the.
geMda Ate hI, vo use apane sAthI khilA.DI ko pAsa kara dete the.
bhArata lauTane ke bAda dhyAnachaMda ke sAtha, eka mazedAra ghaTanA huI.
filma abhinetA pRRithvIrAja kapUra dhyAnachaMda ke faina the.
eka bAra muMbaI meM ho rahe eka maicha meM, vo apane sAtha, nAmI gAyaka kuMdana lAla sahagala ko le Ae.
hAfa TAima taka koI gola nahIM ho pAyA.
sahagala ne kahA, ki hamane donoM bhAiyoM kA bahuta nAma sunA hai.
mujhe tAjjuba hai, ki Apa meM se koI, Adhe samaya taka eka gola bhI nahIM kara pAyA.
rUpa siMha ne taba sahagala se pUChA, ki kyA hama jitane gola mAre, utane gAne hameM Apa sunAeMge.
sahagala rAzI ho gae.
dUsare hAfa meM donoM bhAiyoM ne mila kara, bAraha gola dAge.
lekina fAinala visila bajane se pahale, sahagala sTeDiyama Cho.Da kara jA chuke the.
agale dina sahagala ne apane sTUDiyo Ane ke lie, dhyAna chaMda ke pAsa apanI kAra bhejI.
lekina jaba dhyAna chaMda vahA.N pahuMche, to sahagala ne kahA, ki gAnA gAne kA unakA mUDa, ukha.Da chukA hai.
dhyAna chaMda bahuta nirAsha hue, ki sahagala ne, nAhaka hI unakA samaya KarAba kiyA.
lekina agale dina, sahagala khuda apanI kAra meM usa jagaha pahu.Nche, jahA.N unakI TIma ThaharI huI thI, aura unhoMne, unake lie chaudaha gAne gAe.
na sirfa gAne gAe, balki unhoMne hara khilA.DI ko, eka eka gha.DI bhI bheMTa kI.

kamAla kI bAta hai, ki fAinala khelane vAlI raॉyala chaileMjarsa beMglaura, aura sanarAizarsa haidarAbAda kI TIma ke hI khilA.DI, isa AIpIela meM, sabase shAnadAra pradarshana karane vAle shIrSha tIna khilA.DiyoM meM shAmila rahe.
ise ittefAqa hI kahA jA sakatA hai ki virATa kohalI ne pahalI bAra, kisI AIpIela sIzana meM shataka banAe, vo bhI chAra.
dUsare sthAna para, sanarAizarsa haidarAbAda ke kaptAna, DeviDa vArnara rahe.
tIsare sthAna para, raॉyala chaileMjarsa beMglaura ke ebI Diviliyarsa rahe.
inake alAvA kolakAtA nAiTarAiDarsa ke kaptAna, gautama gaMbhIra ne bhI damadAra ballebAzI kI.
eTaleTiko ke sTrAikara eMTonI grIzamaina ne, penalTI para gola karane kA sunaharA mauqA, ga.NvA diyA thA.
lekina yAnika karAso ne maicha Katma hone ke qarIba dasa minaTa pahale, behatarIna gola karake skora barAbara kara diyA.
lekina eTaleTiko ke yuAnafraina ne mauqA ga.NvA diyA.
phira krisTiyAno ronAlDo ne gola karake apanI TIma ko KitAbI jIta dilA dI.
bhArata ke lieMDara pesa, aura sviTzaralaiMDa kI mArTinA hiMgisa kI jo.DI, freMcha opana Tenisa meM, miksDa Dabalsa ke kvArTara fAinala meM pahu.Ncha gaI hai.
miksDa Dabalsa meM hI, bhArata ke rohana bopannA, aura rUsa kI elA kudriyAfestevA kI jo.DI, dUsare daura meM pahu.Ncha gaI hai.
pahale daura meM, unheM vaॉka ovara mila gayA.
puruShoM ke Dabalsa meM bhI, bhArata kI ummIdeM, barakarAra haiM, jahA.N pesa aura bopannA, apane-apane jo.DIdAroM ke sAtha, tIsare daura meM pahu.Ncha gae haiM.
mahilAoM ke Dabalsa meM shIrSha varIyatA prApta mArTinA hiMgisa, aura sAniyA mirzA kI jo.DI, tIsare daura meM hai.
jabaki miksDa Dabalsa meM, sAniyA mirzA aura iyana DaॉDiga kI jo.DI, dUsare daura meM hai.
bhAratIya krikeTa kaMTrola borDa ne saMjaya bAMga.Da ko zimbAbve daure para jAne vAlI bhAratIya TIma kA heDa kocha, niyukta kiyA hai.
vanaDe aura TI TveMTI sirIsa ke lie, bhAratIya TIma, maheMdra siMha dhonI ke netRRitva meM, agale mahIne zimbAbve daure para jAegI.
bIsIsIAI ke sachiva, ajaya shirke ne eka vij~napti meM batAyA, ki bAMga.Da TIma ke heDa kocha hoMge, jabaki abhaya sharmA ko, fIlDiMga kocha, niyukta kiyA gayA hai.
zimbAbve meM bhAratIya TIma, tIna vanaDe aMtararAShTrIya maicha, aura tIna TI TveMTI aMtarAraShTrIya maicha khelegI.
daurA, ATha jUna se shurU hogA.

pA.Ncha bAra kI vishva chaimpiyana aura laMdana olaMpika meM kAMsya padaka jItane vAlI bhArata kI mahilA mukkebAza, emasI merI kaॉma, aura ela saritA devI, isa sAla hone vAle riyo olaMpika ke lie, kvAlifAI nahIM kara pAI haiM.

kazAKastAna kI rAjadhAnI astAnA meM chala rahI vishva mahilA baॉksiMga chaimpiyanashipa ke dUsare daura meM, emasI merI kaॉma, hAra gaIM, aura isake sAtha hI, riyo jAne kA unakA sapanA, TUTa gayA hai.
apane pahale maicha meM, merI kaॉma ne svIDana kI juliyAnA soDarasTroma ko mAta dI thI.
lekina dUsare daura ke maicha meM, ve jarmanI kI azIzI nimAnI se hAra gaIM.
ela saritA devI bhI, vishva chaimpiyanashipa meM, dUsare daura meM hAra gaIM, aura vo bhI, riyo ke lie kvAlifAI nahIM kara pAIM.
merI pAMcha bAra kI vishva chaiMpiyana haiM, jabaki chAra bAra, vo eshiyana chaiMpiyanashipa meM bhI golDa meDala, jIta chukI haiM.
isake alAvA do hazAra chaudaha ke eshiyana gemsa meM bhI, unhoMne golDa meDala jItA thA.

vahIM do hazAra bAraha laMdana olaMpika meM, jaba mahilA mukkebAzI pratiyogitA ko, isa Ayojana meM shAmila kiyA gayA, to vo yahAM kAMsya padaka jItakara, olaMpika meM padaka jItane vAlI pahalI bhAratIya mahilA mukkebAza banIM thIM.
kyA Apako patA hai, ki iMsAniyata, Aja bahuta ba.DI chunautI kA sAmanA kara rahI hai.
ye chunautI hai, bImAriyoM kI.
kaiMsara, aura dila kI bImAriyoM kI.
DAyabiTIza aura baikTIriyA ke infekshana kI.
tamAma taraha ke darda kI, bhUlane vAle marza, aljhAimara se nipaTane kI, vAyarasa se hone vAlI bImAriyoM se nipaTane kI chunautI.
vij~nAna ne Aja bahuta tarakqI kara lI hai.
magara phira bhI, iMsAna aksara lAchAra nazara AtA hai.
ina bImAriyoM ke Age, ghuTane TekatA mAlUma hotA hai.
vajaha ye, ki bahuta se aise marza haiM, jina para jIta hAsila karane kI davAeM nahIM khojI jA sakI haiM.
inake alAvA bahuta sI aisI davAeM, jo pahale tamAma marzoM se la.Dane meM kAragara thIM, vo aba beasara sAbita ho rahI haiM.
jaise kaI taraha ke kITANuoM para kAragara, eMTIbAyoTika davAeM, aba beasara sAbita ho rahI haiM.
isI taraha maleriyA aura DeMgU jaisI bImAriyoM se la.Dane ke lie, iMsAna ko naI davAoM kI zarUrata hai.
vij~nAna kI tarakqI aura davA kaMpaniyoM ke athAha faMDa kI badaulata, loga ye sochane lage the, ki vo tamAma bImAriyoM se la.Dane kI davAeM, laiba meM vikasita kara leMge.
isa socha ko kuCha kAmayAbI bhI milI, jaba kaI gaMbhIra rogoM se la.Dane ke lie, kaMpAuMDa yA kaI tatvoM ke mela se banI davAeM, prayogashAlAoM meM taiyAra kara lI gaIM.
magara sacha to ye hai, ki iMsAna kI ye socha, burI taraha nAkAma sAbita huI hai.
barasoM kI mehanata ke bAda jaba kaI davAeM taiyAra huI haiM, taba taka to marza kA rUpa-raMga hI badala chukA hotA hai.
tarakqI kI teza raftAra meM hama eka buniyAdI bAta se muMha mo.Da baiThe haiM.
buniyAdI bAta ye, hai ki hamArI bahuta sI mushkiloM kA hala, qudarata ke pAsa hai.
hamAre kaI marzoM kI davA qudarata muhaiyA karA sakatI hai.
balki sadiyoM se aisA hotA AyA hai.
hamArI kamobesha hara pareshAnI kA hala, hameM qudarata se milA hai.
Adi mAnava ke daura meM patthara ke bane hathiyAra hoM, khAnA pakAne ke lie laka.DI ho, yA phira, khAne-pIne kI zarUrata kI chIzeM, qudarata hamAre hara savAla kA javAba, detI rahI hai.
sadiyoM se iMsAnI sabhyatA, qudaratI tarIqoM se apanI bImAriyoM kA ilAja karatI rahI hai.
hamAre purakhe, bahuta sI harbala davAoM ke jAnakAra the.
yahAM taka ki, Aja bhI kaI rogoM se la.Dane kI davAeM, hameM prakRRiti se hAsila hotI haiM.
jaise kaiMsara ke ilAja ke lie hone vAlI kImotherepI meM istemAla hone vAlI davAeM, DoseTaiksela aura paikliTaiksela.
ye donoM hI kemikala, hameM yU, yA sadAbahAra ke pe.Da se milate haiM.
apane tamAma marzo se nipaTane ke lie iMsAna ne eka bAra, phira, qudarata kA ruKa, kiyA hai.
jaMgaloM meM, pahA.DoM para, zamIna ke bhItara, yA phira samaMdara ke aMdara, aise kemikala talAshe jA rahe haiM, jo rogoM se la.Dane meM hamArI madada kara sakeM.
aisI hI talAsha shurU kI hai, uttarI yUropIya desha, naॉrve ne.
yahAM ke Traॉmso shahara kI yUnivarsiTI ne, vahAM kI sarakAra, aura nijI kaMpaniyoM ke sAtha milakara, polara risarcha seMTara, kholA hai.
isI ke tahata, bAyoDiskavarI kAryakrama chalAyA jA rahA hai.

isake tahata, dhruvIya ilAqoM meM pAe jAne vAle jIvoM, jaise ghoMghe, keka.DoM, jelI fisha, yA phira hAiDrA, aura kAI kI tamAma nasloM ke bIcha pa.DatAla karake aise nae kemikala talAshe jA rahe haiM, jo kisI marza se la.Dane meM iMsAna kI madada kara sakeM.
isa abhiyAna ke tahata kAma karane vAle loga, ArkaTika sAgara meM jAkara, sarda mAhaula meM rahane vAle jIvoM ko jamA karate haiM.
phira unheM lAkara, Traॉmso yUnivarsiTI kI laiba meM parakhA jAtA hai.
unameM iMsAna ke madadagAra sAbita ho sakane vAle kemikala, talAshe jAte haiM.
isa kAma meM kaI yuvA vaij~nAnika aura kaI tajurbekAra loga lage hue haiM.
naॉrve, behada ThaMDA desha hai.
isake irda-girda barfa aura samaMdara ke sarda pAnI kA gherA hai.
yahAM kA mausama, kabhI-kabhI, itanA bhayAnaka hotA hai, ki jInA mushkila ho jAe.
isa sarda mAhaula meM bhI Kuda ko bachA pAne vAle jIvoM, vo chAhe ChoTe-ba.De jAnavara hoM, yA phira pe.Da paudhe, meM kuCha na kuCha to KAsa tAqata hotI hai.
jinakI madada se, vo itane bure mAhaula meM bhI hazAroM lAkhoM sAla se raha rahe haiM.
asala meM dharatI ke alaga-alaga hissoM meM, eka se eka KarAba mausama milate haiM.
dhruvoM ke qarIba vAle ilAqe behada sarda hote haiM.
magara yahAM bhI, kaI taraha ke jIva mila jAte haiM.
unameM se zyAdAtara samaMdara ke bhItara hI milate haiM.
naॉrve to vaise bhI samaMdara meM milane vAle tela ke KazAne kI badaulata hI, Aja duniyA ke sabase amIra mulqoM meM shAmila hai.
aba nayA daura hai, isalie, aba samaMdara kI madada se amIrI kA nayA rAstA talAsha rahe haiM, naॉrve ke loga.
qudarata isa kAma meM unakI madadagAra ho sakatI hai.
piChale qarIba sau sAloM se laiba meM tamAma taraha ke rogoM kI davAeM vikasita karane kI ho.Da sI lagI hai.
magara, tamAma dAvoM se itara, sacha to ye hai, ki piChale chAlIsa sAla meM, jo bhI naI davAeM bAzAra meM AI haiM, unameM se zyAdAtara, qudarata se hAsila kI gaI haiM.
amarIkI neshanala kaiMsara iMsTITyUTa ke DeviDa nyUmaina kahate haiM, ki prayogashAlA meM binA kisI qudaratI chIza ke, kuCha banAne kI koshisha, burI taraha nAkAma huI hai.
vo savAla uThAte haiM, ki AKira, hama qudarata se kyoM muMha mo.Da rahe haiM.
yahAM chIzeM tIna sau karo.Da sAla ke vaqta kI AMcha meM tapakara, nikharI haiM.
prakRRiti meM pAe jAne vAle tamAma kemikala ko talAsha karake, hama bahuta sI bImAriyoM para, jIta hAsila kara sakate haiM.
yahI vajaha hai, ki aba dhruvoM ke qarIba ke sarda samaMdara se, vo jAduI kemikala talAshane kI koshisha kI jA rahI hai, jo Aja ke daura ke mushkila rogoM se, la.Da sakeM.
briTena kI ebaraDIna yUnivarsiTI ke mArsela jaispara kahate haiM, ki loga pUChate haiM ki falAM marza kA to.Da, qudarata ke pAsa kyoM nahIM.
to usakA javAba ye hai, ki prakRRiti ke pAsa to hara savAla kA javAba hai.
vaise nae kaMpAuMDa aura naI davAoM ke lie, samaMdara ko khaMgAlane kA chalana, zyAdA purAnA nahIM.
Aja se bIsa sAla pahale taka, loga samudrI jIvoM ke bAre meM yahI jAnakArI juTAte the, ki kauna se jIva, iMsAna ko nuqasAna pahuMchA sakate haiM.
nabbe ke dashaka se samudra ko naI davAoM kA KazAnA mAnakara, dekhA jA rahA hai.
Aja kI tArIKa meM samudra se qarIba chaubIsa hazAra nae kemikala, talAshe jA chuke haiM.
vaise aba taka, aise gyAraha kaMpAuMDa pAe gae haiM, jo kaiMsara se la.Da sakate haiM.
vaij~nAnikoM ko lagatA hai, ki laiba meM naI davAeM banAne ke bajAya, agara hama samudra ko khaMgAleM, to hamArI bahuta sI bImAriyoM kA ilAja, mila sakatA hai.
inake alAvA iMsAna ke kAma Ane vAlI, aura bhI bahuta sI chIzeM, samudra meM milane kI ummIda hai.
afasosa kI bAta basa ye hai, ki aba taka samudra meM pAe jAne vAle, kevala eka fIsada baikTIriyA kI KUbiyoM ke bAre meM, iMsAna ko jAnakArI hai.
lekina naI chunautiyoM ko dekhate hue, aba samaMdara ke aMdara inake hala, talAshe jA rahe haiM.
isa vichAra para yaqIna rakhane vAle, duniyA bhara ke vaij~nAnikoM meM shAmila haiM, naॉrve ke, TraॉnDa yorgeMsana.
unhoMne unnIsa sau assI meM, nArve ke maChalI udyoga ko, bhArI tabAhI se bachAyA thA.
taba naॉrve ke qarIba milane vAlI sAlmana maChaliyAM, rahasyamayI DhaMga se mara rahI thIM.
inakA kArobAra, nArve kI arthavyavasthA kA ba.DA hissA thA.
yorgeMsana aura unake sAthiyoM ne, sAlmana ke marane kI vajaha kA patA kiyA, aura phira, usa roga se la.Dane kI vaiksIna taiyAra kI.
unnIsa sau ninyAnave meM, yorgeMsana kI mulAqAta, nArve kI risarcha kAuMsila ke eka sadasya se huI.
unhoMne, sAla unnIsa sau unahattara kA eka qissA sunAyA.
jaba eka svisa vaij~nAnika ne, naॉrve ke jaMgaloM se eka KAsa taraha ke kukuramutte kI nasla ko khojA.
usameM se eka kemikala milA, jisakA nAma hai, siklosporina.
ye Aja kI tArIKa meM tamAma taraha ke TrAMsaplAMTa ke marIzoM ke kAma AtA hai.
ise, usa kukuramutte kI nasla se nikAlakara, saiMDoza nAma kI davA kaMpanI ne, araboM Daॉlara kamAe.
vahIM nArve ke logoM ko, isase rattI bhara bhI fAyadA nahIM huA.
naॉrve kI risarcha kAuMsila ke usa sadasya ne yorgeMsana se kahA, ki kyA hama aba bhI apane desha meM, aise kemikala talAsha sakate haiM, jo rogoM se la.Dane kI tAqata rakhate hoM.
yorgeMsana ne isakA javAba hAM meM diyA.
unheM nayA mishana mila gayA thA.
naॉrve kI sarazamIM, aura isake irda-girda phaile sarda samaMdara meM, naI davAoM kI talAsha kI.
unhoMne sAlmana udyoga ko bachAne kI apanI shoharata kA fAyadA uThAyA.
yorgeMsana ne tamAma saMsthAoM se, qarIba do karo.Da Daॉlara juTAkara, naॉrve kA bAyoDiskavarI projekTa shurU kiyA.
bAda meM, isameM ArkaTika bAyoDiskavarI seMTara ke kAma ko bhI, jo.Da diyA gayA.
Aja yorgeMsana ke mishana se ju.De vaij~nAnika, samaMdara se, jaMgaloM se, tamAma taraha kI chIzeM talAshakara lAte haiM.
inheM laiba meM ChAMTA jAtA hai.
kAma kI chIzoM kI KUbiyAM patA karane ke lie, una kemikalsa ko isa projekTa kI sAjhIdAra nijI kaMpaniyoM ke havAle kara diyA jAtA hai.
do hazAra sAta se, ArkaTika sAgara meM aba taka eka sau pachAsa nae kaMpAuMDa, talAshe jA chuke haiM.
inameM se kaI se duniyA ko ba.DI ummIdeM haiM.
aba naॉrve ke isa projekTa se, jarmanI kA maiksa plaiMka lIDa DiskavarI seMTara bhI ju.Da gayA hai.
tAki talAshe gae hara kemikala kI KUbiyoM kI sahI DhaMga se pa.DatAla ho sake.
bahuta sI davA kaMpaniyAM, aba Kuda isa abhiyAna meM dilachaspI le rahI haiM.
AKira qudaratI tarIqe se milI davAoM kA koI javAba jo nahIM.
phira ina kemikala kaMpAuMDa kA aura bhI kArobArI istemAla ho sakatA hai.
yAnI yorgeMsana kI dUraMdeshI kI vajaha se, Aja uttarI dhruva ke ilAqe, aura KAsa taura se nArve ke pAsa ke samaMdara, mAnavatA ke nae rakShaka ke taura para ubhare haiM.
inase iMsAniyata ke sAmane kha.DI kaI chunautiyoM kA hala milane kI ummIda hai.
jaba bhI koI qudaratI Afata AtI hai, to usase ju.DI tamAma KabareM Ane lagatI haiM.
jaise ki samudrI tUfAna se itane loga mAre gae, yA phira bhUkaMpa kI vajaha se, itanA nuqasAna huA.
jaMgala kI Aga ne itane ghara jalA die.
matalaba ye, ki kisI bhI prAkRRitika ApadA ke Ane para, iMsAna ko kitanA nuqasAna huA, yahI KabareM AtI haiM.
iMsAna ke sabase qarIbI rishtedAroM, yAnI baMdaroM kI tamAma nasloM ke bAre meM bAta karate haiM.
aba jaise do hazAra paMdraha meM, iMDoneshiyA ke borniyo dvIpa para, jaMgaloM meM bhayaMkara Aga laga gaI thI, isa vajaha se, jaMgaloM ko bhArI nuqasAna huA.
ye ilAqA, pahale hI lagAtAra tIna sAla ke sUkhe se behAla thA, Aga kI vajaha se bache hue pe.Da, jala gae.
dhueM aura jalate sUraja ne, bAqI kI kasara pUrI kara dI.
isa ilAqe meM rahane vAle orAMguTAna ke rahane ke ThikAne, tabAha ho gae.
unake khAne ke lie na pattiyAM bachIM, aura na hI phala.
zarA sochie, ki isa qudaratI Afata se, kitane orAMguTAna mare hoMge.
kanADA kI yaॉrka yUnivarsiTI kI ena rasana ne isa bAre meM kAfI risarcha kI hai.
vo kahatI haiM, ki borniyo meM pAe jAne vAle orAMguTAna, apanI nasla ke sabase mazabUta jAnavara hote haiM.
vo kaI musIbatoM kA AsAnI se sAmanA karate haiM.
lekina ena kA kahanA hai ki isa bAra ke hAlAta, unake lie bhI kAfI mushkila haiM.
ala nino kI vajaha se, unake rahane ke ilAqe sUkhe se behAla haiM.
phira jaMgaloM kI Aga ne hAlAta aura KarAba kara die haiM.
ye piChale paiMtIsa sAloM meM tIsarI bAra hai, ki orAMguTAna ko sUkhe aura jaMgala kI Aga kI doharI mAra, jhelanI pa.Da rahI hai.
achChI bAta ye hai ki orAMguTAna khAne ke mAmale meM, bahuta nakharebAza nahIM, unheM jo milatA hai, vo khA lete haiM.
phira bhI Aga kI vajaha se, na unake rahane ke ThikAne bache haiM, aura na hI khAne ko kuCha mila rahA hai.
Aga se tabAha hue jaMgaloM ke phira se AbAda hone meM, kama se kama bIsa sAla lageMge.
ye daura, orAMguTAnoM ke lie bahuta burA rahane vAlA hai.
diqqata ye hai, ki apane se lagI Aga ke alAvA, sthAnIya loga bhI zamIna sAfa karane ke lie, Aga lagA dete haiM, jisase bache khuche ilAqe bhI tabAha ho jAte haiM.
aise meM orAMguTAna phira khAne kI talAsha meM, iMsAnI bastiyoM kI tarafa Ate haiM.
iMsAnoM se jAnavaroM kI jaMga meM, jAnavaroM kI hAra, kamobesha taya hotI hai.
ziMdagI kI isa jaMga ne orAMguTAnoM para bahuta burA asara DAlA hai.
unheM apane rivAyatI rihAishI ilAqoM se, dUsarI jagaha jAnA pa.Da rahA hai.
iMDoneshiyA se hazAroM kilomITara dUra, madhya amarIkA meM, baMdaroM kI eka aura nasla, qudaratI Afata se jUjha rahI hai.
madhya amarIkI desha beliza ke jaMgaloM meM, sAla do hazAra eka meM samudrI tUphAna Airisa ne, kAfI tabAhI machAI thI.
beliza ke ina jaMgaloM meM blaika hAulara nAma ke baMdara rahate haiM.
samudrI tUfAna kI vajaha se, unakI AbAdI ko bhArI nuqasAna pahuMchA thA.
isa bAre meM risarcha kara rahIM kanADA kI mairI pAvelkA batAtI haiM, ki tUfAnI havAoM se jaMgala pUrI taraha Katma ho gae the.
blaika hAulara baMdaroM kI sATha fIsada AbAdI, isa tUfAna meM Katma ho gaI thI.
mairI aura unakI TIma ko lagatA thA, ki tUfAna ke bAda bhI, baMdaroM kI ye nasla, Kuda ko bachA le jAegI, kyoMki ye kuCha bhI khA-pI lete haiM.
beliza meM rahane vAle blaika hAulara baMdaroM kI AbAdI, agale tIna sAloM meM itanI kama huI, ki tUfAna se pahale ke kevala bIsa fIsada baMdara hI, jaMgaloM meM bache the.
eka vaqta to aisA lagA, ki blaika hAulara baMdaroM kI sthAnIya nasla hI Katma ho jAegI.
AKira meM baMdaroM kI AbAdI ghaTanA kama huI, aura aba ye ba.Dha bhI rahI hai.
lekina aisA tabhI huA, jaba beliza ke jaMgaloM meM phaloM vAle pe.Da, phira se taiyAra ho gae.
isase sAfa hai, ki ina baMdaroM ke bAre meM jaisA sochA gayA thA, vaisA nahIM huA.
ye musIbata ke vaqta bhI, ghAsa-phUsa khAne ke bajAya, phaloM kI talAsha kara rahe the.
isase inakI AbAdI ko bhArI nuqasAna uThAnA pa.DA.
vahIM beliza ke hI dUsare ilAqe meM pAe jAne vAle spAiDara maMkI ke aMdara, qudaratI AfatoM se la.Dane kI zyAdA kUvata dekhI gaI.
ina baMdaroM ne, pahale do hazAra eka, aura phira do hazAra dasa meM Ae bhayaMkara samudrI tUfAnoM se, bhArI nuqasAna jhelA thA.
Ama taura para, jaba spAiDara maMkI ke rihAishI ilAqoM ko nuqasAna hotA hai, to ye sabase pahale bhAga kha.De hote haiM.
aura vahAM tabhI lauTate haiM, jaba hAlAta sAmAnya ho jAte haiM.
magara tUfAna se huI tabAhI se, spAiDara maMkI ne ba.DA dimAGa lagAkara nipaTane kI koshisha kI.
spAiDara maMkI, Ama taura para ba.De jhuMDa meM rahate haiM.
ba.De hote baMdara, bAda meM apane dostoM-rishtedAroM kA alaga jhuMDa banA lete haiM, aura jhuMDa ke sadasya, badalate rahate haiM.
lekina pahale do tUfAnoM, aura phira apane ilAqe meM lagI bhayaMkara Aga se nipaTane ke lie, ina baMdaroM ne jhuMDa meM rahane kI apanI Adata meM pherabadala kara liyA.
jahAM pahale jhuMDa ke baMdara badalate rahate the, vahIM Afata Ane ke bAda, inhoMne apane dostoM-sAthiyoM meM, koI hera-phera nahIM kiyA.
isase khAne ko lekara inake bIcha ApasI jhaga.De nahIM hue.
sabane khAne ke kama sAmAna ko, Apasa meM mila bAMTakara khAyA.
aura isa taraha spAiDara maMkI ne ApasI ekajuTatA se, do-do samudrI tUfAnoM, aura jaMgala kI bhayaMkara Aga jaisI ApadAoM kA sAmanA kiyA.
matalaba sAfa hai, qudarata ke qahara se bachane kA mAddA, sabhI jAnavaroM meM hotA hai.
jo jAnavara badale hue hAlAta ke hisAba se Kuda ko DhAla lete haiM, vo bacha nikalate haiM.
vahIM, jo aisA nahIM kara pAte, vo tabAhI meM tabAha hote haiM.
hAM, ina risarcha se eka bAta sAfa hai, ki iMsAna ko apane Asa-pAsa, bAqI jAnavaroM ko dekhate rahanA hai, to use jaMgaloM meM apanA dakhala, kama karanA hogA.
varanA qudaratI ApadA ke bAda, iMsAnoM kA qahara, jAnavaroM kI bahuta sI nasloM kA KAtmA kara degA.
isa DAMsa pareDa meM hazAroM kI saMkhyA meM DAMsara aura saMgItakAra shAmila hote haiM.
hara sAla, sAMbA DAMsa pareDa ko dekhane ke lie, ba.DI saMkhyA meM loga ikaTThA hote haiM.
isa DAMsa pareDa ko lekara, logoM meM kAfI utsAha hotA hai.
asAkusA kA sAMbA DAMsa kArnivala, eka TIma DAMsa hotA hai.
AsAkusA kA sAMbA kArnivala garmI ke dinoM meM Tokyo kA lokapriya tyauhAra hotA hai.
eka zamAnA thA, ki reDiyo seTa se gUMjatI devakInaMdana pAMDe kI AvAza, bhArata ke jana jana ko sammohita kara letI thI.

apane jIvanakAla meM hI lejeMDa bana gae devakInaMdana pAMDe ke samAchAra pa.Dhane kA aMdAza, uchchAraNa kI shuddhatA, jhannATedAra robIlI AvAza, kisI bhI shrotA ko romAMchita kara dene ke lie kAfI thI.
devakInaMdana pAMDe ko, sAtha kAma kara chuke mashahUra patrakAra, umesha joshI, yAda karate haiM, paune nau baje kA buleTina jaise hI shurU hotA thA, basa eka hI AvAza sunAI detI thI.
ye AkAshavANI hai, aba Apa devakInaMdana pAMDe se samAchAra sunie.
jitane bhI ba.De avasara the, chAhe KushI kA avasara ho yA Gama kA avasara ho, devakInaMdana pAMDe, samAchAra pa.Dhate the.
joshI Age kahate haiM, javAharalAla neharU, aura jayaprakAsha nArAyaNa ke nidhana kA samAchAra, unhoMne hI pa.Dhe.
saMjaya gA.NdhI ke Akasmika nidhana kA samAchAra vAchana karane ke lie, riTAyara ho chuke devakInaMdana pAMDe ko, KAsa taura se dillI sTeshana para bulavAyA gayA.
jitane bhI ba.De avasara hote the, unheM KAsa taura se samAchAra pa.Dhane bulAyA jAtA thA, chAhe unakI DyUTI ho yA na ho.
saba ko patA thA ki ye desha kI AvAza hai.
pAMDejI kaha rahe haiM to isakA matalaba, pUrA desha kaha rahA hai.
kAnapura meM paidA hue devakInaMdana pAMDe ne, unnIsa sau tirtAllisa meM AkAshavANI lakhanaU se kaizuala enauMsara, aura DrAmA ArTisTa ke rUpa meM, apane kariyara kI shuruAta kI thI.
unnIsa sau a.DatAlIsa meM jaba dillI meM AkAshavANI kI hiMdI samAchAra sevA shurU huI, to karIba tIna hazAra ummIdavAroM meM, unakI AvAza aura vAchana shailI ko, sarvashreShTha pAyA gayA.
usake bAda se, unhoMne kabhI pIChe mu.Da kara nahIM dekhA.

kaI varShoM taka, devakInaMdana pAMDe ke sAtha kAma kara chuke, aura AkAshavANI meM nyUza eDiTara ke pada se riTAyara hue, trilokInAtha batAte haiM, U.NchA mAthA, bhItara taka jhA.NkatI shaffAka A.NkheM, chehare para jhalakatA AtmavishvAsa, sAfagoI, ye saba milA kara, devakInaMdana pAMDe kA shAnadAra vyaktitva banatA thA.
kAma ke prati ImAnadArI itanI, ki buleTina shurU hone se pA.Ncha minaTa pahale hI, uTha kara sTUDiyo chale jAte the.
naI pI.DhI ke vAchaka to do minaTa pahale jAne meM apanI heThI samajhate haiM.
lakhanaU meM mile urdU ke anubhava ne, unheM hameshA, spaShTa samAchAra vAchana meM madada kI.
unake sAtha kAma kara chuke, aura apane zamAne meM mashahUra samAchAra vAchaka, azIza hasana kahate haiM, unakI AvAza, kaॉmana AvAza nahIM thI.
unheM sheroshAyarI kA bahuta shauka thA.
isakI vajaha se, unakA talaffusa, bahuta achChA thA.
devakInaMdana pAMDe, jitane lokapriya Ama AdamiyoM ke bIcha the, utane hI ba.De netAoM, aura KAsa logoM ke bIcha bhI.
umesha joshI batAte haiM, AkAshavANI kI eka sTAfa esosieshana huA karatI thI, aura mashahUra samAchAra vAchaka, ashoka vAjapeI, usake kartA dhartA huA karate the.
taba sTAfa ArTisTa ko peMshana aura grejueTI nahIM milatI thI.
aTThAvana sAla kI umra meM riTAyara hote the, aura apane ghara chale jAte the.
unakA bhaviShya aMdhakAramaya hotA thA.
vo mAMga kara rahe the, ki unheM bhI dUsare sarakArI karmachAriyoM kI taraha TrITa kiyA jAe, aura unheM bhI peMshana aura grejueTI kI suvidhA dI jAe.
isa silasile meM pUrA eka pratinidhimaMDala, pradhAnamaMtrI iMdirA gA.NdhI se milane gayA.
bAtachIta ho rahI thI.
iMdirA gA.NdhI kI nazareM, fAiloM para nIche ga.DI huI thIM.
jaba ashoka jI ne devakInaMdana pAMDe kA parichaya karAyA, ki ye devakInaMdana pAMDe haiM, aura ye bhI hamAre sAtha Ae haiM, to iMdirA gAMdhI ne kAma Cho.Da diyA.
kalama nIche rakha dI, aura nazareM uThA kara bolIM, achChA, to Apa haiM devakInaMdana pAMDe, yAnI ki iMdirA gA.NdhI bhI, unako itanA sunatI rahI thIM.
vo zamAnA hI aisA thA, ki agara kisI ko bhI Kabara sunanI ho, to AkAshavANI hI ekamAtra mAdhyama hotA thA.
devakInaMdana pAMDe ke beTe aura isa samaya raMgamaMcha aura baॉlIvuDa ke abhinetA sudhIra pAMDe batAte haiM, ki ghara meM bhI Galata hiMdI bolane para, vo Toka dete the.
jaba maiM skUla meM thA to saba jAnate the, ki ye devakInaMdana pAMDe ke beTe haiM.
usa zamAne meM manoraMjana kA sAdhana reDiyo aura sinemA huA karatA thA.
mere pitA AvAza se hI pahachAne jAte the.
unakA nAma liyA, aura patA chala jAtA thA, ki vo kauna haiM.
mujhe garva mahasUsa hotA thA ki eka shaKsa, jo itanA lokapriya hai, aura jo itanA jAnA jAtA hai, maiM unakA beTA hU.N.

ye bhI hotA thA, ki hiMdI kI klAsa meM, jaba hama Galata vAkya, yA Galata shabda bola dete the, to hamAre TIchara sabase kahate the, ki dekhie sAhaba, devakInaMdana pAMDe ke beTe ho kara, ye Galata hiMdI bola rahe haiM.
ghara meM bhI pitAjI Galata shabda kA istemAla bilkula bardAshta nahIM kara pAte the.
vo faurana Toka dete the, ki ye kaisA shabda bola rahA hai.
devakInaMdana pAMDe kA mAnanA thA, ki Kabara ko pUrI taraha samajha lene ke bAda hI, use pa.DhanA chAhie.
mashahUra samAchAra vAchaka, kRRiShNa kumAra bhArgava ne, na sirfa unake sAtha kAma kiyA thA, balki, unase kuCha gurumaMtra bhI lie the.
bhArgava batAte haiM, ki unnIsa sau sATha meM, merA hiMdI samAchAra vAchaka ke rUpa meM chayana huA thA.
jaba mujhase pahalI bAra samAchAra pa.Dhane ke lie kahA gayA, to merI samajha meM hI nahIM A rahA thA ki maiM kyA karU.N.
mere eka mitra the keshava pAMDe, jo usa samaya vividha bhAratI meM kAma karate the.
maiMne kahA, keshavajI mujhe batAie ki samAchAra kaise pa.Dhe jAte haiM?
unhoMne mujhase kahA, ki maiM tumheM eka shaKsa se milavAtA hU.N.
mere sAmane vAlI kursI para, eka shaKsa baiThe hue the, kurtA pAyajAmA pahane hue.
mujhe unake sAmane le jA kara vo bole, milie devakInaMdana pAMDe se.
mere muMha se nikalA, ki Apako sunate sunate hI maiM ba.DA huA hU.N.
unhoMne kahA, bhArgava, samAchAra koI kalA nahIM hai.
lekina jo kuCha pa.Dho, use samajhakara paDho.
ye gurumaMtra maiMne unase sIkhA, aura jIvana bhara, maiM use apanAtA rahA.
devakInaMdana pAMDe ke vyaktitva kA eka dilachaspa pahalU ye bhI thA, ki vo apane pAsa kalama nahIM rakhate the.
umesha joshI batAte haiM, aksara maiMne dekhA hai, ki nyUza rIDara apanI skripTa para kalama se mArkiMga karate haiM, ki kahA.N para mujhe paॉza denA hai, yA kahA.N para sTresa denA hai.
lekina pAMDejI ne kabhI koI mArkiMga nahIM kI.
ye zarUra hotA thA, ki sTUDiyo meM samAchAra paDhate hue, vo apane dAhine hAtha kA aMgUThA, aura pahalI uMgalI, isa taraha karIba le Ate the, mAno unhoMne kalama paka.DI huI ho.
usake bAda vo pa.Dhate pa.Dhate, havA meM mArkiMga kiyA karate the.
kahIM kaॉmA ho to kaॉmA lagAte the, virAma ho to virAma lagAte the.
kisI bhI mauke para maiMne unheM faMbala karate hue nahIM dekhA.
agara koI gala़tI hotI bhI thI, to vo isa safAI se saMbhAlate the, ki kisI ko kuCha patA hI nahIM chalatA thA ki koI GalatI huI hai.
nyUza eDITara trilokInAtha yAda karate haiM, eka bAra, yAsera arAfAta se ju.DI eka Kabara, pa.DhI jAnI thI.
vo AdhI hI TAipa ho pAI.
maiMne sochA, ki jaba pAMDejI dUsarI KabareM paDha rahe hoMge, tabhI maiM usa Kabara ko pUrA likha dU.NgA.
maiM vAkya pUrA karanA bhUla gayA, aura vahI Kabara, pAMDejI ko paDhane ke lie de dI.
lekina pAMDe jI ne binA ruke, adhUre vAkya ko, sahajatA se ye kahate hue paDhA, ki yAsera arAfAta ne kuCha bhI spaShTa kahane se iMkAra kara diyA.
nyUza rUma meM unakI maujUdagI kA ehasAsa, kamare ke aMdara se A rahe ThahAkoM se hotA thA.
una ThahAkoM se, nyUza rUma ke bAhara kha.De loga samajha jAte the, ki vo aMdara maujUda haiM.
azIza hasana yAda karate haiM, unakA jUniyara-sIniyara, saba ke sAtha bahuta dostAnA vyavahAra huA karatA thA.
sabako patA thA, ki vo dila ke sAfa AdamI haiM.
unake dila meM ChalAvA dikhAvA, yA pAliTiksa bAzI jaisI koI chIza nahIM thI.
unako tho.DA bahuta DriMka karane kA shauka thA.
vahI unakI akelI kamazorI thI, lekina usakI vajaha se unake buleTina para koI asara nahIM pa.DatA thA.
unakI vinodapriyatA kA eka udAharaNa dete hue, kRRiShNa kumAra bhArgava, eka purAnA kissA yAda karate haiM, una dinoM reDiyo para vividha bhAratI se hara ghaMTe, eka buleTina huA karatA thA.
use banAyA maiMne thA, lekina use paDhanA, paMDitajI ko thA.
maiMne unako skripTa dI aura kahA, chalie, pa.Dhane kA samaya ho gayA hai.
vo bole, yAra Aja mUDa nahIM ho rahA hai.
jaba maiM samAchAra pa.Dha kara vApasa AyA, to unase kahA, pAMDe jI, Aja to bahuta ba.DI GalatI ho gaI.
jaba maiMne sArI bAta batAI, to ve haMsate hue bole, koI bAta nahIM bhArgava.
maiMne bhI eka bAra apanI jagaha urmilA mishra kA nAma bola diyA thA.
unakA eka dUsarA qissA bhI ba.DA mashahUra hai.
eka bAra kisI kI chunautI para unhoMne samAchAra kA AraMbha, kuCha isa taraha se kiyA thA, ye devakInaMdana pAMDe hai, aba Apa AkAshavANI se samAchAra sunie.
unake samAchAra pa.Dhane ke DhaMga meM pUrI taraha, spaShTatA huA karatI thI.
vo kahA karate the, ki agara bhArata maicha jIta gayA, to maiM ati utsAha meM samAchAra kyoM paDhU.N.
samAchAra vAchana ke bAre meM, vo eka behatarIna gura batAte the, jo Aja ke, ninyAnave fIsadI samAchAra vAchakoM, aura eMkaroM ko shAyada nahIM mAlUma hogA.
umesha joshI batAte haiM, vo kahate the ki eka chuTakI bajAo, utanA samaya do vAkyoM ke bIcha honA chAhie.
do chuTakI jitanA samaya, do pairAgrAfa, aura tIna chuTakI jitanA samaya, do KabaroM ke bIcha denA, zarUrI hai.
varnA bhAgavata kathA pa.Dhane aura samAchAra pa.Dhane meM, koI aMtara nahIM rahegA.
devakInaMdana pAMDe ne kaI reDiyo nATakoM meM bhAga liyA thA.
unheM AdhArashilA filma aura lokapriya Telivizana sIriyala tamasa meM, apane abhinaya ke jalave dikhAne kA maukA bhI milA thA.
khAne pIne kA bhI unheM bahuta shauka thA.
unake beTe sudhIra pAMDe batAte haiM, achChe khAne kA unheM bahuta shauka thA.
goshta aura rama ke vo bahuta shaukIna the.
lekina ghara meM hI banAnA aura khAnA pasaMda karate the.
hoTaloM aura restarA.N meM jAnA, unheM kuCha KAsa pasaMda nahIM thA.
unheM tanhAI meM baiTha kara pa.DhanA likhanA bhI bahuta pasaMda thA.
shero shAyarI kI kitAbeM, unake sirahAne hameshA rahatI thIM.
tIna chAra aKabAra vo pa.DhA karate the, aura unakA eka eka harfa, vo eka taraha se chATa jAte the.
devakInaMdana pAMDe ko hamashA samAchAra vAchana kI vidhA ke shikhara puruSha ke rUpa meM, yAda kiyA jAegA.
Apane bahuta se jAnavaroM ko shikAra karate hue dekhA hogA, para kabhI sochA hai, ki jaba ye shikArI jAnavara, apane shikAra para hamalA karate haiM, to kisakA jhapaTTA sabase tAqatavara hotA hogA.
chalie, Aja aMdAzA lagAte haiM ki kisa jAnavara kA nivAlA, sabase tAqatavara hotA hai.
vhela, Aja kI tArIKa meM, duniyA kI sabase ba.DI jIva hai.
inameM se, boheDa vhela kA muMha, Aja duniyA meM kisI bhI jAnavara meM, sabase ba.DA mAnA jAtA hai.
lekina vo apane muMha se, kisI ko kATatI nahIM.
kisI para muMha se jhapaTTA mArakara, use chabAne ke lie jAnavara ke pAsa ba.DA sA muMha, aura usameM KataranAka nukIle dAMta, aura tAqatavara peshiyAM, honI chAhie.
to pahalI bAta to ye hai, ki hara vo jAnavara jisake dAMta haiM, vo shikAra ko chabAtA nahIM.
jaise ki, ghoMghe kI jIbha jaise reDulA nAma ke aMga para, hazAroM dAMta hote haiM.
magara isase vo kATatA nahIM, ina dAMtoM ko, vo kharoMchane ke kAma meM lAtA hai.
isI taraha, nIlI vhela, duniyA kI sabase ba.DI jIva hai, magara isake dAMta nahIM hote.
isake muqAbale, sparma vhela ke dAMta, kAfI teza aura ba.De hote haiM.
lekina sparma vhela kI bAiTa ko bhI sabase tAqatavara nahIM kahA jA sakatA, kyoMki isake sirfa nichale jaba.De meM dAMta hote haiM.
Ama taura para sparma vhela apane shikAra ko nigalatI hai, chabAtI nahIM.
raॉyala beljiyana iMsTITyUTa ऑfa nechurala sAiMsa ke oliviyara laimbarTa kahate haiM, ki Aja shikAra para jhapaTTA mArakara chabAne ke mAmale meM sabase Age hai, kilara vhela.
magara kilara vhela, asala meM vhela nahIM, Daॉlfina kI eka nasla hai.
ye ikattIsa fuTa taka laMbI hotI haiM.
inake pachAsa ke qarIba dAMta hote haiM.
ina dAMtoM se, vo apane shikAra ko chIra-phA.Da DAlatI haiM.
ye vhela se lekara sIla taka ko apanA shikAra banAtI haiM.
lekina kilara vhela yA orkA, hameshA jhuMDa meM shikAra karatI haiM.
aise meM kisI eka jAnavara kA sabase tAqatavara jhapaTTA batAne kI resa meM, inheM bhI nahIM ginA jA sakatA.
inake muqAbale greTa vhAiTa shArka kI bAiTa, zyAdA tAqatavara hotI hogI, kyoMki, inake tIna sau dAMta hote haiM.
ye sabase KataranAka shikArI jAnavara mAne jAte haiM.
magara diqqata ye hai, ki inake jaba.DoM meM haDDiyAM nahIM hotIM.
to phira kaise mAnA jAe, ki inakI bAiTa, sabase tAqatavara hotI hai.
isake lie jAnavaroM ke shikAra ko kATane ke vaqta lagAI gaI tAqata ko nApane kI zarUrata hai.
ऑsTreliyA kI nyU iMglaiMDa yUnivarsiTI ke sTIfana ro ne, kaMpyUTara kI madada se, jAnavaroM ke jhapaTTA mArakara chabAne ke vaqta lagAe gae zora ko nApA thA.
patA ye chalA, ki kisI bhI shArka ke jhapaTTA mArakara chabAne meM zyAdA se zyAdA, aThAraha hazAra do sau solaha nyUTana kI tAqata lagatI hai.
nyUTana vo paimAnA hai, jisase kisI chIza para lagA zora nApA jAtA hai.
isako isa taraha se samajhie, ki hamAre dAMta, jaba bahuta tAqata lagAkara koI chIza kATate haiM, to ye zora, zyAdA se zyAdA, eka hazAra tIna sau satraha nyUTana kA hotA hai.
dharatI para nApI gaI kisI bhI sabase tAqatavara bAiTa meM naMbara eka para Ate haiM, magaramachCha.
amarIkA kI floriDA yUnivarsiTI ke gregarI eriksana ne, magaramachChoM kI teIsa nasloM ke shikAra karate vaqta lagAI gaI tAqata ko nApA thA.
unakI TIma ne pAyA, ki magaramachCha apane shikAra ko chabAte vaqta, solaha hazAra chAra sau chaudaha nyUTana taka kA zora lagAte haiM.
dharatI para, ye sabase tAqatavara bAiTa hai.
isase pahale chitakabare laka.Dabagghe ke jhapaTTe ko, sabase tAqatavara mAnA jAtA thA.
vaise magaramachCha kI chabAne meM lagAI gaI tAqata, shArka se kama hai.
magara shArka kI bAiTa kI tAqata ko, kaMpyUTara se aMdAzA gayA thA.
vahIM, magaramachCha ke jhapaTTe ko to vAqaI meM AzamAyA gayA.
phira jina magaramachChoM para, gregarI ne ye tajurbA kiyA thA, vo sabase ba.De magaramachCha vAlI nasla ke nahIM the.
isase ye kahA jA sakatA hai ki unake chabAne kI tAqata, aura bhI zyAdA hogI.
dakShiNa amarIkA meM pAI jAne vAlI pirhAnA maChalI kI bAiTa ko bhI, kAfI paॉvarafula mAnA jAtA hai.
lekina Aja, jo pirhAnA maChaliyAM milatI haiM, vo bahuta ChoTI hotI haiM.
jabaki Aja se qarIba nabbe lAkha sAla pahale, isakI ba.DI bahaneM, usI ilAqe meM rahA karatI thIM.
inheM, megApirhAnA, kahA gayA.
ye tIna fuTa taka laMbI hotI thIM.
mAnA jAtA hai ki inake jhapaTTe meM, eka hazAra do sau chAlIsa se, chAra hazAra sAta sau unachAlIsa nyUTana taka kA zora huA karatA thA.
aba, jaba dharatI se Katma ho chuke jAnavaroM ke tAqatavara jhapaTToM kI bAta ho rahI hai, to isa resa meM kaI aura jAnavara shAmila ho sakate haiM.
qarIba pachchIsa lAkha sAla pahale pAI jAne vAlI, megAloDaॉna nAma kI shArka, Aja kI shArka se, tIna gune se bhI zyAdA laMbI hotI thI.
