zAhira hai, isakI bAiTa bhI, kAfI tAqatavara rahI hogI.
mAnA jAtA hai ki isake jhapaTTe meM eka se do lAkha nyUTana taka kA zora lagatA hogA.
inakI tAqata lagane para eka kAra kA kachUmara nikala sakatA hai.
jisa vaqta, ye megAloDaॉna shArka, dharatI para rahatI thI, usI vaqta vhela kI bhI eka nasla, dharatI para basara karatI thI.
isakA nAma, vaij~nAnikoM ne, liviyATana melavilI rakhA hai.
isake kuCha kaMkAla mile haiM.
isa vhela kA jaba.DA hI, qarIba dasa fuTa kA hotA thA.
vahIM, isa vhela ke dAMtoM kI laMbAI, qarIba chaudaha iMcha hotI thI.

itane ba.De jaba.DoM aura itane KataranAka dAMta se laisa, ye vhela, jaba shikAra para jhapaTatI rahI hogI, to apane shikAra para kitanI tAqata se hamalA karatI hogI, isakA sirfa aMdAzA lagAyA jA sakatA hai.
Aja ATha navaMbara ko dasiyoM lAkha amarIkI mahilAeM, aisA kuCha kareMgI, jisakA unheM laMbe samaya se iMtazAra thA, lekina unheM isake pahale isakA mauqA nahIM milA thA.
ve rAShTrapati chunAva meM, kisI ba.DI pArTI kI mahilA ummIdavAra ke lie voTa kareMgI.
kuCha logoM ne to isake lie, ChiyAnave sAla laMbA iMtazAra kiyA hai.
amarIkA meM aThAraha agasta unnIsa sau bIsa se pahale janmI mahilAoM ne, ziMdagI kI shuruAta aise desha meM kI hai, jahAM auratoM ko voTa dene kA haka nahIM thA.
inameM aThAnave sAla kI esTela shulsa bhI haiM.
ve dUsare vishva yuddha ke daurAna, eka kAraKAne meM kAma karatI thIM.
ve jaba ChoTI thIM, unakI mAM voTa dene jAtI thIM, to unheM sAtha le jAtI thIM.
esTela dila kI marIza haiM, aura haॉsapIsa meM rahatI haiM.
haॉsapIsa vo jagaha hotI hai, jahAM loga mRRityu kI ichChA lie, aMtima dina GuzArane ke lie jAte haiM.
ve kahatI haiM, maiMne ye taya kara liyA thA ki itanA to zarUra jiUMgI, ki pahalI mahilA rAShTrapati kA chunAva dekha sakUM.
unhoMne akTUbara meM pahalI bAra voTa DAlA.
unhoMne mahasUsa kiyA, ki ve kAfI bhAvuka ho gaIM thI, aura apanI potI sArA se kahA, ki unakI tasvIra, fesabuka para posTa kara deM.
sArA ne likhA, maiM apanI aThAnave sAla kI dAdI ke kahane para ye tasvIra posTa kara rahI hUM, ve kaMpyUTara kA istemAla karanA nahIM jAnatI haiM.
kuCha hI dera meM, isa foTo ko, hazAroM logoM ne lAika kiyA.
dUsare kaI logoM kI bhI ye kahAnI thI.
jalda vebasAiTa, AI veTeDa nainTi siksa Iyarsa bana gaI.
isameM hilerI kliMTana ke una samarthakoM kI kahAniyAM thIM, jinakA janma, mahilAoM ko matadAna kA adhikAra milane se pahale huA thA.
inameM se kuCha mahilAoM ko, unnIsaveM saMshodhana ke pArita kie jAne, aura mahilAoM ko voTa dene kA adhikAra die jAne kI ghaTanA, abhI bhI yAda hai.
mesAchyuseTsa kI jUliyaTa barnasTIna kA janma, unnIsa sau teraha meM huA thA, ve eka sau tIna sAla kI haiM.
ve kahatI haiM, mujhe yAda hai ki auratoM ko matadAna kA adhikAra milane ke bAda, pahalI bAra, apanI mAM ke sAtha gho.DAgA.DI meM matadAna keMdra taka gaI thI.
DemokreTika pArTI kI sadasya, eka sau do sAla kI jerailDina jerI emeTa ne bhI, voTa diyA hai.

shikAgo nivAsI, aThAnave sAla kI bIeTrisa laMpakina kahatI haiM, merI mAM una kuCha mahilAoM meM se thIM, jinhoMne apane bAla kaTavA lie aura kIcha.Da meM ghisaTa kara chalane vAlI laMbI skarTa kI jagaha, ChoTI Dresa pahana lI thI.
unhoMne Age kahA, ye hamAre adhikAroM kI bAta hai.
ye matadAna karane ke haqa se shurU huI.
jaba maiM itanI ba.DI ho gaI thI, ki ise samajha sakUM, mujhe kAfI garva huA, ki mahilAoM ne matadAna karane kA adhikAra, hAsila kara liyA.

matadAna karane vAlI kaI mahilAoM ko to basa isI bAta para khushI hai, ki unheM rAShTrapati chunAva meM, eka mahilA ummIdavAra ko voTa dene kA mauqA milA hai, kaI ne isa bAre meM sochA taka nahIM thA.
eMjelA esTela gairAvelI esTara kI mauta, ikkIsa akTUbara ko aThAnave sAla kI umra meM ho gaI.
unhoMne pahale hI voTa dene kA vikalpa chunA.
lekina natIjA Ane ke pahale hI unakA nidhana ho gayA.
unhoMne kahA thA, yadi mujhe eka bAra aura voTa dene kA mauqA milA, maiM kisI aurata ko hI denA chAhUMgI.
esTara ne mauta ke kuCha ghaMTe pahale hI voTa de diyA.
para nabbe aura sau sAla ke Upara kI umra kI kaI mahilAoM ke lie, ye isakA pratIka hai, ki mahilAoM ko kitanA haqa milA hai.
yUjIniyA pArkinsa, eka sau do sAla kI haiM.
ve kahatI haiM, maiM mahilAvAdI taba se hUM, jaba ye shabda banA bhI nahIM thA.
ye samaya kI bAta hai ki koI aurata, rAShTrapati banatI hai.
ninyAnave sAla kI silviyA shulamaina ke mutAbiqa, ye voTa, sirfa isalie nahIM hai, ki hilerI eka mahilA haiM.
ve kahatI haiM, ye ye dikhAne ke lie hai ki hama aurata hone ke nAte kuCha bhI kara sakatI haiM, KAsa kara taba, jaba hamane usake lie zarUrI anubhava hAsila karane ke lie ka.DI mehanata kI hai.
pArkinsa ne kahA, apanI potI aura pa.DapotI ko ye batAne meM achChA lagatA hai, ki aba tumhArI sImA AkAsha hai, aura tuma vo saba kuCha kara sakatI ho jo puruSha kara sakate haiM.
vebasAiTa kI koshishoM kI ora, logoM kA dhyAna gayA.
shulza kI tasvIra TreMDa karane lagI, aura unheM DemokreTa ummIdavAra hilerI kliMTana ne, eka nijI chiTThI likhI.
unhoMne likhA, kisI ba.De rAjanItika dala kI pahalI rAShTrapati ummIdavAra hone kI zimmedAriyoM se, maiM abhibhUta ho gaI hUM.
unhoMne Age likhA, hamane itanA kuCha hAsila kara liyA hai.
para hameM abhI shIshe kI aMtima Chata ko to.DanA hai.
kenADA ke eka gotAKora ne samaMdara meM paramANu bama jaisA upakaraNa khojane kA dAvA kiyA hai.
mAnA jA rahA hai, ki ye amarIkA kA niShkriya paramANu bama ho sakatA hai.
sIna simarIchiMskI briTisha kolaMbiyA ke pAsa, samudrI kaka.DI kI talAsha meM, gote lagA rahe the.
isa daurAna, unheM u.DanatashtarI jaisI dikhane vAlA dhAtu kA eka upakaraNa nazara AyA.

dI keneDiyana DipArTameMTa ऑfa neshanala DifeMsa kA mAnanA hai, ki ye upakaraNa, unnIsa sau pachAsa ke dashaka meM, isI ilAqe meM durghaTanAgrasta hue amarIkI bamavarShaka, bI tharTI siksa meM lagA paramANu bama, ho sakatA hai.
sarakAra kA mAnanA hai ki isa bama meM sakriya paramANu sAmagrI nahIM hai.
isa talAsha ko puKtA karane ke lie, haidA gavaI dvIpa samUha ilAqe meM, nausenA kA jahAza, bhejA jA rahA hai.
simarIchiMskI ne bIbIsI ko batAyA ki aktUbara kI shuruAta meM, vo haidA gavaI dvipa samUha ilAqe meM, gotAkhorI kara rahe the, jahAM unheM, ye milA.
unhoMne batAyA ki ye eka kiMga sAiza ke beDa se bhI ba.DA thA.
vo Upara se chapaTA thA, aura usakA talA golAkAra thA.
isake bIchoM-bIcha, surAKa thA.
simarIchiMskI jaba samudra se bAhara Ae, to unhoMne apane sAthI gotAkhoroM se majAqa meM kahA, maiMne kuCha aisA khojA hai jo adbhuta hai.
mujhe lagA ki ye eka u.DanatashtarI hai.
sainya itihAsakAra GAyaba hue paramANu hathiyAra ko lekara, AdhI sadI se pareshAna haiM.
amarIkI bamavarShaka bI tharTI siksa, usa samaya briTisha kolaMbiyA ke pAsa durghaTanAgrasta ho gayA thA.
vo Teksasa ke kArsavela eyaraforsa besa kI u.DAna para thA.
isa vimAna meM, mArka fora paramANu bama lagA thA.
u.DAna ke kuCha dera bAda hI, vimAna ke iMjana meM Aga laga gaI.
chAlaka dala ke satraha sadasyoM meM se bAraha ne pairAshUTa ke zarie ChalAMga lagA dI.
lekina pAMcha sadasya aisA nahIM kara sake.
amarIkI senA kA kahanA hai ki bama meM, leDa, yUreniyama, aura TIenaTI bharA huA thA.
lekina usameM ploToniyama nahIM thA.
isalie vo paramANu dhamAkA karane meM sakShama nahIM thA.
chAlaka dala ne vimAna ko ऑTo moDa meM DAla diyA, aura use samaMdara ke bIcha durghaTanAgrasta hone diyA.
tIna sAla bAda isakA malabA, saika.DoM kilomITara ke dAyare meM bikharA pAyA gayA.
DI ena DI ke eka pravaktA ne bIbIsI ko batAyA, ki usane isa jAnakArI ko, apane amarIkI samakakSha se sAjhA kiyA hai.
vibhAga kA kahanA hai ki gotAkhora ne jo chIza khojI hai, vo bama ho sakatI hai.
dillI kI dIvAlI, yU.N to yahAM ke bAshiMdoM ko achChI lagatI hai, para mujhe nahIM.
isIlie dIvAlI se eka rAta pahale maiM shahara Cho.Dakara bhAga jAtA hU.N, tAki yahAM kI bArUdI havA meM sAMsa na lenI pa.De.
isa bAra bhI maiM dillI se bhAga nikalA thA.
do dina bAda paMjAba se lauTA, aura jaise hI dillI ke qarIba pahu.NchA, merA dila baiTha gayA.
dIvAlI ke bAda kI dillI kA nAma mIDiyA meM gaisa chaiMbara ho gayA thA.
ho sakatA hai isameM kuCha sacha ho.
magara jaba taka mere phepha.De isa chaiMbara meM kAma kara rahe haiM, taba taka maiM itanI jaldI isa natIje para nahIM pahu.NchanA chAhU.NgA.
phira bhI saba kuCha pahale jaisA nahIM.
balki bahuta kuCha KarAba ho gayA hai.
piChale kuCha dinoM se roza subaha, jaba maiM bistara se uThakara khi.DakI se bAhara nazara DAlatA hU.N, to dhuMdha meM lipaTI imArateM gA.DiyAM aura loga, mujhe nirAshA se bhara dete haiM.
AMkhoM meM bevajaha jalana rahatI hai.
kama se kama merI yAda meM, pahale kabhI aisA nahIM huA thA.
maiMne yahAM piChale solaha sAla meM, behada ghanA koharA to dekhA hai, lekina itanA ghanA dhuMdha nahIM.
mujhe Dara hai ki merA asthamA, jo aba taka sirfa mausama badalane vAle para qahara DhAtA thA, aba achAnaka, kisI roza mujhe aspatAla na pahu.NchA de.

maiM khule aura havAdAra ghara kA himAyatI hU.N, para agara dhuAM ghara meM ghusane ko betAba ho, to daravAze aura khi.DakiyAM, baMda karanA hI shAyada aqlamaMdI hai, aura aba, maiMne ghara ke hara khi.DakI-daravAze ko, pUrI taraha sIla kara diyA hai.
magara, ghara ko sIla karane se samasyA to Katma nahIM hotI.
sAMsa lene ke lie havA to chAhie hI, aura lagatA hai, ki vo aba dillI meM nahIM hai.
maiM eyara pyorIfAyara KarIdane ke bAre meM socha rahA hU.N.
hAlAMki vo sirfa eka ChoTe se dAyare meM hI havA ko sAfa rakha sakate haiM.
pUre ghara ke lie aise kaI eyara pyorIfAyara chAhie.
magara havA KarIdane kI quvvata, hara shaKsa meM nahIM hotI.
pyorIfAyara nahIM to kyA mAska lagAkara, maiM apane taIM havA ChAna sakatA hU.N.
magara merA DaॉkTara isase ittifAka nahIM rakhatA.
unakA kahanA hai ki mAska, sirfa AMshika taura para hI dhueM ko nAka meM ghusane se roka sakatA hai.
phira bhI maiMne ise eka TrAI dene kI ThAnI hai.
sau nahIM, to pachAsa sATha fIsada taka, shAyada rAhata mila jAe.
mujhe Kuda se zyAdA chiMtA beTe kI hai, jisakA khAMsakara aura ChIMkakara, burA hAla hai.
usake skUla ne ChuTTiyoM kA ailAna kara diyA hai, tAki use aura usa jaise bachchoM ko, ghara ke bAhara gaMdI havA meM sAMsa na lenI pa.De.
bachchoM ko ba.DoM se zyAdA tAzI havA chAhie, tAki unake phepha.De tAqatavara baneM.
magara dillI kI havA unake phepha.DoM kI AzamAisha para utArU hai.
maiM aksara TraikiMga ke lie pahA.DoM para jAtA hU.N, magara vahAM merA dama nahIM phUlatA.
merA dama phUla rahA hai yahAM dillI kI sa.DakoM para.
sarakAreM logoM kI ukha.DatI sAMseM thAmane meM nAkAma dikha rahI haiM, aura aba, suprIma korTa ne taya kiyA hai ki vo isa jana ApAtakAla meM, kuCha karegA.

jaba taka suprIma korTa kuCha sochakara amala karane ko kahe, taba taka maiM socha rahA hU.N ki apanA inhelara baiga meM hI rakhU.N, tAki agara kisI vaqta merI sAMseM ukha.Dane lageM to maiM use istemAla kara sakU.N.
mujhe isa bAta kA afasosa hai ki aba sirfa dIvAlI para dillI Cho.Dane se kAma nahIM chalegA.
mahAtmA gAMdhI kI jitanI behatarIna tasvIreM Apane dekhI hoMgI, unake pIChe jo shaKsa the, vo aba isa duniyA meM nahIM rahe.
gAMdhI ke pautra behatarIna foTogrAfara aura nAsA ke pUrva vaij~nAnika, kanu rAmadAsa gAMdhI kA, somavAra shAma, nidhana ho gayA.
laMbe vaqta se bImAra chala rahe kanu, sattAsI barasa ke the.
kanu kA janma, sAla unnIsa sau satraha meM, mahAtmA gAMdhI ke bhatIje nArAyaNa gAMdhI, aura jamunA gAMdhI ke yahAM huA thA.
kanu jaba ChoTe the to unakI vo tasvIra behada mashahUra huI, jisameM vo dAMDI mArcha ke daurAna, mahAtmA gAMdhI kI lAThI paka.De hue Age-Age chala rahe haiM.
akTUbara meM unheM dila kA daurA pa.DA aura brena haimareja bhI huA, jisakI vajaha se, vo komA meM chale gae the.
mahAtmA gAMdhI ke sekreTarI ke taura para kAfI sAla kAma karane vAle kanu ne, unakI do hazAra se zyAdA tasvIreM lI thIM.
hAlAMki inameM se kaI tasvIreM sAloM taka gumanAma rahIM.
kaI dashaka pahale bhArata meM amarIkA ke tatkAlIna rAjadUta, jaॉna kenetha galabretha, kanu ko pa.DhAI ke lie amarIkA ke emaAITI le gae.
bAda meM unhoMne nAsA ke lie bhI kAma kiyA.
kanu gAMdhI ko unake mAtA-pitA ne bIsa sAla kI umra meM gAMdhI kI madada karane ko sevAgrAma bheja diyA thA.
vo meDikala kI pa.DhAI karanA chAhate the, lekina phira unheM foTogrAfI meM dilachaspI paidA ho gaI.
kanu gAMdhI Amataura para mahAtmA gAMdhI ke Asa pAsa hI rahate the.
aise meM kaI aise aMtaraMga aura ekAMta ke pala, unake kaimare meM qaida ho gae.
uttara-pashchima sImA prAMta meM eka bAra gAMdhI kI gA.DI, kuCha aise hI phaMsa gaI thI.
kanu gAMdhI ne mahAtmA gAMdhI ke sAtha, desha-duniyA jagaha jagaha yAtrAeM kI.
gAMdhI ke jIvana ke aMtima dashaka meM kaI ahama ghaTanAeM aura kShaNa guzare.
kanu kI tasvIroM meM, una sabakI kahAnI qaida hai.
mahAtmA gAMdhI bhArata meM dalitoM kI maujUdA dashA ke prati KAse chiMtita rahA karate the.
unhoMne unnIsa sau paiMtAlIsa ChiyAlIsa ke daurAna, tIna mahIne laMbI rela yAtrA kI, aura jagaha-jagaha jAkara dhana juTAyA thA.
isI saMdarbha meM unhoMne eka bAra kahA thA, maiM baniyA hUM, mere lobha kA koI aMta nahIM hai.

ChattIsaga.Dha ke bastara meM pulisa ne dillI vishvavidyAlaya kI profesara, naMdinI suMdara aura jeenayU kI profesara, archanA prasAda sameta, Chaha logoM ke KilAfa eka grAmINa kI hatyA kA mAmalA darja kiyA hai.
pulisa ke anusAra, darabhA kShetra ke grAma nAmA meM shukravAra kI rAta, saMdigdha mAovAdiyoM ne, sAmanAtha baghela kI hatyA kara dI thI.
sAmanAtha baghela ne apane gAMva ke logoM ke sAtha milakara, mAovAdiyoM ke KilAfa TaMgiyA grupa banAyA thA.

pulisa ke eka adhikArI ne batAyA, sAmanAtha baghela kI patnI kI shikAyata para, toMgapAla thAne meM profesara naMdinI sundara, profesara archanA prasAda, sIpIema netA saMjaya parAte, vinIta tivArI, maMjU kavAsI, aura maMgala rAma karmA ke KilAfa, aparAdha darja kiyA gayA hai.
mArksavAdI kamyunisTa pArTI ke netA saMjaya parAte ne, ina AropoM kA khaMDana kiyA hai.
saMjaya parAte ne kahA, bastara kI pulisa janavAdI tAqatoM aura bastara meM shoShaNa ke KilAfa AvAza uThAne vAloM ko, isa taraha ke jhUThe mAmale meM phaMsAne kA ShaDayaMtra racha rahI hai.
lekina hama, aisI koshishoM se Darane vAle nahIM haiM.
isa sAla maI meM naMdinI suMdara sameta dUsare logoM ne sautanAra nAmA aura kumAkoleMga kA daurA kiyA thA.

sAmanAtha sameta dUsare grAmINoM ne kathita rUpa se, pulisa meM shikAyata darja karAI thI, ki naMdinI suMdara aura dUsare logoM ne grAmINoM ko pulisa ke KilAfa bha.DakAyA, aura mAovAdiyoM kA sAtha dene ke lie, grAmINoM ko ukasAyA.
hAlAMki naMdinI suMdara, aura dUsare logoM ne ina AropoM ko, jhUThA batAyA thA.
piChale do dashaka se bastara meM akAdamika shodha karane vAlI naMdinI suMdara ne, bastara ke nRRivij~nAna itihAsa saMskRRiti aura sAmAjika-rAjanItika muddoM ko lekara, kaI kitAbeM likhIM haiM.
isake alAvA unhoMne bastara ke AdivAsiyoM se ju.De kaI muddoM para, suprIma korTa meM yAchikAeM bhI dAyara kI haiM.

naMdinI suMdara kI yAchikA para hI, kathita rUpa se mAovAdiyoM ke KilAfa sarakAra ke saMrakShaNa meM chalane vAle, hathiyArabaMda AMdolana, salavA ju.DUma ko, suprIma korTa ne baMda karane kA nirdesha diyA thA.

suprIma korTa ne sarakAra kI ka.DI AlochanA kI thI, ki usane, AdivAsiyoM ko nijI senA kI taraha, hathiyAra thamA die the, aura unheM GairaqAnUnI tarIqe se kathita rUpa se mAovAdiyoM ke KilAfa, yuddha ke maidAna meM dhakela diyA thA.

isake alAvA piChale mahIne hI sIbIAI ne naMdinI suMdara kI yAchikA para, suprIma korTa meM apanI eka riporTa pesha kI thI, jisake mutAbika sAla do hazAra gyAraha meM, tA.DameTalA gAMva meM, visheSha pulisa adhikAriyoM ne do sau bAvana adhikAriyoM ke ghara jalA die the.
isake alAvA ina gAMvoM meM kuCha logoM kI hatyA aura balAtkAra kI ghaTanAeM, sAmane AI thIM.
isake bAda pulisa mahAnideshaka ne, doShI visheSha pulisa adhikAriyoM ko, lAina aTaicha karane, aura unakI barkhAstagI ke Adesha die the.
isake khilAfa vardIdhArI pulisa javAnoM ne, naMdinI suMdara, aura dUsare sAmAjika aura rAjanItika logoM ke, putale jalAe the.
bhArata prashAsita kashmIra meM chala rahe virodha pradarshanoM ke bIcha, ye eka anokhI bAta hai.

aKabAra ke mutAbiqa, julAI meM hizbula mujAhiddIna kamAMDara, burahAna vAnI kI mauta ke bAda hue bhArata prashAsita kashmIra meM, virodha pradarshanoM ke bIcha, kama se kama, untIsa skUloM ko saMdigdha taura para Aga lagA dI gaI thI.
aba kashmIra ghATI meM shikShakoM se skUloM kI chaukIdArI karane ko kahA gayA hai.
ina shikShakoM se AgazanI se skUloM ko bachAne ke lie rAta meM bhI chaukIdArI karane ko kahA gayA hai.
shikShakoM ke mutAbiqa, pUrI ghATI ke skUloM meM ye nirdesha die gae haiM, ki surakShA kA zimmA shikShakoM kA hogA.
ye nirdesha shrInagara ke mukhya shikShA adhikArI, Arifa iqabAla malika kI tarafa se jArI kie gae haiM.
dakShiNa koriyA meM diggaja ilekTraॉnika kaMpanI saimasaMga ke daftaroM para ChApe mAre gae haiM.
ye rAShTrapati pArka guena-hAe se saMbaMdhita eka siyAsI skaiMDala meM ho rahI jAMcha kA hissA haiM.
abhiyojaka ina AropoM kI jAMcha kara rahe haiM, jinake mutAbiqa saimasaMga ne, rAShTrapati pArka kI qarIbI dosta aura sahAyaka, choI sUna-sila kI beTI ko nAjAyaza tarIqe se vittIya madada dI.
choI isa pUre siyAsI bavAla ke keMdra meM haiM.
una para ilzAma hai, ki unhoMne siyAsata meM daKala dene, aura bizanesa Doneshana hAsila karane ke lie, rAShTrapati se apanI dostI kA istemAla kiyA.
udhara saimasaMga kA kahanA hai ki vo jAMcha meM pUrA sahayoga degI.
praॉsikyUTara ऑfisa ke pravaktA ne samAchAra ejeMsI, eefapI ko batAyA, hama saimasaMga ilekTraॉniksa ke daftaroM kI talAshI le rahe haiM.
hAlAMki unhoMne isakA byorA dene se inakAra kara diyA.
mIDiyA riporToM ke mutAbiqa, saimasaMga ne saMbhavataH pArka kI qarIbI choI ke lie aTThAisa lAkha yUro kA iMtazAma kiyA, tAki unakI beTI, jarmanI meM ikyesTriyana TreniMga le sakeM.
choI farzI mAmale aura tAqata kA durupayoga karane ke Aropa meM filahAla hirAsata meM haiM.
isa siyAsI tUfAna ne pArka ke lie hAlAta kAfI KarAba banA die haiM, aura unase istIfA dene kI mAMga kI jA rahI hai.

amarIkA meM ATha navaMbara ko hone vAle rAShTrapati chunAva ke lie, prachAra abhiyAna ke AKirI dina, ripablikana pArTI ummIdavAra DonalDa TraMpa, aura DemokreTika pArTI kI pratyAshI, hilerI kliMTana, apane-apane samarthakoM ke sAtha, railiyAM kara rahe haiM.

navInatama sarvekShaNoM se saMketa milatA hai ki hilerI kliMTana ne, apane pratidvaMdvI, DonalDa TraMpa para, chAra aMkoM kI ba.Dhata banA lI hai, lekina bIbIsI saMvAdadAtAoM kA kahanA hai, ki hilerI kI sabase ba.DI dikqata, una logoM ko matadAna keMdroM taka lAnA hai, jo voTa DAlane ke ichChuka hI nahIM haiM.

floriDA meM eka chunAvI railI ko saMbodhita karate hue TraMpa ne kahA hai, ki amarIkI logoM ko tAka para rakhakara, viphala rAjanItika taMtra phalatA-phUlatA gayA, aura aba ye samaya la.Dakara, use harAne kA hai.

vahIM hilerI kliMTana ne penasilveniyA meM apane samarthakoM ko saMbodhita karate hue kahA hai, ki logoM ko apane aura apane parivAra ke bhaviShya ko dhyAna meM rakhate hue voTa denA chAhie, kyoMki jaba ve voTa DAleMge, to vo voTa kisI vyakti nahIM, balki muddoM ke samarthana meM hogA.

paMjAba meM dasa navaMbara ko sikha samudAya ke dhArmika Ayojana, sarabata khAlasA bulAne kA ailAna kiyA gayA hai, lekina isase pahale pulisa ne Ayojana se ju.De, do sau se zyAdA kAryakartAoM ko giraftAra kiyA hai.

paMjAba meM eDIjIpI haradIpa siMha DhilloM ne kahA, ki priveMshana ekTa ke tahata, eka sau sattara logoM ko giraph़tAra kiyA gayA hai, jinameM, sarabata khAlasA ke AyojakoM meM se, eka dhyAna siMha maMDa bhI haiM.
vahIM paMjAba sarakAra ne sarabata khAlasA ke Ayojana ke lie, paMjAba ke bhaThiMDA zile meM, talavaMDI sAbo meM jagaha dene se manA kara diyA hai.
paMjAba sarakAra ke isa faisale ke KilAfa sarabata khAlasA bulAne vAle, shiromaNi akAlI dala ke pradhAna, simaranajIta siMha mAna ne, paMjAba hariyANA hAIkorTa kA daravAzA khaTakhaTAyA hai.
hAIkorTa ne isa mAmale meM faisalA, maMgalavAra taka sthagita kara diyA hai.
mAnA jA rahA hai, ki sarabata khAlasA bulAne vAle netA, jagaha na milane kI sUrata meM, isakA Ayojana kisI aura rAjya, jaise ki hariyANA meM bhI kara sakate haiM.

sarabata khAlasA bulAne vAle netAoM meM, simaranajIta siMha mAna ke alAvA, paMthika sevA lahara ke adhyakSha, balajIta siMha dAduvAla, yUnAiTeDa akAlI dala ke adhyakSha, bhAI mohakama siMha, aura dhyAna siMha maMDa haiM.
ina netAoM ne paMjAba sarakAra kI kathita nAkAmiyoM, aura akAla takhta ke jatthedAroM ke khilAfa, sarabata khAlasA bulAyA hai.
unakA Aropa hai ki jatthedAra nAkAma haiM, aura sikha gurudvArA prabaMdhaka kameTI, sikhoM ke muddoM para kAma karane meM, viphala rahI hai.
sarabata khAlasA ko lekara, vivAda hotA rahA hai, ki kauna isakA Ayojana kara sakatA hai.
jAnakAra kahate haiM ki sirfa akAla takhta ko hI, sarabata khAlasA bulAne kA adhikAra hai, kyoMki akAla takhta, sikhoM kI sarvochcha dhArmika saMsthA hai.
isake mukhiyA ko jatthedAra kahate haiM.
vo anya pramukha sikha pratinidhiyoM ke sAtha, dharma aura maryAdA se ju.De faisale lete haiM jo sabhI sikhoM para, bAdhya hote haiM.
sarabata khAlasA meM duniyAbhara se sikha samudAya ke saMgaThanoM ke pratinidhiyoM ko bulAyA jAtA hai.

piChale sAla, navaMbara meM taranatArana meM sarabata khAlasA bulAyA gayA thA, jisameM akAla takhta ne, sirasA DerA sachchA saudA ke pramukha, guramIta rAma rahIma kI eka Apattijanaka tasvIra, aura guru graMtha sAhiba kI beadabI ke mAmaloM ko uThAyA thA.
isameM maMcha, garamakhyAlI logoM ke hAthoM chalA gayA thA, jisake bAda haMgAmA huA thA.
aba paMjAba sarakAra, kisI bhI taraha ke haMgAme se bachane ke lie, isa taraha ke kAryakrama ko rukavAnA chAhatI hai.
keMdra sarakAra ne faisalA kiyA hai ki shukravAra se, sirfa do hazAra rUpae hI badale jA sakeMge.
isa samaya eka dina meM loga sA.Dhe chAra hazAra rUpae badala sakate haiM, lekina shukravAra se, yaha sImA, kama kara ke do hazAra rUpae kara dI gaI hai.
sarakAra kA kahanA hai ki kaI loga, bAra bAra paise badala rahe haiM, jise rokane ke lie, ye kadama, uThAyA gayA hai.
ye pUChe jAne para, ki kyA sarakAra ke pAsa kaisha kI kamI hai, to presa vArtA kara rahe shashikAMta dAsa ne kahA, ki aisA bilkula nahIM hai, aura sarakAra ke pAsa paryApta kaisha, upalabdha hai.
Arthika mAmaloM ke maMtrAlaya meM, sachiva shaktikAMta dAsa ne, sarakAra ke aura kadamoM kI jAnakArI dete hue batAyA, ki shAdiyoM ke lie, DhAI lAkha rUpae nikAle jA sakate haiM.
unhoMne ye bhI batAyA, ki jo vyApArI rejisTarDa haiM, vo eka bAra meM, pachAsa hazAra rUpae, nikAla sakeMge.
pAkistAnI mIDiyA ne, bhArata prashAsita kashmIra meM, logoM para ho rahe kathita atyAchAra ko lekara, jArI kie gae eka gIta para, Kabara kI hai.

isa gIta ko, kashmIra eMthama saॉnga, batAyA jA rahA hai, jise pAkistAna prashAsita kashmIra kI rAjadhAnI, muzaffarAbAda meM, rAShTrapati saradAra masUda KAna kI maujUdagI meM, chaudaha navaMbara ko rilIza kiyA gayA thA.
mIDiyA riporTsa ke mutAbiqa, isa gAne ko, kathita taura para kashmIrI logoM para, bhArata sarakAra dvArA kie jA rahe zulma ke KilAfa, eka AvAza dene ke lie, banAyA gayA hai.
gAne ke nirmAtA, nAmI kalAkAra, umara ehasAna haiM.
umara ne apanI fesabuka vaॉla para, isa gAne ko kashmIra ke charamapaMthI netA, burahAna vAnI ko samarpita kiyA thA.
burahAna ko, bhAratIya fauja ne ATha julAI ko, kathita enakAuMTara meM mAra girAyA thA, jisake bAda, bhArata prashAsita kashmIra meM karIba chAra mahIne taka ashAMti rahI.
bIbIsI se bAta karate hue, umara ehasAna ne kahA, hameM ummIda thI, ki ziMdagI ko tarase kashmIrI logoM kI AvAza bulaMda karane ke lie, bhAratIya kalAkAra, sAmane AeMge.
lekina kuCha logoM ne aisI koshisha kI, to bhAratIya janatA, nArAza ho gaI.
hamane kashmIriyoM para gAnA banAne kA pahalA haqa bhArata ko hI diyA thA.
tAki hukUmateM ye nahIM samajheM, ki zulma karane se, nasleM miTAI jA sakatI haiM.
umara, pAkistAna prashAsita kashmIra meM, bataura samAjasevI kAma karate rahe haiM.
unakA kahanA hai ki pAkistAna ke besTa saMgItakAroM ne milakara isa gIta ko taiyAra kiyA hai.
ye mazahaba kA gIta nahIM hai, balki iMsAnoM kA gIta hai.

pAkistAnI aKabAra Daॉna meM, paMdraha navaMbara ko ChapI Kabara ke mutAbiqa, chUMki bahuta se pAkistAnI kalAkAra bhArata ke lie bhI kAma karate haiM, aise meM zyAdAtara kalAkAra, shurUAta meM isa gAne ke lie taiyAra nahIM hue.
bAda meM isa gAne ko, nAmI saMgItakAra alI azamata, umara jasavAla, aura elisiyA DAyasa kI AvAza meM rikaॉrDa kiyA gayA.
kaI riporTsa meM likhA gayA hai, ki isa gAne ke saMgItakAra, jasavAla ke fesabuka peja se, hazAroM bhAratIya kadradAnoM ne, Kuda ko alaga kara liyA hai.
kaI pAkistAnI chainaloM para dikhAyA gayA, ki rAShTrapati saradAra masUda KAna ne, isa gAne kI tArIfa kI hai.
sAtha hI pAkistAna ke logoM se, kashmIra ke saMgharSha meM unakA sAtha dene kI apIla kI hai.
isa bIcha soshala mIDiyA para, kashmIra samarthaka isa gIta ko jamakara sheyara kara rahe haiM.
GarIba sAfa amIra ke lona mAfa, TviTara para ye haishaTaiga KAsA TreMDa kara rahA hai.
mIDiyA meM A rahI kaI riporToM ke mutAbiqa, udyogapati vijaya mAlyA kA sAta hazAra karo.Da rupae kA baiMka lona mAfa kara diyA gayA hai.
isa para vitta maMtrI aruNa jeTalI ne, budhavAra ko saMsada meM safAI dete hue kahA thA, lona mAfa nahIM kiyA gayA hai.
hama aba bhI, rikavarI ke prayAsa, kara rahe haiM.
basa farka ye hai, ki AdhikArika praviShTi meM, ise parafArmiMga aseTa se, naॉna paraphaॉrmiMga aseTa meM, badala diyA gayA hai.
lekina lagatA hai soshala mIDiyA para loga aruNa jeTalI ke isa tarka se sahamata nahIM hue.
raviMdara nAma ke TviTara yUzara likhate haiM, pyAre sTeTa baiMka ऑfa iMDiyA, lAina meM laga kara, vijaya mAlyA kA lona chukatA karane ke lie, dhanyavAda.
abhaya tomara likhate haiM, apane garIba mitroM aMbAnI aDAnI mAlyA kA kara mAfa karane vAloM, hamAre amIra mitra kisAna kA bhI karza mAfa karo.
ApakA raUfa nAma ke TviTara haiMDala kA TvITa kuCha yUM rahA, lona ke paisoM kA janatA kare bhugatAna, udyogapatiyoM ke paise sarakAra kare mAfa.
paraveza KAna faramAte haiM, Ama janatA ko lAina meM lagA kara, vijaya mAlyA jaise ba.De karzadAroM kA lona mAfa karake, sTeTa baiMka ऑfa iMDiyA ne jo dariyAdilI kA sabUta diyA hai, usako salAma.
pAkistAna ke pradhAnamaMtrI navAza sharIfa ke videsha mAmaloM ke salAhakAra, saratAja azIza amRRitasara meM tIna aura chAra disaMbara ko hone vAlI, hArTa ऑfa eshiyA kaॉnfreMsa meM, hissA leMge.
da iMDiyana eksapresa ne isa Kabara ko, pahale panne para jagaha dI hai.
aKabAra ke mutAbika, janavarI meM paThAnakoTa meM hue hamale ke bAda se, pAkistAna kI ora se ye pahalA maMtristIya daurA hogA.
paThAnakoTa meM hue hamale ke bAda se hI, bhArata aura pAkistAna ke bIcha prastAvita dvipakShIya bAtachIta kI prakriyA paTarI se utara gaI thI.
isa Kabara ke hI sAtha, da iMDiyana eksapresa ne, eka baॉksa Kabara lagAI hai, jisakI surkhI hai, bhAratIya sImA ke pAsa pAka senA kA abhyAsa.

aKabAra ke mutAbika, bhAratIya sImA ke qarIba, bahAvalapura meM pAkistAnI senA pramukha, rAhila sharIfa ke sAtha senA ke abhyAsa meM sharIka hue, pAkistAna ke pradhAnamaMtrI, navAza sharIpha ne kahA, ki dushmana ke kisI bhI dussAhasI kadama kA mAkUla javAba diyA jAegA.
da sTeTsamaina ne jAnakArI dI hai, ki bhAratIya videsha maMtrI suShamA svarAja ke gurdoM ke pratyAropaNa ke lie, emsa meM TesTa hue haiM.
aKabAra ne emsa kI ora se jArI bayAna ke havAle se batAyA hai, ki abhI, isa prakriyA meM kuCha vakta laga sakatA hai, kyoMki gurdA dene vAle kI talAsha ho rahI hai.
hiMdustAna TAimsa ne saMsada ke shItakAlIna satra ke pahale dina se ju.DI Kabara ko pahalI Kabara, banAyA hai.
Kabara kI surkhI kahatI hai, vipakSha ne kahA, desha Arthika arAjakatA kI chapeTa meM hai.
aKabAra ke mutAbika, budhavAra ko vipakShI daloM ne noTabaMdI ko lekara, pradhAnamaMtrI nareMdra modI ko nishAne para liyA.

hiMdustAna TAimsa ke mutAbika, vipakShI daloM ne sarakAra para Aropa lagAyA, ki sarakAra ne isa kadama kI jAnakArI, bIjepI ke dostoM ko pahale hI de dI thI, aura isa faisale kI jAMcha karAne kI mAMga kI.
hiMdustAna TAimsa ne isase ju.DI eka aura Kabara meM batAyA, ki dillI meM noTabaMdI ke bAda se, aparAdhoM meM kamI AI hai.
TAimsa ऑfa iMDiyA kI Kabara ke mutAbika, noTabaMdI se ju.DI ghaTanAoM meM, bIte chaubIsa ghaMTe ke daurAna, sAta anya logoM kI mauta ho gaI.
aKabAra ke mutAbika, maMgalavAra ko uttara pashchima dillI meM apane do bachchoM kI kathita taura para sote vakta jAna le lI.
pulisa ke mutAbika, mukesha siMha nAma kA ye vyakti, do dina eTIema se paise nikAlane meM nAkAma rahA, aura ise lekara pareshAna thA.
da hiMdU ke mutAbika vitta maMtrI aruNa jeTalI ne kahA hai, ki sarakAra ne udyogapati vijaya mAlyA kI kiMgafishara eyaralAinsa ko, diyA gayA RRiNa, mAfa nahIM kiyA hai.
eyaralAinsa para baiMkoM kA kaI karo.Da rupaye bakAyA hai.
TAimsa ऑfa iMDiyA ke mutAbika chIna ne, chAinA opana chaiMpiyanashipa meM hissA lene vAlI, bhAratIya baiDamiMTana TIma ke mainejara chune gae bAmAMga tAgo ko, vIzA dene se manA kara diyA hai.
vo aruNAchala pradesha rAjya baiDamiMTana esosieshana ke sachiva bhI haiM.
dillI sthita chInI dUtAvAsa ne batAyA hai, ki aruNAchala ke DomisAila kI vajaha se, unheM vIzA, nahIM diyA gayA hai.
hiMdustAna TAimsa kI Kabara ke mutAbika eka mahilA chAlaka ne kathita taura para, nashe kI hAlata meM pAMcha logoM para gA.DI cha.DhA dI.
inameM se do logoM kI mauke para mauta ho gaI.
ye loga eka flAIovara para kAma kara rahe the.
hAdasA rAShTrIya rAjamArga saMkhyA eka para karanAla ke karIba huA.
sIriyA meM sarakAra vidrohiyoM ke adhikAra vAle pUrvI eleppo meM, sarakArI vimAnoM se hue hamale meM, eka aspatAla, blaDa baiMka, aura eMbuleMsa ko nishAnA banAe jAne kI Kabara hai.
ina hamaloM meM pAMcha bachchoM sameta kama se kama, ikkIsa logoM kI mauta kI Kabara hai.
jabaki piChale do dino meM battIsa loga mAre jA chuke haiM.
bAyAna chilDransa haॉspiTala ke nideshaka kA kahanA hai, ki vo bAhara nahIM nikala pA rahe haiM, aura bachane ke lie tahaKAne meM Chipe haiM.
briTena sthita sIriyana ऑbzaraveTrI faॉra hyUmana rAiTsa kA kahanA hai, ki kama se kama ikkIsa logoM kI mauta ho chukI hai.
sIriyA meM kaI saMsthAnoM kI madada karane vAlI da iMDipeMDeMTa DaॉkTarsa esosieshana ke mutAbiqa, bAyAna chilDransa haॉspiTala, burI taraha kShatigrasta huA hai.
isane aspatAla ke nideshaka DaॉkTara hAtima ke havAle se batAyA hai ki vo tahaKAne meM phaMse hue haiM.
unhoMne kahA, hamAre Upara vimAna haiM.
hama bAhara nahIM jA sakate haiM.
shAyada hama Kuda ko isa kamare meM bhI surakShita nahIM rakha sakate haiM.
sIriyA sivila DifeMsa ke bachAvakarmiyoM kA kahanA hai ki karama ala-bIka meM, eka chikitsAkarmI kI mauta ho gaI.
sIriyA kI sarakAra ke sahayogI desha rUsa ke elAna ke bAda, tIna hafte taka chale saMgharSha virAma ke bAda, maMgalavAra se yahAM havAI hamale, dobArA shurU hue haiM.
rUsa ne pashchimI sIriyA meM jihAdI charamapaMthiyoM ke KilAfa ba.DA abhiyAna shurU karane kA bhI elAna kiyA.
isameM eyarakraॉfTa kariyara ko bhI pahalI bAra istemAla kiyA gayA.
kisI vaqta eleppo sIriyA kA vANijyika aura audyogika keMdra thA.
sAla do hazAra bAraha meM, eleppo moTe taura para do hissoM meM baMTa gayA.
inameM se pashchimI hisse meM sIriyA kI sarakAra kA adhikAra hai jabaki pUrvI hisse para vidrohiyoM kA niyaMtraNa hai.
bIte sAla sIriyA kI senA ne, IrAna ke samarthana vAle la.DAkoM aura rUsa ke havAI hamaloM kI madada se avarodha kI sthiti ko Katma kiyA.
bItI bAIsa sitaMbara ko sarakArI senA ne shahara ko pUrI taraha se niyaMtraNa meM lene ke lie AkrAmaka abhiyAna kI shuruAta kI.
isake pahale do haph़toM taka sarakArI senA ne pUrvI eleppo kI gherebaMdI kI, jisameM yahAM rahane vAle qarIba do lAkha pachahattara hazAra loga phaMsa gae.
sIriyA kI sarakArI senA aura rUsa ne, aThAraha aktUbara ko havAI hamale baMda kara die, jisase Ama loga aura vidrohI, shahara se bAhara jA sakeM, lekina isa daurAna, bahuta hI kama loga bAhara Ae.

saMyukta rAShTra ke mutAbiqa, mahIne ke AKira taka, pUrvI eleppo meM hue havAI hamaloM aura bamabArI meM, sAta sau se j़yAdA logoM kI mauta huI, jabaki pashchimI eleppo para hue raॉkeTa hamale meM bhI, kaI logoM kI jAna gaI.
mAnavAdhikAra kAryakartAoM kA kahanA hai, ki maMgalavAra se sarakArI senA ne dobArA havAI hamale shurU kie, jinameM kama se kama, gyAraha logoM kI mauta ho gaI.
isabIcha, sarakArI mIDiyA ne Kabara dI, ki zamInI kArravAI ke lie kaI morchoM para ba.DI saMkhyA meM sainikoM ko tainAta kiyA gayA hai.
nigarAnI samUha sIriyana ऑbjaraveTrI kA kahanA hai, ki budhavAra ko kaI ilAqoM meM vimAnoM se misAileM dAGI gaIM aura helikaॉpTara se bama girAe gae.
da sIriyana ऑbjaraveTrI kA kahanA hai ki bATabo gAMva meM, kama se kama unnIsa logoM kI mauta huI hai.
keMdra sarakAra kI ora se pAMcha sau aura hazAra ke purAne noToM para lagAI gaI pAbaMdI para, saMsada ke bAhara hI nahIM, aMdara bhI charchA, garma rahI.
saMsada ke shItakAlIna satra ke pahale dina budhavAra ko, vibhinna rAjanItika daloM ne, sarakAra ke isa faisale kI niMdA kI.
vipakSha ne ise Arthika ApAtakAla batAte hue sarakAra para Aropa lagAyA, ki purAne noToM para pAbaMdI lagAne se pahale, chune hue logoM ko pahale se jAnakArI dI gaI hai.
charchA ke daurAna mAMga kI gaI, ki noTa para pAbaMdI kI jAMcha, saMyukta saMsadIya samiti yAnI jepIsI se honI chAhie.

nyUyaॉrka ke meyara bila De blAsiyo ne, amarIkA ke nava-nirvAchita rAShTrapati, DonalDa TraMpa se mulAkAta kara kahA hai, ki nyUyaॉrka ke loga, isa bAta se Dare hue haiM, ki nayA prashAsana kaise kAma karegA.

De blAsiyo ne batAyA, ki baiThaka ke daurAna, unhoMne TraMpa se spaShTa kahA hai, ki vo aise pravAsI logoM ko unake deshoM meM vApasa bheje jAne kA virodha kareMge, jinake pAsa paryApta dastAveza nahIM haiM.
blAsiyo kA kahanA thA ki pravAsiyoM ke lie TraMpa kI yojanAeM, nyUyaॉrka jaise shahara meM kAma nahIM kareMgI jo pravAsiyoM ke lie sabase achChI jagaha hai.

TraMpa ne, rAShTrapati pada kA chunAva jItane ke bAda kahA thA, ki vo una sabhI pravAsiyoM ko jela meM DAla deMge, yA unake desha vApasa bheja deMge, jinakA AparAdhika rikArDa hai, aura aise logoM kI saMkhyA, tIsa lAkha taka hai.
hAlAMki ye AMka.DA, kAfI vivAdAspada hai.
mAigreshana paॉlisI iMsTiTyUTa kA kahanA hai, ki binA dastAveza vAle pravAsI jo AparAdhika rikaॉrDa ke sAtha haiM, unakI vAstavika saMkhyA ATha lAkha bIsa hazAra hai.
inameM vo loga bhI shAmila haiM, jo avaidha rUpa se sarahada pAra hue haiM.
isa mAmale meM kevala bila De blAsiyo hI nahIM haiM jo TraMpa kI pravAsI nIti kA virodha kara rahe haiM.
laॉsa eMjalsa, saina frAMsisko, shikAgo, bosTana, filaDelfiyA, aura vaॉshiMgaTana DIsI ke meyaroM ne bhI vAdA kiyA hai, ki ve apane shahara ke logoM kI hara hAla meM surakShA kareMge.
blAsiyo TraMpa kI jIta ke bAda, nyU yaॉrka meM pravAsiyoM ke pakSha meM khulakara A gae haiM.
TraMpa kI jIta ke bAda, unhoMne shahara ke DeTAbesa se, binA dastAvezoM vAle pravAsiyoM kA nAma haTA diyA thA, tAki unheM kisI bhI taraha kI dikqata kA sAmanA nahIM karanA pa.De.
nyUyaॉrka ke udAra DemokreTa bila De blAsiyo ne, TraMpa se sAtha, eka ghaMTe kI laMbI mITiMga ke bAda, patrakAroM se bAta kI.
unhoMne kahA, maiMne unase doharAyA ki nyUyaॉrka sameta, amarIkA ke anya shaharoM ke nivAsiyoM kI surakShA honI chAhie, aura unheM bedakhala nahIM kiyA jAnA chAhie.
nyUyaॉrka meM rAShTrIya ausata ke muqAbale tIna gunA j़yAdA videshI mUla ke loga haiM.
aisA isalie huA ki ye sabhI ke lie khulA thA.
isa shahara ko banAne meM, pravAsiyoM kI pI.DhiyA dara pIDhiyAM shAmila rahI haiM.
unhoMne kahA ki TraMpa apane gRRiha nagara nyUyaॉrka se pyAra karate haiM.
hAlAMki nyUyaॉrka ke logoM ne hilarI kliMTana ko voTa kiyA thA.
sIriyA meM jArI saMgharSha ke bIcha bachapana kho sA gayA hai.
amarIkI rAjya kailiforniyA aura erizonA ke kuCha hissoM meM, pahale se hI eka dIvAra maujUda hai.
amarIkI rAShTrapati ke chunAva meM, meksiko sImA para dIvAra banAne kA vivAdAspada muddA, ripablikana ummIdavAra, DonalDa TraMpa ne zorashora se uThAyA.
kailiforniyA aura erizonA sUbe ke kuCha hissoM meM dIvAra pahale se maujUda hai.
ye patharIle registAna, reta ke TIloM, mIloM taka phaile khetoM se hokara guzaratI hai.
usa pAra se isa pAra dAKila hone ke rAstoM para spainisha aura aMgrezI meM likhe sAina borDa dikha pa.Date haiM.
mAlamU pa.Da jAtA hai, ki bhale hI shahara do Tuka.DoM meM baMTa gayA ho, lekina vo abhI bhI, kahIM eka dUsare se ju.DA huA hai.
meksiko aura amarIkA kI do hazAra mIla laMbI sarahada saina DiyAgo, kailiforniyA, brAuMsavile, aura TeksAsa se hokara guzaratI hai.
isa sImA kI nigarAnI ke lie chaubIsa ghaMTe seMsara kAma karate haiM, kaimare nazara rakhate haiM, aura saiMka.DoM kasTama aura sImA surakShA adhikArI, mustaida rahate haiM.
kailiforniyA aura erizonA ke TraMpa samarthaka isa bAta se sahamata haiM, ki dIvAra banAne kA kharcha, meksiko uThAe.
lekina kaI loga isase pareshAna bhI haiM, jinameM meksiko kI sarakAra bhI eka hai.
eka DemokreTa samarthaka ne kahA, ki sImA para chaukasI kI bahuta zyAdA bAta kie jAne se, shikShA aura svAsthya jaise muddoM se, logoM kA dhyAna haTane kI AshaMkA hai.
khAnA eka buniyAdI zarUrata hai.
isake lie iMsAna ne kyA-kyA nahIM kiyA.
eka zamAnA thA jaba iMsAna ke pAsa khAne ke lie chuniMdA chIzeM huA karatI thIM.
lekina Aja duniyA bhara meM itanI taraha ke khAne haiM ki aMdAzA taka lagAnA mushki़la hai.
iMsAna vajUda meM AyA, to kaMda-mUla khAkara guzArA karatA thA.
phira vo shikAra karane lagA.
lekina jaise-jaise samajha ba.DhI, usakA khAne kA aMdAza bhI badalA.
aura isake sAtha hI, pUrI mAnava jAti, hameshA ke lie badala gaI.
Aga kI khoja ne isa dishA meM aura ahama rola nibhAyA.
iMsAna ne khAnA bhUna kara khAnA shurU kiyA.
iMsAna ke itihAsa meM Aga ke bAda, dUsarA ahama qadama thA khetI.
pakA huA khAnA pachAnA AsAna hotA thA.
lihAzA iMsAna ne, shAkAhArI khAnA bhI pakAkara khAnA shurU kara diyA.
khAne ke badalate mizAja ne, iMsAna ko khetI-bA.DI karanA sikhA diyA.
kAshtakArI ke sAtha hI, iMsAna ne AsAna khetI ke lie bahuta se auzAra bhI banAe.
hala se khetI karanA aura AsAna ho gayA.
khetI ke sAtha hI ChoTe-ChoTe gAMva basane shurU hue.
dhIre-dhIre ye gAMva, qasboM meM, aura qasbe, shaharoM meM badala gae.
dekhate hI dekhate sabhyatAoM kA udaya huA.
AbAdI tezI se ba.Dhane lagI.
ba.DhatI AbAdI ke lie ba.DI mAtrA meM khAne kI zarUrata thI.
isake lie khAne kA vyApAra shurU huA.
pakA huA khAnA jaba eka jagaha se dUsarI jagaha jAtA thA, to usake KarAba hone kA Dara rahatA thA.
isa mushkila se pAra pAne ke lie, aise bartana banAe gae, jinameM khAnA laMbe samaya taka ThIka rahatA thA.
sAtha hI gharoM meM istemAla hone vAle refrijareTara bhI banane lage.
eka samaya thA, jaba khAnA pakAne yA garma karane ke lie ghaMToM lagate the.
lekina Aja, mAikroveva chaMda minaTa lagAtA hai.
khAnA khAne kI Adata badalane ke sAtha hI, khAnA banAne, aura use rakhane ke tarIqe bhI, badalane lage.
hareka fasala bAraha mahIne kI nahIM hotI.
lihAzA, jo phala-sabzI eka mausama meM Katma ho jAte the, aba unake lie dUsarI fasala pakane kA iMtazAra nahIM karanA pa.DatA.
kyoMki bahuta se tarIqe apanA kara, khAne-pIne kI chIzoM ko saMrakShita kara liyA jAtA hai.
jaise unnIsa sau chaurAnave meM, TamATara ko saMrakShita karane ke lie bahuta se tarIqe istemAla hue.
iMsAna kI khAnA khAne kI Adata ne, iMsAniyata ko pUrI taraha se badala DAlA hai.
khAne-pIne kI upalabdhatA kI vajaha se Aja iMsAna duniyA ke kone-kone meM base haiM.
AbAdI ba.Dha gaI hai.
iMsAna bAqI qudarata para rAja kara rahe haiM.
lekina, isakA bhArI nuqasAna bhI huA hai.
dharatI ke mAhaula para bhI isakA asara pa.DA hai.
Aja ba.De paimAne para khAnA banAne ke lie bahuta taraha kI mashInoM kA istemAla kiyA jA rahA hai.
inake istemAla se, aisI gaiseM nikalatI haiM, jo dharatI ko nuqasAna pahuMchAtI haiM.
ba.DhatI AbAdI kI KurAqa pUrI karane ke lie paidAvAra ba.DhAI jA rahI hai.
taraha-taraha ke kemikala kA istemAla kiyA jA rahA hai, tAki fasala KarAba nA ho.
jaise-jaise ziMdagI Age ba.Dha rahI hai, iMsAna ke pAsa sukUna se khAnA khAne kA samaya taka nahIM rahA.
Aja use hara chIza reDI TU ITa chAhie.
isalie aisA khAnA taiyAra hone lagA hai, jo peTa to bhara detA hai, lekina sharIra ko zarUrI poShaka tatva nahIM detA.
peTa kI Aga bujhAne ke lie taraha-taraha ke jatana ho rahe haiM.
lekina isake lie hama vAtAvaraNa aura Kuda apanI sehata se khela rahe haiM.
samaya A gayA hai ki hama khAne ke aise vikalpoM ke bAre meM socheM, jinase hamArI sehata achChI rahe.
aura qudarata kA bhI nuqasAna na ho.
agara Apako iMsAnI sabhyatA ke kisI bhI daura meM janma lene kA adhikAra mile to Apa kaba paidA honA chAheMge?
kuCha loga shAyada usa vaqta meM paidA honA chAheM, jaba iMsAna ne pahale-pahala auzAroM ko hAtha meM paka.DanA sIkhA thA.
kuCha ko usa vaqta janma lenA achChA lage, jaba iMsAna ne qalama aura kAGaza kA istemAla shurU kiyA.
kisI ko usa daura ko dekhanA achChA lagegA jaba mAikala eMjelo, roma meM sisTIna chaipala banA rahe the.
yA kuCha loga sheksapiyara ke daura meM paidA honA chAheMge.
ye saba rUmAnI KyAla Apako achChe laga sakate haiM.
magara hama Apako batA deM, ki Apako usa daura meM paidA hone para bhArI qImata bhI chukAnI hogI.
usa daura kI chunautiyoM kA bhI Apako sAmanA karanA hogA.
Apa bImAra pa.Da gae to shAyada Apako joMka se ilAja karAnA pa.De.
hiMsA se bhI ApakI mauta ho sakatI hai.
aura purAne daura meM paidA hone para, shAyada Apako tAumra GarIbI aura bhukhamarI kA sAmanA karanA pa.De.
iMsAna kI sabhyatA ke eka ba.De daura meM, ziMdagI behada mushkila rahI hai.
ausata umra ChoTI rahI hai.
khAne ke lAle pa.De haiM.
Aja bhale hI Apako charamapaMtha globala vArmiMga Arthika maMdI jaisI chIzeM DarAtI hoM, lekina yaqIna jAnie, ye daura, hamAre lie bahuta achChA hai.
hamArI ziMdagI hamArA rahana-sahana kAfI behatara huA hai.
hama aura sabhya bane haiM.
risarchara iyAna golDina aura krisa kuTArnA ne apanI qitAba, eja ऑfa DiskavarI meM isa bAre meM vistAra se likhA hai.
vo kahate haiM, ki iMsAna kI ausata umra, jitanI piChale pachAsa sAloM meM ba.DhI hai, utanI piChale eka hazAra sAla meM bhI nahIM ba.DhI.
isa sAla paidA hue bachchoM ke bAre meM ye ummIda kI jA sakatI hai, ki vo, bAIsavIM sadI ko dekha sakeMge.
Aja pa.DhAI-likhAI se lekara sehata taka ke morche para hama behatara ziMdagI jI rahe haiM.
navajAtoM aura bachchoM kI mauta kA AMka.DA kama huA hai.
duniyA meM GarIbI kama huI hai.
sAla unnIsa sau ikyAsI meM AdhI duniyA GarIbI rekhA ke nIche thI.
aura sAla do hazAra bAraha meM, ye AMka.DA ghaTakara, bAraha fIsada ke Asa-pAsa raha gayA thA.
golDina aura kuTArnA kA kahanA hai, ki vij~nAna ne itanI taraqqI kara lI hai, ki hama bahuta sI chunautiyoM se nipaTa sakate haiM.
hAlAMki isameM koI do rAya nahIM, ki abhI bahuta kuCha kiyA jAnA bAqI hai.
hamArI fizUlaKarchI, qudarata para dabAva ba.DhAtI jA rahI hai.
hara iMsAna ko peTa bhara khAnA muhaiyA karAnA, use achChI shikShA aura rozagAra denA, hamAre lie chunautI bane hue haiM.
phira dharatI kA ba.DhatA tApamAna, hamAre astitva ke lie hI KatarA banatA jA rahA hai.
koI eka iMsAna dharatI ko badala de, aisA to nahIM.
isa nimna starIya sAkSharatA kA nakArAtmaka asara sirfa mahilAoM ke jIvana stara para hI nahIM apitu unake parivAra evaM desha ke Arthika vikAsa para bhI pa.DA hai.

adhyayana se yaha patA chalatA hai ki nirakShara mahilAoM meM sAmAnyatayA uchcha mAtRRitva mRRityu dara, nimna poShAhAra stara, nyUna Aya arjana kShamatA aura parivAra meM unheM bahuta hI kama svAyatatA prApta hotI hai.
mahilAoM meM nirakSharatA kA nakArAtmaka prabhAva usake bachchoM ke svAsthya evaM rahana-sahana para bhI pa.DatA hai.
udAharaNa ke lie, hAla meM kiye gaye eka sarvekShaNa se patA chalatA hai ki shishu mRRitya dara aura mAtAoM kI shaikShaNika stara meM gaharA saMbaMdha hai.
Aja samaya kI jarUrata hai ki hama bhArata meM ina bachchoM kI AvashyakatAoM ko pUrA karane ke liye taiyAra ho jAyeM tAki unake bhaviShya ko ujjvala va sashakta banAyA jA sake.
bhArata meM, svAtaMtryottara yuga ne saMvaidhAnika upalabdhiyaॉM, nItiyaॉM, kAryakrama evaM vidhAna ke mAdhyama se bachchoM ke prati sarakAra ke spaShTa rUkha kA anubhava kiyA hai.
isa shatAbdI ke aMtima dashaka meM, svAsthya, poShaNa, shikShA evaM saMbaMdhita kAryakShetroM meM Aye tIvra prodyaugikI vikAsa ne bachchoM ko naye avasara pradAna kiye haiM.
bachchoM kA kShetra una upayogakartAoM para dhyAna kendrita karatA hai jinhoMne shikShA, saMskRRiti aura virAsata ke vibhinna pahaluoM ko sIkhanA Arambha kiyA hai.
bachchoM kA kShetra mUla rUpa se una bachchoM kI zarUratoM kI pUrti karatA hai jinhoMne apanI mAtRRibhAShA meM sIkhane Arambha kiyA hai.

isa khaMDa meM bhArata kI loka kathAeM, narsarI kI kavitAeM haiM; kuCha suMdara parI kathAe.N, gAyI jAne vAlI kavitAeM suneM aura una saba adbhuta bAtoM ke bAre meM j~nAna arjita kareM jo hamAre chAroM ora vidyamAna haiM yA ghaTita hotI haiM.
prativedana khuda ko vikalAMga vyaktiyoM ke sAtha jo.DatA hai aura shikShA ko shAmila karane ke lie saMgaThita prayAsa kA AhvAna karatA hai.
yUnesko se ba.DA inapuTa milane ke sAtha yaha sAmAnya DhAMchA, nigarAnI aura kAryAnvayana kI vibhinna chunautiyoM ko khatma karatI hai.

sarva shikShA abhiyAna ke eka bhAga ke rUpa meM vasaMta purke tathA yUnIsefa ke sahayoga se yavatamAla jile meM eka jana abhiyAna chalAyA gayA, jisameM pAlakoM se unake bachchoM ko skUla bhejane kA Agraha kiyA jA rahA hai.
yaha abhiyAna dhyAnaratha parikramA ke rUpa meM chalAyA jA rahA hai, jo skUla meM nAmAMkana karAne kA saMdesha lekara gAMva-gAMva meM ghUma rahA hai.

kolakAtA nagara nigama, sarakArI vibhAgoM, yUnIsefa aura gaira sarakArI saMsthA kolakAtA ke vaMchita vargoM meM paidA hue bachchoM ko janma pramANa-patra jArI karane ke lie ekajuTa hue haiM tAki unheM svAsthya aura shikShA sevAoM taka kI suvidhA upalabdha karAI jA sake aura shoShaNa ke khilApha unheM saMrakShaNa mila sake.
shikShA abhiyAna sArvabhaumika prAraMbhika shikShA lakShya ko prApta karane ke lie bhArata sarakAra ke mahatvapUrNa kAryakrama ke bAre meM jAnakArI pradAna karatA hai.
yaha prashikShaNa sAmagrI, Alekha evaM sAmayika dastAveja yA pralekha aura shikShA se saMbaMdhita AgAmI Ayojana kI sUchI pradAna karatA hai.
yaha yAda rakhane ke lie kuCha pramukha tithiyoM kI jAnakArI, jaise, nAmAMkana ke lie Avedana patra jamA karane kI aMtima tithi, ऑnalAina pradAna karatA hai.
ChAtra apanA inaraॉlamenTa naMbara DAlakara apane nAmAMkana sthiti kI jAnakArI ऑnalAina prApta kara sakate haiM.

yaha vishva baiMka prakAshana kA pUrNa pATha, shaikShika saMsAdhana sAmagrI evaM TUla kiTa, bachchoM ke prAraMbhika shikShA para vishva baiMka ke shikShA kArya para sUchanA, liMga, prabhAvI vidyAlaya evaM shikShaka, prau.Dha shikShA evaM vidyAlaya svAsthya, shikShA sAMkhyikI, bahuta sAre deshoM ke shikShA raNanIti kA vivaraNa, kShetrIya sUchanAe.N evaM bahuta sAre saMbaMdhita liMka kI jAnakArI pradAna karatA hai.
yaha samasyA garbhAdhAna ke daurAna niShechana meM kisI prakAra kI truTi hone para utpanna hotI hai aura nAla kA nirmANa karane vAlI koshikAoM meM kharAbI A jAtI hai.
isa sthiti meM koI aparipakva bhrUNa, emniyoTika saika yA koI sAmAnya pleseMTala Utaka nahIM banatA.
AraMbhika avasthA meM Apako garbhavasthA ke kuCha sAmAnya lakShaNa dikhAI de sakatA hai parantu kuCha samaya bAda tho.DA-tho.DA raktasrAva AraMbha ho jAtA hai.
atiulvodakatA garbhAvasthA meM hone vAlA eka aisA roga hai jisameM ulvadrava kI adhikatA ho jAtI hai.
halkI atiulvodakatA sAmAnya hai aura kisI samasyA kA saMketa nahIM hotI, daraasala dvitIya trimAsa meM prakaTa hone vAlA atirikta tarala binA kisI ilAja ke sAmAnya stara ko lauTa sakatA haiM.
kisI ko yaha pakkA patA nahIM hai ki atiulvodakatA kyoM hotI hai lekina kabhI-kabhI katipaya janmajAta vikAroM ke chalate shishu kI truTipUrNa nigalane kI kriyA ke kAraNa aisA ho sakatA haiM.
proTIna emino esiDa se bane hote haiM aura ye prANiyoM ke jIvana se saMbaMdhita Avashyaka kAmoM ke niShpadAna ke lie bahuta jarUrI hote haiM.
khAdya padArthoM meM upasthita Avashyaka emino esiDa kI mAtrA para proTIna kI guNavattA nirbhara hotI hai.
sharIra meM honevAle bahuta se Avashyaka kAmoM ke lie eMjAima yA hAramona ke rUpa meM rahane vAle proTIna kI AvashyakatA hotI hai.
kishora shabda laiTina bhAShA eDolisyera se liyA gayA hai, jisakA matalaba hai- ba.DhanA, paripakva honA, jo yuvAvasthA kI visheShatA hai.
vasA bhojana kA eka Avashyaka bhAga hai aura hamAre sharIra ke bahuta sAre kAmoM meM upayogI sAbita hotA hai.
yaha UrjA kA eka Thosa sAdhana hai aura nau kilo kailorI prati grAma UrjA kA utpAdana karatA hai.
moTApA khUna meM vasA kI adhikatA, uchcha raktachApa, hRRidaya saMbaMdhI roga, madhumeha, patharI evaM kuCha prakAra ke kaiMsara jaisI bImAriyoM kI ora le jAtI hai.
vajana kama karanevAle khAdya padArthoM meM proTIna kI mAtrA adhika honI chAhie aura kArbohAiDreTa evaM charbI kI mAtrA kama honI chAhie.
pattIdAra harI shAka-sabjiyA.N sharIra ke uchita vikAsa evaM achChe svAstha ke lie Avashyaka hotI hai, kyoMki isameM sabhI jarUrI poShaka tatva upasthita hote haiM.
harI sabjiyoM meM viTAmina sI ko bachAye rakhane ke lie unheM jyAdA dera taka pakAnA anuchita hai, kyoMki poShaka tatva jo masU.De ko shakti pradAna karate haiM, adhika pakAne se naShTa ho jAte haiM.
Adhunika vij~nAna ne unnata svachChatA, TIkAkaraNa aura eMTIbAyoTiksa tathA chikitsakIya suvidhAoM ke mAdhyama se aneka saMkrAmaka bImAriyoM se honevAlI mRRityu ke khatare ko khatma kara diyA hai.
Adhunika yuga meM bahuta se loga AnupAtika rUpa se kama umra meM hI hRRidaya rogoM aura kaiMsara tathA jIvanashailI se ju.DI anya bImAriyoM kI vajaha se mara rahe haiM.

jo bhojana hama khAte haiM, hama jisa taraha apane sharIra ko sApha rakhate haiM, shArIrika vyAyAma karate haiM aura surakShita yauna saMbaMdha apanAte haiM, ye sabhI hamAre sharIra ko svastha banAye rakhane meM ba.DI bhUmikA nibhAte haiM.
parajIvI, kI.De, phaphUMda, ghAva, dAMtoM kA sa.DanA, DAyariyA aura pechisha jaisI bImAriyA.N nijI svachChatA ke abhAva meM paidA hotI haiM.
paidAvAra ke mausama meM nIma ke phala ikaTThe kareM aura unheM ChAyAdAra jagaha khulI havA meM sukhAeM.
kITanAshaka aura jaiva kITanAshaka sirfa paMjIkRRita kITanAshaka DIlara se hI kharIdeM jisake pAsa vaidha lAiseMsa ho.
dhaniyA ke bIja ko behatara aMkuraNa ke lie bone se pahale do bhAgoM meM to.DanA pa.DatA hai tathA ise mAutha phreshanara ke rUpa meM bhI prosesa kiyA jAtA hai.
Dripa siMchAI praNAlI phasala ko mukh{}ya paMkti, upa paMkti tathA pArshva paMkti ke taMtra ke unakI laMbAIyoM ke aMtarAla ke sAtha utsarjana bin{}du kA upayoga karake pAnI vitarita karatI hai.
pAnI aura poShaka tatva ut{}sarjaka se, paudhoM kI ja.Da kShetra meM se chalate hue gurutvAkarShaNa aura keshikA ke saMyukta baloM ke mAdhyama se miTTI meM jAte haiM.
himAchala pradesha ke zona do aura tIna meM atyadhika bahumUlya maChalI renabo TrAuTa kI paidAvAra ke lie vishAla kShamatA hai.
TrAuTa kI paidAvAra ke lie isa taraha kA sthAna chunanA chAhie jahAM nadI, jharane jaise bArahamAsI srota ke mAdhyama se uchita guNavattA aura mAtrA meM pAnI upalabdha ho.

grAmINa udyoga sevA ken{}dra sAmAn{}ya suvidhA hai jisakA uddesh{}ya DhAMchAgata sahAyatA aura s{}thAnIya ikAiyoM ko apanI ut{}pAdana kShamatA, kaushala un{}nayana aura bAjAra prasAra jaisI jarUrI sevAeM upalab{}dha karAnA hai.

pashudhana bImA yojanA kI shuruAta do uddeshyoM, kisAnoM tathA pashupAlakoM ko pashuoM kI mRRityu ke kAraNa hue nukasAna se surakShA muhaiyA karavAne hetu tathA pashudhana bImA ke lAbhoM ko logoM ko batAne tathA ise pashudhana tathA unake utpAdoM ke guNavattApUrNa vikAsa ke charama lakShya ke sAtha lokapriya banAne ke lie kiyA gayA.
yaha yojanA govA ko Cho.Dakara sabhI rAjyoM meM saMbaMdhita rAjya pashudhana vikAsa borDa dvArA kriyAnvita kI jA rahI hai.
madhumakkhI pAlana eka kRRiShi AdhArita udyama hai, jise kisAna atirikta Aya arjita karane ke lie apanA sakate haiM.
hama dhuAM pheMkanevAle kA upayoga khuda ko madhumakkhiyoM ke DaMka se bachAne aura una para niyaMtraNa pAne ke lie karate haiM.
kaॉloniyoM ko maveshiyoM, anya jAnavaroM, vyasta sa.DakoM aura sa.Daka para lagI lAiToM se dUra rakheM.
yadi saMbhava ho, to kisI prAkRRitika ThikAne se rAnI makkhI ko paka.Da leM aura use apane Chatte meM rakha deM, tAki dUsarI madhumakkhiyAM vahAM AkarShita hoM.
shrI paddhati meM dhAna kA paudhA prAkRRitika sthiti meM achChe DhaMga se vRRiddhi karatA hai aura isake ja.Da bhI ba.De paimAne para ba.Dhate haiM.
bhArata sameta hara jagaha hAlAMki motiyoM kI mA.Nga ba.DhatI jA rahI hai, lekina dohana aura pradUShaNa se inakI saMkh{}yA ghaTatI jA rahI hai.
yaha AkAra meM ChoTA hotA hai, aura isakI AkRRiti barAbara nahIM hotI.
yaha sthAnIya miTTI evaM mausama sharteM jaisI anachAhI kRRiShi gatividhiyoM se ChuTakArA dilAtA hai.
isa praudyogikI ne khAsa kShetra kI bhUmi ke lie vAstavika poShaka sthiti kI pahachAna karane meM madada kI hai.
guNavattA ke kAraNa sUkShma khetI kShetra ke sabhI utpAda bAjAroM meM AkarShaka prImiyama pradAna karatA hai.
yaha dina meM hamAre ghara ko prakAshita karatA, kapa.De va kRRiShi utpAda ko sUkhAtA tathA hameM garma rakhatA hai.
Ajakala solara phoTovolTeika sela kA, gA.NvoM meM gharoM meM prakAsha kArya, sa.DakoM para roshanI evaM pAnI nikAlane ke kArya meM saphalatApUrvaka upayoga kiyA jA rahA hai.

mahilAe.N grAmINa UrjA kI prakriyA kA eka Avashyaka aMga hai kyoMki ve gharelU upayoga ke lie svachCha evaM paryApta jala, jAnavaroM ke lie chArA, kRRiShi kAryoM evaM anya mahatvapUrNa suvidhAoM ko juTAne meM lagI rahatI haiM.
UrjA prabhAvI dhU.NA rahita chUlhe evaM saura UrjA va bAyo gaisa jaise svachCha IMdhana kA upayoga isakA saMbhAvita samAdhAna hai jisakA aba prachalana ba.DhatA jA rahA hai.
bhAratIya navIkaraNIya UrjA vikAsa abhikaraNa ne mahilAoM ko UrjA ke navIna evaM navIkaraNIya srotoM kA upayoga evaM prasAra ko ba.DhAvA dene meM sahAyatA dene kA prastAva kiyA hai.
jaba akolA jile ke chittalavADI gAMva ke vijaya iMgLe ne apanI DeyarI meM piChale sAla eka bAyogaisa saMyaMtra sthApita karane kA phaisalA kiyA, to hara koI shaMkita thA.
jaise-jaise unake saMyukta parivAra meM vRRiddhi huI, unako apanI gaushAlA gAMva ke bAharI ilAke meM lagabhaga AdhA kilomITara dUrI para sthAnAMtarita karanI pa.DI.
unhoMne bhI apane Apako aise logoM se ghirA huA pAyA jo unheM isa pariyojanA ko tyAga dene kI salAha de rahe the.
saMyaMtra pUre varSha bhara meM Chaha sadasyIya parivAra kA khAnA pakAne ke lie paryApta gaisa pradAna karatA hai.
sAtha hI maMtrAlaya nirmAtAoM, unake sahayogiyoM yA enajIo dvArA pratyakSha mArkeTiMga ke lie koI lakShya nahIM degA.

binA bijalI vAle gAMvoM tathA visheSha varga kA darzA prApta bastiyoM tathA keMdra shAsita dvIpoM ke lAbhArthiyoM tathA gaira-lAbha vAle saMgaThanoM ke sabhI varga saura lAlaTena pAne ke lie yogya hoMge.
isa yojanA ke tahata pUrNa rUpa se AyAtita saura lAlaTena ko shAmila nahIM kiyA gayA hai.
chittalavA.DI ke eka anya kisAna milinda iMgLe yaha jAnakara chakita the ki unakI tIna gAyoM se prApta gobara unake tIna logoM ke parivAra ke lie paryApta se adhika thA.
IMdhana kI laka.DI durlabha hone aura elapIjI sileMDara mahaMge hone ke sAtha, vidarbha meM bAyogaisa apanAne ke ichChuka kisAnoM kI saMkhyA ba.Dha rahI hai.
hameM garmI ke mausama meM garmI va sardI ke mausama meM ThaNDa lagatI hai.
ye saba kuCha mausama meM hone vAle badalAva ke kAraNa hotA hai.
mausama, kisI bhI sthAna kI ausata jalavAyu hotI hai jise kuCha samayAvadhi ke liye vahAM anubhava kiyA jAtA hai.
isa samaya pRRithvI ke jalavAyu meM parivartana ho rahA hai aura sabhI jIvita prANiyoM ne isa badalAva ke sAtha sAmaMjasya bhI baiThA liyA hai.

hama Aja jina mahAdvIpoM ko dekha rahe haiM, ve isa dharA kI utpatti ke sAtha hI bane the tathA inapara samudra meM tairate rahane ke kAraNa tathA vAyu ke pravAha ke kAraNa inakA khisakanA niraMtara jArI hai.
samudra dvArA pRRithvI kI sataha kI apekShA dugunI dara se sUrya kI kiraNoM kA avashoShaNa kiyA jAtA hai.

poShaNa surakShA kI dekhabhAla rAShTrIya taiyAra madhyAhna bhojana kAryakrama, samanvita bAla vikAsa yojanA, kishorI shakti yojanA, kishora la.DakiyoM ke lie poShaNa kAryakrama aura pradhAnamaMtrI grAmodaya yojanA ke tahata kI jAtI hai.
rAShTrIya taiyAra madhyAhna bhojana kAryakrama lagabhaga pUre bhArata meM phaila chukA hai jabaki samanvita bAla vikAsa yojanA kA vistAra charaNabaddha rUpa se kiyA jA rahA hai.
grAmINa anAja bhaMDAra yojanA saMshodhita kI gaI hai tAki ise adhika samagra aura vyApaka banAyA jA sake.
bhArata meM garIba majadUroM ke AMtarika palAyana meM vRRiddhi ho rahI hai.
pravAsiyoM kI aisI janasaMkhyA meM roga phailane kI saMbhAvanA jyAdA hotI hai aura unheM svAsthya sevAoM kI sulabhatA bhI kama hotI hai.

kAma ke Akasmika prakRRiti ke kAraNa AvAsa sthAna meM tIvra badalAva se ve roga-nivAraka sevA se vaMchita hote haiM aura shahara ke anaupachArika kArya vyavasthA meM unakI kArya dashA unheM paryApta upachArAtmaka sevA pAne se asamartha kara detI hai.
AMtarika visthApita loga sarakArI sAmAjika surakShA pAne meM asamartha hote haiM.
kama umra meM vivAha lagabhaga hameshA la.DakiyoM ko shikShA yA arthapUrNa kAryoM se vaMchita karatA hai jo unakI niraMtara garIbI kA kAraNa banatA hai.
bAla vivAha liMgabheda, bImArI evaM garIbI ke bhaMvarajAla meM phaMsA detA hai.
jAti prathA bhAratIya samAja ko sAmpradAyika samUhoM evaM shreNiyoM meM bAMTatI hai.
saMskRRiti evaM sabhyatA ke vikAsa ke bAvazUda jAti prathA aba bhI hamAre samAja meM eka prabala bhUmikA nibhAtI hai.
karza, paramparAoM Adi ke nAma para pI.Dha{}iyoM se unase mazadUra kI taraha yA nimna koTi ke kArya karAkara unakA shoShaNa kiyA jAtA hai.
bhArata sarakAra ne aspRRishyatA samApta karane ke lie kAnUna banAe haiM tathA samAja ke kamazora hissoM ke jIvana kI guNavattA sudhArane ke lie kaI sudhAra lAe haiM.
kanyA bhrUNa hatyA, la.DakoM ko prAthamikatA dene tathA kanyA janma se ju.De nimna mUlya ke kAraNa jAna bUjhakara kI gaI kanyA shishu kI hatyA hotI hai.
dabhAva ke pIChe sAMskRRitika mAnyatAoM evaM sAmAjika niyamoM kA adhika hAtha hotA hai.
yaha AMka.DA vartamAna meM kAryarata logoM ke AdhAra para nikAlA gayA hai.
bhArata meM buzurgoM kI behatara sthiti ko baढ़AvA dene vAle sakArAtmaka pahaluoM meM eka parivAra ke sadasyoM kA unake sAtha gaharA ju.DAva hai.
sarakAra dvArA unake svastha evaM sArthaka jIvana kI kShamatA ko sunishchita kiyA jAnA chAhie.
saMvidhAna isa viShaya se ju.DI anusUchI meM sIdhetaura se vikalAMga vyaktiyoM kI sashaktIkaraNa kI jimmedArI rAjya sarakAroM ko detA hai.
yaha sahAyatA mAnasika pakShAghAta se grasta ChAtroM ko Avashyaka saॉphTaveyara kI upalabdhatA ke lie bhI dI jAtI hai.
AkAsha me safeda hAthI nAchatA gAtA jA rahA hai.
isa suMdara nagara meM machCharoM kI kamI nahIM hai.
subaha hote hI sUrya dakShiNa kI ora jAtA hai.
mai isa bAra kuCha achChA nahIM khAnA chAhatA hU.N.
garmiyoM ke dinoM meM ve paMkha kholakara rote the.
unhone yaha sochakara hI patthara ko paढ़nA shurU kiyA.
j~nAna hI saMsAra kA sabase ba.DA dhokhA thA.
nala kholane para saba baMdaroM pe TUTa pa.De.
pattharoM kI shAdI meM nevaleM nAcheM.
eka AdamI ThaM.DI Aga meM kUda pa.DA.
mujhe sUkhe pAnI kI pyAsa lagI hai.
madhumakkhI kA madhu ka.DavA ho sakatA hai.
maine mishrI se bhI mIThA nIMbU khAne kA nishchaya kiyA.
pIchChe se A rahI gADI pIchChe bhI jA sakatI hai.
khushiyoM ke tyohAra kI holI ko divAlI bolie.
samaya ko paka.DanA pApa mAnA jAtA hai.
uttara dakShiNa meM bArisha hone kI sevA nahIM thI.
vaha ye bhI nahIM jAnatA thA ki use parAMThe banAne the.
rAta bhara jage rahanA sehata ke lie achChA hai.
merI ChoTI bahana, apanI sAsa ke bagala meM gAtI hai.
amarikA kI rAjadhAnI muMbaI hai.
kala maiMne eka baMdara ko paढ़te dekhA.
chennai se dillI jAne meM do mahIneM lagate haiM.
loga khAne ke lie hI zindA rahate haiM.
usa gA.Nva me sirfa pAgala loga khAnA khAte haiM.
dillI kI rAjadhAnI manAlI hai.
chA.Nda ko paka.DanA bahuta zarUrI hai.
sUraja ne pUre laMkA ko jalA diyA.
chAya aura makkhana pe.Da pe chaढ़e.
chUhe ne gusse meM hAthI ko kATA.
gIta gAte usakI sAMseM ruka gayI.
holI meM loga diyA jalAteM haiM.
parIkShA ke dina hI pa.DanA chAhie.
amarikA gaMgA meM baha gayI.
karnATaka ke mukhya maMtrI kerala meM kAma karate haiM.
rAjasthAna meM pAnI kI kamI nahI hai.
chennai meM bahuta ThanDa lagatI hai.
dakShiNa bhArata meM roTI khAyA jAtA hai.
aspatAla meM loga khAne jAte haiM.
kAma to rAta meM hI karanA chAhie.
jaMgala kA rAjA machChara hai.
chi.DiyAghara meM loga rahate haiM.
jhUTa kI hameshA jIta hotI hai.
baMdaroM kI bArisha ho rahI thI.
chamakate hue tAroM ke sAtha mata khelo.
achAra me kacharA nahI hai.
rAtoM rAta hamane ronA shuru kiyA.
kaue ke sira para sonA milatA hai.
adhyApaka gAjara kA halavA banAteM haiM.
rAta meM adraka meMDhaka bana jAtA hai.
dInA ne upajAU ko javAba diyA.
mukAma se Age zamIna Ane lagI.
saudA mahInA ho gayA thA.
pa.DhanA likhanA Apake Ane se khusha haiM.
hazAra lAlacha shaitAna kyoM na ho.
zamIna becha bAchakara abhilAShA paidA huI.
gItoM se milA homavarka khiDaqI kholI hai.
rasoI meM makAna vAlI sunA rahI hai.
hara roza kI taraha devayAnI nAma hai.
samaya ke sAtha kauna pareshAna karatA hai.
jAna nA pahachAna garma kaॉfI chAhie.
khi.DakI ne kamAla kara dikhAyA thA.
kRRipayA tho.DI dera bAda kheda hai.
chi.DiyA ke mana meM saba khelate haiM.
ghara meM pravesha karate hI AnaMda kA tyohAra hai.
banAnA bahuta AsAna jhaga.DAlU hU.N.
virodha ke lie bhIkha meM milI AshA.
bhAlU kI pU.NCha barfa meM jamane lagI.
chIMTI ne kahA,billI nIche khisaka gaI.
billI mausI mitra bana jAo.
barasAta ke pAnI ko ThIka karanA hai.
merA kharagosha kha.De kha.De hI sotA hai.
chUhe ne jaldI se jAla kutara DAlA.
mela jola se tuma saba sukhI rahoge.
chUhA ne dekhA ki sUraja nikala AyA hai.
kauA tezI se u.Dakara bila se bAhara gayA.
apane baragada ke pAsa pahu.Ncha kara hI dama lo.
chi.DiyoM ko ghoMsale banAne kA adhikAra hogA.
garu.Da Ama ke pe.Da kI ora AI.
kuCha dinoM meM usake paMkha nikala Aye.
maiM aura dAnA lene jAtI hU.N.
vaha jaise Atmamugdha sI rahatI thI.
apane meM bharIpUrI aura tuShTa thI.
uThatA dhuA.N koI kaise ChupAye.
kyoM aba dekha bhI nahIM sakatA kyA.
use Aja bhI vishvAsa nahIM hotA hai.
usane jaMtara maMtara saba kuCha chATa DAlA.
vaha vasaMta kI hariyAlI muskAna nahIM thI.
usakI AMkha bachAkara nikala sakatA hai.
kaMghI tumhAre bUte ke bAhara hai.
pe.Da Ishvara ke banAe hue haiM.
eka sAla meM hariyAlI ho gaI.
pe.Da paudhoM kI tulanA meM yaha bahuta ChoTA thA.
do gha.DI chaढ़ne para chamakIlI dhUpa nikalI.
tumane paudhoM ko zarA sA bhI maukA nahIM diyA.
yaha jAne binA yAtrA para nikala pa.De.
AvAza sunakara a.NdhA gho.DA pahuMcha jAtA.
bA.De ke mAlika isalie nahIM Cho.Da dete.
duniyA ke desha nazara A jAyeMge.
bhUmi para svarga ho na ho.

eka nadI ke kinAre, eka jAmuna ke pe.Da para, eka bandara rahatA thA, jisakI mitratA, usa nadI meM rahane vAle magaramachCha ke sAtha ho gayI. vo bandara, usa magaramachCha ko bhI khAne ke lie jAmuna detA rahatA thA. eka dina, usa magaramachCha ne, kuCha jAmuna, apanI patnI ko bhI khilAye. svAdiShTa jAmuna khAne ke bAda, usane ye sochakara ki rozAnA aise mIThe phala khAne vAle kA dila bhI khUba mIThA hogA, apane pati se, usa bandara kA dila lAne kI zidda kI. patnI ke hAthoM majabUra hue magaramachCha ne bhI eka chAla chalI, aura bandara se kahA, ki usakI bhAbhI, use milanA chAhatI hai. isalie, vo usakI pITha para baiTha jAye, tAki surakShita usake ghara pahu.Ncha jAe. bandara bhI apane mitra kI bAta kA bharosA kara, pe.Da se nadI meM kUdA, aura usakI pITha para, savAra ho gayA. jaba ve nadI ke bIchoM-bIcha pahuMche, magaramachCha ne sochA, ki aba bandara ko sahI bAta batAne meM, koI hAni nahIM, aura usane bheda khola diyA ki usakI patnI, usakA dila, khAnA chAhatI hai. bandara ko dhakkA to lagA, lekina usane, apanA dhairya nahIM khoyA, aura tapAka se bolA, oha, tumane ye bAta mujhe pahale kyoM nahIM batAI, kyoMki maiMne to apanA dila, jAmuna ke pe.Da kI khokhala meM sambhAla kara rakhA hai. aba jaldI se mujhe vApisa nadI ke kinAre le chalo, tAki maiM apanA dila lAkara, apanI bhAbhI ko upahAra meM dekara, use khusha kara sakUM. mUrkha magaramachCha, bandara ko jaise hI nadI kinAre le kara AyA, bandara ne zora se jAmuna ke pe.Da para ChalAMga lagAI, aura krodha meM bharakara bolA, are mUrkha, dila ke binA bhI kyA koI zindA raha sakatA hai? jA, Aja se terI-merI dostI samApta.

mitro, bachapana meM paढ़I ye kahAnI Aja bhI musIbata ke kShaNoM meM dhairya rakhane kI preraNA detI hai, tAki hama kaThina samaya kA DaTa kara mukAbalA kara sakeM. dUsare, mitratA kA sadaiva sammAna kareM.

eka bAra, do gadhe, apanI pITha para bojhA uThAye chale jA rahe the, unako kAfI laMbA safara taya karanA thA. eka gadhe kI pITha para, namaka kI bhArI boriyAM ladI huI thIM, to eka kI pITha para, rUI kI boriyAM ladI huI thIM.

jisa rAste se vo jA rahe the, usa bIcha meM eka nadI pa.DI. nadI ke Upara reta kI boriyoM kA kachchA pula banA huA thA. jisa gadhe kI pITha para namaka kI boriyAM thIM, usakA paira, burI taraha se phisala gayA, aura vo nadI ke aMdara gira pa.DA. nadI meM girate hI, namaka pAnI meM ghula gayA, aura usakA vazana, halkA ho gayA. vo ye bAta, ba.DI prasannatA se dusare ko batAne lagA. dusare gadhe ne sochA, ye to baढ़iyA yukti hai, aise meM to maiM bhI apanA bhAra, kAfI kama kara sakatA hU.N, aura usane binA soche samajhe, pAnI meM ChalAMga lagA dI. kintu rUI ke pAnI sokha lene ke kAraNa, usakA bhAra kama hone kI jagaha, bahuta baढ़ gayA, jisa kAraNa, vo murkha gadhA, pAnI meM DUba gayA.

eka saMta, ye sArA kissA, apane shiShyoM ke sAtha dekha rahe the. unhoMne apane shiShyoM se kahA, manuShya ko sadA apanA viveka jAgRRita rakhanA chAhie. binA apanI buddhi lagAe, dUsaroM kI nakala kara vaisA hI karane vAle sadA upahAsa ke pAtra banate haiM.

mitroM, hamArI asala ziMdagI meM bhI ye bAta lAgU hotI hai. hama kisI ko eka kShetra meM saphala hote dekha, use kaॉpI karanA shurU kara dete haiM. hame lagatA hai, ki yadi koI baMdA apane kShetra meM saphala ho gayA, to hame bhI usa kShetra meM saphalatA mila jAyegI. lekina hama shAyada ye dhyAna nahIM dete, ki usakI pITha para, namaka vAlI borI hai, matalaba, usakA iMTaresTa alaga hai, aura bhUlavasha, hama rUI kI borI ko lAde, ChalAMga lagA dete haiM, matalaba, dUsare TaileMTa yA iMTaresTa ko lAde usa kShetra meM saphala hone kA khvAba dekhate hai, aura aMtataH hameM paChatAnA pa.DatA hai. isalie, dUsaroM ko dekhakara sIkhanA ThIka hai, para unakA a.NdhA anukaraNa karanA, usa mUrkha gadhe ke samAna vyavahAra karanA hai.

bahuta samaya pahale kI bAta hai, sudUra dakShiNa meM, kisI pratApI rAjA kA rAjya thA. rAjA ke tIna putra the. eka dina, rAjA ke mana meM AyA, ki putroM ko, kuCha aisI shikShA dI jAye, ki samaya Ane para vo rAja-kAja sambhAla sakeM. isI vichAra ke sAtha, rAjA ne sabhI putroM ko darabAra meM bulAyA aura bolA, putroM, hamAre rAjya meM, nAshapAtI kA koI vRRikSha nahIM hai. maiM chAhatA hU.N tuma saba chAra-chAra mahIne ke aMtarAla para isa vRRikSha kI talAsha meM jAo, aura patA lagAo ki vo kaisA hotA hai? rAjA kI Aj~nA pA kara tIno putra, bArI-bArI se gae, aura vApasa lauTa Aye.

sabhI putroM ke lauTa Ane para, rAjA ne punaH, sabhI ko darabAra meM bulAyA, aura usa pe.Da ke bAre meM batAne ko kahA. pahalA putra bolA, pitAjI, vo pe.Da to bilakula Teढ़A–meढ़A aura sUkhA huA thA. nahIM-nahIM, vo to bilakula harA–bharA thA, lekina shAyada usame kuCha kamI thI, kyoMki usapara, eka bhI phala, nahIM lagA thA, dusare putra ne pahale ko bIcha meM hI rokate hue kahA. phira tIsarA putra bolA, bhaiyA, lagatA hai, Apa bhI koI galata pe.Da dekha Aye, kyoMki maiMne sachamucha nAshapAtI kA pe.Da dekhA. vo bahuta hI shAnadAra thA, aura phaloM se ladA pa.DA thA. aura tIno putra, apanI-apanI bAta ko lekara Apasa meM vivAda karane lage, ki tabhI rAjA, apane siMghAsana se uThe, aura bole, putroM, tumhe Apasa meM bahasa karane kI koI AvashyakatA nahIM hai. daraasala tuma tIno hI vRRikSha kA sahI varNana kara rahe ho. maiMne jAnabUjha kara, tumhe alaga-alaga mausama meM, vRRikSha khojane bhejA thA, aura tumane jo dekhA, vo usa mausama ke anusAra thA.

maiM chAhatA hU.N, ki isa anubhava ke AdhAra para, tuma tIna bAtoM ko gA.NTha bA.Ndha lo. pahalI, kisI chIza ke bAre meM sahI aura pUrNa jAnakArI chAhie, to tumhe use lambe samaya taka dekhanA-parakhanA chAhie. phira chAhe vo koI viShaya ho, vastu ho, yA phira, koI vyakti hI kyoM na ho. dUsarI, hara mausama eka sA nahIM hotA. jisa prakAra vRRikSha mausama ke anusAra sUkhatA, harA-bharA, yA phaloM se ladA rahatA hai, usI prakAra, manuShaya ke jIvana meM bhI, utAra chaDhAva Ate rahate haiM. ataH, agara tuma kabhI bhI bure daura se guzara rahe ho, to apanI himmata aura dhairya, banAye rakho. samaya avashya badalatA hai. aura tIsarI bAta, apanI bAta ko hI sahI mAna kara usa para a.De mata raho. apanA dimAga kholo, aura dUsaroM ke vichAroM ko bhI jAno. ye saMsAra j~nAna se bharA pa.DA hai. chAha kara bhI, tuma akele sArA j~nAna arjita nahIM kara sakate. isalie, bhrama kI sthiti meM, kisI j~nAnI vyakti se salAha lene meM saMkocha mata karo.

eka naujavAna chItA, pahalI bAra shikAra karane nikalA. abhI vo kuCha hI Age baढ़A thA, ki eka laka.DabagghA, use rokate hue bolA, are ChoTU, kahA.N jA rahe ho tuma? maiM to Aja pahalI bAra khuda se shikAra karane nikalA hU.N!, chItA romAMchita hote hue bolA. laka.DabagghA haMsA, abhI to tumhAre khelane-kUdane ke dina haiM, tuma itane ChoTe ho, tumhe shikAra karane kA koI anubhava bhI nahIM hai. tuma kyA shikAra karoge! laka.Dabagghe kI bAta sunakara, chItA udAsa ho gayA. dina bhara shikAra ke lie vo bemana idhara-udhara ghUmatA rahA, kuCha eka prayAsa bhI kiye, para saphalatA nahIM milI, aura use bhUkhe peTa hI ghara lauTanA pa.DA.

agalI subaha, vo eka bAra phira shikAra ke lie nikalA. kuCha dUra jAne para, use eka bUढ़e bandara ne dekhA aura pUChA, kahA.N jA rahe ho beTA? baMdara mAmA, maiM shikAra para jA rahA hU.N, chItA bolA. bahuta achChe, bandara bolA. tumhArI tAkata aura gati ke kAraNa, tuma eka behada kushala shikArI bana sakate ho. jAo, tumhe jalda hI saphalatA milegI. ye suna, chItA utsAha se bhara gayA, aura kuCha hI samaya meM, usane, ChoTe se hirana kA shikAra kara liyA.

mitroM, hamArI zindagI meM shabda, bahuta mAyane rakhate haiM. donoM hI dina, chItA to vahI thA, usame vahI phUrti aura vahI tAkata thI. para jisa dina, use Diskareja kiyA gayA, vo asaphala ho gayA. jisa dina, enakareja kiyA gayA, vo saphala ho gayA.

eka sarovara me.N tIna divya maChaliyA.N rahatI thI.N. vahA.N kI tamAma maChaliyA.N, una tIno.N ke prati hI shradhdA me.N ba.NTI huI thI.N. eka maChalI kA nAma vyAvahArikabuddhi thA, dUsarI kA nAma madhyamabuddhi, aura tIsarI kA nAma, atibuddhi thA. atibuddhi ke pAsa, j~nAna kA asIma bhaMDAra thA. vo sabhI prakAra ke shAstro.N kA j~nAna rakhatI thI. madhyamabuddhi ko utanI hI dura taka sochane.N kI Adata thI, jisase usakA vAstA pa.DatA thA. vo sochatI kama thI, paraMparAgata DhaMga se apanA kAma kiyA karatI thI. vyavahArika buddhi, na paraMparA para dhyAna detI thI, aura na hI shAstra para. use jaba jaisI AvashyakatA hotI thI, nirNaya liyA karatI thI, aura AvashyakatA na pa.Dane.N para kisI shAstra ke panne taka nahI.N ulaTatI thI.

eka dina kuCha maChuAre, sarovara ke taTa para Aye, aura maChaliyo.N kI bahutAyata dekhakara, bAte.N karane.N lage, ki yahA.N kAfI maChaliyA.N hai.N, subaha Akara, hama isame.N jAla DAle.Nge. unakI bAte.N maChaliyo.N ne.N sunI.N. vyavahArika buddhi ne.N kahA, hame.N faurana ye tAlAba Cho.Da denA chAhie. patale soto.N kA mArga paka.Dakara, udhara jaMgalI ghAsa se Dhake hue jaMgalI sarovara me.N chale jAnA chAhiye. madhyamabuddhi ne.N kahA, prAchIna kAla se hamAre pUrvaja, ThaNDa ke dino.N me.N hI vahA.N jAte hai.N, aura abhI to, vo mausama hI nahI.N AyA hai. hama hamAre varSho.N se chalI A rahI isa paraMparA ko nahI.N to.Da sakate. maChuAro.N kA khatarA ho, yA na ho, hame.N isa paraMparA kA dhyAna rakhanA hai.

atibuddhi ne.N, garva se ha.Nsate hue kahA, tuma loga aj~nAnI ho, tumhe.N shAstro.N kA j~nAna nahI.N hai. jo bAdala garajate hai.N, ve barasate nahI.N hai.N. phira hama loga eka hazAra tarIko.N se tairanA jAnate hai.N, pAnI ke tala me.N jAkara baiThane.N kI sAmarthyatA hai. hamAre pUMCha me.N itanI shakti hai, ki hama jAlo.N ko phA.Da sakatI hai.N. vaise bhI kahA gayA hai, ki sa.NkaTo.N se ghire hue ho, to bhI apane.N ghara ko Cho.Dakara paradesha chale jAnA, achChI bAta nahI.N hai. avvala to ve maChuAre Aye.Nge nahI.N, Aye.Nge, to hama tairakara nIche baiTha jAye.NgI, unake jAla me.N Aye.Nge hI nahI.N. eka do pha.Nsa bhI gaI.N, to pu.NCha se jAla phA.Dakara nikala jAyeMge. bhAI, shAstro.N aura j~nAniyo.N ke vachano.N ke virUdhda, mai.N to nahI.N jAU.NgI. vyavahArikabuddhi ne.N kahA, mai.N shAstro.N ke bAre me.N nahI.N jAnatI, magara merI buddhi kahatI hai, ki manuShya jaise tAkatavara aura bhayAnaka shatru kI AshaMkA sira para ho, to bhAgakara kahI.N Chupa jAo. aisA kahate hue, vo apane.N anuyAyioM ko lekara chala pa.DI.

madhyamabuddhi aura atibuddhi, apane.N para.NparA aura shAstra j~nAna ko lekara, vahI.N rUka gayIM. agale dina maChuAro.N ne.N pUrI taiyArI ke sAtha Akara, vahA.N jAla DAlA, aura una dono.N kI, eka na chalI. jaba maChuAre unake vishAla sharIra ko TAMga rahe the, taba vyavahArikabuddhi ne.N gaharI sA.Nsa lekara kahA, inake shAstra j~nAna ne.N hI dhokhA diyA. kAsha, iname.N tho.DI, vyavahArika buddhi bhI hotI.

vyavahArika buddhi se, hamArA Ashaya hai, ki kisa samaya hame.N kyA karanA chAhie, aura jo hama kara rahe hai.N, usa kArya kA pariNAma nikalane.N para, kyA samasyAye.N A sakatI hai.N. ye sochanA hI vyavahArika buddhi hai. bolachAla kI bhAShA meM hama ise kaॉmana seMsa bhI kahate haiM, aura bhale hI, hama ba.De j~nAnI nA hoM, moTI-moTI kitAbeM nA paढ़IM hoM, lekina hama apanI vyvayahArika buddhi se, kisI paristhiti kA sAmanA, AsAnI se kara sakate haiM.

eka bAra kI bAta hai. eka samRRiddha vyApArI, jo sadaiva apane gurU se parAmarsha karake kuCha na kuCha sukarma kiyA karatA thA, guru se bolA, gurudeva, dhanArjana hetu, maiM apanA gA.Nva pIChe zarUra Cho.Da AyA hU.N, para hara samaya mujhe lagatA rahatA hai, ki vahA.N para, eka aisA devAlaya banAyA jAye, jisameM devapUjana ke sAtha-sAtha, bhojana kI bhI vyavasthA ho, achChe saMskAroM se logoM ko susaMskRRita kiyA jAye, asharaNa ko sharaNa mile, vastrahIna kA tana Dhake, rogiyoM ko davA aura chikitsA mile, bachche apane dharma ke vAstavika svarUpa se, avagata ho sakeM. sunate hI guru prasannatApUrvaka bole, kevala gA.Nva meM hI kyoM, tuma aisA hI eka maMdira, apane isa nagara meM bhI banavAo. vyApArI ko sujhAva pasaMda AyA, aura usane do maMdira, eka apane gA.Nva, aura dUsarA apane nagara meM, jahA.N vo apane parivAra ke sAtha rahatA thA, banavA die. donoM devAlaya, shIghra hI logoM kI shraddhA ke keMdra bana gaye. lekina kuCha dina hI bIte the ki vyApArI ne dekhA, ki nagara ke loga, gA.Nva ke mandira meM Ane lage haiM, jabaki vahA.N pahu.Nchane kA rAstA kAfI kaThina hai. usakI samajha meM nahIM A rahA thA ki aisA kyoM ho rahA hai.

kuCha bhArI mana se, vo guru jI ke pAsa gayA, aura sArA vRRittAMta kaha sunAyA. guru jI ne kuCha vichAra kiyA, aura phira use ye parAmarsha diyA, ki vo gA.Nva ke maMdira ke pujArI ko, nagara ke mandira meM sevA ke lie bulA le. usane aisA hI kiyA. nagara ke pujArI ko gA.Nva, aura gA.Nva ke pujArI ko, nagara meM sevA para niyukta kara diyA. kuCha hI dina bIte the, ki vo ye dekhakara stabdha raha gayA, ki aba gA.Nva ke loga, nagara ke mandira kI ora rukha karane lage haiM. aba to use hairAnI ke sAtha-sAtha, pareshAnI bhI anubhava hone lagI. binA eka kShaNa kI derI ke, vo gurujI ke pAsa jAkara, hAtha jo.Da kara kahane lagA, ApakI Aj~nAnusAra, maiMne donoM pujAriyoM kA sthAnAMtaraNa kiyA. lekina samasyA to pahale se bhI gambhIra ho chalI hai, ki aba to mere gA.Nva ke parichita aura parijana, kaShTa sahakara aura kirAyA–bhA.DA kharcha karake, nagara ke devAlaya meM Ane lage haiM. mujhase ye nahIM dekhA jAtA.

vyApArI kI bAta sunate hI guru jI sArI bAta samajha gaye, aura bole, hairAnI aura pareshAnI Cho.Do. daraasala, jo gA.Nva vAle pujArI haiM, unakA achChA svabhAva hI hai, jo loga usI devAlaya meM jAnA chAhate haiM, jahA.N ve hote haiM. unakA logoM se niHsvArtha prema, unake duHkha se dukhI honA, unake sukha meM prasanna honA, unase mitratA kA vyavahAra karanA hI, logoM ko, unakI ora AkarShita karatA hai, aura loga svataH hI, unakI aura khiMche chale Ate haiM. aba sArI bAta, vyApArI kI samajha meM A chukI thI.

mitroM, hameM bhI ye bAta achChe se samajhanI chAhie, ki hamArA vyaktitva, hamAre bAharI raMga-rUpa se nahIM, hamAre vyavahAra se nirdhArita hotA hai. bilakula eka samAna j~nAna, aura vesha-bhUShA vAle, do pujAriyoM meM, loga kaShTa saha kara bhI usI ke pAsa gae, jo adhika saMvedanashIla, aura vyavahArI thA. isI taraha, hama chAhe jisa kArya kShetra se ju.De hoM, hamArI saphalatA meM, hamAre vyavahAra kA bahuta ba.DA yogadAna hotA hai. hama sabhI ko isa parama satya kA bodha honA chAhie, ki isa dharatI para, mAtra, apane lie hI nahIM Aye haiM, hameM apane sukha-duHkha kI chiMtA ke sAtha-sAtha, dUsaroM ke dukha-sukha ko zarUra bAMTanA chAhie. unase mitratApUrNa vyavahAra karanA chAhie, tAki hama jahA.N para upasthita hoM, vahA.N para, svataH hI eka achChA vAtAvaraNa banA rahe, aura sakArAtmakatA kI taraMgoM se, hamarA jIvana-sAgara, lahalahAtA rahe .

bahuta samaya pahale kI bAta hai, himAlaya ke jaMgaloM meM, eka bahuta tAkatavara shera rahatA thA. eka dina, usane bArAsiMghe kA shikAra kiyA, aura khAne ke bAda, apanI guphA ko lauTane lagA. abhI usane chalanA shurU hI kiyA thA, ki eka siyAra, usake sAmane daMDavata karatA huA, usake guNagAna karane lagA. use dekha shera ne pUChA, are! tuma ye kyA kara rahe ho?
he jaMgala ke rAjA, maiM ApakA sevaka banakara, apanA jIvana dhanya karanA chAhatA hU.N. kRRipayA mujhe apanI sharaNa meM le lIjiye, aura apanI sevA karane kA avasara pradAna kIjiye, siyAra bolA.

shera jAnatA thA, ki siyAra kA asala makasada, usake dvArA Cho.DA gayA shikAra khAnA hai. para usane sochA, ki chalo, isake sAtha rahane se mere kyA jAtA hai. kuCha nahIM to, ChoTe-moTe kAma hI kara degA. aura usane siyAra ko apane sAtha rahane kI anumati de dI.

usa dina ke bAda se, jaba bhI shera shikAra karatA, siyAra bhI bhara peTa bhojana karatA. samaya bItatA gayA, aura roza mAMsAhAra karane se, siyAra kI tAkata bhI ba.Dha gayI. isI ghamaMDa meM, aba vo jaMgala ke bAkI jAnavaroM para rauba bhI jhA.Dane lagA. aura eka dina to usane hadda hI kara dI.

usane shera se kahA, Aja tuma ArAma karo. shikAra maiM karU.NgA, aura tuma merA Cho.DA huA mAMsa khAoge. shera ye suna, bahuta krodhita huA, para usane apane krodha para kAbU karate hue, siyAra ko sabaka sikhAnA chAhA. shera bolA, ye to ba.DI achChI bAta hai. Aja mujhe bhaiMsA khAne kA mana hai, tuma usI kA shikAra karo. siyAra, turaMta bhaiMsoM ke jhuNDa kI tarafa nikala pa.DA, aura dau.Date hue, eka ba.De se bhaiMse para jhapaTA. bhaiMsA satarka thA. usane turaMta apanI sIMgha ghumAI, aura siyAra ko dUra jhaTaka diyA. siyAra kI kamara TUTa gayI, aura vo kisI taraha ghisaTate hue, shera ke pAsa vApasa pahuMchA.
kyA huA, bhaiMsA kahA.N hai?, shera bolA.
huzUra, mujhe kShamA kIjiye. maiM bahaka gayA thA, aura khuda ko Apake barAbara samajhane lagA thA, siyAra giDagiDAte hue bolA.

dhUrta, tere jaise ehasAna farAmosha kA yahI hasra hotA hai. maiMne tere Upara dayA kara ke tujhe apane sAtha rakhA, aura tU mere Upara hI dhauMsa jamAne lagA, aura aisA kahate hue, shera ne apane eka hI prahAra se, siyAra ko, Dhera kara diyA.

kisI ke kiye gae upakAra ko bhUla, use hI nIchA dikhAne vAle logoM kA, vahI hasra hotA hai, jo isa kahAnI meM, siyAra kA huA. hameM hameshA, apanI vartamAna yogyatAoM kA sahI AMkalana karanA chAhie, aura ghamaMDa meM Akara, kisI taraha kA mUrkhatApUrNa kArya, nahIM karanA chAhie.

kisI shahara meM, do bhAI rahate the. uname se eka, shahara kA sabase ba.DA bizanesamaina thA, to dUsarA, eka Draga-eDikTa thA, jo aksara nashe kI hAlata meM, logoM se mAra-pITa kiyA karatA thA. jaba loga inake bAre meM jAnate, to bahuta Ashcharya karate, ki Akhira donoM meM itanA aMtara kyoM hai, jabaki donoM, eka hI mAtA-pitA kI saMtAne haiM, eka jaisI shikShA prApta hai, aura bilakula eka jaise mAhaula meM pale-baDhe haiM. kuCha logoM ne isa bAta kA patA lagAne kA nishchaya kiyA, aura shAma ko, bhAiyoM ke ghara pahuMche.

andara ghusate hI, unheM nashe meM dhuta, eka vyakti dikhA. ve usake pAsa gae aura pUChA, bhAI, tuma aise kyoM ho?. tuma bevajaha logoM se la.DAI-jhagaDA karate ho, nashe meM dhuta, apane bIvI-bachchoM ko pITate ho, Akhira ye saba karane kI vajaha kyA hai?
mere pitA, bhAI ne uttara diyA.
pitA! vo kaise?, logoM ne pUChA.
bhAI bolA, mere pitA sharAbI the. ve aksara merI mA.N aura hama donoM bhAiyoM ko pITA karate the. bhalA tuma loga mujhase aura kyA ummIda kara sakate ho. maiM bhI vaisA hI hU.N.

phira ve loga dUsare bhAI ke pAsa gae. vo apane kAma meM vyasta thA, aura tho.DI dera bAda, unase milane AyA. mAfa kIjiyegA, mujhe Ane meM tho.DI dera ho gayI. batAie, maiM ApakI kyA madada kara sakatA hU.N?
logoM ne isa bhAI se bhI vahI prashna kiyA, Apa itane sammAnita bizanesamaina haiM, ApakI hara jagaha pUCha hai, sabhI ApakI prashaMsA karate haiM. Akhira ApakI ina upalabdhiyoM kI vajaha kyA hai?
mere pitA, uttara AyA.
logoM ne Ashcharya se pUChA, bhalA vo kaise?

mere pitA sharAbI the. nashe meM vo hameM mArA-pITA karate the. maiM ye saba chupa-chApa dekhA karatA thA, aura tabhI maiMne nishchaya kara liyA thA, kI maiM aisA bilakula nahIM bananA chAhatA. mujhe to eka sabhya, sammAnita, aura ba.DA AdamI bananA hai, aura maiM vahI banA. bhAI ne apanI bAta, pUrI kI.
