baMdaroM kA saradAra, apane bachche ke sAtha, kisI ba.De se pe.Da kI DAlI para baiThA huA thA. bachchA bolA, mujhe bhUkha lagI hai, kyA Apa mujhe khAne ke lie kuCha pattiyAM de sakate haiM. bandara muskurAyA, maiM de to sakatA hU.N, para achChA hogA, tuma khuda hI apane lie pattiyAM to.Da lo. lekina mujhe achChI pattiyoM kI pahachAna nahIM hai, bachchA udAsa hote hue bolA. tumhAre pAsa eka vikalpa hai, bandara bolA. isa pe.Da ko dekho, tuma chAho, to nIche kI DAliyoM se, purAnI ka.DI pattiyAM chuna sakate ho, yA Upara kI patalI DAliyoM para ugI, tAzI-narama pattiyAM to.Dakara khA sakate ho. bachchA bolA, ye ThIka nahIM hai, bhalA ye achChI–achChI pattiyAM nIche kyoM nahIM uga sakatIM, tAki sabhI loga AsAnI se unheM khA sakeM. yahI to bAta hai, agara vo sabakI pahu.Ncha meM hotIM, to unakI upalabdhatA kahA.N ho pAtI. unake baढ़ne se pahale hI, unheM to.Da kara khA liyA jAtA, bandara ne samajhAyA. lekina ina patalI DAliyoM para chaढ़nA, khataranAka ho sakatA hai. DAla TUTa sakatI hai, merA pA.Nva phisala sakatA hai, maiM nIche girakara choTila ho sakatA hU.N, bachche ne apanI chiMtA jatAI. bandara bolA, suno beTA, eka bAta hameshA yAda rakho, hama apane dimAga meM khatare kI jo tasvIra banAte haiM, aksara khatarA, usase kahIM kama hotA hai. para aisA hai, to hara eka bandara una DAliyoM se tAzI pattiyAM to.Dakara kyoM nahIM khAtA, bachche ne pUChA. bandara kuCha socha kara bolA, kyoMki zyAdAtara baMdaroM ko Dara kara jIne kI Adata pa.Da chukI hotI hai. ve sa.DI-galI pattiyAM khAkara, usakI shikAyata karanA pasaMda karate haiM, para kabhI khatarA uThAkara, vo pAne kI koshisha nahIM karate, jo vo sachamucha pAnA chAhate haiM. para tuma aisA mata karanA. ye jaMgala tamAma, sambhAvanAoM se bharA huA hai. apane Dara ko jIto, aura jAo, aisI zindagI jiyo, jo tuma sachamucha jInA chAhate ho. bachchA samajha chukA thA, ki use kyA karanA hai. usane turaMta hI, apane Dara ko pIChe Cho.DA, aura tAzI-narama pattiyoM se apanI bhUkha miTAI.

ajaya, rAjasthAna ke kisI shahara meM rahatA thA. vo grejueTa thA, aura eka prAiveTa kaMpanI meM jaॉba karatA thA. para vo apanI zindagI se khusha nahIM thA. hara samaya vo kisI na kisI samasyA se pareshAna rahatA thA, aura usI ke bAre meM sochatA rahatA thA.

eka bAra, ajaya ke shahara se kuCha dUrI para, eka fakIra bAbA kA kAfilA rukA huA thA. shahara meM chAroM aura unhI kI charchA thI. bahuta se loga, apanI samasyAeM lekara unake pAsa pahu.Nchane lage. ajaya ko bhI isa bAre meM patA chalA, aura usane bhI fakIra bAbA ke darshana karane kA nishchaya kiyA.
ChuTTI ke dina subaha-subaha hI, ajaya, unake kAfile taka pahuMchA. vahAM saika.DoM logoM kI bhI.Da juTI huI thI. bahuta iMtazAra ke bAda, ajaya kA naMbara AyA.

vo bAbA se bolA, bAbA, maiM apane jIvana se bahuta dukhI hU.N. hara samaya samasyAeM mujhe ghere rahatI haiM. kabhI ऑfisa kI TeMshana rahatI hai, to kabhI ghara para anabana ho jAtI hai, aura kabhI, apanI sehata ko lekara pareshAna rahatA hU.N. bAbA, koI aisA upAya batAiye, ki mere jIvana se sabhI samasyAeM Katma ho jAeM, aura maiM chaina se jI sakU.N.
bAbA muskurAye, aura bole, putra, Aja bahuta dera ho gayI hai. maiM tumhAre prashna kA uttara, kala subaha dUMgA. lekina kyA tuma merA eka ChoTA sA kAma karoge?
zarUra karU.NgA, ajaya utsAha ke sAtha bolA.

dekho beTA, hamAre kAfile meM sau UMTa haiM, aura inakI dekhabhAla karane vAlA, Aja bImAra pa.Da gayA hai. maiM chAhatA hU.N ki Aja rAta, tuma inakA khayAla rakho, aura jaba sau ke sau UMTa baiTha jAeM, to tuma bhI so jAnA, aisA kahate hue, bAbA apane tambU meM chale gae.
agalI subaha, bAbA ajaya se mile, aura pUChA, kaho beTA, nIMda achChI AI.
kahA.N bAbA, maiM to eka pala bhI nahIM so pAyA. maiMne bahuta koshisha kI, para maiM sabhI UMToM ko nahIM baiThA pAyA. koI na koI UMTa kha.DA ho hI jAtA, ajaya dukhI hote hue bolA.
maiM jAnatA thA, yahI hogA. Aja taka kabhI aisA nahIM huA, ki ye sAre UMTa, eka sAtha baiTha jAeM, bAbA bole.
ajaya nArAzagI ke svara meM bolA, to phira Apane mujhe aisA karane ko kyoM kahA.

bAbA bole, beTA, kala rAta tumane kyA anubhava kiyA. yahI nA, ki chAhe jitanI bhI koshisha kara lo, sAre UMTa eka sAtha nahIM baiTha sakate. tuma eka ko baiThAoge, to kahIM aura koI dUsarA kha.DA ho jAegA. isI taraha, tuma eka samasyA kA samAdhAna karoge, to kisI kAraNavasha, dUsarI kha.DI ho jAegI. putra, jaba taka jIvana hai, ye samasyAeM to banI hI rahatI haiM, kabhI kama, to kabhI zyAdA.
to hameM kyA karanA chAhie, ajaya ne jij~nAsAvasha pUChA.

ina samasyAoM ke bAvajUda, jIvana kA AnaMda lenA sIkho. kala rAta kyA huA. kaI UMTa rAta hote-hote khuda hI baiTha gae, kaI tumane apane prayAsa se baiThA die. para bahuta se UMTa, tumhAre prayAsa ke bAda bhI nahIM baiThe. aura jaba bAda meM tumane dekhA, to pAyA, ki tumhAre jAne ke bAda, uname se kuCha, khuda hI baiTha gae. kuCha samajhe. samasyAeM bhI aisI hI hotI haiM. kuCha to apane Apa hI Katma ho jAtI haiM, kuCha ko tuma apane prayAsa se hala kara lete ho, aura kuCha tumhAre bahuta koshisha karane para bhI hala nahIM hotIM. aisI samasyAoM ko, samaya para Cho.Da do. uchita samaya para, ve khuda hI Katma ho jAtI haiM. aura jaisA ki maiMne pahale kahA, jIvana hai, to kuCha samasyAeM raheMgI hI raheMgI. para isakA ye matalaba nahIM, kI tuma dina rAta unhI ke bAre meM sochate raho. aisA hotA, to UMToM kI dekhabhAla karane vAlA kabhI so hI nahIM pAtA. samasyAoM ko eka tarafa rakho, aura jIvana kA AnaMda lo. chaina kI nIMda so. jaba unakA samaya AegA, to vo khuda hI hala ho jAe.NgI putra. Ishvara ke die hue AshIrvAda ke lie, use dhanyavAda karanA sIkho, pI.DAeM khuda hI kama ho jAeMgI, fakIra bAbA ne apanI bAta pUrI kI.

bahuta samaya pahale kI bAta hai. kisI gA.Nva meM, ChaH aMdhe AdamI rahate the. eka dina gA.Nva vAloM ne unheM batAyA, are, Aja gA.Nva meM hAthI AyA hai. unhoMne Aja taka basa hAthiyoM ke bAre meM sunA thA, para kabhI ChU kara mahasUsa nahIM kiyA thA. unhoMne nishchaya kiyA, bhale hI hama hAthI ko dekha nahIM sakate, para Aja hama saba chalakara use mahasUsa to kara sakate haiM nA, aura phira, vo saba, usa jagaha kI tarafa ba.Dha chale, jahA.N hAthI AyA huA thA. sabhI ne hAthI ko ChUnA shurU kiyA.
maiM samajha gayA, hAthI eka khambhe kI taraha hotA hai, pahale vyakti ne, hAthI kA paira ChUte hue kahA.
are nahIM, hAthI to rassI kI taraha hotA hai, dUsare vyakti ne pU.NCha paka.Date hue kahA.
maiM batAtA hU.N, ye to pe.Da ke tane kI taraha hai, tIsare vyakti ne sUM.Dha paka.Date hue kahA.
tuma loga kyA bAta kara rahe ho, hAthI eka ba.De hAtha ke paMkhe kI taraha hotA hai, chauthe vyakti ne kAna ChUte hue sabhI ko samajhAyA.
nahIM-nahIM, ye to eka dIvAra kI taraha hai, pAMchave vyakti ne peTa para hAtha rakhate hue kahA.
aisA nahIM hai, hAthI to eka kaThora nalI kI taraha hotA hai, ChaThe vyakti ne apanI bAta rakhI.
aura phira, sabhI Apasa meM bahasa karane lage, aura khuda ko sahI sAbita karane meM laga gae. unakI bahasa teza hotI gayI, aura aisA lagane lagA, mAno vo Apasa meM la.Da hI pa.DeMge.

tabhI vahAM se eka buddhimAna vyakti guzara rahA thA. vo rukA, aura unase pUChA, kyA bAta hai, tuma saba Apasa meM jhaga.Da kyoM rahe ho. hama ye nahIM taya kara pA rahe haiM ki Akhira hAthI dIkhatA kaisA hai, unhoMne, uttara diyA. aura phira bArI bArI se unhoMne apanI bAta, usa vyakti ko samajhAI. buddhimAna vyakti ne sabhI kI bAta shAMti se sunI, aura bolA, tuma saba apanI-apanI jagaha sahI ho. tumhAre varNana meM aMtara isalie hai, kyoMki tuma sabane, hAthI ke alaga-alaga bhAga Chue haiM. para dekhA jAe, to tuma logo ne jo kuCha bhI batAyA, vo sabhI bAte, hAthI ke varNana ke lie sahI baiThatI haiM. achChA, aisA hai, sabhI ne eka sAtha uttara diyA. usake bAda koI vivAda nahIM huA, aura sabhI khusha ho gae, ki vo sabhI, sacha kaha rahe the.

dostoM kaI bAra aisA hotA hai, ki hama apanI bAta ko lekara a.Da jAte haiM, ki hama hI sahI haiM, aura bAkI saba galata haiM. lekina ye saMbhava hai ki hameM sikke kA, eka hI pahalu dikha rahA ho, aura usake AlAvA bhI kuCha aise tathya hoM, jo sahI hoM. isIlie hameM apanI bAta to rakhanI chAhie, para dUsaroM kI bAta bhI, sabra se sunanI chAhie, aura kabhI bhI, bekAra kI bahasa meM nahIM pa.DanA chAhie. vedoM meM bhI kahA gayA hai, ki eka satya ko kaI tarIke se batAyA jA sakatA hai. to jaba agalI bAra Apa aisI kisI bahasa meM pa.DeM, to yAda kara lIjiyegA, ki kahIM aisA to nahIM, ki Apake hAtha meM, sirfa pU.NCha hai, aura bAkI hisse, kisI aura ke pAsa hai.

eka bauddha bhikShuka, bhojana banAne ke lie, jaMgala se laka.DiyA.N chuna rahA thA, ki tabhI, usane kuCha anokhA dekhA. kitanA ajIba hai ye, usane binA pairoM kI loma.DI ko dekhate hue mana hI mana sochA. Akhira isa hAlata meM ye ziMdA kaise hai, use Ashacharya huA, aura Upara se ye bilakula svastha hai.

vo apane KayAloM meM khoyA huA thA, kI achAnaka chAroM tarafa, afarA–tafarI machane lagI. jaMgala kA rAjA shera, usa tarafa A rahA thA. bhikShuka bhI tezI dikhAte hue eka U.Nche pe.Da para cha.Dha gayA, aura vahIM se, saba kuCha dekhane lagA.

shera ne eka hirana kA shikAra kiyA thA, aura use apane jaba.De meM dabAkara, loma.DI kI tarafa, ba.Dha rahA thA. para usane loma.DI para hamalA nahIM kiyA, balki use bhI khAne ke lie, mAMsa ke kuCha Tuka.De DAla die.

ye to ghora Ashcharya hai. shera loma.DI ko mArane kI bajAye, use bhojana de rahA hai, bhikShuka budabudAyA. use apanI A.NkhoM para bharosA nahIM ho rahA thA. isalie vo agale dina phira vahI.N AyA, aura Chipakara, shera kA iMtazAra karane lagA. Aja bhI vaisA hI huA. shera ne apane shikAra kA kuCha hissA, loma.DI ke sAmane DAla diyA.

ye bhagavAna ke hone kA pramANa hai, bhikShuka ne apane Apa se kahA. vo jise paidA karatA hai, usakI roTI kA bhI iMtazAma kara detA hai. Aja se isa loma.DI kI taraha, maiM bhI Upara vAle kI dayA para jIUMgA. ishvara mere bhI bhojana kI vyavasthA karegA. aura aisA sochate hue, vo eka vIrAna jagaha para jAkara, eka pe.Da ke nIche baiTha gayA.

pahalA dina bItA, para koI vahAM nahIM AyA. dUsare dina bhI kuCha loga udhara se guzara gae, para bhikShuka kI tarafa kisI ne dhyAna nahIM diyA. idhara binA kuCha khAe-pIye vo kamazora hotA jA rahA thA. isI taraha kuCha aura dina bIta gae, aba to usakI rahI sahI tAkata bhI khatma ho gayI. vo chalane-phirane ke lAyaka bhI nahIM rahA. usakI hAlata, bilakula mRRita vyakti kI taraha ho chukI thI. kI tabhI, eka mahAtmA udhara se guzare, aura bhikShuka ke pAsa pahuMche. usane apanI sArI kahAnI, mahAtmA jI ko sunAI, aura bolA, aba Apa hI batAie, ki bhagavAna itanA nirdayI kaise ho sakate haiM. kyA kisI vyakti ko isa hAlata meM pahuMchAnA pApa nahIM hai. bilkula hai, mahAtmA jI ne kahA. lekina tuma itane mUrkha kaise ho sakate ho. tuma ye kyoM nahIM samajhe, ki bhagavAna tumhe use shera kI taraha banate dekhanA chAhate the, loma.DI kI taraha nahIM.

dostoM hamAre jIvana meM bhI aisA kaI bAra hotA hai, ki hameM chIzeM,jisa taraha samajhanI chAhie, usake viparIta samajha lete haiM. Ishvara ne sabhI ke andara kuCha na kuCha aisI shaktiyAM dI haiM, jo hameM mahAna banA sakatI haiM. zarurata hai, ki hama unheM pahachAne. usa bhikShuka kA saubhAgya thA, kI use usakI galatI kA ahasAsa karAne ke lie, mahAtmA jI mila gae. para hameM khuda bhI chaukannA rahanA chAhie, kI kahIM hama shera kI jagaha, loma.DI to nahIM bana rahe haiM.

eka AdamI hameshA kI taraha, apane nAI kI dukAna para bAla kaTavAne gayA. bAla kaTavAte vaqta, aksara desha-duniyA kI bAteM huA karatI thIM. Aja bhI ve sinemA, rAjanIti, aura khela jagata ityAdi ke bAre meM bAta kara rahe the. ki achAnaka, bhagavAna ke astitva ko lekara bAta hone lagI.
nAI ne kahA, dekhiye bhaiyA , ApakI taraha, maiM bhagavAna ke astitva meM yakIna nahIM rakhatA.
tuma aisA kyoM kahate ho, AdamI ne pUChA.

are, ye samajhanA bahuta AsAna hai. basa galI meM jAie, aura Apa samajha jAyeMge ki bhagavAna nahIM hai. Apa hI batAie, ki agara bhagavAna hote, to kyA itane loga bImAra hote? itane bachche anAtha hote? agara bhagavAna hote, to kisI ko koI darda koI takalIfa nahIM hotI, nAI ne bolanA jArI rakhA. maiM aise bhagavAna ke bAre meM nahIM socha sakatA, jo ina saba chIzoM ko hone de. Apa hI batAie, kahA.N hai bhagavAna?
AdamI eka kShaNa ke lie rukA, kuCha sochA, para bahasa baDhe nA, isalie chupa hI rahA.

nAI ne apanA kAma Katama kiyA, aura AdamI, kuCha sochate hue, dukAna se bAhara nikalA, aura kuCha dUra jAkara kha.DA ho gayA. kuCha dera iMtazAra karane ke bAda, use eka lambI dA.DhI–mUCha vAlA adhe.Da vyakti, usa tarafa AtA dikhAI pa.DA. use dekhakara lagatA thA, mAno vo kitane dinoM se nahAyA-dhoyA nA ho.
AdamI turaMta nAI ki dukAna meM vApasa ghusa gayA, aura bolA, jAnate ho, isa duniyA meM nAI nahIM hote.
bhalA kaise nahIM hote haiM?, nAI ne savAla kiyA. maiM sAkShAta tumhAre sAmane hU.N.
nahIM, AdamI ne kahA, vo nahIM hote haiM. varanA kisI kI bhI lambI dA.DhI–mUCha nahIM hotI. para vo dekho, sAmane usa AdamI kI kitanI lambI dA.DhI-mUCha hai.
are nahIM bhAIsAhaba, nAI hote haiM. lekina bahuta se loga, hamAre pAsa nahIM Ate, nAI bolA.

bilakula sahI, AdamI ne nAI ko rokate hue kahA. yahI to bAta hai. bhagavAna bhI hote haiM, para loga unake pAsa nahIM jAte, aura nA hI unheM khojane kA prayAsa karate haiM. isIlie duniyA meM itanA duHkha-darda hai.

haMsoM kA eka jhuNDa, samudra taTa ke Upara se guzara rahA thA. usI jagaha, eka kauvA bhI mauja mastI kara rahA thA. usane haMsoM ko, upekShA bharI nazaroM se dekhA. tuma loga kitanI achChI u.DAna bhara lete ho. kauvA mazAka ke lahaje meM bolA, tuma loga aura kara hI kyA sakate ho, basa apanA paMkha pha.Dapha.DA kara, u.DAna bhara sakate ho. kyA tuma merI taraha phUrtI se u.Da sakate ho. merI taraha, havA meM kalAbAziyAM dikhA sakate ho. nahIM, tuma to ThIka se jAnate bhI nahIM ki u.DanA kise kahate haiM.
kauve kI bAta sunakara, eka vRRiddha haMsa bolA, ye achChI bAta hai ki tuma ye saba kara lete ho, lekina tumhe isa bAta para ghamaMDa nahIM karanA chAhie.
maiM ghamaMDa–vamaMDa nahIM jAnatA. agara tuma meM se koI bhI merA mukAbalA kara sakata hai, to sAmane Aye, aura mujhe harA kara dikhAe.

eka yuvA nara haMsa ne kauve kI chunautI svIkAra kara lI. ye taya huA, ki pratiyogitA do charaNoM meM hogI, pahale charaNa meM kauvA, apane karataba dikhAyegA, aura haMsa ko bhI vahI karake dikhAnA hogA, aura dUsare charaNa meM, kauve ko haMsa ke karataba, doharAne hoMge.

pratiyogitA shurU huI, pahale charaNa kI shuruAta kauve ne kI, aura eka se ba.Dhakara eka kalAbAziyAM dikhAne lagA. vo kabhI gola-gola chakkara khAtA, to kabhI zamIna ChUte hue, Upara u.Da jAtA. vahI.N, haMsa usake mukAbale kuCha KAsa nahIM kara pAyA. kauvA aba aura bhI ba.Dha-cha.Dha kara bolane lagA, maiM to pahale hI kaha rahA thA, ki tuma logoM ko aura kuCha bhI nahIM AtA.

phira dUsarA charaNa shurU huA. haMsa ne u.DAna bharI, aura samudra kI tarafa, u.Dane lagA. kauvA bhI usake pIChe ho liyA, ye kauna sA kamAla dikhA rahe ho, bhalA sIdhe-sIdhe u.DanA bhI koI chunautI hai, sacha meM, tuma mUrkha ho! kauvA bolA.

para haMsa ne koI javAba nahI diyA, aura chupa-chApa u.DatA rahA. dhIre-dhIre, ve zamIna se bahuta dUra hote gae, aura kauve kA baDabaDAnA bhI, kama hotA gayA, aura kuCha dera meM bilakula hI baMda ho gayA. kauvA aba burI taraha thaka chukA thA, itanA, ki aba usake lie khuda ko havA meM rakhanA bhI mushkila ho rahA thA, aura vo bAra-bAra, pAnI ke karIba pahucha rahA thA. haMsa, kauve kI sthiti, samajha rahA thA, para usane anajAna banate hue kahA, tuma bAra-bAra pAnI kyoM ChU rahe ho, kyA ye bhI tumhArA koI karataba hai. nahIM, kauvA bolA, mujhe mAfa kara do, maiM aba bilakula thaka chUkA hU.N, aura yadi tumane merI madada nahIM kI, to maiM yahIM dama to.Da dUMgA. mujhe bachA lo, maiM kabhI ghamaMDa nahIM dikhAUMgA.

haMsa ko kauve para dayA A gayI, usane sochA, ki chalo, kauvA sabaka to sIkha hI chukA hai, aba usakI jAna bachAnA hI ThIka hogA, aura vo kauve ko apane pITha para baiThA kara, vApasa taTa kI ora, u.Da chalA.
bahuta samaya pahale kI bAta hai. kisI jaMgala meM eka gadhA, baragada ke pe.Da ke nIche leTa kara, ArAma kara rahA thA.

leTe-leTe usake mana meM bure KayAla Ane lage. usane sochA, yadi dharatI phaTa gayI, to merA kyA hogA. abhI usane aisA sochA hI thA, ki use eka zora se dhamAke kI AvAza AyI. vo bhayabhIta ho uThA, aura chIkhane lagA, bhAgo-bhAgo, dharatI phaTa rahI hai, apanI jAna bachAo. aura aisA kahate hue, vo pAgaloM kI taraha eka dishA meM bhAgane lagA.
use isa kadara bhAgatA dekhate hue, eka anya gadhe ne usase pUChA, are kyA huA bhAI, tuma isa taraha badahavAsa bhAge kyoM jA rahe ho?
are tuma bhI bhAgo, apanI jAna bachAo, dharatI phaTa rahI hai, aisA chIkhate hue, vo bhAgatA rahA.
ye sunakara dUsarA gadhA bhI Dara gayA, aura usake sAtha, bhAgane lagA. aba to vo donoM eka sAtha chillA rahe the, bhAgo-bhAgo dharatI phaTa rahI hai.

dekhate-dekhate saika.DoM gadhe isa bAta ko doharAte hue, usI dishA meM bhAgane lage. gadhoM ko isa taraha bhAgatA dekha, anya jAnavara bhI Dara gae. dharatI phaTane kI khabara jaMgala meM lagI Aga kI taraha, phailane lagI, aura jalda hI sabako patA chala gayA, kI dharatI phaTa rahI hai. chAroM tarafa jAnavaroM kI chIkha-pukAra macha gayI. sAMpa, bichChu, sIyAra, lomaDa, hAthI, gho.De, sabhI usa jhuNDa meM, shAmila ho, bhAgane lage.

jaMgala meM phaile isa ho-halle ko suna, apanI guphA meM vishrAma kara rahA jaMgala kA rAjA shera, bAhara nikalA. use apanI A.NkhoM para yakIna nahIM huA, ki sAre jAnavara, eka hI dishA meM bhAge jA rahe haiM. vo uChala kara sabake sAmane AyA, aura gUMjatI huI dahA.Da ke sAtha bolA, ye kyA pAgalapana hai, kahA.N bhAge jA rahe ho tuma saba?
mahArAja, dharatI phaTa rahI hai, Apa bhI apanI jAna bachAie. jhuNDa meM Age kha.DA bandara bolA.
kisane kahA ye saba, shera ne prashna kiyA.

saba eka dUsare kA muMha dekhane lage, phira bandara bolA, mujhe to ye bAta chIte ne batAyI thI. chIte ne kahA, maiMne to ye pakShiyoM se sunA thA. aura aise karate karate patA chalA, ki ye bAta, sabase pahale gadhe ne batAI thI.
gadhe ko mahArAja ke sAmane bulAyA gayA. tumhe kaise patA chalA, ki dharatI phaTa rahI hai, shera ne gusse se pUChA.
maiMne apane kAno se dharatI ke phaTane kI AvAza sunI mahArAja, gadhe ne Darate hue uttara diyA.

ThIka hai, chalo, mujhe usa jagaha le chalo, aura dikhAo, ki dharatI phaTa rahI hai. aisA kahate hue, shera gadhe ko usa tarafa dhakelatA huA le jAne lagA. bAkI jAnavara bhI unake pIChe ho lie, aura Dara-Dara kara, usa ora, ba.Dhane lage. baragada ke pAsa pahucha kara gadhA bolA, huzUra, maiM yahIM so rahA thA, ki tabhI zora se, dharatI phaTane kI AvAza AI. maiMne khuda uDatI huI dhUla dekhI, aura bhAgane lagA.

shera ne Asa pAsa jA kara dekhA, aura sArA mAmalA samajha gayA. usane sabhI ko saMbodhita karate hue kahA, ye gadhA mahAmUrkha hai. daraasala, pAsa hI nAriyala kA eka U.NchA pe.Da hai, aura teza havA chalane se, usa para lagA eka ba.DA sA nAriyala, nIche patthara para gira pa.DA. patthara sarakane se, Asa-pAsa dhUla u.Dane lagI, aura ye gadhA nA jAne kaise, ise dharatI phaTane kI bAta samajha baiThA. shera ne bolanA jArI rakhA, para bhAiyoM, ye to gadhA hai, para kyA Apake pAsa bhI apanA dimAga nahIM hai, jAie, apane ghara jAiye, aura AindA se kisI afavAha para yakIna karane se pahale, dasa bAra sochiyegA.

isIlie, hameM kisI gadhe kI bAta para yakIna karane se pahale, apanA dimAga, zarUra lagA lenA chAhie, aura ye bhI samajhanA chAhie, ki agara saika.DoM loga bhI kisI galata chIza ko ba.DhAvA de rahe haiM, to bhI vo galata hI rahatI hai, aura usase bachane meM hI, bhalAI hai.

eka maka.DI thI. usane ArAma se rahane ke lie, eka shAnadAra jAlA banAne kA vichAra kiyA, aura sochA, kI isa jAle me khUba kI.DeM, makkhiyA.N phaseMgI, aura mai use AhAra banAuMgI, aura maze se rahUMgI. usane kamare ke eka kone ko pasaMda kiyA, aura vahA.N jAlA bunanA shurU kiyA. kuCha dera bAda, AdhA jAlA buna kara taiyAra ho gayA. ye dekhakara, vo maka.DI kAfI khusha huI, ki tabhI achAnaka usakI nazara, eka billI para pa.DI, jo use dekhakara, ha.Nsa rahI thI.
maka.DI ko gussA A gayA, aura vo billI se bolI, ha.Nsa kyoM rahI ho?
ha.NsU nahI to kyA karU.N, billI ne javAba diyA. yahA.N makkhiyA.N nahI hai. ye jagaha to bilakula sAfa sutharI hai, yahA.N kauna AyegA tere jAle me.

ye bAta, maka.DI ke gale utara gaI. usane achChI salAha ke liye billI ko dhanyavAda diyA, aura jAlA adhUrA Cho.Dakara, dUsarI jagaha talAsha karane lagI. usane Idhara Udhara dekhA. use eka khi.DakI nazara AyI, aura usane jAlA bunanA, shurU kiyA. kuCha dera taka vo jAlA bunatI rahI, tabhI eka chi.DiyA AyI, aura maka.DI kA mazAka u.DAte hue bolI, are maka.DI, tU bhI kitanI bevakUfa hai.
kyoM, maka.DI ne pUChA.
chi.DiyA use samajhAne lagI, are yahAM to khi.DakI se teza havA AtI hai. yahAM to tU apane jAle ke sAtha hI u.Da jAyegI.

maka.DI ko chi.DiyA kI bAta ThIka lagI, aura vo vahA.N bhI jAlA adhUrA banA Cho.Dakara sochane lagI, aba kahA.N jAlA banAyA.N jAye. samaya kAfI bIta chUkA thA, aura aba use bhUkha bhI lagane lagI thI. aba use eka AlamArI kA khulA daravAzA dikhA, aura usane usI me, apanA jAlA bunanA shurU kiyA. kuCha jAlA bunA hI thA, tabhI use eka kaॉkrocha nazara AyA, jo jAle ko acharaja bhare nazaro se dekha rahA thA.
maka.DI ne pUChA, isa taraha kyoM dekha rahe ho?

kaॉkrocha bolA, are, yahA.N kahA.N jAlA bunane chalI AyI. ye to bekAra kI AlamArI hai. abhI ye yahA.N pa.DI hai, kuCha dinoM bAda ise becha diyA jAyegA, aura tumhArI sArI mehanata bekAra chalI jAyegI. ye suna kara, maka.DI ne vahAM se haTa jAnA hI behatara samajhA.

bAra-bAra prayAsa karane se, vo kAfI thaka chukI thI, aura usake aMdara jAlA bunane kI tAkata hI nahI bachI thI. bhUkha kI vajaha se vo pareshAna thI. use paChatAvA ho rahA thA, ki agara pahale hI jAlA buna letI to achChA rahatA. para aba vo kuCha nahIM kara sakatI thI, usI hAlata me pa.DI rahI.
jaba maka.DI ko lagA ki aba kuCha nahIM ho sakatA, to usane pAsa se guzara rahI chIMTI se madada karane kA Agraha kiyA.

chIMTI bolI, maiM bahuta dera se tumhe dekha rahI thI, tuma bAra-bAra apanA kAma shurU karatI, aura dUsaroM ke kahane para, use adhUrA Cho.Da detI. aura jo loga aisA karate haiM, unakI yahI hAlata hotI hai. aura aisA kahate hue vo apane rAste chalI gaI, aura maka.DI paChatAtI huI, niDhAla pa.DI rahI.

eka bAra, eka kisAna ne apane paDosI ko bhalA burA kaha diyA. para jaba bAda meM use apanI galatI kA ehasAsa huA, to vo eka saMta ke pAsa gayA. usane saMta se, apane shabda vApasa lene kA upAya pUChA.
saMta ne kisAna se kahA, tuma khUba sAre paMkha ikaThThA kara lo, aura unheM shahara ke bIchoM-bIcha jAkara, rakha do. kisAna ne aisA hI kiyA, aura phira saMta ke pAsa pahuMcha gayA.
taba saMta ne kahA, aba jAo, aura una paMkhoM ko ikaThThA kara ke vApasa le Ao.

kisAna vApasa gayA. para taba taka, sAre paMkha, havA se idhara-udhara u.Da chuke the. aura kisAna khAlI hAtha, saMta ke pAsa pahuMchA. taba saMta ne usase kahA, ki ThIka aisA hI, tumhAre dvArA kahe gae shabdoM ke sAtha hotA hai, tuma AsAnI se inheM apane mukha se nikAla to sakate ho, para chAha kara bhI, vApasa nahIM le sakate.

eka bAra eka naujavAna la.Dake ne sukarAta se pUChA, ki saphalatA kA rahasya kyA hai. sukarAta ne usa la.Dake se kahA, ki tuma kala mujhe nadI ke kinAre milo. vo mile. phira sukarAta ne naujavAna se, unake sAtha, nadI kI tarafa ba.Dhane ko kahA. jaba Age ba.Dhate-ba.Dhate pAnI gale taka pahu.Ncha gayA, tabhI achAnaka, sukarAta ne usa la.Dake kA sara paka.Da ke pAnI meM Dubo diyA. la.DakA bAhara nikalane ke lie saMgharSha karane lagA, lekina sukarAta tAkatavara the, aura use taba taka Duboye rakhe, jaba taka kI vo nIlA nahIM pa.Dane lagA. phira sukarAta ne usakA sara pAnI se bAhara nikAla diyA, aura bAhara nikalate hI, jo chIza usa la.Dake ne sabase pahale kI, vo thI, hA.Nphate-hA.Nfate, tezI se, sAMsa lenA.

sukarAta ne pUChA, jaba tuma vahA.N the, to tuma sabase zyAdA kyA chAhate the. la.Dake ne uttara diyA, sAMsa lenA. sukarAta ne kahA, yahI saphalatA kA rahasya hai. jaba tuma saphalatA ko utanI hI burI taraha se chAhoge, jitanA kI tuma sAMsa lenA chAhate the, to vo tumhe mila jAegI. isake AlAvA aura koI rahasya nahIM hai.

eka samaya kI bAta hai. eka tAlAba ke kinAre, eka kaChuA, aura do haMsa rahate the. kaChuA, tAlAba meM rahatA thA. usakI haMsoM ke sAtha dostI ho gayI thI, jo usase milane, hameshA tAlAba taka Ate rahate the. saba bahuta KushI KushI milajula kara rahate the.

eka sAla, vahAM akAla pa.DA. bahuta dinoM taka bArisha nahIM huI. saba kheta khalihAna, tAlAba sUkha gae. pAnI kI eka bU.Nda bhI nahIM bachI, kisI ke pIne ke lie. sAre jAnavara, pAnI ke AbhAva, aura teza garmI kI vajaha se, marane lage. taba bahuta sAre jAnavaroM ne, dUsarI jagaha jAnA taya kiyA, jahA.N para pAnI bhI ho, aura kheta-khalihAna, hare-bhare hoM.

tInoM dosta, kaChuA, aura haMsoM ne bhI, usa tAlAba ko Cho.Dakara, kahIM aura jAne kA faisalA kiyA, jahA.N bahuta pAnI ho, aura vahI.N hameshA ke lie basane kA vichAra kiyA. para dUsarI jagaha jAnA bhI mushkila thA. haMsoM ke lie to AsAna thA, kyUMki, unheM u.DanA AtA thA. para kaChue ke lie ye bahuta hI mushkila kAma thA. kaChue ko, u.DanA to AtA nahIM thA, aura zamIna para, utanI dUra chalanA bhI AsAna nahIM thA.

tInoM dostoM ne parAmarsha karake isa pareshAnI kA hala nikalane kI sochI. eka haMsa ne eka tarIkA sochA, kI agara kaChuA apane dAMtoM se, laka.DI kI DaMTe ko paka.Da le, to DaMTe ke donoM kinAroM ko, haMsa apane muMha meM davA kara, u.Da jAeMge. isameM kevala eka hI dikkata thI, kI kaChuA kuCha nA bole, nahIM to vo gira jAegA aura mara jAegA. donoM haMsa, bahuta chiMtita the, kyU.Nki kaChue ke lie chupa rahanA, bahuta mushkila thA, vo bahuta bAtUnI thA. kaChue ko bAta samajha meM AI, aura usane pratij~nA lI, kI vo pUre rAste, chupa rahegA.

yAtrA shuru karane se pahale, haMsoM ne phira se, apane mitra kaChue ko samajhAyA, kI kisI bhI stithi meM apanA muMha, nA khole. hidAyata de kara, haMsoM ne apane choMcha meM, laka.DI ko paka.Da liyA, aura kaChue ne, laka.DI ke bIcha vAle hisse ko dAMtoM meM paka.DA. aura isa taraha unakI yAtrA shuru huI. ve bahuta U.NchA U.NchA u.Date hue pahA.Da, kheta, maidAna ke Upara se jA rahe the. aMta meM, eka shahara ke Upara se guzare.

shahara ke logoM ne aisA nazArA pahalI bAra dekhA thA. sabhI bahuta Ashcharyachakita hue. sabhI loga haMsane lage, aura tAliyA.N bajAne lage, ha.Nso aura kaChue ko ese u.Date dekha kara. loga zora zora se hallA karane lage, aura haMsane lage. ye saba dekha kara kaChue ko gussA Ane lagA. apanI jij~nAsA ko rokane ki bajAya, usane bolane ke lie muMha kholA, aura usakI paka.Da, ChUTa gayI, aura vo gira kara mara gayA. isa taraha, kaChuA, apanI mUrkhatA, aura besabrI se, mArA gayA.

eka samaya kI bAta hai. amarAsakti nAma kA eka rAjA, dakShiNa bhArata meM rAja karatA thA. usake tIna kAmachora putra the, jo usakI chiMtA ke kAraNa bana chuke the. jaba rAjA ko yaha j~nAta huA, kI usake putroM ko kAma sIkhane meM koI rUchi nahIM hai, to rAjA ne apane maMtriyoM ko bulA kara kahA, Apa logoM ko to patA hI hai, kI maiM apane putroM se khusha nahIM hU.N. j~nAnI puruShoM ne kahA hai, kI ajanmeM putra, mUrkha putra se behatara hote haiM. mUrkha putra, apane pitA ke lie apamAna kA kAraNa banatA hai. mai unheM, apanA utarAdhikArI banane ke yogya kaise banAUM. merA mArgadarshana kareM.

eka maMtrI ne viShNusharmA kA nAma batAyA. maMtrI ne kahA, mahArAja, viShNusharmA eka bahuta hI j~nAnI puruSha haiM, jo apane sau se adhika shiShyoM ke sAtha rahate haiM. vo hI Apake putroM ko sahI shikShA de pAe.Nge. Apa unakI sharaNa meM jAyeM, aura Apako bahuta jalda hI badalAva dikhegA.

rAjA ne viShNusharmA ko bulAvA bhejA, aura unase vinatI kI, he j~nAnI, mujha para dayA karo, aura mere putroM ko shikShA de kara, unheM bhI j~nAnI banAo, aura maiM Apako sau gA.NvoM kA mAlika banA dUMgA.
viShNusharmA bole, he rAjA, merI bAta suno. sau gA.Nva kA lAlacha mujhe nahIM hai, Apa Aja se Chaha mahIne kI ginatI karo. agara maiM Apake putroM ko j~nAnI na banA dUM, to merA nAma badala denA.

rAjA ne turaMta apane putroM ko bulA bhejA, aura unheM, viShNusharmA ke supurda kara diyA. viShNusharmA, unheM apane Ashrama meM le gae, aura pAMcha yojanAyeM shikhAyI. apanI bAta rakhate hue, unhone apane rAjA ke dvArA diyA huA kAma, pUrA kara diyA. usake bAda se, paMchataMtra, pUrI duniyA meM, bachchoM ke mArgadarshana ke lie prasiddha ho gayA.

bahuta samaya pahale kI bAta hai. vardhamAna nAma kA eka vyApArI, dakShiNa bhArata meM rahatA thA. eka dina jaba vo ArAma kara rahA thA, taba usake mana meM khayAla AyA, kI isa duniyA meM paisA hI saba kuCha hai. jitanA vyakti ko milatA hai, vo utanA hI saktishAlI hotA hai. dushmana bhI amIra dosta DhUMDhate haiM. vRRiddha bhI javAna ho jAte haiM, agara unake pAsa paisA hotA hai, aura javAna bhI vRRiddha ho jAtA hai, agara usake pAsa paisA nahIM hotA hai.

saba kuCha vichAra karake, vardhamAna, eka achChA dina dekhakara, apanI zarUrata kA sAmAna lene bAzAra kI khoja meM nikala pa.DA. usane apanI yAtrA, eka suMdara sushobhita baila gA.DI meM nikAlI. rAstA lambA hone kI vajaha se, thakAna hone para, eka baila, jisakA nAma, saMjIvAkA thA, chakkara khA kara, jaMgala ke bIchoM bIcha, jamunA nadI ke kinAre gira pa.DA. phira bhI, vyApArI ne apanI yAtrA jArI rakhI, aura kuCha sevakoM ko, usa baila kA khayAla rakhane ke lie Cho.Da gayA. lekina usake naukara, mAlika ke jAne ke bAda, baila ko akelA Cho.Dakara chale gae, aura jaba apane mAlika se mile, to unheM batAyA, kI baila to mara chukA thA.

apane rAjA kI aisI hAlata dekha kara, do siyAra, karAtAkA aura damanakA, jinheM ye samajha meM nahIM A rahA thA, kI unake mAlika ko kyA huA hai. jaMgala ke mAlika ko kyA huA hai, damanakA ne pUChA. dUsaroM kI bAtoM meM apanI nAka nahIM ghusAnA chAhie, damanakA bolA.  jo
hara sunI huI bAta para bharosA nahIM karanA chAhie. aura dUsaroM kI bAta se apane ko dukhI nahIM karanA chAhie.

eka samaya kI bAta hai. meMDhakoM kA rAjA, gaMgAdattA, eka ba.De se kueM meM rahatA thA, jo usakA ghara bhI thA. apane gharavAloM se apamAna janaka bAteM suna kara, vo apanA rAjya Cho.Da kara, kueM meM rahane lagA.

jaba meMDhaka rAjA apanI socha meM khoyA huA thA, usI samaya usane eka ba.De se sAMpa ko, pe.Da ke tane meM jAte hue dekhA, aura sochane lagA, hameM dushmana se la.Dane ke lie, dushmana kA sAtha hI lenA chAhie. tAkatavara AdamI hI tAkatavara se la.Da sakatA hai. dushmana kA nAsha hI mere lie KushI lA sakatA hai.
apane Age lakShya ko dekha kara, vo pe.Da ke tane ke pAsa gayA, aura kobarA ko bulAyA, priyAdarsanA, kRRipayA bAhara AyeM.

kobarA sAvadhAna thA. usane sochA, ye kauna mujhe AvAza de rahA hai. ye merI jAtI kA to nahIM hai, aura maiM apanI jAtI ke bAhara, kisI se dostI nahIM karatA. maiM apane ghara ke aMdara hI rahatA hU.N, aura patA lagatA hU.N, kI ye bulAne vAlA kauna hai. ye koI jAdUgara ho sakatA hai, yA koI, jo merI madada chAhatA ho, apane dushmana ko Katama karane ke lie.
taba kobarA, aMdara se hI chillA kara bolA, tuma kauna ho?
maiM gaMgAdattA hU.N, meMDhakoM kA rAjA. Apase madada lene AyA hU.N, usane javAba diyA.

maiM tuma para vishvAsa nahIM karatA. kyA kabhI sUkhI ghAsa aura Aga ke bIcha dostI ho sakatI hai? kyA tumane sunA nahIM hai, kI shikAra aura shikArI, kabhI dosta nahIM bana sakate haiM. maiM tuma para vishvAsa nahIM kara sakatA hU.N, kobarA bolA.

he priyAdarsanA, jo maiM tumheM bola rahA hU.N vo satya hai. tuma mere janma se dushmana ho. para maiM tumhAre pAsa, madada ke lie AyA hU.N, apanI beyzatI kA badalA lene ke lie. kisI ne sacha kahA hai, jaba tumhArI zindagI para bana AtI hai, musIbata tumheM sAmane se dikhatI hai, apane dushmana ke hisAba se kAma karanA behatara hai, aura apanI zindagI aura ghara, bachA sakate haiM.
tumhArI kisane beyzatI kI hai, kobarA ne pUChA.
vo mere rishtedAra haiM.
tuma kahA.N rahate ho, vahA.N eka kuA.N hai yA tAlAba hai?
vo eka kuA.N hai, aura patthara kI dIvAreM haiM usakI.
para mere pAsa paira nahIM haiM. maiM kaise usa kueM ke pAsa pahu.Ncha kara tumhAre dushmana ko mAra sakatA hU.N?

Apa chiMtA mata karie. mujhe nA mata bolie. maiM Apako aMdara jAne kA rAstA dikhUMgA. usa kueM ke divAra para eka darAra hai, jo bilakula sahI jagaha hai Apake Chupane ke lie. AeyA, maiM Apako dikhatA hU.N, meMDhaka rAja ne bolA.
taba kobarA ne sochA, aba maiM bU.DhA ho gayA hU.N. bahuta mushkila se aba mujhe meMDhaka khAne ko milatA hai. mujhe isake sAtha jAnA chAhie, aura pratidina meMDhaka kA bhojana karanA chAhie.
phira meMDhaka rAja ko kobarA ne kahA.N, ThIka hai, chalo.

para eka sharta hai, gaMgAdatta bolA, priyAdarsanA, maiM Apako vahAM le jAU.NgA, aura jagaha dikhA dUMgA. para Apako, una meMDhaka ko Cho.Da denA hogA, jo mere karIba haiM. kevala unako hI khAhoge, jinheM maiM bolU.NgA.
kobarA ne javAba diyA, aba tuma mere dosta ho. maiM tumheM apanI zabAna detA hU.N. maiM kevala unheM khAU.NgA, jinheM tuma bologe.

taba kobarA apane bila se nikalA, aura meMDhaka rAja ke pIChe pIChe, kueM taka gayA. meMDhaka rAja ne usako kueM kA vo darAra dikhA diyA, jahA.N kobarA ArAma se Chupa kara baiTha sakatA thA. aura una rishtedAroM ko bhI dikhAyA, jinheM vo mAranA chAhatA thA. kobarA usa darAra meM Chupa kara baiTha gayA, aura samaya se pahale, una sAre meMDhaka ko khA gayA, jinheM, unake rAjA ne batAyA thA. aba, jaba sAre meMDhaka khattama ho gae, to kobarA, meMDhaka rAja ko bolA, maiMne tumhAre sAre dushmana, khatma kara die hai. aba mujhe nayA shikAra dikhAo. tumhI mujhe yahA.N lAye ho.
gaMgAdatta bolA, Apane apanA kAma karake merI madada kI hai. aba ye samaya hai kI Apa isa jagaha ko Cho.Da kara chale jAyeM.
maiM yahA.N se kaise jA sakatA hU.N? kobarA ne inakAra kiyA. merI jagaha, koI aura A jAyegA. maiM yahIM rahU.NgA. tuma mujhe pratidina eka meMDhaka do, bhojana ke lie, apane rishtedAroM se.
paChatAte hue, kI apane dushmana se dostI karake gaMgAdatta ne galata kiyA, gaMgAdatta sochane lagA, kI behatara yahI hogA kI pratidina, maiM apane eka rishtedAra ko de dUM.

phira meMDhaka rAja pratidina eka meMDhaka, kobarA ko dene lagA. para duShTa kobarA, sAre meMDhakoM ko nigala gayA. phira eka dina, yAmunAdAtta kI bArI thI, meMDhaka rAja ke putra kI bArI thI. rAjA apane beTe kI mRRityu para bahuta royA. usakI patnI ne usase kahA, kI aba rone kA koI fAyadA nahIM hai, aura ye bolA, kI use vo jagaha Cho.Da kara chale jAnA chAhie, tabhI usa kobarA ke AtaMka kA aMta ho sakatA hai.

jaise jaise dina guzare, kobarA ne meMDhaka rAja ke pUre kabile ko khatma kara diyA. aba kevala rAjA gaMgAdatta bacha gayA thA. isIlie vo gaMgAdatta se bolA, dekho dosta, aba yahA.N koI meMDhaka nahIM bachA hai mere khAne ke lie. mujhe bahuta bhUka lagI hai. mujhe batAo, aba maiM kyA khAU, jisase merI bhUka miTa sake.

rAjA bolA, priyAdarsanA, Apa khAne kI chiMtA mata kIjie. jaba taka maiM ApakA dosta hU.N, Apa mujhe isa kueM se nikAlane meM madada kIjie. maiM jAkara aisA kuA.N dekhatA hU.N, jisameM sAre meMDhaka bhare hue hoMge. maiM una logoM ko isa kueM ke pAsa Ane ke lie kahU.NgA, aura phira, tuma apanA peTa bhara lenA.

mere dosta, tuma gaMgAdatta ko to jAnate hI ho. kRRipayA usake pAsa jAo, aura usase kaho, agara vo mere lie meMDhaka nahIM lA sakatA hai to koI bAta nahIM, vo khuda vApasa A jAye. maiM itane achChe dosta ke binA nahIM raha sakatA hU.N.
gaMgAdatta bolA, bhUkhe AdamI kA kauna bharosA kara sakatA hai. tuma kRRipayA yahA.N se jAo.
aise logo se dostI mata karo, jo tumase kevala apanA matalaba nikAlanA chAhate haiM.
eka hAthI thA. usakA mitra, baMdara thA. lekina eka dina, una donoM kI mitratA TUTa gaI. to hAthI aura baMdara, alaga-alaga ho gae.

eka dina baMdara ne hAthI ko chi.DhAyA. vo bolA, laMbI sUMDa sUpA jaise kAna moTe-moTe paira. ye sunakara hAthI ko gussA AyA, to vo bhI baMdara ko chi.DhAne lagA. itanI laMbI pUMCha kAlA muMha kA baMdara.

ye sunakara baMdara ko bhI gussA AyA. usane hAthI ko, nAkhUna ga.DA die, to hAthI ne usako sUMDa se paka.Dakara, gola-gola ghumAkara, nadIM meM pheMka diyA, to baMdara chillAne lagA. hAthI mujhe bachAo-bachAo. hAthI ko dayA A gaI, aura use pAnI se bAhara nikAla liyA. baMdara ne hAthI se mAfI mAMgI, mujhe mAfa kara do. hAthI ne baMdara ko mAfa kara diyA, aura donoM, phira se, achChe dosta banakara rahane laga gae.

purAne samaya kI bAta hai. eka jaMgala meM eka shera rahatA thA. gIda.Da usakA sevaka thA. jo.DI achChI thI. sheroM ke samAja meM to usa shera kI koI izzata nahIM thI, kyoMki vo javAnI meM, sabhI dUsare sheroM se yuddha hAra chukA thA, isalie, vo alaga-thalaga rahatA thA. use gIda.Da jaise chamache kI sakhta zarUrata thI, jo chaubIsa ghaMTe, usakI chamachAgirI karatA rahe. gIda.Da ko basa khAne kA jugA.Da chAhie thA. peTa bhara jAne para, gIda.Da, usa shera kI vIratA ke aise guNa gAtA, ki shera kA sInA phUlakara, duganA chau.DA ho jAtA.

eka dina shera ne eka biga.Daila jaMgalI sAMDa kA shikAra karane kA sAhasa kara DAlA. sAMDa bahuta shaktishAlI thA. usane lAta mArakara, shera ko dUra pheMka diyA, jaba vo uThane ko huA, to sAMDa ne shera ko sIgoM se uThAkara eka peDa ke sAtha raga.Da diyA.

kisI taraha shera jAna bachAkara bhAgA. shera sIMgoM kI mAra se kAfI zakhmI ho gayA thA. kaI dina bIte, lekina shera ke zakhma ThIka hone kA nAma nahIM le rahe the. aisI hAlata meM, vo shikAra nahIM kara sakatA thA. svayaM shikAra karanA gIda.Da ke basa kA nahIM thA. donoM ke bhUkhoM marane kI naubata A gaI. shera ko ye bhI bhaya thA, ki khAne kA jugA.Da samApta hone ke kAraNa, gIda.Da usakA sAtha na Cho.Da jAe.

shera ne eka dina use sujhAyA, dekha, zakhmoM ke kAraNa maiM dau.Da nahIM sakatA. shikAra kaise karUM? tU jAkara kisI bevakUfa se jAnavara ko bAtoM meM phasAkara yahAM lA. maiM usa jhA.DI meM ChipA rahUMgA.

gIda.Da ko bhI shera kI bAta jaMcha gaI. vo kisI mUrkha jAnavara kI talAsha meM ghUmatA-ghUmatA, eka kasbe ke bAhara nadI-ghATa para pahuMchA. vahAM use eka mariyala-sA gadhA, ghAsa para muMha mAratA nazara AyA. vo shakla se hI bevakUfa laga rahA thA.
gIda.Da gadhe ke nikaTa jAkara bolA, bahuta kamazora ho gae ho, kyA bAta hai?
gadhe ne apanA dukha.DA royA, kyA batAUM bhAI, jisa dhobI kA maiM gadhA hUM, vo bahuta krUra hai. dina bhara DhulAI karavAtA hai, aura chArA kuCha detA nahIM.
gIda.Da ne use nyautA diyA, chAchA, mere sAtha jaMgala chalo na, vahAM bahuta harI-harI ghAsa hai. khUba charanA, tumhArI sehata bana jAegI.
gadhe ne kAna pha.Dapha.DAe, rAma rAma. maiM jaMgala meM kaise rahUMgA? jaMgalI jAnavara, mujhe khA jAeMge.

chAchA tumheM shAyada patA nahIM, ki jaMgala meM eka bagulA bhagatajI kA satsaMga huA thA. usake bAda, sAre jAnavara shAkAhArI bana gae haiM. aba koI kisI ko nahIM khAtA. gIda.Da bolA, aura kAna ke pAsa muMha le jAkara dAnA pheMkA, chAchU, pAsa ke kasbe se bechArI gadhI bhI apane dhobI mAlika ke atyAchAroM se taMga Akara, jaMgala meM A gaI. vahAM harI-harI ghAsa khAkara, vo khUba laharA gaI haiM, tuma usake sAtha ghara basA lenA.

gadhe ke dimAga para, harI-harI ghAsa, aura ghara basAne ke sunahare sapane ChAne lage. vo gIda.Da ke sAtha jaMgala kI ora chala diyA. jaMgala meM gIda.Da gadhe ko usI jhA.DI ke pAsa le gayA, jisameM shera ChipA baiThA thA. isase pahale ki shera paMjA mAratA, gadhe ko jhA.DI meM shera kI nIlI battiyoM kI taraha chamakatI AMkheM nazara A gaIM. vo Darakara uChalA, gadhA bhAgA, aura bhAgatA hI gayA. shera bujhe svara meM gIda.Da se bolA, bhaI, isa bAra maiM taiyAra nahIM thA. tuma use dobArA lAo, isa bAra galatI nahIM hogI.
gIda.Da dobArA usa gadhe kI talAsha meM kasbe meM pahuMchA. use dekhate hI bolA, chAchA, tumane to merI nAka kaTavA dI. tuma apanI dulhana se Darakara bhAga gae?
usa jhA.DI meM mujhe do chamakatI AMkheM dikhAI dI thI, jaise shera kI hotI haiM. maiM bhAgatA na to kyA karatA? gadhe ne shikAyata kI.

gIda.Da, nakalI mAthA pITakara bolA, chAchA o chAchA! tuma bhI nIre mUrkha ho. usa jhA.DI meM tumhArI dulhana thI. jAne kitane janmoM se vo tumhArI rAha dekha rahI thI. tumheM dekhakara usakI AMkheM chamaka uThI, to tumane use shera samajha liyA?

gadhA bahuta lajjita huA, gIda.Da kI chAla-bharI bAteM hI aisI thIM. gadhA, phira usake sAtha chala pa.DA. jaMgala meM jhA.DI ke pAsa pahuMchate hI shera ne nukIle paMjoM se use mAra girAyA. isa prakAra, shera va gIda.Da kA bhojana juTA.

eka samaya kI bAta thI, eka rAjA ne, eka pAlatU bandara ko apane sevaka ke rUpa meM rakhA huA thA. jahA.N-jahA.N rAjA jAtA, vo bandara bhI usake sAtha jAtA. rAjA ke darabAra meM, usa bandara ko rAjA kA pAlatU hone ke kAraNa, koI roka-Toka nahIM thI. garmI ke mausama meM eka dina rAjA, apane shayanakakSha meM, vishrAma kara rahA thA. vo bandara bhI shayyA ke pAsa baiTha kara, rAjA ko eka paMkhe se havA kara rahA thA. tabhI, eka makkhI AI, aura rAjA kI ChAtI para Akara baiTha gayI. jaba bandara ne usa makkhI ko baiThA dekhA, to usane use u.DAne kA prayAsa kiyA. hara bAra vo makkhI uDatI, aura tho.DI dera bAda, phira rAjA kI ChAtI para A kara baiTha jAtI. ye dekha kara, bandara gusse se lAla ho gayA. gusse meM, usane makkhI ko mArane kI ThAnI. phira vo bandara, makkhI ko mArane ke lie hathiyAra DhUDane lagA. kuCha dUra hI, use rAjA kI talavAra dikhAI dI. usane vo talavAra uThAI, aura gusse meM makkhI ko mArane ke lie, pUre bala se, talavAra rAjA kI ChAtI para mAra dI. isase pahale kI talavAra makkhI ko lagatI, makkhI vahA.N se u.Da gayI. bandara ke bala se kiye gae vAra se makkhI to nahIM marI, magara usase, rAjA kI mRRityu avashya ho gayI. isIlie kahate haiM, ki mUrkha ko apanA sevaka banAne meM, koI bhalAI nahIM hai.

eka samaya kI bAta thI, eka pahA.Da kI UMchI choTI para, eka bAja rahatA thA. pahA.Da kI tarAI meM baragada ke pe.Da para, eka kauA, apanA ghoMsalA banAkara rahatA thA. vo ba.DA chAlAka aura dhUrta thA. usakA prayAsa sadA yahI rahatA thA, ki binA mehanata kie khAne ko mila jAe. pe.Da ke AsapAsa khoha meM kharagosha rahate the. jaba bhI kharagosha bAhara Ate, to bAja UMchI u.DAna bharate, aura ekAdha kharagosha ko uThAkara le jAte.
eka dina kaue ne sochA, vaise to ye chAlAka kharagosha mere hAtha AeMge nahIM, agara inakA narma mAMsa khAnA hai to mujhe bhI bAja kI taraha karanA hogA. ekAeka jhapaTTA mArakara paka.Da lUMgA.

dUsare dina, kaue ne bhI eka kharagosha ko dabochane kI bAta sochakara, UMchI u.DAna bharI. phira usane kharagosha ko paka.Dane ke lie bAja kI taraha zora se jhapaTTA mArA. aba bhalA kauA bAja kA kyA mukAbalA karatA. kharagosha ne use dekha liyA, aura jhaTa vahAM se bhAgakara, chaTTAna ke pIChe Chipa gayA. kauA apanI hIM jhoMka meM, usa chaTTAna se jA TakarAyA. natIjA, usakI choMcha aura garadana TUTa gaIM, aura usane vahIM ta.Dapa kara, dama to.Da diyA. isIlie kahate haiM, nakala karane ke lie bhI akala chAhie.

eka bAra kI bAta hai, eka kharagosha bahuta DhIMge mAra rahA thA, kI vo kitanA tIvra bhAga sakatA hai, aura vo jaMgala meM rahane vAle kaChue kA, upahAsa kara rahA thA, kI vo kitanA dhImA hai. ye suna kara, kaChue ne kharagosha ko dau.Da kI chunautI de dI. donoM ne dau.Da karane kA nishchaya liyA.

jaisA kI sabane sochA thA, kharagosha dau.Da prAraMbha hote hI tIvratA se, kaChuA se Age nikala gayA. abhI dau.Date-dau.Date, tho.DA hI samaya guzarA thA, ki kharagosha ne pIChe mu.Dakara dekhA, ki kaChuA kAfI pIChe raha gayA hai. usane sochA, ki kaChue kI chAla to bahuta dhImI hai, isalie maiM tho.DI dera vishrAma kara letA hU.N. vo eka pe.Da kI ThaMDI ChA.Nva meM aisA soyA, ki kaChuA, dhImI chAla hone ke bAvajUda, usase Age nikala kara, apane gantavya taka pahu.Ncha kara dau.Da jIta gayA. jaba kharagosha nIMda se uThA, to use kaChuA dikhAI nahIM diyA. kharagosha dau.Da jItane ke lie gantavya kI ora dau.DA, aura Ashcharya meM, kaChue ko vahAM usakI pratIkShA karatA pAyA.

eka bAra kI bAta hai. eka pe.Da kI choTI para eka ghoMsalA thA, jisameM eka kauve kI jo.DI rahatI thI. lekina durbhAgya se, usa pe.Da ke tala para, eka nAga bhI rahatA thA. jaba bhI mAdA kauvA koI anDA detI, aura jaise hI kauve kI jo.DI pe.Da se dUra jAte, tabhI vo nAga reMgatA huA pe.Da ke Upara jAtA, aura ghoMsale meM rakhA kauve kA aMDA khA jAtA. jaba kauve kI jo.DI vApasa AtI, to ye dekha bahuta dukhI hue, aura jaba ye bAra-bAra huA, taba kauve kI jo.DI ne, usa nAga se ChuTakArA pAne kA nirNaya kara liyA.

kauve ne apane mitra siyAra se saMparka kiyA, aura usako sArI bAta batAI. siyAra kauve se bolA, kI tuma rAjA ke mahala jAo, aura vahAM se eka maha.NgI vastu lAo, aura use nAga ke bila meM pheMka do. kauA rAjA ke mahala gayA, aura usane rAnI ke kamare se usakA hAra churA liyA. rAnI ne ye dekha liyA, aura mahala ke rakShaka ko, kauve se vo hAra vApasa lAne ke lie kahA. rakShaka kauve ke pIChe-pIChe jaMgala kI ora gayA. kauA jaba pe.Da ke pAsa pahuMchA, taba usane rAnI kA hAra nAga ke bila meM pheMka diyA. rakShaka ne ye dekha liyA, aura usa bila se hAra vApasa lene ke lie, rakShaka ne bila meM rahane vAle nAga ko mAra diyA, aura bila se hAra, vApasa le liyA. isa taraha se, kauve kI jo.DI, nAga se ChuTakArA pAne meM saphala rahI.

kaMchanapura ke eka dhanI vyApArI ke ghara meM, rasoI meM eka kabUtara ne ghoMsalA banA rakhA thA. kisI dina eka lAlachI kauvA, udhara se A nikalA. vahA.N maChalI ko dekhakara, usake muha meM pAnI A gayA. taba usake mana meM vichAra AyA, ki mujhe isa rasoIghara meM ghusanA chAhie, lekina kaise ghusU.N, ye sochakara vo pareshAna thA. tabhI usakI nazara, kabUtaroM ke ghoMsale para pa.DI.

usane sochA, ki maiM agara kabUtara se dostI kara lU.N, to shAyada merI bAta bana jAe.N. kabUtara jaba dAnA chugane ke lie bAhara nikalA, to kauvA usake sAtha nikalA. tho.DI dera bAda, kabUtara ne pIChe mu.Dakara dekhA, to dekhA ki kauvA usake pIChe hai. isa para kabUtara ne kauve se kahA, bhAI, tuma mere pIChe kyoM ho. isa para kauve ne kabUtara se kahA, tuma mujhe achChe lagate ho, isIlie maiM tumase dostI karanA chAhatA hU.N. isa para kauve se kabUtara ne kahA, hama dosta kaise bana sakate hai. hamArA aura tumhArA bhojana bhI to alaga alaga hai. maiM bIja khAtA hU.N, aura tuma kI.De. isa para kauve ne chApalUsI dikhAte hue kahA, kaunasI ba.DI bAta hai, mere pAsa ghara nahIM hai, isalie hama sAtha sAtha to raha hI sakate haiM, aura sAtha hI bhojana khojane AyA kareMge, tuma apanA, aura maiM apanA.

ghara ke mAlika ne dekhA ki kabUtara ke sAtha eka kauvA bhI hai. to usane sochA, chalo, kabUtara kA mitra hogA, isalie usane usa bAre meM adhika nahIM sochA. agale dina, kabUtara ne kauve se khAnA khojane ke lie sAtha chalane ko kahA, to kauve ne peTa darda kA bahAnA banA kara, manA kara diyA. isa para kabUtara akelA hI chalA gayA, kyoMki kauve ne ghara ke mAlika ko ye kahate sunA thA, naukara ko, ki Aja kuCha mehamAna A rahe haiM, isalie tuma maChalI banA lenA. udhara kauvA, naukara ke rasoI se bAhara nikalane kA intazAra hI kara rahA thA, ki usake jAte hI kauvA, thAlI kI ora jhapaTA, aura maChalI uThAkara ArAma se khAne lagA. naukara jaba vApisa AyA, to kauve ko maChalI khAte dekha, gusse se bhara gayA, aura usane kauve ko paka.Da kara, gardana maro.Da kara, mAra DAlA. jaba shAma meM kabUtara vApisa AyA, to usane kauve kI hAlata dekhI, to sArI bAta samajha gayA. isIlie kahA gayA hai, duShTa prakRRiti ke prANI ko, usake kiye kI sazA avashya milatI hai.
eka totA thA mIThUrAma. piMjarA hI mIThUrAma kA ghara thA, aura vahI usakI duniyA. mIThUrAma kI AvAza ba.DI achChI thI, para vo sirfa rAta ko hI gAtA thA.

eka rAta, jaba mIThUrAma gAnA gA rahA thA, to udhara se eka chamagAda.Da nikalA. chamagAda.Da ne dekhA, ki mIThUrAma kI AvAza bahuta hI mIThI hai, to usane pUChA, kyoM bhaI, tumhArI AvAza itanI mIThI hai, to tuma sirfa rAta ko hI kyoM gAte ho?

mIThUrAma ne isakI vajaha batAte hue kahA, eka bAra jaba maiM jaMgala meM dina ke samaya gAnA gA rahA thA, to eka shikArI udhara se nikalA. usane merI AvAza sunI, aura isI kAraNa, usane mujhe paka.Da liyA. tabase abhI taka, maiM isa piMjare meM kaida hUM.

ye batAkara mIThUrAma bolA, ki isake bAda se maiMne ye sIkha liyA ki dina meM gAnA, musIbata kA kAraNa bana sakatA hai, aura isIlie aba maiM rAta ko hI gAtA hUM. ye sunakara chamagAda.Da bolA, mitra, ye to tumheM paka.De jAne se pahale sochanA chAhie thA.

sacha bhI hai, kaI bAra hama galatiyAM karane ke bAda hI, usase kuCha na kuCha sIkhate haiM. para zarUrI nahIM hai ki hara bAra sIkhane ke lie galatI hI kI jAe. kaI martabA kisI kAma ko karane se pahale, kuCha sAvadhAniyAM barata kara, hama galatiyoM se bacha sakate haiM, aura nukasAna se bhI. to yAda rakhie, buddhimAna vahI hotA hai, jo socha-vichArakara kAma karatA hai.

eka desha meM akAla pa.DA. pAnI kI kamI se sArI fasaleM mArI gaIM. deshavAsI apane lie eka vakta kI roTI bhI nahIM juTA pAte the. aise samaya, kauvoM ko roTI ke Tuka.De milane baMda ho gae. ve jaMgala kI ora u.Da chale.

unameM se eka kauvA-kauvI ne pe.Da para apanA baserA kara liyA. usa pe.Da ke nIche eka tAlAba thA, jisameM jalakauvA rahatA thA. vo sAre dina pAnI meM kha.De rahakara kabhI maChaliyAM paka.DatA, kabhI pAnI kI sataha para paMkha phailAkara, laharoM ke sAtha nAchatA nazara AtA.

pe.Da para baiThe kaue ne sochA, maiM to bhUkha se bhaTaka rahA hUM, aura ye chAra-chAra maChaliyAM eka sAtha gaTaka kara AnaMda meM hai. yadi isase dostI kara lUM, to mujhe maChaliyAM khAne ko zarUra mileMgI.

vo u.Dakara tAlAba ke kinAre gayA, aura shahada-sI mIThI bolI meM kahane lagA, mitra, tuma to bahuta chusta-durusta ho. eka hI jhaTake meM maChalI ko apanI choMcha meM phaMsA lete ho, mujhe bhI ye kalA sikhA do.
tuma sIkhakara kyA karoge? tumheM maChaliyAM hI to khAnI haiM. maiM tumhAre lie paka.Da diyA karUMgA.

usa dina ke bAda se, jalakauvA, Dhera sArI maChaliyAM paka.DatA, kuCha khuda khAtA, aura kuCha apane mitra ke lie kinAre para rakha detA. kauvA unheM choMcha meM dabAkara pe.Da para jA baiThatA, aura kauve ke sAtha, svAda le lekara khAtA.
kuCha dinoM ke bAda usane sochA, maChalI paka.Dane meM hai hI kyA! maiM bhI paka.Da sakatA hUM. jalakauve kI kRRipA para palanA zyAdA ThIka nahIM.
aisA mana meM ThAnakara, vo pAnI meM utarane lagA.
are dosta! ye kyA kara rahe ho? tuma pAnI meM mata jAo. tuma thala kauvA ho, jala kauvA nahIM. tuma jala meM maChalI paka.Dane ke dAMvapeMcha nahIM jAnate, musIbata meM pa.Da jAoge.
ye tuma nahIM, tumhArA abhimAna bola rahA hai. maiM abhI maChalI paka.Dakara dikhAtA hUM. kauve ne aka.Da kara kahA.

kauvA ChapAka se pAnI meM ghusa gayA, para Upara na nikala sakA. tAlAba meM kAI jamI huI thI. kAI meM Cheda karane kA use anubhava na thA. usa bechAre ne usameM Cheda karane kI ko{}shisha bhI kI, Upara se tho.DI-sI choMcha dikhAI de rahI thI, para nikalane ke lie ba.DA-sA Cheda honA thA. natIjatana, usakA aMdara hI aMdara, dama ghuTane lagA, aura vo mara gayA.
kauvI kauve ko DhUMDhatI huI jalakauve ke pAsa AI, aura apane pati ke bAre meM pUChane lagI.

bahana, kauvA merI nakala karatA huA pAnI meM maChalI paka.Dane utara pa.DA, aura prANoM se hAtha dho baiThA. usane ye nahIM sochA ki maiM jalavAsI hUM, aura zamIna para bhI chala sakatA hUM, para vo kevala thalavAsI hai. maiMne use bahuta samajhAyA, para usane eka na sunI.

eka vana meM hAthiyoM kA eka jhuMDa rahatA thA. jhuMDa ke saradAra ko gajarAja kahate the. vo vishAlakAya lambI sUMDa tathA lambe moTe dAMtoM vAlA thA. khaMbhe ke samAna usake moTe-moTe paira the. jaba vo chiMghA.DatA thA, to sArA vana, gUMja uThatA thA.

gajarAja apane jhuMDa ke hAthiyoM se ba.DA pyAra karatA thA. svayaM kaShTa uThA letA thA, para jhuMDa ke kisI bhI hAthI ko kaShTa meM nahIM pa.Dane detA thA, aura sAre ke sAre hAthI bhI gajarAja ke prati, ba.DI shradghA rakhate the.

eka bAra jalavRRiShTi na hone ke kAraNa vana meM zoroM kA akAla pa.DA. nadiyAM sarovara sUkha gae, vRRikSha aura latAeM bhI sUkha gaIM. pAnI aura bhojana ke abhAva meM, pashu-pakShI vana ko Cho.Dakara bhAga kha.De hue. vana meM chIkha-pukAra hone lagI, hAya-hAya hone lagI. gajarAja ke jhuMDa ke hAthI bhI, akAla ke shikAra hone lage. ve bhI bhojana aura pAnI na milane se, ta.Dapa-ta.Dapakara marane lage. jhuMDa ke hAthiyoM kA burA hAla dekhakara, gajarAja ba.DA dukhI huA. vo sochane lagA, kauna sA upAya kiyA jAe, jisase hAthiyoM ke prANa bacheM.
eka dina gajarAja ne tamAma hAthiyoM ko bulAkara unase kahA, isa vana meM na to bhojana hai, na pAnI hai! tuma saba bhinna-bhinna dishAoM meM jAo, bhojana aura pAnI kI khoja karo.

hAthiyoM ne gajarAja kI Aj~nA kA pAlana kiyA. hAthI bhinna-bhinna dishAoM meM ChiTaka gae. eka hAthI ne lauTakara gajarAja ko sUchanA dI, yahAM se kuCha dUra para eka dUsarA vana hai. vahAM pAnI kI eka bahuta ba.DI jhIla hai. vana ke vRRikSha phUloM aura phaloM se lade hue haiM. gajarAja ba.DA prasanna huA. usane hAthiyoM se kahA, ki aba hameM dera na karake turaMta usI vana meM pahuMcha jAnA chAhie, kyoMki vahAM bhojana aura pAnI donoM haiM. gajarAja anya hAthiyoM ke sAtha, dUsare vana meM chalA gayA. hAthI vahAM bhojana aura pAnI pAkara ba.De prasanna hue.

usa vana meM kharagoshoM kI eka bastI thI. bastI meM bahuta se kharagosha rahate the. hAthI kharagoshoM kI bastI se hI hokara jhIla meM pAnI pIne ke lie jAyA karate the. hAthI jaba kharagoshoM kI bastI se nikalane lagate the, to ChoTe-ChoTe kharagosha unake pairoM ke nIche A jAte the. kuCha kharagosha mara jAte the, kuCha ghAyala ho jAte the.

roza-roza kharagoshoM ko marate aura ghAyala hote dekhakara, kharagoshoM kI bastI meM halachala macha gaI. kharagosha sochane lage, yadi hAthiyoM ke pairoM se ve isI taraha kuchale jAte rahe, to vo dina dUra nahIM, jaba unakA khAtmA ho jAegA.

apanI rakShA kA upAya sochane ke lie kharagoshoM ne eka sabhA bulAI. sabhA meM bahuta se kharagosha ikaTThe hue. kharagoshoM ke saradAra ne, hAthiyoM ke atyAchAroM kA varNana karate hue kahA, kyA hamameM se koI aisA hai, jo apanI jAna para khelakara, hAthiyoM kA atyAchAra baMda karA sake?

saradAra kI bAta sunakara eka kharagosha bola uThA, yadi mujhe kharagoshoM kA dUta banAkara, gajarAja ke pAsa bhejA jAe, to maiM hAthiyoM ke atyAchAra ko baMda karA sakatA hUM. saradAra ne, kharagosha kI bAta mAna lI, aura kharagoshoM kA dUta banAkara gajarAja ke pAsa bheja diyA.

kharagosha, gajarAja ke pAsa jA pahuMchA. vo hAthiyoM ke bIcha meM kha.DA thA. kharagosha ne sochA, vo gajarAja ke pAsa pahuMche to kisa taraha pahuMche. agara vo hAthiyoM ke bIcha meM ghusatA hai, to ho sakatA hai hAthI use pairoM se kuchala de. ye sochakara vo pAsa hI kI eka UMchI chaTTAna para chaढ़ gayA. chaTTAna para kha.DA hokara, usane gajarAja ko pukArakara kahA, gajarAja, maiM chaMdramA kA dUta hUM. chaMdramA ke pAsa se tumhAre lie eka saMdesha lAyA hUM.

chadramA kA nAma sunakara, gajarAja kharagosha kI ora AkarShita huA. usane kharagosha kI ora dekhate hue kahA, kyA kahA tumane? tuma chadramA ke dUta ho? tuma chaMdramA ke pAsa se mere lie kyA saMdesha lAe ho?

kharagosha bolA, hAM gajarAja, maiM chaMdramA kA dUta hUM. chaMdramA ne tumhAre lie saMdesha bhejA hai. suno, tumane chaMdramA kI jhIla kA pAnI gaMdA kara diyA hai. tumhAre jhuMDa ke hAthI, kharagoshoM ko pairoM se kuchala-kuchalakara mAra DAlate haiM. chaMdramA kharagoshoM ko bahuta pyAra karate haiM, unheM apanI goda meM rakhate haiM. chaMdramA tumase bahuta nArAza haiM. tuma sAvadhAna ho jAo. nahIM to chaMdramA, tumhAre sAre hAthiyoM ko mAra DAleMge.

kharagosha kI bAta sunakara, gajarAja bhayabhIta ho uThA. usane kharagosha ko sachamucha chaMdramA kA dUta aura usakI bAta ko, sachamucha chaMdramA kA saMdesha samajha liyA. usane Dara kara kahA, ye to ba.DA burA saMdesha hai. tuma mujhe turaMta chaMdramA ke pAsa le chalo. maiM unase apane aparAdhoM ke lie kShamA yAchanA karUMgA.

kharagosha gajarAja ko chaMdramA ke pAsa le jAne ke lie taiyAra ho gayA. usane kahA, maiM tumheM chaMdramA ke pAsa le chalatA hUM, para sharta ye hai ki tuma akele hI chaloge. gajarAja ne kharagosha kI bAta mAna lI.

pUrNimA kI rAta thI. AkAsha meM chaMdramA haMsa rahA thA. kharagosha gajarAja ko lekara jhIla ke kinAre gayA. usane gajarAja se kahA, gajarAja, milo chaMdramA se. kharagosha ne jhIla ke pAnI kI ora saMketa kiyA. pAnI meM pUrNimA ke chaMdramA kI paraChAIM ko hI chaMdramA mAna liyA.
gajarAja ne chaMdramA se kShamA mAMgane ke lie apanI sUMDa pAnI meM DAla dI. pAnI meM lahareM paidA ho uThIM, paraChAIM adRRishya ho gaI. gajarAja bola uThA, dUta, chaMdramA kahAM chale gae?
kharagosha ne uttara diyA, chaMdramA tumase nArAza haiM. tumane jhIla ke pAnI ko apavitra kara diyA hai. tumane kharagoshoM kI jAna lekara pApa kiyA hai, isalie chaMdramA tumase milanA nahIM chAhate.
gajarAja ne kharagosha kI bAta sacha mAna lI. usane Dara kara kahA, kyA aisA koI upAya hai, jisase chaMdramA, mujhase prasanna ho sakate haiM?

kharagosha bolA, hAM, hai. tumheM prAyashchita karanA hogA. tuma kala savere hI apane jhuMDa ke hAthiyoM ko lekara, yahAM se dUra chale jAo. chaMdramA tuma para prasanna ho jAeMge. gajarAja prAyashchita karane ke lie taiyAra ho gayA. vo dUsare dina hAthiyoM ke jhuMDa sahita, vahAM se chalA gayA.
isa taraha, kharagosha kI chAlAkI ne, balavAna gajarAja ko dhokhe meM DAla diyA, aura usane apanI budghimAnI ke bala se hI, kharagoshoM ko mRRityu ke mukha meM jAne se bachA liyA.

do mitra, dharmabuddhi aura kubuddhi, himmata nagara meM rahate the. eka bAra kubuddhi ke mana meM eka vichAra AyA, kyoM na maiM mitra dharmabuddhi ke sAtha, dUsare desha jAkara dhanopArjana karrU.N. bAda meM kisI na kisI yukti se use Thaga kara, sArA dhana ha.Dapa kara, sukha-chaina se pUrI jiMdagI jIu.N.
isI niyati se, kubuddhi ne dharmabuddhi ko dhana aura j~nAna prApta hone kA lobha dete hue, apane sAtha, bAhara jAne ke lie rAzI kara liyA.

shubha-muhUrta dekhakara donoM mitra eka anya shahara ke lie prasthAna kara gae. jAte samaya, apane sAtha kaI sAmAna lekara gaye, tathA mu.NhamA.Nge dAmoM para bechakara, khUba dhanopArjana kiyA. aMtataH, prasanna mana se gA.Nva kI tarafa lauTa gaye.

gA.Nva ke nikaTa pahu.Nchane para kubuddhi ne dharmabuddhi ko samajhAte hue kahA, mere vichAra se gA.Nva meM eka sAtha sArA dhana le jAnA uchita nahIM hai. kuCha logoM ko hamase IShyA hone lagegI, to kuCha loga, karza ke rupa meM paisA mA.Ngane lageMge. saMbhava hai ki koI chora hI ise churA le. usane rAya dete hue kahA, mere vichAra se kuCha dhana hameM jaMgala meM hI kisI surakShita sthAna para gA.Dha denA chAhie. anyathA sArA dhana dekhakara, sanyAsI va mahAtmAoM kA mana bhI Dola jAtA hai. sIdhe-sIdhe dharmabuddhi ne punaH kubuddhi ke vichAra meM, apanI sahamati jatAI.

vahIM kisI surakShita sthAna para, donoM ne gaDढ़e khodakara, apanA dhana dabA diyA, tathA ghara kI ora prasthAna kara gaye. bAda meM maukA dekhakara, eka rAta kubuddhi ne vahA.N ga.De sAre dhana ko, chupake se nikAlakara, hathiyA liyA.
kuCha dinoM bAda dharmabuddhi ne kubuddhi se kahA, mujhe kuCha dhana kI AvashyakatA hai. ataH Apa mere sAtha chalie. kubuddhi taiyAra ho gayA.

jaba usane dhana nikAlane ke lie gaDढ़e khode, to vahA.N kuCha bhI nahIM milA. kubuddhi ne turaMta rone-chillAne kA abhinaya kiyA. usane dharmabuddhi para dhana nikAla lene kA ilzAma lagA diyA. donoM la.Dane-jhaga.Date, nyAyAdhIsha ke pAsa pahu.Nche.
nyAyAdhIsha ke sammukha, donoM ne apanA-apanA pakSha prastuta kiyA. nyAyAdhIsha ne satya kA patA lagAne ke lie divya-parIkShA kA Adesha diyA.

nItivAna sanyAsI. eka jaMgala meM hiraNyaka nAmaka chUhA, tathA laghupatanaka nAma kA kauvA rahatA thA. donoM meM pragA.Dha mitratA thI. laghupatanaka. hiraNyaka ke lie hara dina khAneM ke lie kahIM na kahIM se kuCha lAtA thA. apane upakAroM se usane hiraNyaka ko, RRINI banA liyA thA. eka bAra, hiraNyaka ne laghupanaka se dukhI mana se kahA, isa pradesha meM akAla pa.Da gayA hai. logoM ne pakShiyoM ko pha.NsAne ke lie, apane ChatoM para jAla DAla diyA hai. maiM kisI taraha bacha pAyA hU.N. ataH, maiMne isa pradesha ko Cho.Dane kA nishchaya kiyA hai.

laghupatanaka ne batAyA, dakShiNa dishA meM durgama vana hai, jahA.N eka vishAla sarovara hai. vahA.N merA eka atyaMta ghaniShTa mitra rahAtA hai. usakA nAma, maMtharaka kaChuA hai. usase mujhe maChaliyoM ke TUka.De mila jAyA kareMge.

hiraNyaka ne vinatI kI, ki vo bhI laghupatanaka ke sAtha vahIM jAkara rahanA chAhatA hai. laghupatanaka ne use samajhAne kI koshisha kI, ki use apanI janmabhUmi va sukhada AvAsa ko nahIM Cho.DanA chAhie. isa para hiraNyaka ne kahA, aisA karane kA kAraNa vo bAda meM batAegA.

donoM mitroM ne sAtha jAne kA nishchaya kiyA. hiraNyaka, laghupatanaka kI pITha para baiThakara, usa sarovara kI ora prasthAna kara gayA. nishchita sthAna para pahu.Nchakara kauve ne chUhe ko apanI pITha para se utArA, tathA tAlAba ke kinAre kha.De hokara, apane mitra maMtharaka ko pukArane lagA.

maMtharaka, tatkAla jala se nikalA. donoM eka-dUsare se milakara prasannachita the. isI bIcha hiraNyaka bhI A pahu.NchA. laghupanaka ne maMtharaka se hiraNyaka kA parichaya karAyA, tathA usake guNoM kI prashaMsA bhI kI.
maMtharaka ne bhI hiraNyaka se usake janmasthAna se vairAgya kA kAraNa jAnanA chAhA. donoM ke Agraha ko sunakara, hiraNyaka apanI vyathA kathA, sunAne lagA.

nagara ke bAhara sthita shiva maMdira meM, tAmrachU.Da nAmaka eka sanyAsI rahatA thA. vo nagara meM bhikShA mA.Ngakara, sukhapUrvaka apanA jIvana vyatIta kara rahA thA. khAne-pIne se bache anna-dhAnya ko, vaha pratyeka dina eka bhikShA pAtra meM DAlakara, rAtri meM khU.NTI para laTakAkara so jAyA karatA thA. subaha-subaha, use maMdira ke bAhara baiThe bhikhAriyoM meM bA.NTa detA thA. ina saba bAtoM kI sUchanA, hiraNyaka ko bhI milI. use ye bhI patA chalA, ki ye svAdiShTa sAmagrI, U.NchAI para hone ke kAraNa, anya chUhoM ko dikkata hotI hai.

hiraNyaka ne batAyA, ki apane sAthI kI bAta sunakara eka rAta maiM vahA.N AyA, tathA khU.NTI para laTakI hAMDI para ChalAMga lagA dI, tathA hA.NDI ko nIche girA diyA, tathA sAthiyoM ke sAtha, svAdiShTa bhojana kA AnaMda liyA. aba ye hamArA hara rAta kA niyama sA bana gayA.
pareshAna hokara sanyAsI eka phaTe bAMsa kA DaMDA lekara AyA. DaMDe kI AvAza se hama loga Dara jAte the, lekina usake so jAte hI, punaH haMDiyA, sAfa kara dete the.

eka bAra, sanyAsI kA mitra, vRRihatasfika, tIrthATana ke uparAMta usase milane AyA. rAta meM sote samaya, vRRihatasfika, tAmrachU.Da ko apane tIrtha kA vivaraNa, sunAne lagA. isa daurAna bhI tAmrachU.Da, phaTe bA.Nsa kA DaMDA bajAtA rahA, jisase vRRihatasfika ko burA lagA. taba tAmrachU.Da ne, use DaMDA bajAne kI asalI vajaha batAI.

vRRihatasfika ne jij~nAsA dikhAte hue pUChA, chUhe kA bila kahA.N hai? tAmrachU.Da ne anabhij~natA darshAyI, lekina ye spaShTa thA, ki zarura hI ye bila, kisI khazAne para hai. dhana kI garamI ke kAraNa hI ye chUhA, utanA adhika U.NchAI taka kUda sakatA hai. vRRihatasfika ne eka kudAla ma.NgavAyA, tathA nishchita hokara, rAta meM donoM so gae.

hiraNyaka ne sunAnA jArI rakhA. prAtaHkAla vRRihatasfika apane mitra ke sAtha, hamAre padachinhoM kA anusaraNa karate hue, hamAre bila taka A hI pahU.Nche. kisI taraha maiMne apanI jAna bachA lI, paraMtu aMdara Chipe koSha ko nikAla liyA. koSha ke lUTa jAne se, merA utsAha, shithila ho gayA. isake bAda maiMne usa khU.NTI taka pahu.Nchane kI kaI bAra koshisha kI, lekina asaphala rahA.

maiMne dhana ko punaH prApta karane kI kaI koshisheM kI, lekina ka.DI nigarAnI ke kAraNa, mujhe vo vApasa nahIM mila pAyA. isa kAraNa, mere parijana bhI mujhase kannI kATane lage the. isa prakAra, maiM daridratA tathA apamAna kI ziMdagI jI rahA thA.

eka bAra maiMne punaH saMkalpa liyA. kisI taraha takiye ke nIche rakhe dhana ko lA rahA thA, ki usa duShTa saMnyAsI kI nidrA bhaMga ho gayI. usane DaMDe se mere Upara bhayaMkara prahAra kiyA. maiM kisI taraha jIvita bacha pAyA. jAna to bacha gayI, lekina parivAra ke logoM ke sAtha rahanA, sammAnajanaka nahIM lagA. aura isIlie, maiM apane mitra laghupatanaka ke sAtha, yahA.N chalA AyA.

hiraNyaka kI Apa bItI sunakara maMtharaka ne kahA, mitra, niHsaMdeha, laghupatanaka ApakA sachchA va hitaiShI mitra hai. saMkaTa kAla meM sAtha nibhAnevAlA hI sachchA mitra hotA hai. samRRiddhi meM to sabhI mitra hote haiM.
dhIre-dhIre hiraNyaka bhI apane dhana kI kShati ko bhUla gayA, tathA sukhapUrvaka, jIvana yApana karane lagA.

eka bAra kI bAta hai, eka jaMgala meM eka shera thA. vo shera bahuta gamaMDI aura gusse vAlA thA. vo apanI bhUkha ke lie hI nahIM, apitu apane manoraMjana ke lie, jantuMoM kI hatyA kiyA karatA thA. sAre jantuMoM ne shera ke isa prakopa se pareshAna hokara, ye nirNaya liyA, kI unheM isa viShaya para shera se bAta karanI chAhie. unhoMne eka bAra, shera ko nimaMtraNa dekara bulAyA. vahA.N sAre jaMtu bhI ekatrita hue. vahA.N hAthI, kharagosha, hiraNa, bhAlU, bandara, loma.DI, chuhA, gAya, baiMsa, gilherI, bArAsiMgA Adi the. unhoMne shera se kahA, kI agara shera isI taraha se jaMgala meM jantuMoM kA shikAra karatA rahA, to vo dina dUra nahIM, jaba sAre jantu, jaMgala se lupta ho jAyeMge. unhoMne shera ke sAmane eka prastAva rakhA. prastAva ke anusAra, eka eka kara hara eka dina eka jaMtu, shera ke bhojana ke lie usakI guphA meM bheja diyA jAyegA. isa taraha shera apane bhojana ke AlAvA, jantuMoM kA shikAra nahIM kara pAyegA. isa prastAva se jantuMoM ko bhI chena milegA. shera ne yaha prastAva svIkAra kara liyA. shera ke lie ye sahI bhI thA, kyoMki aba use shikAra karane ke lie, apanI guphA se bAhara bhI nahIM jAnA pa.DegA. usa dina ke bAda se hara dina eka jaMtu, shera ke lie bhejA jAne lagA.

eka bAra eka kharagosha kI bArI AI. vo kharagosha bahuta chatura thA, aura use, eka upAya sUjhA. vo kharagosha, shera ke pAsa kuCha dera se gayA. isa para shera bahuta gussA huA, aura jaba usane eka ChoTe se kharagosha ko dekhA, to use aura bhI gussA AyA. shera gusse meM bolA, kI mai sAre jantuMoM ko khA jAUMgA. kharagosha bolA, kI isameM usakA koI doSha nahIM hai. usake bhojana ke lie pAMcha kharagosha bheje gae the, magara rAste meM, chAra kharagoshoM ko eka dUsarA shera khA gayA, aura vo eka lotA kharagosha, apanI jAna bachA kara usake pAsa AyA. isa para shera bolA, usa jaMgala meM, kevala vahI shera hai, aura kharagosha, use usa jagaha para lekara jAye, jahA.N usane dUsarA shera dekhA thA. kharagosha, usa shera ko eka kuMe ke pAsa lekara chalA gayA, aura bolA, kI usane dUsare shera ko, usa kuMe ke andara dekhA thA. shera ne jaba usa kuMe meM dekhA, to use apanI Chavi dikhAI dI. apanI Chavi dekha kara, shera ko lagA, kI usa kuMe meM dUsarA shera hai. shera ne usase la.DAI kara, use apane jaMgala se bAhara karane kI sochI, aura ye socha kara, usa kuMe meM ChalAMga lagA dI. aisA kara, shera ne apanI jAna gavA dI. isa taraha kharagosha ne na kevala apanI, parantu dUsare jantuMoM kI bhI jAna bachA lI.
isIlie kahate haiM, kI bala se buddhi ba.DI hotI hai!

eka rAjA ke shayanakakSha meM maMdarI sarpiNI nAma kI jUM ne DerA DAla rakhA thA. roza rAta ko jaba rAjA jAtA, to vo chupake se bAhara nikalatI, aura rAjA kA khUna chUsakara, phira apane sthAna para jA ChipatI. saMyoga se eka dina agnimukha nAma kA eka khaTamala bhI rAjA ke shayanakakSha meM A pahuMchA. jUM ne jaba use dekhA, to vahAM se chale jAne ko kahA. use apane adhikAra-kShetra meM kisI anya kA dakhala sahana nahIM thA. lekina khaTamala bhI kama chatura na thA, dekho, mehamAna se isa taraha bartAva nahIM kiyA jAtA, maiM Aja rAta tumhArA mehamAna hUM.

jUM, antataH, khaTamala kI chikanI-chupa.DI bAtoM meM A gaI, aura use sharaNa dete hue bolI, ThIka hai, tuma yahAM rAtabhara ruka sakate ho, lekina rAjA ko kAToge to nahIM, usakA khUna chUsane ke lie.
khaTamala bolA, lekina maiM tumhArA mehamAna hU.N, mujhe kuCha to dogI khAne ke lie. aura rAjA ke khUna se ba.DhiyA bhojana aura kyA ho sakatA hai.

ThIka hai, jUM bolI. tuma chupachApa rAjA kA khUna chUsa lenA, use pI.DA kA AbhAsa nahIM honA chAhie. jaisA tuma kahogI, bilakula vaisA hI hogA. kahakara khaTamala, shayanakakSha meM rAjA ke Ane kI pratIkShA karane lagA.

rAta Dhalane para, rAjA vahAM AyA, aura bistara para pa.Dakara so gayA. use dekha khaTamala saba kuCha bhUlakara, rAjA ko kATane lagA, khUna chUsane ke lie. aisA svAdiShTa khUna, usane pahalI bAra chakhA thA, isalie, vo rAjA ko zora-zora se kATakara, usakA khUna chUsane lagA. isase, rAjA ke sharIra meM teza khujalI hone lagI, aura usakI nIMda uchaTa gaI. usane krodha meM bharakara apane sevakoM se, khaTamala ko DhUMDhakara mArane ko kahA.
ye sunakara chatura khaTamala to paMlaga ke pAe ke nIche Chipa gayA, lekina chAdara ke kone para baiThI jUM, rAjA ke sevakoM kI nazara meM A gaI. unhoMne use paka.DA, aura mAra DAlA.

eka la.DakA, roza jaMgala meM bhe.DeM charAne ke lie jAtA thA. vo ba.DA shaitAna thA. apanI shaitAniyoM dvArA dUsaroM ko pareshAna karane meM use ba.DA mazA AtA thA. magara jaMgala meM akelA hone ke kAraNa, vo ukatA jAtA thA. yahAM kise aura kaise pareshAna kare, yahI sochatA rahatA thA. jaMgala ke pAsa hI kuCha kisAnoM ke kheta the. vo subaha-subaha Akara apane khetoM meM kAma karane meM juTa jAte the.
eka dina, use kisAnoM ke sAtha shaitAnI karane kI sUjhI. vo sochane lagA ki aisA kyA kiyA jAe, ki sAre kisAna pareshAna ho jAeM.
achAnaka usake dimAga meM eka khurAfAta A hI gaI.
vo zora-zora se chillAne lagA, bachAo, bachAo! bhe.DiyA AyA. bhe.DiyA AyA!

kisAnoM ne la.Dake kI AvAza sunI, to ve apanA-apanA kAma Cho.Dakara, la.Dake kI madada ke lie dau.Da pa.De. jo bhI hAtha lagA, sAtha le Ae. koI phAva.DA le AyA, koI darAMtI, to koI haMsiyA. magara jaba ve la.Dake ke pAsa pahuMche, to unheM kahIM bhe.DiyA dikhAI nahIM diyA.
kisAnoM ne la.Dake se pUChA, kahA.N hai bhe.DiyA?
unakA savAla sunakara la.DakA haMsa pa.DA, aura bolA, maiM to mazAka kara rahA thA, bhe.DiyA AyA hI nahIM thA. jAo. tuma loga jAo.
kisAna la.Dake ko DAMTa-phaTakAra kara lauTa Ae. unake jAne ke bAda vo apane Apase bolA, vAha! kaisA bevakUfa banAyA. mazA A gayA.

kuCha dinoM bAda la.Dake ne phira aisA hI kiyA. AsapAsa ke kisAna, phira madada ke lie dau.Da Ae. la.DakA phira haMsakara bolA, maiM mazAka kara rahA thA. Apa logoM ke pAsa koI aura kAma nahIM hai, jo mAmUlI-sI chIkha-pukAra sunakara dau.De chale Ate ho.

kisAnoM ko ba.DA gussA AyA. eka bAra phira, unhoMne use DAMTa-phaTakAra lagAI. magara DhITha la.DakA haMsatA rahA. lekina aba kisAnoM ne dRRi.Dha nishchaya kara liyA, ki isa la.Dake kI madada ko kabhI nahIM AeMge.

kuCha samaya bAda eka dina, sachamucha hI bhe.DiyA A pahuMchA. la.DakA dau.Dakara eka pe.Da para cha.Dha gayA, aura madada ke lie chillAne lagA. isa bAra usakI madada ke lie koI nahIM AyA. sabhI ne yahI sochA, ki vo badamAsha la.DakA pahale kI taraha mazAka kara rahA hai. bhe.Diye ne kaI bhe.DoM ko mAra DAlA. isase la.Dake ko apane kie para dukha huA.

golU aura molU pakke dosta the. golU jahAM dubalA-patalA thA, vahIM molU moTA gola-maTola. donoM eka-dUsare para jAna dene kA dama bharate the, lekina unakI jo.DI dekhakara, logoM kI haMsI ChUTa jAtI. eka bAra unheM kisI dUsare gAMva meM rahane vAle mitra kA nimaMtraNa milA. usane unheM, apanI bahana ke vivAha ke avasara para bulAyA thA.
unake mitra kA gAMva koI bahuta dUra to nahIM thA, lekina vahAM taka pahuMchane ke lie jaMgala se hokara guzaranA pa.DatA thA. aura usa jaMgala meM, jaMgalI jAnavaroM kI bharamAra thI.

donoM chala die. jaba ve jaMgala se hokara guzara rahe the, to unheM sAmane se, eka bhAlU AtA dikhA. use dekhakara, donoM bhaya se thara-thara kAMpane lage. tabhI dubalA-patalA golU, tezI se dau.Dakara eka pe.Da para jA cha.DhA, lekina moTA hone ke kAraNa, molU utanA teza nahIM dau.Da sakatA thA. udhara bhAlU bhI nikaTa A chukA thA, phira bhI molU ne sAhasa nahIM khoyA. usane suna rakhA thA, ki bhAlU mRRita sharIra ko nahIM khAte. vo turaMta, zamIna para leTa gaye, aura sAMsa roka lI. aisA abhinaya kiyA, ki mAno sharIra meM prANa haiM hI nahIM. bhAlU ghuraghurAtA huA molU ke pAsa AyA, usake chehare va sharIra ko sUMghA, aura use mRRita samajhakara Age ba.Dha gayA.
jaba bhAlU kAfI dUra nikala gayA, to golU pe.Da se utarakara molU ke nikaTa AyA, aura bolA, mitra, maiMne dekhA thA. bhAlU tumase kuCha kaha rahA thA. kyA kahA usane?
molU ne gusse meM bharakara javAba diyA, mujhe mitra kahakara na bulAo. aura aisA hI kuCha bhAlU ne bhI mujhase kahA. usane kahA, golU para vishvAsa na karanA, vo tumhArA mitra nahIM hai.
sunakara golU sharmindA ho gayA. use abhAsa ho gayA thA, ki usase kitanI bhArI bhUla ho gaI thI. usakI mitratA bhI sadaiva ke lie samApta ho gaI.

eka ghane jaMgala meM eka ba.DA-sA nAga rahatA thA. chi.DiyoM ke aMDe, me.Dhaka tathA ChipakaliyoM jaise ChoTe-ChoTe jIva-jaMtuoM ko khAkara, apanA peTa bharatA thA. rAtabhara, vaha apane bhojana kI talAsha meM rahatA, aura dina nikalane para, apane bila meM jAkara, so rahatA. dhIre-dhIre vo moTA hotA gayA, hAlata ye ho gaI, ki vo itanA moTA ho gayA, ki bila ke aMdara-bAhara AnA-jAnA bhI dUbhara ho gayA.

AkhirakAra, usane bila ko Cho.Dakara, eka vishAla pe.Da ke nIche rahane kI sochI. lekina vahIM pe.Da kI ja.Da meM chIMTiyoM kI bAMbI thI, aura unake sAtha rahanA, nAga ke lie asaMbhava thA. so vaha nAga, una chIMTiyoM kI bAMbI ke nikaTa jAkara bolA, maiM sarparAja nAga hUM, isa jaMgala kA rAjA. maiM tuma chIMTiyoM ko Adesha detA hUM, ki yaha jagaha Cho.Dakara chale jAo. vahAM aura bhI jAnavara the, jo usa bhayAnaka sAMpa ko dekhakara Dara gae, aura jAna bachAne ke lie idhara-udhara bhAgane lage. lekina chIMTiyoM ne nAga kI isa dhamakI para koI dhyAna na diyA.

ve pahale kI taraha apane kAma-kAja meM juTI rahIM. nAga ne ye dekhA, to usake krodha kA pArAvAra na rahA. vo gusse meM bharakara bAMbI ke nikaTa jA pahuMchA. ye dekha, hazAra-hazAra chIMTiyA.N, usa bAMbI se nikala pa.DI, aura nAga se lipaTakara usake sharIra para kATane lagIM. unake kaMTIle DaMkoM se pareshAna nAga, bilabilAne lagA. usakI pI.DA, asahanIya ho chalI thI, aura sharIra para ghAva hone lage the. nAga ne chIMTiyoM ko haTAne kI bahuta koshisha kI, lekina asaphala rahA. kuCha hI dera meM, usane vahIM ta.Dapa-ta.Dapa kara, jAna de dI.

unhoMne, apanI rAga adAyagI meM, jisa eka chIza para sarvAdhika mehanata kI hai, vaha unakA mIM.Da kA kAma hai
prasiddha saMgIta vidvAna, chetana karanAnI likhate haiM, bismillA khAna kI kalA kI sabase ba.DI khUbI yaha hai, ki unake dhvani vinyAsa kI shuddhatA, uttejanA jagAtI hai
unakI sAMgItika pratibhA, apratima hai
ve, rAga kA vistAra karane, usakI saMrachanA ke byauroM ko ubhArane meM, hameshA behada sadhe hue, aura jAgarUka rahe haiM
bismillA khAna kI mIM.Da, jo unakI vAdana kalA kA sabase sashakta pakSha bana gayI hai, dekhane lAyaka hai
vAdana ke samaya, mIM.Da lete vakta, ve suroM meM jo mo.Da, ghumAva, aura daivIya sparsha mahasUsa karAte haiM, vaha sunane vAle ko apUrva anubhava detA hai
lagatA hai ki, bismillA khAna, mIM.Da lete vakta, shahanAI nahIM bajA rahe, balki sharIra ke kisI ghAva para, marahama kara rahe haiM
