isa sarda mAhaula meM bhI Kuda ko bachA pAne vAle jIvoM, vo chAhe ChoTe-ba.De jAnavara hoM, yA phira pe.Da paudhe, meM kuCha na kuCha to KAsa tAqata hotI hai.
jinakI madada se, vo itane bure mAhaula meM bhI hazAroM lAkhoM sAla se raha rahe haiM.
asala meM dharatI ke alaga-alaga hissoM meM, eka se eka KarAba mausama milate haiM.
dhruvoM ke qarIba vAle ilAqe behada sarda hote haiM.
magara yahAM bhI kaI taraha ke jIva mila jAte haiM.
unameM se zyAdAtara, samaMdara ke bhItara hI milate haiM.
naॉrve to vaise bhI samaMdara meM milane vAle tela ke KazAne kI badaulata hI, Aja duniyA ke sabase amIra mulqoM meM shAmila hai.
aba nayA daura hai, isalie aba samaMdara kI madada se amIrI kA nayA rAstA talAsha rahe haiM, naॉrve ke loga.
qudarata isa kAma meM unakI madadagAra ho sakatI hai.
piChale qarIba sau sAloM se, laiba meM tamAma taraha ke rogoM kI davAeM vikasita karane kI ho.Da sI lagI hai.
magara tamAma dAvoM se, itara, sacha to ye hai, ki piChale chAlIsa sAla meM jo bhI naI davAeM bAzAra meM AI haiM, unameM se zyAdAtara, qudarata se hAsila kI gaI haiM.
amarIkI neshanala kaiMsara iMsTITyUTa ke DeviDa nyUmaina kahate haiM, ki prayogashAlA meM binA kisI qudaratI chIza ke, kuCha banAne kI koshisha, burI taraha nAkAma huI hai.
vo savAla uThAte haiM, ki AKira hama qudarata se kyoM muMha mo.Da rahe haiM.
yahAM chIzeM tIna sau karo.Da sAla ke vaqta kI AMcha meM tapakara nikharI haiM.
prakRRiti meM pAe jAne vAle tamAma kemikala ko talAsha karake, hama bahuta sI bImAriyoM para jIta hAsila kara sakate haiM.
yahI vajaha hai, ki aba dhruvoM ke qarIba ke sarda samaMdara se vo jAduI kemikala talAshane kI koshisha kI jA rahI hai, jo Aja ke daura ke mushkila rogoM se la.Da sakeM.
briTena kI ebaraDIna yUnivarsiTI ke mArsela jaispara kahate haiM, ki loga pUChate haiM ki falAM marza kA to.Da, qudarata ke pAsa kyoM nahIM.
to usakA javAba ye hai, ki prakRRiti ke pAsa to hara savAla kA javAba hai.
vaise, nae kaMpAuMDa aura naI davAoM ke lie samaMdara ko khaMgAlane kA chalana zyAdA purAnA nahIM.
Aja se bIsa sAla pahale taka loga samudrI jIvoM ke bAre meM yahI jAnakArI juTAte the, ki kauna se jIva iMsAna ko nuqasAna pahuMchA sakate haiM.
nabbe ke dashaka se samudra ko naI davAoM kA KazAnA mAnakara dekhA jA rahA hai.
Aja kI tArIKa meM samudra se qarIba chaubIsa hazAra nae kemikala talAshe jA chuke haiM.
vaise aba taka aise gyAraha kaMpAuMDa pAe gae haiM, jo kaiMsara se la.Da sakate haiM.
vaij~nAnikoM ko lagatA hai ki laiba meM naI davAeM banAne ke bajAya, agara hama samudra ko khaMgAleM, to hamArI bahuta sI bImAriyoM kA ilAja mila sakatA hai.
inake alAvA, iMsAna ke kAma Ane vAlI aura bhI bahuta sI chIzeM samudra meM milane kI ummIda hai.
afasosa kI bAta basa ye hai, ki aba taka samudra meM pAe jAne vAle kevala eka fIsada baikTIriyA kI KUbiyoM ke bAre meM iMsAna ko jAnakArI hai.
lekina, naI chunautiyoM ko dekhate hue, aba samaMdara ke aMdara inake hala talAshe jA rahe haiM.
isa vichAra para yaqIna rakhane vAle duniyA bhara ke vaij~nAnikoM meM shAmila haiM, naॉrve ke TraॉnDa yorgeMsana.
unhoMne unnIsa sau assI meM nArve ke maChalI udyoga ko bhArI tabAhI se bachAyA thA.
taba naॉrve ke qarIba milane vAlI sAlmana maChaliyAM, rahasyamayI DhaMga se mara rahI thIM.
inakA kArobAra, nArve kI arthavyavasthA kA ba.DA hissA thA.
yorgeMsana aura unake sAthiyoM ne, sAlmana ke marane kI vajaha kA patA kiyA, aura phira usa roga se la.Dane kI vaiksIna taiyAra kI.
unnIsa sau ninyAnave meM, yorgeMsana kI mulAqAta, nArve kI risarcha kAuMsila ke eka sadasya se huI.
unhoMne sAla unnIsa sau unahattara kA eka qissA sunAyA.
jaba eka svisa vaij~nAnika ne, naॉrve ke jaMgaloM se eka KAsa taraha ke kukuramutte kI nasla ko khojA.
usameM se eka kemikala milA, jisakA nAma hai, siklosporina.
ye Aja kI tArIKa meM tamAma taraha ke TrAMsaplAMTa ke marIzoM ke kAma AtA hai.
ise, usa kukuramutte kI nasla se nikAlakara, saiMDoza nAma kI davA kaMpanI ne, araboM Daॉlara kamAe.
vahIM nArve ke logoM ko, isase rattI bhara bhI fAyadA nahIM huA.
naॉrve kI risarcha kAuMsila ke usa sadasya ne, yorgeMsana se kahA, ki kyA hama aba bhI apane desha meM aise kemikala talAsha sakate haiM, jo rogoM se la.Dane kI tAqata rakhate hoM.
yorgeMsana ne isakA javAba hAM meM diyA.
unheM nayA mishana mila gayA thA.
naॉrve kI sarazamIM aura isake irda-girda phaile sarda samaMdara meM, naI davAoM kI talAsha kA.
unhoMne sAlmana udyoga ko bachAne kI apanI shoharata kA fAyadA uThAyA.
yorgeMsana ne tamAma saMsthAoM se qarIba do karo.Da Daॉlara juTAkara, naॉrve kA bAyoDiskavarI projekTa shurU kiyA.
bAda meM isameM ArkaTika bAyoDiskavarI seMTara ke kAma ko bhI jo.Da diyA gayA.
Aja yorgeMsana ke mishana se ju.De vaij~nAnika, samaMdara se, jaMgaloM se, tamAma taraha kI chIzeM talAshakara lAte haiM.
inheM laiba meM ChAMTA jAtA hai.
kAma kI chIzoM kI KUbiyAM patA karane ke lie, una kemikalsa ko isa projekTa kI sAjhIdAra nijI kaMpaniyoM ke havAle kara diyA jAtA hai.
do hazAra sAta se ArkaTika sAgara meM aba taka eka sau pachAsa nae kaMpAuMDa talAshe jA chuke haiM.
inameM se kaI se duniyA ko ba.DI ummIdeM haiM.
aba naॉrve ke isa projekTa se, jarmanI kA maiksa plaiMka lIDa DiskavarI seMTara bhI ju.Da gayA hai.
tAki talAshe gae hara kemikala kI KUbiyoM kI sahI DhaMga se pa.DatAla ho sake.
bahuta sI davA kaMpaniyAM, aba Kuda isa abhiyAna meM dilachaspI le rahI haiM.
AKira qudaratI tarIqe se milI davAoM kA koI javAba jo nahIM.
phira ina kemikala kaMpAuMDa kA aura bhI kArobArI istemAla ho sakatA hai.
yAnI yorgeMsana kI dUraMdeshI kI vajaha se, Aja uttarI dhruva ke ilAqe, aura KAsa taura se nArve ke pAsa ke samaMdara, mAnavatA ke nae rakShaka ke taura para ubhare haiM.
inase iMsAniyata ke sAmane kha.DI kaI chunautiyoM kA hala milane kI ummIda hai.
jaba bhI koI qudaratI Afata AtI hai, to usase ju.DI tamAma KabareM Ane lagatI haiM.
jaise ki samudrI tUfAna se itane loga mAre gae, yA phira bhUkaMpa kI vajaha se itanA nuqasAna huA.
jaMgala kI Aga ne itane ghara jalA die.
matalaba ye ki kisI bhI prAkRRitika ApadA ke Ane para, iMsAna ko kitanA nuqasAna huA, yahI KabareM AtI haiM.
iMsAna ke sabase qarIbI rishtedAroM, yAnI baMdaroM kI tamAma nasloM ke bAre meM bAta karate haiM.
aba jaise do hazAra paMdraha meM, iMDoneshiyA ke borniyo dvIpa para, jaMgaloM meM bhayaMkara Aga laga gaI thI, isa vajaha se, jaMgaloM ko bhArI nuqasAna huA.
ye ilAqA pahale hI lagAtAra tIna sAla ke sUkhe se behAla thA, Aga kI vajaha se bache hue pe.Da jala gae.
dhueM aura jalate sUraja ne bAqI kI kasara pUrI kara dI.
isa ilAqe meM rahane vAle orAMguTAna ke rahane ke ThikAne tabAha ho gae.
unake khAne ke lie na pattiyAM bachIM, aura na hI phala.
zarA sochie, ki isa qudaratI Afata se, kitane orAMguTAna mare hoMge.
kanADA kI yaॉrka yUnivarsiTI kI ena rasana ne, isa bAre meM kAfI risarcha kI hai.
vo kahatI haiM, ki borniyo meM pAe jAne vAle orAMguTAna, apanI nasla ke sabase mazabUta jAnavara hote haiM.
vo kaI musIbatoM kA AsAnI se sAmanA karate haiM.
lekina ena kA kahanA hai, ki isa bAra ke hAlAta, unake lie bhI kAfI mushkila haiM.
ala nino kI vajaha se, unake rahane ke ilAqe, sUkhe se behAla haiM.
phira jaMgaloM kI Aga ne hAlAta aura KarAba kara die haiM.
ye piChale paiMtIsa sAloM meM tIsarI bAra hai, ki orAMguTAna ko, sUkhe aura jaMgala kI Aga kI doharI mAra jhelanI pa.Da rahI hai.
achChI bAta ye hai, ki orAMguTAna khAne ke mAmale meM, bahuta nakharebAza nahIM, unheM jo milatA hai vo khA lete haiM.
phira bhI Aga kI vajaha se, na unake rahane ke ThikAne bache haiM, aura na hI khAne ko kuCha mila rahA hai.
Aga se tabAha hue jaMgaloM ke phira se AbAda hone meM, kama se kama bIsa sAla lageMge.
ye daura, orAMguTAnoM ke lie bahuta burA rahane vAlA hai.
diqqata ye hai, ki apane se lagI Aga ke alAvA, sthAnIya loga bhI, zamIna sAfa karane ke lie Aga lagA dete haiM, jisase bache khuche ilAqe bhI tabAha ho jAte haiM.
aise meM orAMguTAna phira khAne kI talAsha meM, iMsAnI bastiyoM kI tarafa Ate haiM.
iMsAnoM se jAnavaroM kI jaMga meM, jAnavaroM kI hAra, kamobesha taya hotI hai.
ziMdagI kI isa jaMga ne, orAMguTAnoM para, bahuta burA asara DAlA hai.
unheM apane rivAyatI rihAishI ilAqoM se, dUsarI jagaha jAnA pa.Da rahA hai.
iMDoneshiyA se hazAroM kilomITara dUra, madhya amarIkA meM, baMdaroM kI eka aura nasla, qudaratI Afata se jUjha rahI hai.
madhya amarIkI desha, beliza ke jaMgaloM meM, sAla do hazAra eka meM, samudrI tUfAna Airisa ne kAfI tabAhI machAI thI.
beliza ke ina jaMgaloM meM, blaika hAulara nAma ke baMdara rahate haiM.
samudrI tUfAna kI jagaha se, unakI AbAdI ko bhArI nuqasAna pahuMchA thA.
isa bAre meM risarcha kara rahIM kanADA kI mairI pAvelkA batAtI haiM, ki tUfAnI havAoM se jaMgala pUrI taraha Katma ho gae the.
blaika hAulara baMdaroM kI, sATha fIsada AbAdI, isa tUfAna meM Katma ho gaI thI.
mairI aura unakI TIma ko lagatA thA, ki tUfAna ke bAda bhI, baMdaroM kI ye nasla, Kuda ko bachA le jAegI, kyoMki ye kuCha bhI khA-pI lete haiM.
beliza meM rahane vAle blaika hAulara baMdaroM kI AbAdI, agale tIna sAloM meM itanI kama huI, ki tUfAna se pahale ke kevala bIsa fIsada baMdara hI, jaMgaloM meM bache the.
eka vaqta to aisA lagA, ki blaika hAulara baMdaroM kI sthAnIya nasla hI Katma ho jAegI.
AKira meM baMdaroM kI AbAdI ghaTanA kama huI, aura aba ye ba.Dha bhI rahI hai.
lekina aisA tabhI huA, jaba beliza ke jaMgaloM meM phaloM vAle pe.Da phira se taiyAra ho gae.
isase sAfa hai, ki ina baMdaroM ke bAre meM jaisA sochA gayA thA, vaisA nahIM huA.
ye musIbata ke vaqta bhI, ghAsa-phUsa khAne ke bajAya, phaloM kI talAsha kara rahe the.
isase inakI AbAdI ko bhArI nuqasAna uThAnA pa.DA.
vahIM beliza ke hI dUsare ilAqe meM pAe jAne vAle spAiDara maMkI ke aMdara, qudaratI AfatoM se la.Dane kI zyAdA kUvata dekhI gaI.
ina baMdaroM se pahale, do hazAra eka, aura phira, do hazAra dasa meM Ae, bhayaMkara samudrI tUfAnoM se, bhArI nuqasAna jhelA thA.
Ama taura para jaba spAiDara maMkI ke rihAishI ilAqoM ko nuqasAna hotA hai, to ye sabase pahale bhAga kha.De hote haiM.
aura vahAM tabhI lauTate haiM, jaba hAlAta sAmAnya ho jAte haiM.
magara tUfAna se huI tabAhI se, spAiDara maMkI ne, ba.DA dimAGa lagAkara nipaTane kI koshisha kI.
spAiDara maMkI, Ama taura para ba.De jhuMDa meM rahate haiM.
ba.De hote baMdara, bAda meM apane dostoM-rishtedAroM kA alaga jhuMDa banA lete haiM, aura jhuMDa ke sadasya, badalate rahate haiM.
lekina pahale do tUfAnoM, aura phira, apane ilAqe meM lagI bhayaMkara Aga se nipaTane ke lie, ina baMdaroM ne jhuMDa meM rahane kI apanI Adata meM, pherabadala kara liyA.
jahAM pahale jhuMDa ke baMdara badalate rahate the, vahIM Afata Ane ke bAda, inhoMne apane dostoM-sAthiyoM meM, koI hera-phera nahIM kiyA.
isase khAne ko lekara inake bIcha ApasI jhaga.De nahIM hue.
sabane khAne ke kama sAmAna ko, Apasa meM, hela se bAMTakara khAyA.
aura isa taraha, spAiDara maMkI ne, ApasI ekajuTatA se, do-do samudrI tUfAnoM, aura jaMgala kI bhayaMkara Aga jaisI ApadAoM kA sAmanA kiyA.
matalaba sAfa hai, qudarata ke qahara se bachane kA mAddA, sabhI jAnavaroM meM hotA hai.
jo jAnavara badale hue hAlAta ke hisAba se Kuda ko DhAla lete haiM, vo bacha nikalate haiM.
vahIM, jo aisA nahIM kara pAte, vo tabAhI meM, tabAha hote haiM.
hAM ina risarcha se eka bAta sAfa hai, ki iMsAna ko, apane Asa-pAsa bAqI jAnavaroM ko dekhate rahanA hai, to use jaMgaloM meM apanA dakhala kama karanA hogA.
varanA qudaratI ApadA ke bAda, iMsAnoM kA qahara, jAnavaroM kI bahuta sI nasloM kA KAtmA kara degA.
isa DAMsa pareDa meM, hazAroM kI saMkhyA meM DAMsara aura saMgItakAra shAmila hote haiM.
hara sAla sAMbA DAMsa pareDa ko dekhane ke lie, ba.DI saMkhyA, loga ikaTThe hote haiM.
isa DAMsa pareDa ko lekara, logoM meM kAfI utsAha hotA hai.
asAkusA kA sAMbA DAMsa kArnivala, eka TIma DAMsa hotA hai.
AsAkusA kA sAMbA kArnivala, garmI ke dinoM meM, Tokyo kA lokapriya tyauhAra hotA hai.
eka zamAnA thA, ki reDiyo seTa se gUMjatI, devakInaMdana pAMDe kI AvAza, bhArata ke jana jana ko sammohita kara letI thI.

apane jIvanakAla meM hI lejeMDa bana gae devakInaMdana pAMDe ke samAchAra pa.Dhane kA aMdAza, uchchAraNa kI shuddhatA, jhannATedAra robIlI AvAza, kisI bhI shrotA ko romAMchita kara dene ke lie kAfI thI.
devakInaMdana pAMDe ke sAtha kAma kara chuke mashahUra patrakAra, umesha joshI yAda karate haiM, paune nau baje kA buleTina jaise hI shurU hotA thA, basa eka hI AvAza sunAI detI thI.
ye, AkAshavANI hai, aba Apa, devakInaMdana pAMDe se samAchAra sunie.
jitane bhI ba.De avasara the, chAhe KushI kA avasara ho yA Gama kA avasara ho, devakInaMdana pAMDe, samAchAra pa.Dhate the.
joshI Age kahate haiM, javAharalAla neharU, aura jayaprakAsha nArAyaNa ke nidhana kA samAchAra, unhoMne hI pa.Dhe.
saMjaya gA.NdhI ke Akasmika nidhana kA samAchAra vAchana karane ke lie, riTAyara ho chuke devakInaMdana pAMDe ko, KAsa taura se dillI sTeshana para bulavAyA gayA.
jitane bhI ba.De avasara hote the, unheM KAsa taura se samAchAra pa.Dhane bulAyA jAtA thA, chAhe unakI DyUTI ho yA na ho.
saba ko patA thA, ki ye desha kI AvAza hai.
pAMDejI kaha rahe haiM, to isakA matalaba pUrA desha kaha rahA hai.
kAnapura meM paidA hue devakInaMdana pAMDe ne, unnIsa sau taitAllisa meM, AkAshavANI lakhanaU se, kaizuala enauMsara, aura DrAmA ArTisTa ke rUpa meM apane kariyara kI shuruAta kI thI.
unnIsa sau a.DatAlIsa meM, jaba dillI meM AkAshavANI kI hiMdI samAchAra sevA shurU huI, to karIba tIna hazAra ummIdavAroM meM, unakI AvAza aura vAchana shailI ko sarvashreShTha pAyA gayA.
usake bAda se, unhoMne kabhI pIChe mu.Da kara nahIM dekhA.

kaI varShoM taka, devakInaMdana pAMDe ke sAtha kAma kara chuke, aura AkAshavANI meM nyUza eDiTara ke pada se riTAyara hue, trilokInAtha batAte haiM, U.NchA mAthA, bhItara taka jhA.NkatI shaffAka A.NkheM, chehare para jhalakatA AtmavishvAsa, sAfagoI, ye saba milA kara, devakInaMdana pAMDe kA shAnadAra vyaktitva banatA thA.
kAma ke prati ImAnadArI itanI, ki buleTina shurU hone se pA.Ncha minaTa pahale hI uTha kara, sTUDiyo chale jAte the.
naI pI.DhI ke vAchaka to, do minaTa pahale jAne meM apanI heThI samajhate haiM.
lakhanaU meM mile urdU ke anubhava ne, unheM hameshA spaShTa samAchAra vAchana meM madada kI.
unake sAtha kAma kara chuke aura apane zamAne meM mashahUra samAchAra vAchaka, azIza hasana kahate haiM, unakI AvAza, kaॉmana AvAza nahIM thI.
unheM sheroshAyarI kA bahuta shauka thA.
isakI vajaha se, unakA talaffusa bahuta achChA thA.
devakInaMdana pAMDe jitane lokapriya Ama AdamiyoM ke bIcha the, utane hI ba.De netAoM aura KAsa logoM ke bIcha bhI.
umesha joshI batAte haiM, AkAshavANI kI eka sTAfa esosieshana huA karatI thI, aura mashahUra samAchAra vAchaka, ashoka vAjapeI, usake kartA dhartA huA karate the.
taba sTAfa ArTisTa ko peMshana aura grejueTI nahIM milatI thI.
aTThAvana sAla kI umra meM riTAyara hote the, aura apane ghara chale jAte the.
unakA bhaviShya aMdhakAramaya hotA thA.
vo mAMga kara rahe the, ki unheM bhI dUsare sarakArI karmachAriyoM kI taraha TrITa kiyA jAe, aura unheM bhI peMshana aura grejueTI kI suvidhA dI jAe.
isa silasile meM eka pUrA pratinidhimaMDala, pradhAnamaMtrI iMdirA gA.NdhI se milane gayA.
bAtachIta ho rahI thI.
iMdirA gA.NdhI kI nazareM, fAiloM para nIche ga.DI huI thIM.
jaba ashoka jI ne devakInaMdana pAMDe kA parichaya karAyA, ki ye devakInaMdana pAMDe haiM, aura ye bhI hamAre sAtha Ae haiM, to iMdirA gAMdhI ne apanA kAma Cho.Da diyA.
kalama nIche rakha dI, aura nazareM uThA kara bolIM, achChA, to Apa haiM devakInaMdana pAMDe, yAnI ki iMdirA gA.NdhI bhI, unako itanA sunatI rahI thIM.
vo zamAnA hI aisA thA, ki agara kisI ko bhI Kabara sunanI ho, to AkAshavANI hI ekamAtra mAdhyama hotA thA.
devakInaMdana pAMDe ke beTe aura isa samaya raMgamaMcha aura baॉlIvuDa ke abhinetA, sudhIra pAMDe batAte haiM, ki ghara meM bhI, Galata hiMdI bolane para vo Toka dete the.
jaba maiM skUla meM thA, to saba jAnate the ki ye devakInaMdana pAMDe ke beTe haiM.
usa zamAne meM manoraMjana kA sAdhana, reDiyo aura sinemA huA karatA thA.
mere pitA AvAza se hI pahachAne jAte the.
unakA nAma liyA, aura patA chala jAtA thA, ki vo kauna haiM.
mujhe garva mahasUsa hotA thA, ki eka shaKsa, jo itanA lokapriya hai, aura jo itanA jAnA jAtA hai, maiM unakA beTA hU.N.

ye bhI hotA thA, ki hiMdI kI klAsa meM jaba hama Galata vAkya, yA Galata shabda bola dete the, to hamAre TIchara sabase kahate the, ki dekhie sAhaba, devakInaMdana pAMDe ke beTe ho kara ye Galata hiMdI bola rahe haiM.
ghara meM bhI pitAjI Galata shabda kA istemAla bilkula bardAshta nahIM kara pAte the.
vo faurana Toka dete the, ki ye kaisA shabda bola rahA hai.
devakInaMdana pAMDe kA mAnanA thA, ki Kabara ko pUrI taraha samajha lene ke bAda hI, use pa.DhanA chAhie.
mashahUra samAchAra vAchaka, kRRiShNa kumAra bhArgava ne, na sirfa unake sAtha kAma kiyA thA, balki unase kuCha gurumaMtra bhI lie the.
bhArgava batAte haiM, unnIsa sau sATha meM, merA hiMdI samAchAra vAchaka ke rUpa meM chayana huA thA.
jaba mujhase pahalI bAra samAchAra pa.Dhane ke lie kahA gayA, to merI samajha meM hI nahIM A rahA thA, ki maiM kyA karU.N.
mere eka mitra the, keshava pAMDe, jo usa samaya, vividha bhAratI meM kAma karate the.
maiMne kahA, keshavajI, mujhe batAie ki samAchAra kaise pa.Dhe jAte haiM?
unhoMne mujhase kahA, ki maiM tumheM eka shaKsa se milavAtA hU.N.
mere sAmane vAlI kursI para eka shaKsa baiThe hue the, kurtA pAyajAmA pahane hue.
mujhe unake sAmane le jA kara vo bole, milie, devakInaMdana pAMDe se.
mere muMha se nikalA, ki Apako sunate sunate hI maiM ba.DA huA hU.N.
unhoMne kahA, bhArgava, samAchAra koI kalA nahIM hai.
lekina jo kuCha pa.Dho, use samajhakara pa.Dho.
ye gurumaMtra maiMne unase sIkhA, aura jIvana bhara, maiM use apanAtA rahA.
devakInaMdana pAMDe ke vyaktitva kA eka dilachaspa pahalU ye bhI thA, ki vo apane pAsa kalama nahIM rakhate the.
umesha joshI batAte haiM, aksara maiMne dekhA hai, ki nyUza rIDara, apanI skripTa para, kalama se mArkiMga karate haiM, ki kahA.N para mujhe paॉza denA hai, yA kahA.N para sTresa denA hai.
lekina pAMDejI ne kabhI koI mArkiMga nahIM kI.
ye zarUra hotA thA, ki sTUDiyo meM samAchAra paDhate hue, vo apane dAhine hAtha kA aMgUThA, aura pahalI uMgalI, isa taraha karIba le Ate the, mAno unhoMne kalama paka.DI huI ho.
usake bAda, vo pa.Dhate pa.Dhate, havA meM mArkiMga kiyA karate the.
kahIM kaॉmA ho, to kaॉmA lagAte the, virAma ho, to virAma lagAte the.
kisI bhI mauke para, maiMne unheM faMbala karate hue nahIM dekhA.
agara koI gala़tI hotI bhI thI, to vo isa safAI se saMbhAlate the, ki kisI ko kuCha patA hI nahIM chalatA thA ki koI GalatI huI hai.
nyUza eDITara trilokInAtha yAda karate haiM, eka bAra yAsera arAfAta se ju.DI eka Kabara pa.DhI jAnI thI.
vo AdhI hI TAipa ho pAI.
maiMne sochA, ki jaba pAMDejI dUsarI KabareM paDha rahe hoMge, tabhI maiM usa Kabara ko pUrA likha dU.NgA.
maiM vAkya pUrA karanA bhUla gayA, aura vahI Kabara, pAMDejI ko paDhane ke lie de dI.
lekina pAMDe jI ne, binA ruke adhUre vAkya ko sahajatA se ye kahate hue paDhA, ki yAsera arAfAta ne, kuCha bhI spaShTa kahane se iMkAra kara diyA.
nyUza rUma meM, unakI maujUdagI kA ehasAsa, kamare ke aMdara se A rahe ThahAkoM se hotA thA.
una ThahAkoM se, nyUza rUma ke bAhara kha.De loga samajha jAte the, ki vo aMdara maujUda haiM.
azIza hasana yAda karate haiM, unakA jUniyara-sIniyara, saba ke sAtha, bahuta dostAnA vyavahAra huA karatA thA.
sabako patA thA, ki vo dila ke sAfa AdamI haiM.
unake dila meM ChalAvA, dikhAvA, yA pAliTiksa bAzI jaisI koI chIza nahIM thI.
unako tho.DA bahuta DriMka karane kA shauka thA.
vahI unakI akelI kamazorI thI, lekina usakI vajaha se, unake buleTina para koI asara nahIM pa.DatA thA.
unakI vinodapriyatA kA eka udAharaNa dete hue, kRRiShNa kumAra bhArgava, eka purAnA kissA yAda karate haiM, una dinoM reDiyo para vividha bhAratI se, hara ghaMTe eka buleTina huA karatA thA.
use banAyA maiMne thA, lekina use paDhanA, paMDitajI ko thA.
maiMne unako skripTa dI, aura kahA, chalie, pa.Dhane kA samaya ho gayA hai.
vo bole, yAra Aja mUDa nahIM ho rahA hai.
jaba maiM samAchAra pa.Dha kara vApasa AyA, to unase kahA, pAMDe jI, Aja to bahuta ba.DI GalatI ho gaI.
jaba maiMne sArI bAta batAI, to ve haMsate hue bole, koI bAta nahIM bhArgava.
maiMne bhI eka bAra, apanI jagaha urmilA mishra kA nAma bola diyA thA.
unakA eka dUsarA qissA bhI ba.DA mashahUra hai.
eka bAra kisI kI chunautI para, unhoMne samAchAra kA AraMbha, kuCha isa taraha se kiyA thA, yaha devakInaMdana pAMDe hai, aba Apa AkAshavANI se, samAchAra sunie.
unake samAchAra pa.Dhane ke DhaMga meM, pUrI taraha spaShTatA huA karatI thI.
vo kahA karate the, ki agara bhArata maicha jIta gayA, to maiM ati utsAha meM samAchAra kyoM paDhU.N.
samAchAra vAchana ke bAre meM, vo eka behatarIna gura batAte the, jo Aja ke ninyAnave fIsadI samAchAra vAchakoM, aura eMkaroM ko shAyada nahIM mAlUma hogA.
umesha joshI batAte haiM, vo kahate the, ki eka chuTakI bajAo, utanA samaya, do vAkyoM ke bIcha honA chAhie.
do chuTakI jitanA samaya, do pairAgrAfa, aura tIna chuTakI jitanA samaya, do KabaroM ke bIcha denA zarUrI hai.
varnA bhAgavata kathA pa.Dhane, aura samAchAra pa.Dhane meM, koI aMtara nahIM rahegA.
devakInaMdana pAMDe ne kaI reDiyo nATakoM meM bhAga liyA thA.
unheM AdhArashilA filma aura lokapriya Telivizana sIriyala tamasa meM, apane abhinaya ke jalave dikhAne kA maukA bhI milA thA.
khAne pIne kA bhI unheM bahuta shauka thA.
unake beTe sudhIra pAMDe batAte haiM, achChe khAne kA, unheM bahuta shauka thA.
goshta aura rama ke vo bahuta shaukIna the.
lekina ghara meM hI banAnA, aura khAnA pasaMda karate the.
hoTaloM aura restarA.N meM jAnA, unheM kuCha KAsa pasaMda nahIM thA.
unheM tanhAI meM baiTha kara pa.DhanA likhanA bhI bahuta pasaMda thA.
shero shAyarI kI kitAbeM, unake sirahAne hameshA rahatI thIM.
tIna chAra aKabAra vo pa.DhA karate the, aura usakA eka eka harfa, vo eka tarafa se chATa jAte the.
devakInaMdana pAMDe ko hameshA samAchAra vAchana kI vidhA ke shikhara puruSha ke rUpa meM yAda kiyA jAegA.
Apane bahuta se jAnavaroM ko shikAra karate hue dekhA hogA, para kabhI sochA hai, ki jaba ye shikArI jAnavara, apane shikAra para hamalA karate haiM, to kisakA jhapaTTA sabase tAqatavara hotA hogA.
chalie, Aja aMdAzA lagAte haiM, ki kisa jAnavara kA nivAlA, sabase tAqatavara hotA hai.
vhela, Aja kI tArIKa meM duniyA kI sabase ba.DI jIva hai.
inameM se boheDa vhela kA muMha, Aja duniyA meM kisI bhI jAnavara meM sabase ba.DA mAnA jAtA hai.
lekina vo apane muMha se, kisI ko kATatI nahIM.
kisI para muMha se jhapaTTA mArakara, use chabAne ke lie, jAnavara ke pAsa ba.DA sA muMha, phira usameM KataranAka nukIle dAMta, aura tAqatavara peshiyAM honI chAhie.
to pahalI bAta ye hai, ki hara vo jAnavara, jisake dAMta haiM, vo shikAra ko chabAtA nahIM.
jaise ki ghoMghe kI jIbha, jaise, reDulA nAma ke aMga para, hazAroM dAMta hote haiM.
magara isase vo kATatA nahIM, ina dAMtoM ko, vo kharoMchane ke kAma meM lAtA hai.
isI taraha, nIlI vhela, duniyA kI sabase ba.DI jIva hai, magara isake dAMta nahIM hote.
isake muqAbale, sparma vhela ke dAMta kAfI teza aura ba.De hote haiM.
lekina sparma vhela kI bAiTa ko bhI, sabase tAqatavara nahIM kahA jA sakatA, kyoMki isake sirfa nichale jaba.De meM dAMta hote haiM.
Ama taura para, sparma vhela apane shikAra ko nigalatI hai, chabAtI nahIM.
raॉyala beljiyana iMsTITyUTa ऑfa nechurala sAiMsa ke oliviyara laimbarTa kahate haiM, ki Aja shikAra para jhapaTTA mArakara chabAne ke mAmale meM, sabase Age hai, kilara vhela.
magara kilara vhela, asa meM vhela nahIM, Daॉlfina kI eka nasla hai.
ye ikattIsa fuTa taka laMbI hotI haiM.
inake pachAsa ke qarIba dAMta hote haiM.
ina dAMtoM se, vo apane shikAra ko chIra-phA.Da DAlatI haiM.
ye vhela se lekara sIla taka ko apanA shikAra banAtI haiM.
lekina kilara vhela yA orkA, hameshA jhuMDa meM shikAra karatI haiM.
aise meM kisI eka jAnavara kA sabase tAqatavara jhapaTTA batAne kI resa meM, inheM bhI nahIM ginA jA sakatA.
inake muqAbale, greTa vhAiTa shArka kI bAiTa, zyAdA tAqatavara hotI hogI, kyoMki, inake tIna sau dAMta hote haiM.
ye sabase KataranAka shikArI mAne jAte haiM.
magara diqqata ye hai, ki inake jaba.DoM meM, haDDiyAM nahIM hotIM.
to phira kaise mAnA jAe, ki inakI bAiTa sabase tAqatavara hotI hai.
isake lie jAnavaroM ke shikAra ko kATane ke vaqta lagAI gaI tAqata ko nApane kI zarUrata hai.
ऑsTreliyA kI nyU iMglaiMDa yUnivarsiTI ke sTIfana ro ne, kaMpyUTara kI madada se, jAnavaroM ke jhapaTTA mArakara chabAne ke vaqta lagAe gae zora ko nApA thA.
patA ye chalA, ki kisI bhI shArka ke jhapaTTA mArakara chabAne meM, zyAdA se zyAdA, aThAraha hazAra do sau solaha nyUTana kI tAqata lagatI hai.
nyUTana vo paimAnA hai, jisase kisI chIza para lagA zora nApA jAtA hai.
isako isa taraha se samajhie, ki hamAre dAMta, jaba bahuta tAqata lagAkara koI chIza kATate haiM, to ye zora, zyAdA se zyAdA, eka hazAra tIna sau satraha nyUTana kA hotA hai.
dharatI para nApI gaI kisI bhI sabase tAqatavara bAiTa meM, naMbara eka para Ate haiM, magaramachCha.
amarIkA kI floriDA yUnivarsiTI ke gregarI eriksana ne, machCharoM kI teIsa nasloM ke shikAra karate vaqta lagAI gaI tAqata ko nApA thA.
unakI TIma ne pAyA, ki magaramachCha apane shikAra ko chabAte vaqta, solaha hazAra chAra sau chaudaha nyUTana taka kA zora lagAte haiM.
dharatI para, ye sabase tAqatavara bAiTa hai.
isase pahale chitakabare laka.Dabagghe ke jhapaTTe ko, sabase tAqatavara mAnA jAtA thA.
vaise magaramachCha kI chabAne meM lagAI gaI tAqata, shArka se kama hai.
magara shArka kI bAiTa kI tAqata ko kaMpyUTara se aMdAzA gayA thA.
vahIM magaramachCha ke jhapaTTe ko to, vAqaI meM AzamAyA gayA.
phira, jina magaramachChoM para, gregarI ne ye tajurbA kiyA thA, vo sabase ba.De magaramachCha vAlI nasla ke nahIM the.
isase ye kahA jA sakatA hai, ki unake chabAne kI tAqata aura bhI zyAdA hogI.
dakShiNa amarIkA meM pAI jAne vAlI pirhAnA maChalI kI bAiTa ko bhI kAfI paॉvarafula mAnA jAtA hai.
lekina Aja jo pirhAnA maChaliyAM milatI haiM, vo bahuta ChoTI hotI haiM.
jabaki Aja se qarIba nabbe lAkha sAla pahale, isakI ba.DI bahaneM, usI ilAqe meM rahA karatI thIM.
inheM megApirhAnA kahA gayA.
ye tIna fuTa taka laMbI hotI thIM.
mAnA jAtA hai ki inake jhapaTTe meM, eka hazAra do sau chAlIsa se, chAra hazAra sAta sau unachAsa nyUTana taka kA zora huA karatA thA.
aba jaba dharatI se Katma ho chuke jAnavaroM ke tAqatavara jhapaTToM kI bAta ho rahI hai, to isa resa meM, kaI aura jAnavara shAmila ho sakate haiM.
qarIba pachchIsa lAkha sAla pahale pAI jAne vAlI, megAloDaॉna nAma kI shArka, Aja kI shArka se, tIna gune se bhI zyAdA laMbI hotI thI.
zAhira hai, isakI bAiTa bhI, kAfI tAqatavara rahI hogI.
mAnA jAtA hai, ki isake jhapaTTe meM, eka se do lAkha nyUTana taka kA zora lagatA hogA.
itanI tAqata lagane para, eka kAra kA kachUmara nikala sakatA hai.
jisa vaqta ye megAloDaॉna shArka dharatI para rahatI thI, usI vaqta, vhela kI bhI eka nasla, dharatI para basara karatI thI.
isakA nAma, vaij~nAnikoM ne, liviyATana, melavilI rakhA hai.
isake kuCha kaMkAla mile haiM.
isa vhela kA jaba.DA hI qarIba dasa fuTa kA hotA thA.
vahIM isa vhela ke dAMtoM kI laMbAI, qarIba chaudaha iMcha hotI thI.
Aja ATha navaMbara ko, dasiyoM lAkha amarIkI mahilAeM aisA kuCha kareMgI, jisakA unheM laMbe samaya se iMtazAra thA, lekina unheM isake pahale isakA mauqA nahIM milA thA.
ve rAShTrapati chunAva meM kisI ba.DI pArTI kI mahilA ummIdavAra ke lie voTa kareMgI.
kuCha logoM ne to isake lie ChiyAnave sAla laMbA iMtazAra kiyA hai.
amarIkA meM aThAraha agasta unnIsa sau bIsa se pahale janmI mahilAoM ne, ziMdagI kI shuruAta aise desha meM kI hai, jahAM auratoM ko voTa dene kA haka nahIM thA.
inameM aThAnave sAla kI esTela shulsa bhI haiM.
ve dUsare vishva yuddha ke daurAna, eka kAraKAne meM kAma karatI thIM.
ve jaba ChoTI thIM, unakI mAM voTa dene jAtI thIM, to unheM sAtha le jAtI thIM.
esTela dila kI marIza haiM, aura haॉsapIsa meM rahatI haiM.
haॉsapIsa, vo jagaha hotI hai, jahAM loga mRRityu kI ichChA lie aMtima dina GuzArane ke lie jAte haiM.
ve kahatI haiM, maiMne yaha taya kara liyA thA, ki itanA to zarUra jiUMgI, ki pahalI mahilA rAShTrapati kA chunAva dekha sakUM.
unhoMne akTUbara meM pahalI bAra voTa DAlA.
unhoMne mahasUsa kiyA, ki ve kAfI bhAvuka ho gaIM thI, aura apanI potI sArA se kahA, ki unakI tasvIra fesabuka para posTa kara deM.
sArA ne likhA, maiM apanI aThAnave sAla kI dAdI ke kahane para ye tasvIra posTa kara rahI hUM, ve kaMpyUTara kA istemAla karanA nahIM jAnatI haiM.
kuCha hI dera meM isa foTo ko hazAroM logoM ne lAika kiyA.
dUsare kaI logoM kI bhI yaha kahAnI thI.
jalda vebasAiTa AI veTeDa nainTi siksa Iyarsa bana gaI.
isameM hilerI kliMTana ke una samarthakoM kI kahAniyAM thIM, jinakA janma, mahilAoM ko matadAna kA adhikAra milane se pahale huA thA.
inameM se kuCha mahilAoM ko, unnIsaveM saMshodhana ke pArita kie jAne, aura mahilAoM ko voTa dene kA adhikAra die jAne kI ghaTanA, abhI bhI yAda hai.
mesAchyuseTsa kI jUliyaTa barnasTIna kA janma, unnIsa sau teraha meM huA thA, ve eka sau tIna sAla kI haiM.
ve kahatI haiM, mujhe yAda hai, ki auratoM ko matadAna kA adhikAra milane ke bAda pahalI bAra apanI mAM ke sAtha, gho.DAgA.DI meM matadAna keMdra taka gaI thI.
DemokreTika pArTI kI sadasya, eka sau do sAla kI, jerailDina jerI emeTa ne bhI voTa diyA hai.

shikAgo nivAsI, aThAnave sAla kI bIeTrisa laMpakina kahatI haiM, merI mAM una kuCha mahilAoM meM se thIM, jinhoMne apane bAla kaTavA lie, aura kIcha.Da meM ghisaTa kara chalane vAlI laMbI skarTa kI jagaha, ChoTI Dresa pahana lI thI.
unhoMne Age kahA, yaha hamAre adhikAroM kI bAta hai.
yaha matadAna karane ke haqa se shurU huI.
jaba maiM itanI ba.DI ho gaI thI, ki ise samajha sakUM, mujhe kAfI garva huA, ki mahilAoM ne matadAna karane kA adhikAra hAsila kara liyA.
matadAna karane vAlI kaI mahilAoM ko to basa isI bAta para khushI hai, ki unheM rAShTrapati chunAva meM eka mahilA ummIdavAra ko voTa dene kA mauqA milA hai, kaI ne isa bAre meM sochA taka nahIM thA.
eMjelA esTela gairAvelI esTara kI mauta, ikkIsa akTUbara ko aThAnave sAla kI umra meM ho gaI.
unhoMne pahale hI voTa dene kA vikalpa chunA.
lekina natIjA Ane ke pahale hI unakA nidhana ho gayA.
unhoMne kahA thA, yadi mujhe eka bAra aura voTa dene kA mauqA milA, maiM kisI aurata ko hI denA chAhUMgI.
esTara ne mauta ke kuCha ghaMTe pahale hI voTa de diyA.
para nabbe aura sau sAla ke Upara kI umra kI kaI mahilAoM ke lie ye, isakA pratIka hai, ki mahilAoM ko kitanA haqa milA hai.
yUjIniyA parkinsa eka sau do sAla kI haiM.
ve kahatI haiM, maiM mahilAvAdI taba se hUM, jaba yaha shabda banA bhI nahIM thA.
ye samaya kI bAta hai, ki koI aurata rAShTrapati banatI hai.
ninyAnave sAla kI silviyA shulamaina ke mutAbiqa, ye voTa, sirfa isalie nahIM hai ki hilerI eka mahilA haiM.
ve kahatI haiM, yaha ye dikhAne ke lie hai, ki hama aurata hone ke nAte, kuCha bhI kara sakatI haiM, KAsa kara taba, jaba hamane usake lie zarUrI anubhava hAsila karane ke lie ka.DI mehanata kI hai.
parkinsa ne kahA, apanI potI aura pa.DapotI ko yaha batAne meM achChA lagatA hai, ki aba tumhArI sImA AkAsha hai, aura tuma vaha saba kuCha kara sakatI ho jo puruSha kara sakate haiM.
vebasAiTa kI koshishoM kI ora logoM kA dhyAna gayA.
shulza kI tasvIra TreMDa karane lagI, aura unheM DemokreTa ummIdavAra hilerI kliMTana ne, eka nijI chiTThI likhI.
unhoMne likhA, kisI ba.De rAjanItika dala kI pahalI rAShTrapati ummIdavAra hone kI zimmedAriyoM se, maiM abhibhUta ho gaI hUM.
unhoMne Age likhA, hamane itanA kuCha hAsila kara liyA hai.
para hameM abhI shIshe kI aMtima Chata ko to.DanA hai.
kenADA ke eka gotAKora ne samaMdara meM paramANu bama jaisA upakaraNa khojane kA dAvA kiyA hai.
mAnA jA rahA hai, ki ye amarIkA kA niShkriya paramANu bama ho sakatA hai.
sIna simarIchiMskI, briTisha kolaMbiyA ke pAsa, samudrI kaka.DI kI talAsha meM gote lagA rahe the.
isa daurAna, unheM u.DanatashtarI jaisI dikhane vAlA dhAtu kA eka upakaraNa nazara AyA.

dI keneDiyana DipArTameMTa ऑfa neshanala DifeMsa kA mAnanA hai, ki yaha upakaraNa, unnIsa sau pachAsa ke dashaka meM, isI ilAqe meM durghaTanAgrasta hue amarIkI bamavarShaka, bI ChattIsa meM lagA paramANu bama ho sakatA hai.
sarakAra kA mAnanA hai, ki isa bama meM sakriya paramANu sAmagrI nahIM hai.
isa talAsha ko puKtA karane ke lie, haidA gavaI dvIpa samUha ilAqe meM, nausenA kA jahAza bhejA jA rahA hai.
simarIchiMskI ne bIbIsI ko batAyA, ki aktUbara kI shuruAta meM, vo haidA gavaI dvipa samUha ilAqe meM gotAkhorI kara rahe the, jahAM unheM ye milA.
unhoMne batAyA, ki ye eka kiMga sAiza ke beDa se bhI ba.DA thA.
vo Upara se chapaTA thA aura usakA talA golAkAra thA.
usake bIchoM-bIcha, surAKa thA.
simarIchiMskI jaba samudra se bAhara Ae, to unhoMne apane sAthI gotAkhoroM se majAqa meM kahA, maiMne kuCha aisA khojA hai, jo adbhuta hai.
mujhe lagA ki yaha eka u.DanatashtarI hai.
sainya itihAsakAra GAyaba hue paramANu hathiyAra ko lekara AdhI sadI se pareshAna haiM.
amarIkI bamavarShaka bI ChattIsa, usa samaya briTisha kolaMbiyA ke pAsa durghaTanAgrasta ho gayA thA.
vo Teksasa ke kArsavela eyaraforsa besa kI u.DAna para thA.
isa vimAna meM, mArka chAra paramANu bama lagA thA.
u.DAna ke kuCha dera bAda hI, vimAna ke iMjana meM Aga laga gaI.
chAlaka dala ke satraha sadasyoM meM se bAraha ne, pairAshUTa ke zarie ChalAMga lagA dI.
lekina pAMcha sadasya aisA nahIM kara sake.
amarIkI senA kA kahanA hai, ki bama meM leDa, yUreniyama, aura TIenaTI bharA huA thA.
lekina usameM ploToniyama nahIM thA.
isalie vaha paramANu dhamAkA karane meM sakShama nahIM thA.
chAlaka dala ne, vimAna ko ऑTo moDa meM DAla diyA, aura use samaMdara ke bIcha, durghaTanAgrasta hone diyA.
tIna sAla bAda, isakA malabA, saika.DoM kilomITara ke dAyare meM bikharA pAyA gayA.
DI ena DI ke eka pravaktA ne bIbIsI ko batAyA, ki usane isa jAnakArI ko, apane amarIkI samakakSha se sAjhA kiyA hai.
vibhAga kA bhI kahanA hai, ki gotAkhora ne jo chIza khojI hai, vaha bama ho sakatI hai.
dillI kI dIvAlI yU.N to yahAM ke bAshiMdoM ko achChI lagatI hai, para mujhe nahIM.
isIlie dIvAlI se eka rAta pahale, maiM shahara Cho.Dakara bhAga jAtA hU.N, tAki yahAM kI bArUdI havA meM sAMsa na lenI pa.De.
isa bAra bhI maiM dillI se bhAga nikalA thA.
do dina bAda, paMjAba se lauTA, aura jaise hI dillI ke qarIba pahu.NchA, merA dila baiTha gayA.
dIvAlI ke bAda kI dillI kA nAma, mIDiyA meM gaisa chaiMbara ho gayA thA.
ho sakatA hai isameM kuCha sacha ho.
magara, jaba taka mere phepha.De isa chaiMbara meM kAma kara rahe haiM, taba taka maiM itanI jaldI isa natIje para nahIM pahu.NchanA chAhU.NgA.
phira bhI saba kuCha pahale jaisA nahIM.
balki bahuta kuCha KarAba ho gayA hai.
piChale kuCha dinoM se, roza subaha, jaba maiM bistara se uThakara khi.DakI se bAhara nazara DAlatA hU.N, to dhuMdha meM lipaTI imArateM, gA.DiyAM, aura loga, mujhe nirAshA se bhara dete haiM.
AMkhoM meM bevajaha jalana rahatI hai.
kama se kama merI yAda meM, pahale kabhI aisA nahIM huA thA.
maiMne yahAM piChale solaha sAla meM, behada ghanA koharA to dekhA hai, lekina itanA ghanA dhuMdha nahIM.
mujhe Dara hai, ki merA asthamA, jo aba taka sirfa mausama badalane vAle para qahara DhAtA thA, aba achAnaka kisI roza mujhe aspatAla na pahu.NchA de.

maiM khule aura havAdAra ghara kA himAyatI hU.N, para agara dhuAM ghara meM ghusane ko betAba ho, to daravAze aura khi.DakiyAM baMda karanA hI, shAyada aqlamaMdI hai, aura aba maiMne ghara ke hara khi.DakI-daravAze ko, pUrI taraha sIla kara diyA hai.
magara ghara ko sIla karane se, samasyA to Katma nahIM hotI.
sAMsa lene ke lie havA to chAhie hI, aura lagatA hai, ki vaha aba dillI meM nahIM hai.
maiM eyara pyorIfAyara KarIdane ke bAre meM socha rahA hU.N.
hAlAMki vo sirfa eka ChoTe se dAyare meM hI havA ko sAfa rakha sakate haiM.
pUre ghara ke lie aise kaI eyara pyorIfAyara chAhie.
magara havA KarIdane kI quvvata, hara shaKsa meM nahIM hotI.
pyorIfAyara nahIM to kyA, mAska lagAkara, maiM apane taIM havA ChAna sakatA hU.N.
magara merA DaॉkTara isase ittifAka nahIM rakhatA.
unakA kahanA hai, ki mAska, sirfa AMshika taura para hI dhueM ko nAka meM ghusane se roka sakatA hai.
phira bhI maiMne ise eka TrAI dene kI ThAnI hai.
sau nahIM to pachAsa sATha fIsadI taka shAyada rAhata mila jAe.
mujhe Kuda se zyAdA chiMtA beTe kI hai, jisakA khAMsakara aura ChIMkakara burA hAla hai.
usake skUla ne ChuTTiyoM kA ailAna kara diyA hai, tAki use aura usa jaise bachchoM ko, ghara ke bAhara gaMdI havA meM sAMsa na lenI pa.De.
bachchoM ko ba.DoM se zyAdA tAzI havA chAhie, tAki unake phepha.De tAqatavara baneM.
magara dillI kI havA, unake phepha.DoM kI AzamAisha para utArU hai.
maiM aksara TraikiMga ke lie pahA.DoM para jAtA hU.N, magara vahAM merA dama nahIM phUlatA.
merA dama phUla rahA hai yahAM dillI kI sa.DakoM para.
sarakAreM logoM kI ukha.DatI sAMseM thAmane meM nAkAma dikha rahI haiM, aura aba, suprIma korTa ne taya kiyA hai, ki vaha, isa jana ApAtakAla meM kuCha karegA.

jaba taka suprIma korTa kuCha sochakara amala karane ko kahe, taba taka maiM socha rahA hU.N, ki apanA inhelara baiga meM hI rakhU.N, tAki agara kisI vaqta merI sAMseM ukha.Dane lageM, to maiM use istemAla kara sakU.N.
mujhe isa bAta kA afasosa hai, ki aba sirfa dIvAlI para, dillI Cho.Dane se kAma nahIM chalegA.
mahAtmA gAMdhI kI jitanI behatarIna tasvIreM Apane dekhI hoMgI, unake pIChe jo shaKsa the, vo aba isa duniyA meM nahIM rahe.
gAMdhI ke pautra, behatarIna foTogrAfara, aura nAsA ke pUrva vaij~nAnika, kanu rAmadAsa gAMdhI kA somavAra shAma nidhana ho gayA.
laMbe vaqta se bImAra chala rahe kanu, sattAsI barasa ke the.
kanu kA janma, sAla unnIsa sau satraha meM, mahAtmA gAMdhI ke bhatIje, nArAyaNa gAMdhI, aura jamunA gAMdhI ke yahAM huA thA.
kanu jaba ChoTe the to unakI vo tasvIra behada mashahUra huI, jisameM vo dAMDI mArcha ke daurAna, mahAtmA gAMdhI kI lAThI paka.De hue Age-Age chala rahe haiM.
akTUbara meM unheM dila kA daurA pa.DA, aura brena haimareja bhI huA, jisakI vajaha se, vo komA meM chale gae the.
mahAtmA gAMdhI ke sekreTarI ke taura para, kAfI sAla kAma karane vAle kanu ne, unakI do hazAra se zyAdA tasvIreM lI thIM.
hAlAMki, inameM se kaI tasvIreM, sAloM taka gumanAma rahIM.
kaI dashaka pahale, bhArata meM amarIkA ke tatkAlIna rAjadUta, jaॉna kenetha galabretha, kanu ko pa.DhAI ke lie amarIkA ke emaAITI le gae.
bAda meM unhoMne nAsA ke lie bhI kAma kiyA.
kanu gAMdhI ko, unake mAtA-pitA ne, bIsa sAla kI umra meM, gAMdhI kI madada karane ko sevAgrAma bheja diyA thA.
vo meDikala kI pa.DhAI karanA chAhate the, lekina phira unheM foTogrAfI meM dilachaspI paidA ho gaI.
kanu gAMdhI, Amataura para mahAtmA gAMdhI ke Asa pAsa hI rahate the.
aise meM kaI aise aMtaraMga aura ekAMta ke pala unake kaimare meM qaida ho gae.
uttara-pashchima sImA prAMta meM, eka bAra gAMdhI kI gA.DI, kuCha aise hI phaMsa gaI thI.
kanu gAMdhI ne, mahAtmA gAMdhI ke sAtha, desha-duniyA jagaha jagaha yAtrAeM kI.
gAMdhI ke jIvana ke aMtima dashaka meM kaI ahama ghaTanAeM aura kShaNa guzare.
kanu kI tasvIroM meM, una sabakI kahAnI qaida hai.
mahAtmA gAMdhI, bhArata meM dalitoM kI maujUdA dashA ke prati KAse chiMtita rahA karate the.
unhoMne unnIsa sau paiMtAlIsa ChiyAlIsa ke daurAna, tIna mahIne laMbI rela yAtrA kI, aura jagaha-jagaha jAkara dhana juTAyA thA.
isI saMdarbha meM, unhoMne eka bAra kahA thA, maiM baniyA hUM, mere lobha kA koI aMta nahIM hai.

ChattIsaga.Dha ke bastara meM, pulisa ne dillI vishvavidyAlaya kI profesara, naMdinI suMdara, aura jeenayU kI profesara, archanA prasAda sameta, Chaha logoM ke KilAfa, eka grAmINa kI hatyA kA mAmalA darja kiyA hai.
pulisa ke anusAra, darabhA kShetra ke grAma nAmA meM, shukravAra kI rAta saMdigdha mAovAdiyoM ne, sAmanAtha baghela kI hatyA kara dI thI.
sAmanAtha baghela ne, apane gAMva ke logoM ke sAtha milakara, mAovAdiyoM ke KilAfa TaMgiyA grupa banAyA thA.

pulisa ke eka adhikArI ne batAyA, sAmanAtha baghela kI patnI kI shikAyata para, toMgapAla thAne meM, profesara naMdinI sundara, profesara archanA prasAda, sIpIema netA saMjaya parAte, vinIta tivArI, maMjU kavAsI, aura maMgala rAma karmA ke KilAfa, aparAdha darja kiyA gayA hai.
mArksavAdI kamyunisTa pArTI ke netA saMjaya parAte ne, ina AropoM kA khaMDana kiyA hai.
saMjaya parAte ne kahA, bastara kI pulisa, janavAdI tAqatoM aura bastara meM shoShaNa ke KilAfa AvAza uThAne vAloM ko, isa taraha ke jhUThe mAmale meM, phaMsAne kA ShaDayaMtra racha rahI hai.
lekina hama aisI koshishoM se Darane vAle nahIM haiM.
isa sAla maI meM naMdinI suMdara sameta, dUsare logoM ne, sautanAra, nAmA, aura kumAkoleMga kA daurA kiyA thA.

sAmanAtha sameta dUsare grAmINoM ne, kathita rUpa se pulisa meM shikAyata darja karAI thI, ki naMdinI suMdara, aura dUsare logoM ne, grAmINoM ko pulisa ke KilAfa bha.DakAyA, aura mAovAdiyoM kA sAtha dene ke lie, grAmINoM ko ukasAyA.
hAlAMki naMdinI suMdara, aura dUsare logoM ne ina AropoM ko jhUThA batAyA thA.
piChale do dashaka se, bastara meM, akAdamika shodha karane vAlI naMdinI suMdara ne, bastara ke, nRRivij~nAna, itihAsa, saMskRRiti, aura sAmAjika-rAjanItika muddoM ko lekara, kaI kitAbeM likhIM haiM.
isake alAvA, unhoMne bastara ke AdivAsiyoM se ju.De kaI muddoM para, suprIma korTa meM yAchikAeM bhI dAyara kI haiM.

naMdinI suMdara kI yAchikA para hI, kathita rUpa se mAovAdiyoM ke KilAfa sarakAra ke saMrakShaNa meM chalane vAle, hathiyArabaMda AMdolana, salavA ju.DUma ko suprIma korTa ne baMda karane kA nirdesha diyA thA.

suprIma korTa ne sarakAra kI ka.DI AlochanA kI thI, ki usane AdivAsiyoM ko nijI senA kI taraha hathiyAra thamA die the, aura unheM, GairaqAnUnI tarIqe se kathita rUpa se mAovAdiyoM ke KilAfa yuddha ke maidAna meM dhakela diyA thA.

isake alAvA, piChale mahIne hI sIbIAI ne, naMdinI suMdara kI yAchikA para suprIma korTa meM, apanI eka riporTa pesha kI thI, jisase mutAbika, sAla do hazAra gyAraha meM, tA.DameTalA gAMva meM, visheSha pulisa adhikAriyoM ne, do sau bAvana AdivAsiyoM ke ghara jalA die the.
isake alAvA, ina gAMvoM meM, kuCha logoM kI hatyA aura balAtkAra kI ghaTanAeM sAmane AI thIM.
isake bAda pulisa mahAnideshaka ne doShI visheSha pulisa adhikAriyoM ko, lAina aTaicha karane, aura unakI barkhAstagI ke Adesha die the.
isake khilAfa, vardIdhArI pulisa javAnoM ne, naMdinI suMdara aura dUsare sAmAjika aura rAjanItika logoM ke putale jalAe the.
bhArata prashAsita kashmIra meM chala rahe virodha pradarshanoM ke bIcha, ye eka anokhI bAta hai.

aKabAra ke mutAbiqa, julAI meM hizbula mujAhiddIna kamAMDara burahAna vAnI kI mauta ke bAda hue bhArata prashAsita kashmIra meM, virodha pradarshanoM ke bIcha, kama se kama untIsa skUloM ko, saMdigdha taura para Aga lagA diyA gayA hai.
aba kashmIra ghATI meM, shikShakoM se skUloM kI chaukIdArI karane ko kahA gayA hai.
ina shikShakoM se, AgazanI se, skUloM ko bachAne ke lie rAta meM bhI chaukIdArI karane ko kahA gayA hai.
shikShakoM ke mutAbiqa, pUrI ghATI ke skUloM meM ye nirdesha die gae haiM, ki surakShA kA zimmA, shikShakoM kA hogA.
ye nirdesha, shrInagara ke mukhya shikShA adhikArI, Arifa iqabAla malika kI tarafa se jArI kie gae haiM.
dakShiNa koriyA meM diggaja ilekTraॉnika kaMpanI saimasaMga ke daftaroM para ChApe mAre gae haiM.
ye rAShTrapati pArka guena-hAe se saMbaMdhita eka siyAsI skaiMDala meM ho rahI jAMcha kA hissA haiM.
abhiyojana una AropoM kI jAMcha kara rahe haiM, jinake mutAbiqa, saimasaMga ne rAShTrapati pArka kI qarIbI dosta aura sahAyaka, choI sUna-sila kI beTI ko, nAjAyaza tarIqe se vittIya madada dI.
choI, isa pUre siyAsI bavAla ke keMdra meM haiM.
una para ilzAma hai, ki unhoMne siyAsata meM daKala dene, aura bizanesa Doneshana hAsila karane ke lie, rAShTrapati se apanI dostI kA istemAla kiyA.
udhara saimasaMga kA kahanA hai, ki vo jAMcha meM pUrA sahayoga degI.
praॉsikyUTara ऑfisa ke pravaktA ne, samAchAra ejeMsI eefapI ko batAyA, hama saimasaMga ilekTraॉniksa ke daftaroM kI talAshI le rahe haiM.
hAlAMki unhoMne isakA byorA dene se inakAra kara diyA.
mIDiyA riporToM ke mutAbiqa, saimasaMga ne saMbhavataH pArka kI qarIbI choI ke lie, aTThAisa lAkha yUro kA iMtazAma kiyA, tAki unakI beTI, jarmanI meM ikyesTriyana TreniMga le sakeM.
choI farzI mAmale aura tAqata kA durupayoga karane ke Aropa meM, filahAla hirAsata meM haiM.
isa siyAsI tUfAna ne pArka ke lie hAlAta kAfI KarAba banA die haiM, aura unase istIfA dene kI mAMga kI jA rahI hai.

amarIkA meM ATha navaMbara ko hone vAle rAShTrapati chunAva ke lie, prachAra abhiyAna ke AKirI dina, ripablikana pArTI ummIdavAra, DonalDa TraMpa aura DemokreTika pArTI kI pratyAshI, hilerI kliMTana, apane-apane samarthakoM ke sAtha railiyAM kara rahe haiM.

navInatama sarvekShaNoM se saMketa milatA hai, ki hilerI kliMTana ne, apane pratidvaMdvI, DonalDa TraMpa para, chAra aMkoM kI ba.Dhata banA lI hai, lekina bIbIsI saMvAdadAtAoM kA kahanA hai, ki hilerI kI sabase ba.DI tAkata, una logoM ko matadAna keMdroM taka lAnA hai, jo voTa DAlane ke ichChuka hI nahIM haiM.

floriDA meM eka chunAvI railI ko saMbodhita karate hue TraMpa ne kahA hai, ki amarIkI logoM ko tAka para rakhakara, viphala rAjanItika taMtra phalatA-phUlatA gayA, aura aba ye samaya, la.Dakara use harAne kA hai.

vahIM hilerI kliMTana ne, penasilveniyA meM, apane samarthakoM ko saMbodhita karate hue kahA hai, ki logoM ko apane, aura apane parivAra ke bhaviShya ko dhyAna meM rakhate hue voTa denA chAhie, kyoMki jaba ve voTa DAleMge, to vo voTa kisI vyakti nahIM, balki muddoM ke samarthana meM hogA.

paMjAba meM dasa navaMbara ko, sikha samudAya ke dhArmika Ayojana, sarabata khAlasA bulAne kA ailAna kiyA gayA hai, lekina isase pahale, pulisa ne Ayojana se ju.De, do sau se zyAdA kAryakartAoM ko giraftAra kiyA hai.

paMjAba meM eDIjIpI haradIpa siMha DhilloM ne kahA, ki priveMshana ekTa ke tahata, eka sau sattara logoM ko giraph़tAra kiyA gayA hai, jinameM sarabata khAlasA ke AyojakoM meM se, eka dhyAna siMha maMDa bhI haiM.
vahIM paMjAba sarakAra ne sarabata khAlasA ke Ayojana ke lie, paMjAba ke bhaThiMDA zile meM, talavaMDI sAbo meM, jagaha dene se manA kara diyA hai.
paMjAba sarakAra ke isa faisale ke KilAfa, sarabata khAlasA bulAne vAle, shiromaNi akAlI dala ke pradhAna, simaranajIta siMha mAna ne, paMjAba hariyANA hAIkorTa kA daravAzA khaTakhaTAyA hai.
hAIkorTa ne isa mAmale meM faisalA maMgalavAra taka sthagita kara diyA hai.
mAnA jA rahA hai, ki sarabata khAlasA bulAne vAle netA, jagaha na milane kI sUrata meM isakA Ayojana, kisI aura rAjya, jaise ki hariyANA meM bhI kara sakate haiM.

sarabata khAlasA bulAne vAle netAoM meM, simaranajIta siMha mAna ke alAvA, paMthika sevA lahara ke adhyakSha, balajIta siMha dAduvAla, yUnAiTeDa akAlI dala ke adhyakSha, bhAI mohakama siMha, aura dhyAna siMha maMDa haiM.
ina netAoM ne paMjAba sarakAra kI kathita nAkAmiyoM, aura akAla takhta ke jatthedAroM ke khilAfa, sarabata khAlasA bulAyA hai.
unakA Aropa hai, ki jatthedAra nAkAma haiM, aura sikha gurudvArA prabaMdhaka kameTI, sikhoM ke muddoM para kAma karane meM viphala rahI hai.
sarabata khAlasA ko lekara vivAda hotA rahA hai, ki kauna isakA Ayojana kara sakatA hai.
jAnakAra kahate haiM, ki sirfa akAla takhta ko hI sarabata khAlasA bulAne kA adhikAra hai, kyoMki akAla takhta, sikhoM kI sarvochcha dhArmika saMsthA hai.
isake mukhiyA ko jatthedAra kahate haiM.
vo anya pramukha sikha pratinidhiyoM ke sAtha, dharma aura maryAdA se ju.De faisale lete haiM, jo sabhI sikhoM para bAdhya hote haiM.
sarabata khAlasA meM, duniyAbhara se sikha samudAya ke saMgaThanoM ke pratinidhiyoM ko bulAyA jAtA hai.

piChale sAla navaMbara meM, taranatArana meM, sarabata khAlasA bulAyA gayA thA, jisameM akAla takhta ne, sirasA DerA sachchA saudA ke pramukha, guramIta rAma rahIma kI, eka Apattijanaka tasvIra, aura guru graMtha sAhiba kI beadabI ke mAmaloM ko uThAyA thA.
isameM maMcha, garamakhyAlI logoM ke hAthoM chalA gayA thA, jisake bAda haMgAmA huA thA.
aba paMjAba sarakAra kisI bhI taraha ke haMgAme se bachane ke lie isa taraha ke kAryakrama ko rukavAnA chAhatI hai.
keMdra sarakAra ne faisalA kiyA hai, ki shukravAra se, sirfa do hazAra rUpae hI badale jA sakeMge.
isa samaya, eka dina meM loga, sA.Dhe chAra hazAra rUpae badala sakate haiM, lekina shukravAra se, yaha sImA kama kara ke, do hazAra rUpae kara dI gaI hai.
sarakAra kA kahanA hai, ki kaI loga bAra bAra paise badala rahe haiM, jise rokane ke lie, ye kadama uThAyA gayA hai.
ye pUChe jAne para, ki kyA sarakAra ke pAsa kaisha kI kamI hai, to presa vArtA kara rahe shashikAMta dAsa ne kahA, ki aisA bilkula nahIM hai, aura sarakAra ke pAsa paryApta kaisha upalabdha hai.
Arthika mAmaloM ke maMtrAlaya meM, sachiva shaktikAMta dAsa ne, sarakAra ke aura kadamoM kI jAnakArI dete hue batAyA, ki shAdiyoM ke lie, DhAI lAkha rUpae nikAle jA sakate haiM.
unhoMne ye bhI batAyA, ki jo vyApArI rejisTarDa haiM, vo eka bAra meM pachAsa hazAra rUpae nikAla sakeMge.
pAkistAnI mIDiyA ne, bhArata prashAsita kashmIra meM, logoM para ho rahe kathita atyAchAra ko lekara jArI kie gae eka gIta para Kabara kI hai.

isa gIta ko kashmIra eMthama saॉnga batAyA jA rahA hai, jise pAkistAna prashAsita kashmIra kI rAjadhAnI, muzaffarAbAda meM, rAShTrapati saradAra masUda KAna kI maujUdagI meM, chaudaha navaMbara ko rilIza kiyA gayA thA.
mIDiyA riporTsa ke mutAbiqa, isa gAne ko kathita taura para, kashmIrI logoM para bhArata sarakAra dvArA kie jA rahe zulma ke KilAfa, eka AvAza dene ke lie banAyA gayA hai.
gAne ke nirmAtA, nAmI kalAkAra, umara ehasAna haiM.
umara ne apanI fesabuka vaॉla para, isa gAne ko kashmIra ke charamapaMthI netA, burahAna vAnI ko samarpita kiyA thA.
burahAna ko bhAratIya fauja ne, ATha julAI ko kathita enakAuMTara meM mAra girAyA thA, jisake bAda, bhArata prashAsita kashmIra meM, karIba chAra mahIne taka ashAMti rahI.
bIbIsI se bAta karate hue umara ehasAna ne kahA, hameM ummIda thI, ki ziMdagI ko tarase kashmIrI logoM kI AvAza bulaMda karane ke lie, bhAratIya kalAkAra sAmane AeMge.
lekina kuCha logoM ne aisI koshisha kI, to bhAratIya janatA nArAza ho gaI.
hamane kashmIriyoM para gAnA banAne kA pahalA haqa bhArata ko hI diyA thA.
tAki hukUmateM, ye nahIM samajheM, ki zulma karane se nasleM miTAI jA sakatI haiM.
umara, pAkistAna prashAsita kashmIra meM, bataura samAjasevI kAma karate rahe haiM.
unakA kahanA hai, ki pAkistAna ke besTa saMgItakAroM ne milakara, isa gIta ko taiyAra kiyA hai.
ye mazahaba kA gIta nahIM hai, balki iMsAnoM kA gIta hai.

pAkistAnI aKabAra Daॉna meM, paMdraha navaMbara ko ChapI Kabara ke mutAbiqa, chUMki bahuta se pAkistAnI kalAkAra bhArata ke lie bhI kAma karate haiM, aise meM zyAdAtara kalAkAra, shurUAta meM isa gAne ke lie taiyAra nahIM hue.
bAda meM isa gAne ko, nAmI saMgItakAra, alI azamata, umara jasavAla, aura elisiyA DAyasa kI AvAza meM rikaॉrDa kiyA gayA.
kaI riporTsa meM likhA gayA hai, ki isa gAne ke bAda, saMgItakAra jasavAla ke fesabuka peja se, hazAroM bhAratIya kadradAnoM ne, Kuda ko alaga kara liyA hai.
kaI pAkistAnI chainaloM para dikhAyA gayA, ki rAShTrapati saradAra masUda KAna ne isa gAne kI tArIfa kI hai.
sAtha hI pAkistAna ke logoM se, kashmIra ke saMgharSha meM unakA sAtha dene kI apIla kI hai.
isa bIcha soshala mIDiyA para, kashmIra samarthaka, isa gIta ko jamakara sheyara kara rahe haiM.
GarIba sAfa amIra ke lona mAfa, TviTara para ye haishaTaiga, KAsA TreMDa kara rahA hai.
mIDiyA meM A rahI kaI riporToM ke mutAbiqa, udyogapati vijaya mAlyA kA, sAta hazAra karo.Da rupae kA baiMka lona mAfa kara diyA gayA hai.
isa para vitta maMtrI aruNa jeTalI ne, budhavAra ko saMsada meM safAI dete hue kahA thA, lona mAfa nahIM kiyA gayA hai.
hama aba bhI rikavarI ke prayAsa kara rahe haiM.
basa farka ye hai, ki AdhikArika praviShTi meM, ise parafArmiMga aseTa se, naॉna paraphaॉrmiMga aseTa meM badala diyA gayA hai.
lekina lagatA hai, soshala mIDiyA para loga, aruNa jeTalI ke isa tarka se sahamata nahIM hue.
raviMdara nAma ke TviTara yUzara likhate haiM, pyAre sTeTa baiMka ऑfa iMDiyA, lAina meM laga kara, vijaya mAlyA kA lona chukatA karane ke lie dhanyavAda.
abhaya tomara likhate haiM, apane garIba mitroM aMbAnI, aDAnI, mAlyA kA kara mAfa karane vAloM, hamAre amIra mitra kisAna kA bhI karza mAfa karo.
ApakA raUfa nAma ke TviTara haiMDala kA TvITa, kuCha yUM rahA, lona ke paisoM kA janatA kare bhugatAna, udyogapatiyoM ke paise sarakAra kare mA.
paraveza KAna faramAte haiM, Ama janatA ko lAina meM lagA kara, vijaya mAlyA jaise ba.De karzadAroM kA lona mAfa karake, sTeTa baiMka ऑfa iMDiyA ne jo dariyAdilI kA sabUta diyA hai, usako salAma.
pAkistAna ke pradhAnamaMtrI navAza sharIfa ke videsha mAmaloM ke salAhakAra, saratAja azIza, amRRitasara meM tIna aura chAra disaMbara ko hone vAlI, hArTa ऑfa eshiyA kaॉnfreMsa meM hissA leMge.
da iMDiyana eksapresa ne, isa Kabara ko pahale panne para jagaha dI hai.
aKabAra ke mutAbika, janavarI meM paThAnakoTa meM hue hamale ke bAda se, pAkistAna kI ora se, ye pahalA maMtristIya daurA hogA.
paThAnakoTa meM hue hamale ke bAda se hI, bhArata aura pAkistAna ke bIcha prastAvita dvipakShIya bAtachIta kI prakriyA, paTarI se utara gaI thI.
isa Kabara ke hI sAtha, da iMDiyana eksapresa ne, eka baॉksa Kabara lagAI hai, jisakI surkhI hai, bhAratIya sImA ke pAsa, pAka senA kA abhyAsa.

aKabAra ke mutAbika, bhAratIya sImA ke qarIba, bahAvalapura meM, pAkistAnI senA pramukha, rAhila sharIfa ke sAtha, senA ke abhyAsa meM sharIka hue pAkistAna ke pradhAnamaMtrI, navAza sharIpha ne kahA, ki dushmana ke kisI bhI dussAhasI kadama kA mAkUla javAba diyA jAegA.
da sTeTsamaina ne jAnakArI dI hai, ki bhAratIya videsha maMtrI, suShamA svarAja, gurdoM ke pratyAropaNa ke lie, emsa meM TesTa hue haiM.
aKabAra ne emsa kI ora se jArI bayAna ke havAle se batAyA hai, ki abhI isa prakriyA meM, kuCha vakta laga sakatA hai, kyoMki gurdA dene vAle kI talAsha ho rahI hai.
hiMdustAna TAimsa ne, saMsada ke shItakAlIna satra ke pahale dina se ju.DI Kabara ko, pahalI Kabara banAyA hai.
Kabara kI surkhI kahatI hai, vipakSha ne kahA, desha Arthika arAjakatA kI chapeTa meM.
aKabAra ke mutAbika, budhavAra ko vipakShI daloM ne, noTabaMdI ko lekara, pradhAnamaMtrI nareMdra modI ko nishAne para liyA.

hiMdustAna TAimsa ke mutAbika, vipakShI daloM ne sarakAra para Aropa lagAyA, ki sarakAra ne isa kadama kI jAnakArI, bIjepI ke dostoM ko pahale hI de dI thI, aura isa faisale kI jAMcha karAne kI mAMga kI.
hiMdustAna TAimsa ne, isase ju.DI eka aura Kabara meM batAyA hai, ki dillI meM noTabaMdI ke bAda se, aparAdhoM meM kamI AI hai.
TAimsa ऑfa iMDiyA kI Kabara ke mutAbika, noTabaMdI se ju.DI ghaTanAoM meM, bIte chaubIsa ghaMTe ke daurAna, sAta anya logoM kI mauta ho gaI.
aKabAra ke mutAbika, maMgalavAra ko uttara pashchima dillI meM, apane do bachchoM kI kathita taura para sote vakta jAna le lI.
pulisa ke mutAbika, mukesha siMha nAma kA ye vyakti, do dina eTIema se paise nikAlane meM nAkAma rahA, aura ise lekara pareshAna thA.
da hiMdU ke mutAbika, vitta maMtrI aruNa jeTalI ne kahA hai, ki sarakAra ne udyogapati vijaya mAlyA kI kiMgafishara eyaralAinsa ko diyA gayA RRiNa, mAfa nahIM kiyA hai.
eyaralAinsa para baiMkoM kA kaI karo.Da rupaye bakAyA hai.
TAimsa ऑfa iMDiyA ke mutAbika, chIna ne chAinA opana chaiMpiyanashipa meM hissA lene vAlI, bhAratIya baiDamiMTana TIma ke mainejara chune gae, bAmAMga tAgo ko vIzA dene se manA kara diyA hai.
vo aruNAchala pradesha rAjya baiDamiMTana esosieshana ke sachiva bhI haiM.
dillI sthita chInI dUtAvAsa ne batAyA hai, ki aruNAchala ke DomisAila kI vajaha se, unheM vIzA nahIM diyA gayA hai.
hiMdustAna TAimsa kI Kabara ke mutAbika, eka mahilA chAlaka ne, kathita taura para nashe kI hAlata meM pAMcha logoM para gA.DI cha.DhA dI.
inameM se do logoM kI mauke para mauta ho gaI.
ye loga, eka flAIovara para kAma kara rahe the.
hAdasA, rAShTrIya rAjamArga saMkhyA eka para, karanAla ke karIba huA.
sIriyA meM sarakAra vidrohiyoM ke adhikAra vAle pUrvI eleppo meM, sarakArI vimAnoM se hue hamale meM, eka aspatAla, blaDa baiMka, aura eMbuleMsa ko nishAnA banAe jAne kI Kabara hai.
ina hamaloM meM, pAMcha bachchoM sameta, kama se kama ikkIsa logoM kI mauta kI Kabara hai.
jabaki piChale do dino meM, battIsa loga mAre jA chuke haiM.
bAyAna chilDransa haॉspiTala ke nideshaka kA kahanA hai, ki vo bAhara nahIM nikala pA rahe haiM, aura bachane ke lie, tahaKAne meM Chipe haiM.
briTena sthita sIriyana ऑbzaraveTrI faॉra hyUmana rAiTsa kA kahanA hai, ki kama se kama ikkIsa logoM kI mauta ho chukI hai.
sIriyA meM kaI saMsthAnoM kI madada karane vAlI, da iMDipeMDeMTa DaॉkTarsa esosieshana ke mutAbiqa, bAyAna chilDransa haॉspiTala, burI taraha kShatigrasta huA hai.
isane aspatAla ke nideshaka, DaॉkTara hAtima ke havAle se batAyA hai, ki vo tahaKAne meM phaMse hue haiM.
unhoMne kahA, hamAre Upara vimAna haiM.
hama bAhara nahIM jA sakate haiM.
shAyada hama Kuda ko, isa kamare meM bhI surakShita nahIM rakha sakate haiM.
sIriyA sivila DifeMsa ke bachAvakarmiyoM kA kahanA hai, ki karama ala-bIka meM eka chikitsAkarmI kI mauta ho gaI.
sIriyA kI sarakAra ke sahayogI desha rUsa ke elAna ke bAda, tIna hafte taka chale saMgharSha virAma ke bAda, maMgalavAra se yahAM havAI hamale dobArA shurU hue haiM.
rUsa ne pashchimI sIriyA meM jihAdI charamapaMthiyoM ke KilAfa, ba.DA abhiyAna shurU karane kA bhI elAna kiyA.
isameM eyarakraॉfTa kariyara ko bhI pahalI bAra istemAla kiyA gayA.
kisI vaqta eleppo sIriyA kA vANijyika aura audyogika keMdra thA.
sAla do hazAra bAraha meM, eleppo moTe taura para do hissoM meM baMTa gayA.
inameM se pashchimI hisse meM, sIriyA kI sarakAra kA adhikAra hai, jabaki pUrvI hisse para vidrohiyoM kA niyaMtraNa hai.
bIte sAla, sIriyA kI senA ne IrAna ke samarthana vAle la.DAkoM, aura rUsa ke havAI hamaloM kI madada se avarodha kI sthiti ko Katma kiyA.
bItI bAIsa sitaMbara ko, sarakArI senA ne shahara ko pUrI taraha se niyaMtraNa meM lene ke lie, AkrAmaka abhiyAna kI shuruAta kI.
isake pahale do haph़toM taka, sarakArI senA ne, pUrvI eleppo kI gherebaMdI kI, jisameM yahAM rahane vAle qarIba do lAkha pachahattara hazAra loga phaMsa gae.
sIriyA kI sarakArI senA aura rUsa ne, aThAraha aktUbara ko havAI hamale baMda kara die, jisase Ama loga aura vidrohI, shahara se bAhara jA sakeM, lekina isa daurAna, bahuta hI kama loga bAhara Ae.

saMyukta rAShTra ke mutAbiqa, mahIne ke AKira taka, pUrvI eleppo meM hue havAI hamaloM aura bamabArI meM, sAta sau se j़yAdA logoM kI mauta huI, jabaki pashchimI eleppo para hue raॉkeTa hamale meM bhI, kaI logoM kI jAna gaI.
mAnavAdhikAra kAryakartAoM kA kahanA hai, ki maMgalavAra se, sarakArI senA ne dobArA havAI hamale shurU kie, jinameM kama se kama, gyAraha logoM kI mauta ho gaI.
isabIcha sarakArI mIDiyA ne Kabara dI, ki zamInI kArravAI ke lie, kaI morchoM para ba.DI saMkhyA meM, sainikoM ko tainAta kiyA gayA.
nigarAnI samUha, sIriyana ऑbjaraveTrI kA kahanA hai, ki budhavAra ko kaI ilAqoM meM, vimAnoM se misAileM dAGI gaIM, aura helikaॉpTara se bama girAe gae.
da sIriyana ऑbjaraveTrI kA kahanA hai, ki bATabo gAMva meM, kama se kama unnIsa logoM kI mauta huI hai.
keMdra sarakAra kI ora se, pAMcha sau aura hazAra ke purAne noToM para lagAI gaI pAbaMdI para, saMsada ke bAhara hI nahIM, aMdara bhI charchA garma rahI.
saMsada ke shItakAlIna satra ke pahale dina, budhavAra ko vibhinna rAjanItika daloM ne, sarakAra ke isa faisale kI niMdA kI.
vipakSha ne ise Arthika ApAtakAla batAte hue, sarakAra para Aropa lagAyA, ki purAne noToM para pAbaMdI lagAne se pahale, chune hue logoM ko pahale se jAnakArI dI gaI hai.
charchA ke daurAna mAMga kI gaI, ki noTa para pAbaMdI kI jAMcha, saMyukta saMsadIya samiti, yAnI jepIsI se honI chAhie.

nyUyaॉrka ke meyara, bila De blAsiyo ne, amarIkA ke nava-nirvAchita rAShTrapati, DonalDa TraMpa se mulAkAta kara kahA hai, ki loga nyUyaॉrka ke loga, isa bAta se Dare hue haiM, ki nayA prashAsana kaise kAma karegA.

De blAsiyo ne batAyA, ki baiThaka ke daurAna, unhoMne TraMpa se spaShTa kahA hai, ki vo aise pravAsI logoM ko unake deshoM meM vApasa bheje jAne kA virodha kareMge, jinake pAsa paryApta dastAveza nahIM haiM.
blAsiyo kA kahanA thA, ki pravAsiyoM ke lie TraMpa kI yojanAeM, nyUyaॉrka jaise shahara meM kAma nahIM kareMgI, jo pravAsiyoM ke lie sabase achChI jagaha hai.

TraMpa ne rAShTrapati pada kA chunAva jItane ke bAda kahA thA, ki vo una sabhI pravAsiyoM ko jela meM DAla deMge, yA unake desha vApasa bheja deMge, jinakA AparAdhika rikArDa hai, aura aise logoM kI saMkhyA, tIsa lAkha taka hai.
hAlAMki ye AMka.DA, kAfI vivAdAspada hai.
mAigreshana paॉlisI iMsTiTyUTa kA kahanA hai, ki binA dastAveza vAle pravAsI, jo AparAdhika rikaॉrDa ke sAtha haiM, unakI vAstavika saMkhyA, ATha lAkha bIsa hazAra hai.
inameM se ve loga bhI shAmila haiM, jo avaidha rUpa se sarahada pAra hue haiM.
isa mAmale meM kevala bila De blAsiyo hI nahIM haiM, jo TraMpa kI pravAsI nIti kA virodha kara rahe haiM.
laॉsa eMjalsa, saina frAMsisko, shikAgo, bosTana, filaDelfiyA, aura vaॉshiMgaTana DIsI ke meyaroM ne bhI vAdA kiyA hai, ki ve apane shahara ke logoM kI hara hAla meM surakShA kareMge.
blAsiyo TraMpa kI jIta ke bAda, nyU yaॉrka meM pravAsiyoM ke pakSha meM khulakara A gae haiM.
TraMpa kI jIta ke bAda, unhoMne shahara se DeTAbesa se binA dastAvezoM vAle pravAsiyoM kA nAma haTA diyA thA, tAki unheM kisI bhI taraha kI dikqata kA sAmanA nahIM karanA pa.De.
nyUyaॉrka ke udAra DemokreTa bila De blAsiyo ne, TraMpa ke sAtha, eka ghaMTe kI laMbI mITiMga ke bAda, patrakAroM se bAta kI.
unhoMne kahA, maiMne unase doharAyA, ki nyUyaॉrka sameta amarIkA ke anya shaharoM ke nivAsiyoM kI surakShA honI chAhie, aura unheM bedakhala nahIM kiyA jAnA chAhie.
nyUyaॉrka meM rAShTrIya ausata ke muqAbale tIna gunA j़yAdA videshI mUla ke loga haiM.
aisA isalie huA, ki ye sabhI ke lie khulA thA.
isa shahara ko banAne meM pravAsiyoM kI pI.DhiyA dara pIDhiyAM shAmila rahI haiM.
unhoMne kahA, ki TraMpa apane gRRiha nagara nyUyaॉrka se pyAra karate haiM.
hAlAMki nyUyaॉrka ke logoM ne, hilarI kliMTana ko voTa kiyA thA.
sIriyA meM jArI saMgharSha ke bIcha, bachapana kho sA gayA hai.
amarIkI rAjya kailiforniyA aura erizonA ke kuCha hissoM meM, pahale se hI eka dIvAra maujUda hai.
amarIkI rAShTrapati ke chunAva meM, meksiko sImA para dIvAra banAne kA vivAdAspada muddA, ripablikana ummIdavAra, DonalDa TraMpa ne zorashora se uThAyA.
kailiforniyA aura erizonA sUbe ke kuCha hissoM meM, dIvAra pahale se maujUda hai.
ye patharIle registAna, reta ke TIloM, mIloM taka phaile khetoM se hokara guzaratI hai.
usa pAra se, isa pAra dAKila hone ke rAstoM para, spainisha aura aMgrezI meM likhe sAina borDa dikha jAte haiM.
mAlamU pa.Da jAtA hai, bhale hI shahara do Tuka.DoM meM baMTa gayA ho, lekina vo abhI bhI, kahIM eka dUsare se ju.DA huA hai.
meksiko aura amarIkA kI do hazAra mIla laMbI sarahada, saina DiyAgo, kailiforniyA, brAuMsavile, aura TeksAsa se hokara guzaratI hai.
isa sImA kI nigarAnI ke lie, chaubIsa ghaMTe seMsara kAma karate haiM, kaimare nazara rakhate haiM, aura saiMka.DoM kasTama aura sImA surakShA adhikArI mustaida rahate haiM.
kailiforniyA aura erizonA ke TraMpa samarthaka, isa bAta se sahamata haiM, ki dIvAra banAne kA kharcha, meksiko uThAe.
lekina kaI loga isase pareshAna bhI haiM, jinameM meksiko kI sarakAra bhI eka hai.
eka DemokreTa samarthaka ne kahA, ki sImA para chaukasI kI bahuta zyAdA bAta kie jAne se, shikShA aura svAsthya jaise muddoM se, logoM kA dhyAna haTane kI AshaMkA hai.
khAnA eka buniyAdI zarUrata hai.
isake lie iMsAna ne kyA-kyA nahIM kiyA.
eka zamAnA thA, jaba iMsAna ke pAsa khAne ke lie chuniMdA chIzeM huA karatI thIM.
lekina Aja duniyA bhara meM, itanI taraha ke khAne haiM, ki aMdAzA taka lagAnA mushki़la hai.
iMsAna vajUda meM AyA, to kaMda-mUla khAkara guzArA karatA thA.
phira vo shikAra karane lagA.
lekina, jaise-jaise samajha ba.DhI, usakA khAne kA aMdAza bhI badalA.
aura isake sAtha hI, pUrI mAnava jAti, hameshA ke lie badala gaI.
Aga kI khoja ne isa dishA meM aura ahama rola nibhAyA.
iMsAna ne khAnA bhUna kara khAnA shurU kiyA.
iMsAna ke itihAsa meM, Aga ke bAda dUsarA ahama qadama thA, khetI.
pakA huA khAnA pachAnA AsAna hotA thA.
lihAzA iMsAna ne shAkAhArI khAnA bhI pakAkara khAnA shurU kara diyA.
khAne ke badalate mizAja ne, iMsAna ko khetI-bA.DI karanA sikhA diyA.
kAshtakArI ke sAtha hI, iMsAna ne, AsAna khetI ke lie bahuta se auzAra bhI banAe.
hala se khetI karanA aura AsAna ho gayA.
khetI ke sAtha hI, ChoTe-ChoTe gAMva basane shurU hue.
dhIre-dhIre ye gAMva, qasboM meM, aura qasbe, shaharoM meM badala gae.
dekhate hI dekhate, sabhyatAoM kA udaya huA.
AbAdI tezI se ba.Dhane lagI.
ba.DhatI AbAdI ke lie ba.DI mAtrA meM khAne kI zarUrata thI.
isake lie khAne kA vyApAra shurU huA.
pakA huA khAnA, jaba eka jagaha se dUsarI jagaha jAtA thA, to usake KarAba hone kA Dara rahatA thA.
isa mushkila se pAra pAne ke lie, aise bartana banAe gae, jinameM khAnA laMbe samaya taka ThIka rahatA thA.
sAtha hI gharoM meM istemAla hone vAle refrijareTara bhI banane lage.
eka samaya thA, jaba khAnA pakAne yA garma karane ke lie ghaMToM lagate the.
lekina Aja, mAikroveva, chaMda minaTa lagAtA hai.
khAnA khAne kI Adata badalane ke sAtha hI, khAnA banAne, aura use rakhane ke tarIqe bhI badalane lage.
hareka fasala bAraha mahIne kI nahIM hotI.
lihAzA, jo phala-sabzI eka mausama meM Katma ho jAte the, aba unake lie, dUsarI fasala pakane kA iMtazAra nahIM karanA pa.DatA.
kyoMki bahuta se tarIqe apanA kara, khAne-pIne kI chIzoM ko saMrakShita kara liyA jAtA hai.
jaise unnIsa sau chaurAnave meM, TamATara ko saMrakShita karane ke lie, bahuta se tarIqe istemAla hue.
iMsAna kI khAnA khAne kI Adata ne, iMsAniyata ko pUrI taraha se badala DAlA hai.
khAne-pIne kI upalabdhatA kI vajaha se, Aja iMsAna, duniyA ke kone-kone meM base haiM.
AbAdI ba.Dha gaI hai.
iMsAna bAqI qudarata para rAja kara rahe haiM.
lekina isakA bhArI nuqasAna bhI huA hai.
dharatI ke mAhaula para bhI isakA asara pa.DA hai.
Aja ba.De paimAne para khAnA banAne ke lie bahuta taraha kI mashInoM kA istemAla kiyA jA rahA hai.
inake istemAla se aisI gaiseM nikalatI haiM, jo dharatI ko nuqasAna pahuMchAtI haiM.
ba.DhatI AbAdI kI KurAqa pUrI karane ke lie paidAvAra ba.DhAI jA rahI hai.
taraha-taraha ke kemikala kA istemAla kiyA jA rahA hai, tAki fasala KarAba nA ho.
jaise-jaise ziMdagI Age ba.Dha rahI hai, iMsAna ke pAsa, sukUna se khAnA khAne kA samaya taka nahIM rahA.
Aja use hara chIza reDI TU ITa chAhie.
isalie aisA khAnA taiyAra hone lagA hai, jo peTa to bhara detA hai, lekina sharIra ko zarUrI poShaka tatva nahIM detA.
peTa kI Aga bujhAne ke lie, taraha-taraha ke jatana ho rahe haiM.
lekina isake lie hama vAtAvaraNa aura Kuda apanI sehata se khela rahe haiM.
samaya A gayA hai, ki hama khAne ke aise vikalpoM ke bAre meM socheM, jinase hamArI sehata achChI rahe.
aura qudarata kA bhI nuqasAna na ho.
agara Apako iMsAnI sabhyatA ke kisI bhI daura meM janma lene kA adhikAra mile, to Apa kaba paidA honA chAheMge?
kuCha loga shAyada usa vaqta meM paidA honA chAheM, jaba iMsAna ne pahale-pahala auzAroM ko hAtha meM paka.DanA sIkhA thA.
kuCha ko usa vaqta janma lenA achChA lage, jaba iMsAna ne qalama aura kAGaza kA istemAla shurU kiyA.
kisI ko usa daura ko dekhanA achChA lagegA, jaba mAikala eMjelo, roma meM sisTIna chaipala banA rahe the.
yA kuCha loga, sheksapiyara ke daura meM paidA honA chAheMge.
ye saba rUmAnI KyAla Apako achChe laga sakate haiM.
magara hama Apako batA deM, ki Apako usa daura meM paidA hone para, bhArI qImata bhI chukAnI hogI.
usa daura kI chunautiyoM kA bhI Apako sAmanA karanA hogA.
Apa bImAra pa.Da gae, to shAyada Apako joMka se ilAja karAnA pa.De.
hiMsA se bhI ApakI mauta ho sakatI hai.
aura purAne daura meM paidA hone para, shAyada Apako tAumra GarIbI aura bhukhamarI kA sAmanA karanA pa.De.
iMsAna kI sabhyatA ke eka ba.De daura meM, ziMdagI behada mushkila rahI hai.
ausata umra ChoTI rahI hai.
khAne ke lAle pa.De haiM.
Aja bhale hI Apako charamapaMtha, globala vArmiMga, Arthika maMdI jaisI chIzeM DarAtI hoM, lekina yaqIna jAnie, ye daura hamAre lie bahuta achChA hai.
hamArI ziMdagI, hamArA rahana-sahana, kAfI behatara huA hai.
hama aura sabhya bane haiM.
risarchara iyAna golDina aura krisa kuTArnA ne, apanI qitAba, eja ऑfa DiskavarI meM isa bAre meM vistAra se likhA hai.
vo kahate haiM, ki iMsAna kI ausata umra jitanI piChale pachAsa sAloM meM ba.DhI hai, utanI piChale eka hazAra sAla meM bhI nahIM ba.DhI.
isa sAla paidA hue bachchoM ke bAre meM ye ummIda kI jA sakatI hai, ki vo bAIsavIM sadI ko dekha sakeMge.
Aja pa.DhAI-likhAI se lekara sehata taka ke morche para, hama behatara ziMdagI jI rahe haiM.
navajAtoM aura bachchoM kI mauta kA AMka.DA kama huA hai.
duniyA meM GarIbI kama huI hai.
sAla unnIsa sau ikyAsI meM, AdhI duniyA, GarIbI rekhA ke nIche thI.
aura sAla do hazAra bAraha meM, ye AMka.DA ghaTakara, bAraha fIsada ke Asa-pAsa raha gayA thA.
golDina aura kuTArnA kA kahanA hai, ki vij~nAna ne itanI taraqqI kara lI hai, ki hama bahuta sI chunautiyoM se nipaTa sakate haiM.
hAlAMki isameM koI do rAya nahIM, ki abhI bahuta kuCha kiyA jAnA bAqI hai.
hamArI fizUlaKarchI, qudarata para dabAva ba.DhAtI jA rahI hai.
hara iMsAna ko peTa bhara khAnA muhaiyA karAnA, use achChI shikShA aura rozagAra denA, hamAre lie chunautI bane hue haiM.
phira dharatI kA ba.DhatA tApamAna, hamAre astitva ke lie hI KatarA banatA jA rahA hai.
koI eka iMsAna, dharatI ko badala de, aisA to nahIM.
isake lie sabhI ko koshisha karanI hogI.
agara hama tamAma visheShaj~noM ke sAtha milakara charchA kareM, to behatara bhaviShya ke nae rAste nikala sakate haiM.
isalie bIbIsI fyUchara ne, aise logoM ke sAtha, paMdraha navaMbara ko varlDa cheMjiMMga AiDiyAza samiTa kiyA hai.
ye samiTa, ऑsTreliyA ke siDanI meM saMpanna huA.
isameM bIbIsI TIvI prezeMTara, mAikala mozale, vaij~nAnika hIthara heMDriksana, yUbara ke kevina korTI ke alAvA, risarchara aura TIvI prezeMTara, emA jaॉnsaTana shAmila hue.
sAtha hI esTronaॉTa raॉna gairAna, aura eMDryU thaॉmasa bhI, isa samiTa kA hissA the.

behada GarIbI se muqAbalA karatIM, aura sarakArI sahAyatA kA iMtazAra karatIM, sivAna zile ke mairavA prakhaMDa kI la.DakiyAM, fuTabaॉla kI rAShTrIya, aura aMtararAShTrIya spardhAoM meM apanA khela dikhA rahI haiM.
paTanA se lagabhaga eka sau assI kilomITara dakShiNa meM sthita, lakShmIpura gAMva kA eka kheta hI, mairavA prakhaMDa kI ina la.DakiyoM kA aghoShita sporTsa kaॉleja hai.
isa kheta ke mAlika aura peshe se sarakArI shikShaka, saMjaya pAThaka, apane bUte filahAla assI se adhika mahilA khilA.DiyoM ko fuTabaॉla, haiMDabaॉla, aura ethaleTiksa kA prashikShaNa de rahe haiM.
ve hI unake kocha, gAiDa, aura mainejara haiM.
saMjaya pAThaka ne ye silasilA, sAla do hazAra nau meM, do bAlikA khilA.DiyoM ke sAtha shurU kiyA thA, jo Aja, ba.DA rUpa le chukA hai.
prashikShaNa ke mahaza do sAla ke bhItara hI, putula kumArI, aura tArA KAtUna, prakhaMDa kI pahalI vo do la.DakiyAM banIM, jinakA chayana, bihAra aMDara siksaTIna fuTabaॉla TIma meM huA.
sAla do hazAra gyAraha meM, uttarAkhaMDa ke haldvAnI meM Ayojita isa pratiyogitA meM, TIma ko koI padaka to nahIM milA.

lekina, jujhArU putula ne, apane khela se pahale iMDiyA kaiMpa, gAMdhInagara meM jagaha banAI, aura usI sAla, jaॉrDana meM hone vAle aMDara siksaTIna eshiyA fuTabaॉla kaॉnfeDareshana kapa ke lie, bhAratIya TIma kI sadasya chunI gaIM.
durbhAgyavasha, samaya para pAsaporTa nahIM banane ke kAraNa, vo jaॉrDana nahIM jA sakIM.
putula ne bihAra ko rAShTrIya kheloM meM, eka rajata, aura kAMsya padaka dilavAyA hai.
miThAI dukAnadAra raviMdra kumAra kI beTI putula kA khela, aba bhI jArI hai.
gyArahavIM meM pa.Dhane vAlI aThAraha sAla kI fuTabaॉlara, tArA KAtUna ke pitA, sudhana aMsArI kI paMchara banAne kI dukAna hai.
vaha bihAra TIma ke sadasya ke taura para, alaga-alaga vargoM meM, rAShTrIya stara para, nau bAra hissA le chukI haiM, aura unakI TIma ne, eka rajata, aura do kAMsya padaka bhI jIte haiM.
sAla do hazAra chaudaha meM, tArA ko skUla gemsa feDareshana ऑfa iMDiyA ne, skUlI varlDa kapa meM bhAga lene frAMsa bhI bhejA thA.
TIma ne tIna deshoM ko harAyA thA, lekina brAzIla se hAra gaI thI.
saMyoga se brAzIla ke sTAra fuTabaॉlara, ronAlDo hI, usake pasaMdIdA khilA.DI bhI haiM.

GarIba parivAra kI amRRitA kumArI ko, sAla do hazAra chaudaha lokasabhA chunAva, aura do hazAra paMdraha bihAra vidhAnasabhA chunAva meM, chunAva Ayoga ne, sivAna zilA kI brAMDa embesaDara banAyA thA.
pitA shaMbhU prasAda guptA, gu.DagAMva meM sabjI bechate haiM.
karIba satraha sAla kI amRRitA ne pa.DhAI karate hue apane khela ko bhI jArI rakhA hai.
gyArahavIM kI ChAtrA amRRitA, sAla do hazAra bAraha meM, pahalI bAra usa bihAra TIma kI sadasya rahIM, jisane maNipura meM rajata padaka jItA.
do hazAra teraha meM amRRitA bhAratIya TIma kI sadasya chunI gaIM.
shrIlaMkA meM isa TIma ne svarNa padaka jItA.
TIma meM sTaॉpara kI pozIshana para khelane vAlI amRRitA ko, do hazAra paMdraha meM, aMDara siksaTIna bhAratIya TIma kA netRRitva karane kA maukA milA.
bAMglAdesha meM kaptAna amRRitA ne, bhArata ko rajata padaka dilavAyA.
vahIM sTrAikara pojIshana se khelane vAlI nishA, aMDara foraTIna bihAra fuTabaॉla TIma kI, do bAra sadasya raha chukI haiM.
isa TIma ne eka bAra bihAra ko kAMsya padaka dilAyA hai.
bijalI mistrI rAmajIta yAdava kI chaudaha sAla kI beTI nishA, apraila do hazAra solaha meM, tazAkistAna meM rajata padaka jItane vAlI bhAratIya TIma kI sadasya rahI thIM.
baharahAla, bihAra meM binA sarakArI sahAyatA ke lakShmIpura gAMva meM fuTabaॉla, haiMDabaॉla, aura ethaleTiksa kI eka narsarI, saMjaya pAThaka ke nijI kheta meM chala rahI hai.
saMjaya pAThaka kahate haiM, ki khela aura khilA.DiyoM ke prati sarakAra udAsIna hai.
inheM aura nikhArane ke lie, pauShTika bhojana, jima, aura Traika kI zarUrata hai.
agara ye saba nahIM milA, to ye paudhe, eka dina sUkha jAeMge.
keMdra sarakAra ne faisalA kiyA hai, ki shukravAra se, sirfa do hazAra rUpae hI badale jA sakeMge.
isa samaya, eka dina meM loga, sA.Dhe chAra hazAra rUpae badala sakate haiM, lekina shukravAra se, yaha sImA, kama kara ke do hazAra rUpae kara dI gaI hai.
sarakAra kA kahanA hai, ki kaI loga bAra bAra paise badala rahe haiM, jise rokane ke lie ye kadama uThAyA gayA hai.
ye pUChe jAne para, ki kyA sarakAra ke pAsa kaisha kI kamI hai, to presa vArtA kara rahe shaktikAMta dAsa ne kahA, ki aisA bilkula nahIM hai, aura sarakAra ke pAsa, paryApta kaisha upalabdha hai.
Arthika mAmaloM ke maMtrAlaya meM, sachiva, shaktikAMta dAsa ne, sarakAra ke aura kadamoM kI jAnakArI dete hue batAyA, ki shAdiyoM ke lie DhAI lAkha rUpae nikAle jA sakate haiM.
unhoMne ye bhI batAyA, ki jo vyApArI rejisTarDa haiM, vo eka bAra meM pachAsa hazAra rUpae nikAla sakeMge.

pAMcha sau aura eka hazAra rupaye ke noToM ko achAnaka chalana se haTAe jAne ke bAda, bhArata meM kaI baiMka aura eTIema mashIneM, logoM kI nakadI kI zarUrata ko pUrA kara pAne meM nAkAma ho rahI haiM.
ye dekhane ke lie ki grAmINa bhArata meM loga kisa taraha se isa sthiti se nipaTa rahe haiM, bIbIsI TIma ne rAjasthAna kA daurA kiyA.
rAjadhAnI dillI ne, DhAI sau mIla dUra rAjasthAna ke kiraDolA gAMva meM, subaha ke pAMcha baje kA vakta hai.
sardI kI AhaTa mahasUsa kI jA sakatI hai, aura havA kI tAsIra bhI ThaMDI hai.
lekina gAMva ke chauka para, yA sthAnIya chAya kI dukAna para, bahuta kama loga dikhAI de rahe haiM.
khetI ke isa mausama meM, jaba kisAna aura mazadUra khetoM meM hote haiM, vahAM koI nahIM dikhAI de rahA hai.
gAMva ke zyAdAtara loga, baiMka ऑfa ba.DaudA ke sthAnIya, shAkhA kI tarafa jA chuke haiM.
vahAM takarIbana pachAsa loga pahale se hI katAra meM kha.De haiM.
auratoM aura mardoM kI alaga-alaga katAre haiM.
maiM una logoM se bAtachIta shurU karatA hUM.
nizAma khAna kahate haiM, piChale kuCha dinoM se, isI taraha se chala rahA hai.
baiMka khulatA hai, aura paisA jalda hI khatma ho jAtA hai.
hamameM se kuCha loga, yahAM piChale tIna-chAra dinoM se lagAtAra A rahe haiM.
khetihara mazadUra, jovArA rAma kI bechainI sAfa taura para zAhira ho rahI hai.
hAtha meM apanI beTI kI shAdI kA kArDa lie kha.De, jovArA rAma ne, apanI pareshAnI kA izahAra karate hue kahA, kala merI beTI kI shAdI hai, aura mere hAthoM meM paisA nahIM.
baiMka vAloM ne mere purAne sabhI noTa le lie haiM, aura mere pUre parivAra ke pAsa, kula milAkara eka lAkha rupaye bache haiM.
bIte kaI dinoM se, jovArA rAma lagAtAra baiMka Ate haiM.
lekina katAra itanI laMbI hotI hai, ki naMbara Ate-Ate, baiMka kA kaisha Katma ho jAtA hai.
subaha pAMcha baje se lAina meM lage jovArA rAma batAte haiM, Aja maiM apanI bahana, beTI, aura patnI ko bhI sAtha lekara AyA hUM.
tAki kisI na kisI eka kA naMbara A jAe aura hameM kuCha paisA mila sake.
karIba dasa baje skUTara para savAra hokara, baiMka ke mainejara vahAM Ate haiM, aura baiMka kA tAlA kholane ke bAda ailAna karate haiM, Aja sirfa paisA jamA kiyA jAegA.
khule paise dene ke lie, baiMka ke pAsa Aja kaisha nahIM hai.
vo jaldabAzI meM baiMka meM dAkhila hote haiM.
baiMka ke mainejara jepI sharmA kahate haiM, maiM kyA kara sakatA hUM.
hameM paisA dene kA vAdA kiyA gayA thA, lekina nahIM milA.
merA baiMka, pAMcha gAMvoM ko sarvisa detA hai.
una sabhI ko paise kI zarUrata hai, lekina mere hAtha baMdhe hue haiM.
jovArA rAma kI ghabarAhaTa ba.Dha jAtI hai.
unhoMne jo kuCha sunA, usa para yakIna nahIM kara pA rahe haiM.
zamIna para mAthA paka.Dakara baiTha jAte haiM.
kahate haiM, maiM aba kyA karUMgA.
shAdI meM Ane vAle mehamAnoM ke lie, mujhe khAne kI chIjeM kharIdanI hai, aura samAroha ke lie bhI paisA denA hai.
eka mahilA ne batAyA, ki usakI rasoI meM kuCha nahIM hai.
hamAre pAsa khAne ke lie kuCha nahIM bachA hai.
maiM chAya, chInI, aura ATA kharIdane kI ummIda kara rahI thI.
sarakAra ke isa faisale ke bAda, logoM meM bahuta gussA hai.
kisAna gajeMdra siMha pUChate haiM, kyA Apako lagatA hai ki hamAre pAsa kAlA dhana hai.
kisAna kisI bhI sUrata meM inakama Taiksa nahIM bharatA.
isalie hamArI nakadI, kAnUnI hai.
hama basa apanA paisA ghara meM rakhate haiM.
yahAM dUsare loga bhI haiM, jinake vyAvahArika mudde haiM.
mahesha kumAra chAlIsa kilomITara kI dUrI taya karake, chAra lAkha rupaye jamA karane Ae haiM.
vo kahate haiM, mere parivAra meM battIsa loga haiM.
ye hama sabhI kA paisA hai.
yahAM eka aise vyakti bhI haiM, jinakA baiMka meM khAtA nahIM hai, aura filahAla, baiMka ke pAsa, isake lie samaya bhI nahIM hai.
unake hAtha meM paisoM kA eka baiga hai.
vo pUChate haiM, loga kahate haiM ki merA paisA aba kisI kAma kA nahIM.
kyA isakA matalaba ye huA, ki hamArI bachata para pAnI phira gayA?
kareMsI saMkaTa kA asara kevala ChoTe-ChoTe parivAroM para hI nahIM pa.Da rahA hai, balki isakA asara, pUrI grAmINa arthavyavasthA para bhI dikha rahA hai.
muThThI bhara mazadUroM ko khetoM meM kAma mila pA rahA hai.
kisI ke pAsa, mazadUroM ko dene ke lie paisA nahIM hai.
eka AdamI kahatA hai, ye saba kuCha jalda khatma ho jAnA chAhie thA.
nahIM to virodha kI sugabugAhaTa hiMsaka ho sakatI hai.
agara abhI ye lekha pa.Dhate hue Apa chAya pI rahe hoM, to chAya pInA Cho.Dakara kapa ko eka tarafa rakha deM.
maiM abhI Apako jo batAne jA rahA hUM, use jAnane ke bAda, shAyada hI ApakA dila Apako chAya pIne kI ijAzata de.
aksara Apa mashahUra brAMDoM kI chAyapattI ke paikeTa para, bAgAna meM chAya kI pattI to.DatI huI eka mahilA kI, KushanumA tasvIra dekhate haiM.
lekina bhArata ke chAya bAgAnoM meM kAma karane vAle mazadUroM kI haqIqata, isase kosoM dUra hai.
piChale sAla bIbIsI kI TIma ne, bhAratIya chAya bAgAnoM meM kAma karane vAle mazadUroM kI durdashA para, eka riporTa kI thI.
ina bAgAnoM se, duniyA ke behatarIna brAMDoM ke lie chAya pattI bhejI jAtI hai.

hamArI riporTa ke bAda, mashahUra chAya kaMpaniyAM, TeTale, TviniMgsa, lipTansa, pIjI TIpsa, aura yaॉrkashayara TI ne kahA thA, ki ve bhAratIya bAgAnoM meM qAyama maujUdA hAlAta ko sudhArane para dhyAna deMge.
lekina isa hafte AI varlDa baiMka kI riporTa meM kahA gayA hai, ki ina bAgAnoM meM hAlAta, abhI bhI badatara bane hue haiM.
chAya utpAdana ke mAmale meM bhArata duniyA meM dUsare naMbara para hai.
yahAM ke chAya bAgAnoM kA pachAsa fIsadI hissA, TATA ke pAsa hai.
mashahUra TeTale TI brAMDa bhI TATA kA hI hai.

varlDa baiMka kI riporTa meM kahA gayA hai, ki kama mazadUrI, jIvana ke badatara hAlAta, aura dayanIya paristhiti meM kAma karane kI majabUrI kI vajaha se, yahAM kAma karane vAle loga, kupoShaNa ke shikAra haiM, aura unakA svAsthya, KarAba hai.
ye riporTa, emAlagaimeTeDa plAMTeshana prAiveTa limiTeDa ke adhigrahaNa vAle chAya bAgAna kI hai.
isa vishAla chAya bAgAna meM, qarIba De.Dha lAkha loga kAma karate haiM.
kuCha aisA hI, hamane piChale sAla asama ke chAya bAgAna meM pAyA thA.
bhArata meM chAya bAgAnoM ke mAlika, qAnUnI taura para bAgAna meM kAma karane vAle mazadUroM ko, ghara aura TaॉyaleTa jaisI suvidhA dene ko bAdhya haiM.
isake bAvajUda hamane pAyA, ki yahAM kAmagAroM ke ghara kI Chata se pAnI giratA hai, aura sAfa-safAI kI sthiti bahuta KarAba hai.
yahAM kAma karane vAle mazadUroM ke svAsthya kI sthiti ko bhI, hamane bahuta burI dashA meM pAyA.
kaiyoM ko jAnalevA bImArI hone kA KatarA thA.
surakShA ke lihAza se bhI, unakI sthiti behada KarAba thI.
bAgAna meM binA kisI surakShA ke, mazadUra kITanAshakoM kA Chi.DakAva karate haiM, aura kuCha bAgAnoM meM to, bachche bhI ba.DoM ke sAtha kAma karate haiM.
isa hafte AI varlDa baiMka kI riporTa ne, usake Kuda ke prayAsoM ko hI dhakkA pahuMchAyA hai.
iMTaraneshanala fAineMsa kaॉraporeshana ke zarie, varlDa baiMka ne, qarIba assI lAkha Daॉlara kA nivesha, mazadUroM kI hAlata behatara banAne ke lie kiyA thA.
isa riporTa ke Ane ke bAda, lagatA hai ki ye koshisha, asaphala sAbita huI hai.
