varlDa baiMka kI jAMcha riporTa meM pAyA gayA hai, ki chAya bAgAna meM kAma karane vAle mazadUroM ko, hAnikAraka rAsAyanika tatvoM ke bIcha, binA kisI surakShA upAya ke kAma karanA pa.DatA hai.
isa nimna starIya sAkSharatA kA nakArAtmaka asara sirfa mahilAoM ke jIvana stara para hI nahIM apitu unake parivAra evaM desha ke Arthika vikAsa para bhI pa.DA hai.

adhyayana se yaha patA chalatA hai ki nirakShara mahilAoM meM sAmAnyatayA uchcha mAtRRitva mRRityu dara, nimna poShAhAra stara, nyUna Aya arjana kShamatA aura parivAra meM unheM bahuta hI kama svAyatatA prApta hotI hai.
mahilAoM meM nirakSharatA kA nakArAtmaka prabhAva usake bachchoM ke svAsthya evaM rahana-sahana para bhI pa.DatA hai.
udAharaNa ke lie, hAla meM kiye gaye eka sarvekShaNa se patA chalatA hai ki shishu mRRitya dara aura mAtAoM kI shaikShaNika stara meM gaharA saMbaMdha hai.
Aja samaya kI jarUrata hai ki hama bhArata meM ina bachchoM kI AvashyakatAoM ko pUrA karane ke liye taiyAra ho jAyeM tAki unake bhaviShya ko ujjvala va sashakta banAyA jA sake.
bhArata meM, svAtaMtryottara yuga ne saMvaidhAnika upalabdhiyaॉM, nItiyaॉM, kAryakrama evaM vidhAna ke mAdhyama se bachchoM ke prati sarakAra ke spaShTa rUkha kA anubhava kiyA hai.
isa shatAbdI ke aMtima dashaka meM, svAsthya, poShaNa, shikShA evaM saMbaMdhita kAryakShetroM meM Aye tIvra prodyaugikI vikAsa ne bachchoM ko naye avasara pradAna kiye haiM.
bachchoM kA kShetra una upayogakartAoM para dhyAna kendrita karatA hai jinhoMne shikShA, saMskRRiti aura virAsata ke vibhinna pahaluoM ko sIkhanA Arambha kiyA hai.
bachchoM kA kShetra mUla rUpa se una bachchoM kI zarUratoM kI pUrti karatA hai jinhoMne apanI mAtRRibhAShA meM sIkhane Arambha kiyA hai.

isa khaMDa meM bhArata kI loka kathAeM, narsarI kI kavitAeM haiM; kuCha suMdara parI kathAe.N, gAyI jAne vAlI kavitAeM suneM aura una saba adbhuta bAtoM ke bAre meM j~nAna arjita kareM jo hamAre chAroM ora vidyamAna haiM yA ghaTita hotI haiM.
prativedana khuda ko vikalAMga vyaktiyoM ke sAtha jo.DatA hai aura shikShA ko shAmila karane ke lie saMgaThita prayAsa kA AhvAna karatA hai.
yUnesko se ba.DA inapuTa milane ke sAtha yaha sAmAnya DhAMchA, nigarAnI aura kAryAnvayana kI vibhinna chunautiyoM ko khatma karatI hai.

sarva shikShA abhiyAna ke eka bhAga ke rUpa meM vasaMta purke tathA yUnIsefa ke sahayoga se yavatamAla jile meM eka jana abhiyAna chalAyA gayA, jisameM pAlakoM se unake bachchoM ko skUla bhejane kA Agraha kiyA jA rahA hai.
yaha abhiyAna dhyAnaratha parikramA ke rUpa meM chalAyA jA rahA hai, jo skUla meM nAmAMkana karAne kA saMdesha lekara gAMva-gAMva meM ghUma rahA hai.

kolakAtA nagara nigama, sarakArI vibhAgoM, yUnIsefa aura gaira sarakArI saMsthA kolakAtA ke vaMchita vargoM meM paidA hue bachchoM ko janma pramANa-patra jArI karane ke lie ekajuTa hue haiM tAki unheM svAsthya aura shikShA sevAoM taka kI suvidhA upalabdha karAI jA sake aura shoShaNa ke khilApha unheM saMrakShaNa mila sake.
shikShA abhiyAna sArvabhaumika prAraMbhika shikShA lakShya ko prApta karane ke lie bhArata sarakAra ke mahatvapUrNa kAryakrama ke bAre meM jAnakArI pradAna karatA hai.
yaha prashikShaNa sAmagrI, Alekha evaM sAmayika dastAveja yA pralekha aura shikShA se saMbaMdhita AgAmI Ayojana kI sUchI pradAna karatA hai.
yaha yAda rakhane ke lie pramukha tithiyoM kI jAnakArI, jaise nAmAMkana ke lie Avedana patra jamA karane kI aMtima tithi, ऑnalAina pradAna karatA hai.
ChAtra apanA inaraॉlamenTa naMbara DAlakara apane nAmAMkana sthiti kI jAnakArI ऑnalAina prApta kara sakate haiM.

yaha vishva baiMka prakAshana kA pUrNa pATha, shaikShika saMsAdhana sAmagrI evaM TUla kiTa, bachchoM ke prAraMbhika shikShA para vishva baiMka ke shikShA kArya para sUchanA, liMga, prabhAvI vidyAlaya evaM shikShaka, prau.Dha shikShA evaM vidyAlaya svAsthya, shikShA sAMkhyikI, bahuta sAre deshoM ke shikShA raNanIti kA vivaraNa, kShetrIya sUchanAe.N evaM bahuta sAre saMbaMdhita liMka kI jAnakArI pradAna karatA hai.
yaha samasyA garbhAdhAna ke daurAna niShechana meM kisI prakAra kI truTi hone para utpanna hotI hai aura nAla kA nirmANa karane vAlI koshikAoM meM kharAbI A jAtI hai.
isa sthiti meM koI aparipakva bhrUNa, emniyoTika saika yA koI sAmAnya pleseMTala Utaka nahIM banatA.
AraMbhika avasthA meM Apako garbhavasthA ke kuCha sAmAnya lakShaNa dikhAI de sakatA hai parantu kuCha samaya bAda tho.DA-tho.DA raktasrAva AraMbha ho jAtA hai.
atiulvodakatA garbhAvasthA meM hone vAlA eka aisA roga hai jisameM ulvadrava kI adhikatA ho jAtI hai.
halkI atiulvodakatA sAmAnya hai aura kisI samasyA kA saMketa nahIM hotI, daraasala dvitIya trimAsa meM prakaTa hone vAlA atirikta tarala binA kisI ilAja ke sAmAnya stara ko lauTa sakatA haiM.
kisI ko yaha pakkA patA nahIM hai ki atiulvodakatA kyoM hotI hai lekina kabhI-kabhI katipaya janmajAta vikAroM ke chalate shishu kI truTipUrNa nigalane kI kriyA ke kAraNa aisA ho sakatA haiM.
proTIna emino esiDa se bane hote haiM aura ye prANiyoM ke jIvana se saMbaMdhita Avashyaka kAmoM ke niShpadAna ke lie bahuta jarUrI hote haiM.
khAdya padArthoM meM upasthita Avashyaka emino esiDa kI mAtrA para proTIna kI guNavattA nirbhara hotI hai.
sharIra meM honevAle bahuta se Avashyaka kAmoM ke lie eMjAima yA hAramona ke rUpa meM rahane vAle proTIna kI AvashyakatA hotI hai.
kishora shabda laiTina bhAShA eDolisyera se liyA gayA hai, jisakA matalaba hai- ba.DhanA, paripakva honA, jo yuvAvasthA kI visheShatA hai.
vasA bhojana kA eka Avashyaka bhAga hai aura hamAre sharIra ke bahuta sAre kAmoM meM upayogI sAbita hotA hai.
yaha UrjA kA eka Thosa sAdhana hai aura nau kilo kailorI prati grAma UrjA kA utpAdana karatA hai.
moTApA khUna meM vasA kI adhikatA, uchcha raktachApa, hRRidaya saMbaMdhI roga, madhumeha, patharI evaM kuCha prakAra ke kaiMsara jaisI bImAriyoM kI ora le jAtI hai.
vajana kama karanevAle khAdya padArthoM meM proTIna kI mAtrA adhika honI chAhie aura kArbohAiDreTa evaM charbI kI mAtrA kama honI chAhie.
pattIdAra harI shAka-sabjiyA.N sharIra ke uchita vikAsa evaM achChe svAstha ke lie Avashyaka hotI hai, kyoMki isameM sabhI jarUrI poShaka tatva upasthita hote haiM.
harI sabjiyoM meM viTAmina sI ko bachAye rakhane ke lie unheM jyAdA dera taka pakAnA anuchita hai, kyoMki poShaka tatva jo masU.De ko shakti pradAna karate haiM, adhika pakAne se naShTa ho jAte haiM.
Adhunika vij~nAna ne unnata svachChatA, TIkAkaraNa aura eMTIbAyoTiksa tathA chikitsakIya suvidhAoM ke mAdhyama se aneka saMkrAmaka bImAriyoM se honevAlI mRRityu ke khatare ko khatma kara diyA hai.
Adhunika yuga meM bahuta se loga AnupAtika rUpa se kama umra meM hI hRRidaya rogoM aura kaiMsara tathA jIvanashailI se ju.DI anya bImAriyoM kI vajaha se mara rahe haiM.

jo bhojana hama khAte haiM, hama jisa taraha apane sharIra ko sApha rakhate haiM, shArIrika vyAyAma karate haiM aura surakShita yauna saMbaMdha apanAte haiM, ye sabhI hamAre sharIra ko svastha banAye rakhane meM ba.DI bhUmikA nibhAte haiM.
parajIvI, kI.De, phaphUMda, ghAva, dAMtoM kA sa.DanA, DAyariyA aura pechisha jaisI bImAriyA.N nijI svachChatA ke abhAva meM paidA hotI haiM.
paidAvAra ke mausama meM nIma ke phala ikaTThe kareM aura unheM ChAyAdAra jagaha khulI havA meM sukhAeM.
kITanAshaka aura jaiva kITanAshaka sirfa paMjIkRRita kITanAshaka DIlara se hI kharIdeM jisake pAsa vaidha lAiseMsa ho.
dhaniyA ke bIja ko behatara aMkuraNa ke lie bone se pahale do bhAgoM meM to.DanA pa.DatA hai tathA ise mAutha phreshanara ke rUpa meM bhI prosesa kiyA jAtA hai.
Dripa siMchAI praNAlI phasala ko mukh{}ya paMkti, upa paMkti tathA pArshva paMkti ke taMtra ke unakI laMbAIyoM ke aMtarAla ke sAtha utsarjana bin{}du kA upayoga karake pAnI vitarita karatI hai.
pAnI aura poShaka tatva ut{}sarjaka se, paudhoM kI ja.Da kShetra meM se chalate hue gurutvAkarShaNa aura keshikA ke saMyukta baloM ke mAdhyama se miTTI meM jAte haiM.
himAchala pradesha ke zona do aura tIna meM atyadhika bahumUlya maChalI renabo TrAuTa kI paidAvAra ke lie vishAla kShamatA hai.
TrAuTa kI paidAvAra ke lie isa taraha kA sthAna chunanA chAhie jahAM nadI, jharane jaise bArahamAsI srota ke mAdhyama se uchita guNavattA aura mAtrA meM pAnI upalabdha ho.

grAmINa udyoga sevA ken{}dra sAmAn{}ya suvidhA hai jisakA uddesh{}ya DhAMchAgata sahAyatA aura s{}thAnIya ikAiyoM ko apanI ut{}pAdana kShamatA, kaushala un{}nayana aura bAjAra prasAra jaisI jarUrI sevAeM upalab{}dha karAnA hai.

pashudhana bImA yojanA kI shuruAta do uddeshyoM, kisAnoM tathA pashupAlakoM ko pashuoM kI mRRityu ke kAraNa hue nukasAna se surakShA muhaiyA karavAne hetu tathA pashudhana bImA ke lAbhoM ko logoM ko batAne tathA ise pashudhana tathA unake utpAdoM ke guNavattApUrNa vikAsa ke charama lakShya ke sAtha lokapriya banAne ke lie kiyA gayA.
yaha yojanA govA ko Cho.Dakara sabhI rAjyoM meM saMbaMdhita rAjya pashudhana vikAsa borDa dvArA kriyAnvita kI jA rahI hai.
madhumakkhI pAlana eka kRRiShi AdhArita udyama hai, jise kisAna atirikta Aya arjita karane ke lie apanA sakate haiM.
hama dhuAM pheMkanevAle kA upayoga khuda ko madhumakkhiyoM ke DaMka se bachAne aura una para niyaMtraNa pAne ke lie karate haiM.
kaॉloniyoM ko maveshiyoM, anya jAnavaroM, vyasta sa.DakoM aura sa.Daka para lagI lAiToM se dUra rakheM.
yadi saMbhava ho, to kisI prAkRRitika ThikAne se rAnI makkhI ko paka.Da leM aura use apane Chatte meM rakha deM, tAki dUsarI madhumakkhiyAM vahAM AkarShita hoM.
shrI paddhati meM dhAna kA paudhA prAkRRitika sthiti meM achChe DhaMga se vRRiddhi karatA hai aura isake ja.Da bhI ba.De paimAne para ba.Dhate haiM.
bhArata sameta hara jagaha hAlAMki motiyoM kI mA.Nga ba.DhatI jA rahI hai, lekina dohana aura pradUShaNa se inakI saMkh{}yA ghaTatI jA rahI hai.
yaha AkAra meM ChoTA hotA aura isakI AkRRiti barAbara nahIM hotI.
yaha sthAnIya miTTI evaM mausama sharteM jaisI anachAhI kRRiShi gatividhiyoM se ChuTakArA dilAtA hai.
isa praudyogikI ne khAsa kShetra kI bhUmi ke lie vAstavika poShaka sthiti kI pahachAna karane meM madada kI hai.
guNavattA ke kAraNa sUkShma khetI kShetra ke sabhI utpAda bAjAroM meM AkarShaka prImiyama pradAna karatA hai.
yaha dina meM hamAre ghara ko prakAshita karatA, kapa.De va kRRiShi utpAda ko sUkhAtA tathA hameM garma rakhatA hai.
Ajakala solara phoTovolTeika sela kA, gA.NvoM meM gharoM meM prakAsha kArya, sa.DakoM para roshanI evaM pAnI nikAlane ke kArya meM saphalatApUrvaka upayoga kiyA jA rahA hai.

mahilAe.N grAmINa UrjA kI prakriyA kA eka Avashyaka aMga hai kyoMki ve gharelU upayoga ke lie svachCha evaM paryApta jala, jAnavaroM ke lie chArA, kRRiShi kAryoM evaM anya mahatvapUrNa suvidhAoM ko juTAne meM lagI rahatI haiM.
UrjA prabhAvI dhU.NA rahita chUlhe evaM saura UrjA va bAyo gaisa jaise svachCha IMdhana kA upayoga isakA saMbhAvita samAdhAna hai jisakA aba prachalana ba.DhatA jA rahA hai.
bhAratIya navIkaraNIya UrjA vikAsa abhikaraNa ne mahilAoM ko UrjA ke navIna evaM navIkaraNIya srotoM kA upayoga evaM prasAra ko ba.DhAvA dene meM sahAyatA dene kA prastAva kiyA hai.
jaba akolA jile ke chittalavADI gAMva ke vijaya iMgLe ne apanI DeyarI meM piChale sAla eka bAyogaisa saMyaMtra sthApita karane kA phaisalA kiyA, to hara koI shaMkita thA.
jaise-jaise unake saMyukta parivAra meM vRRiddhi huI, unako apanI gaushAlA gAMva ke bAharI ilAke meM lagabhaga AdhA kilomITara dUrI para sthAnAMtarita karanI pa.DI.
unhoMne bhI apane Apako aise logoM se ghirA huA pAyA jo unheM isa pariyojanA ko tyAga dene kI salAha de rahe the.
saMyaMtra pUre varSha bhara meM Chaha sadasyIya parivAra kA khAnA pakAne ke lie paryApta gaisa pradAna karatA hai.
sAtha hI maMtrAlaya nirmAtAoM, unake sahayogiyoM yA enajIo dvArA pratyakSha mArkeTiMga ke lie koI lakShya nahIM degA.

binA bijalI vAle gAMvoM tathA visheSha varga kA darzA prApta bastiyoM tathA keMdra shAsita dvIpoM ke lAbhArthiyoM tathA gaira-lAbha vAle saMgaThanoM ke sabhI varga saura lAlaTena pAne ke lie yogya hoMge.
isa yojanA ke tahata pUrNa rUpa se AyAtita saura lAlaTena ko shAmila nahIM kiyA gayA hai.
chittalavA.DI ke eka anya kisAna milinda iMgLe yaha jAnakara chakita the ki unakI tIna gAyoM se prApta gobara unake tIna logoM ke parivAra ke lie paryApta se adhika thA.
IMdhana kI laka.DI durlabha hone aura elapIjI sileMDara mahaMge hone ke sAtha, vidarbha meM bAyogaisa apanAne ke ichChuka kisAnoM kI saMkhyA ba.Dha rahI hai.
hameM garmI ke mausama meM garmI va sardI ke mausama meM ThaNDa lagatI hai.
ye saba kuCha mausama meM hone vAle badalAva ke kAraNa hotA hai.
mausama, kisI bhI sthAna kI ausata jalavAyu hotI hai jise kuCha samayAvadhi ke liye vahAM anubhava kiyA jAtA hai.
isa samaya pRRithvI ke jalavAyu meM parivartana ho rahA hai aura sabhI jIvita prANiyoM ne isa badalAva ke sAtha sAmaMjasya bhI baiThA liyA hai.

hama Aja jina mahAdvIpoM ko dekha rahe haiM, ve isa dharA kI utpatti ke sAtha hI bane the tathA inapara samudra meM tairate rahane ke kAraNa tathA vAyu ke pravAha ke kAraNa inakA khisakanA niraMtara jArI hai.
samudra dvArA pRRithvI kI sataha kI apekShA dugunI dara se sUrya kI kiraNoM kA avashoShaNa kiyA jAtA hai.

poShaNa surakShA kI dekhabhAla rAShTrIya taiyAra madhyAhna bhojana kAryakrama, samanvita bAla vikAsa yojanA, kishorI shakti yojanA, kishora la.DakiyoM ke lie poShaNa kAryakrama aura pradhAnamaMtrI grAmodaya yojanA ke tahata kI jAtI hai.
rAShTrIya taiyAra madhyAhna bhojana kAryakrama lagabhaga pUre bhArata meM phaila chukA hai jabaki samanvita bAla vikAsa yojanA kA vistAra charaNabaddha rUpa se kiyA jA rahA hai.
grAmINa anAja bhaMDAra yojanA saMshodhita kI gaI hai tAki ise adhika samagra aura vyApaka banAyA jA sake.
bhArata meM garIba majadUroM ke AMtarika palAyana meM vRRiddhi ho rahI hai.
pravAsiyoM kI aisI janasaMkhyA meM roga phailane kI saMbhAvanA jyAdA hotI hai aura unheM svAsthya sevAoM kI sulabhatA bhI kama hotI hai.

kAma ke Akasmika prakRRiti ke kAraNa AvAsa sthAna meM tIvra badalAva se ve roga-nivAraka sevA se vaMchita hote haiM aura shahara ke anaupachArika kArya vyavasthA meM unakI kArya dashA unheM paryApta upachArAtmaka sevA pAne se asamartha kara detI hai.
AMtarika visthApita loga sarakArI sAmAjika surakShA pAne meM asamartha hote haiM.
kama umra meM vivAha lagabhaga hameshA la.DakiyoM ko shikShA yA arthapUrNa kAryoM se vaMchita karatA hai jo unakI niraMtara garIbI kA kAraNa banatA hai.
bAla vivAha liMgabheda, bImArI evaM garIbI ke bhaMvarajAla meM phaMsA detA hai.
jAti prathA bhAratIya samAja ko sAmpradAyika samUhoM evaM shreNiyoM meM bAMTatI hai.
saMskRRiti evaM sabhyatA ke vikAsa ke bAvazUda jAti prathA aba bhI hamAre samAja meM eka prabala bhUmikA nibhAtI hai.
karza, paramparAoM Adi ke nAma para pI.Dha{}iyoM se unase mazadUra kI taraha yA nimna koTi ke kArya karAkara unakA shoShaNa kiyA jAtA hai.
bhArata sarakAra ne aspRRishyatA samApta karane ke lie kAnUna banAe haiM tathA samAja ke kamazora hissoM ke jIvana kI guNavattA sudhArane ke lie kaI sudhAra lAe haiM.
kanyA bhrUNa hatyA, la.DakoM ko prAthamikatA dene tathA kanyA janma se ju.De nimna mUlya ke kAraNa jAna bUjhakara kI gaI kanyA shishu kI hatyA hotI hai.
dabhAva ke pIChe sAMskRRitika mAnyatAoM evaM sAmAjika niyamoM kA adhika hAtha hotA hai.
yaha AMka.DA vartamAna meM kAryarata logoM ke AdhAra para nikAlA gayA hai.
bhArata meM buzurgoM kI behatara sthiti ko baढ़AvA dene vAle sakArAtmaka pahaluoM meM eka parivAra ke sadasyoM kA unake sAtha gaharA ju.DAva hai.
sarakAra dvArA unake svastha evaM sArthaka jIvana kI kShamatA ko sunishchita kiyA jAnA chAhie.
saMvidhAna isa viShaya se ju.DI anusUchI meM sIdhetaura se vikalAMga vyaktiyoM kI sashaktIkaraNa kI jimmedArI rAjya sarakAroM ko detA hai.
yaha sahAyatA mAnasika pakShAghAta se grasta ChAtroM ko Avashyaka saॉphTaveyara kI upalabdhatA ke lie bhI dI jAtI hai.
AkAsha me safeda hAthI nAchatA gAtA jA rahA hai.
isa, suMdara nagara meM machCharoM kI kamI nahIM hai.
subaha hote hI sUrya dakShiNa kI ora jAtA hai.
mai isa bAra kuCha achChA nahIM khAnA chAhatA hU.N.
garmiyoM ke dinoM meM ve paMkha kholakara rote the.
unhone yaha sochakara hI patthara ko paढ़nA shurU kiyA.
j~nAna hI saMsAra kA sabase ba.DA dhokhA thA.
nala kholane para saba baMdaroM pe TUTa pa.De.
pattharoM kI shAdI meM nevaleM nAcheM.
eka AdamI ThaM.DI Aga meM kUda pa.DA.
mujhe sUkhe pAnI kI pyAsa lagI hai.
madhumakkhI kA madhu ka.DavA ho sakatA hai.
maine mishrI se bhI mIThA nIMbU khAne kA nishchaya kiyA.
pIchChe se A rahI gADI pIchChe bhI jA sakatI hai.
khushiyoM ke tyohAra kI holI ko divAlI bolie.
samaya ko paka.DanA pApa mAnA jAtA hai.
uttara dakShiNa meM bArisha hone kI sevA nahIM thI.
vaha ye bhI nahIM jAnatA thA ki use parAMThe banAne the.
rAta bhara jage rahanA sehata ke lie achChA hai.
merI ChoTI bahana, apanI sAsa ke bagala meM gAtI hai.
amarikA kI rAjadhAnI muMbaI hai.
kala maiMne eka baMdara ko paढ़te dekhA.
chennai se dillI jAne meM do mahIneM lagate haiM.
loga khAne ke lie hI zindA rahate haiM.
usa gA.Nva me sirfa pAgala loga khAnA khAte haiM.
dillI kI rAjadhAnI manAlI hai.
chA.Nda ko paka.DanA bahuta zarUrI hai.
sUraja ne pUre laMkA ko jalA diyA.
chAya aura makkhana pe.Da pe chaढ़e.
chUhe ne gusse meM hAthI ko kATA.
gIta gAte usakI sAMseM ruka gayI.
holI meM loga diyA jalAteM haiM.
parIkShA ke dina hI pa.DanA chAhie.
amarikA gaMgA meM baha gayI.
karnATaka ke mukhya maMtrI kerala meM kAma karate haiM.
rAjasthAna meM pAnI kI kamI nahI hai.
chennai meM bahuta ThanDa lagatI hai.
dakShiNa bhArata meM roTI khAyA jAtA hai.
aspatAla meM loga khAne jAte haiM.
kAma to rAta meM hI karanA chAhie.
jaMgala kA rAjA machChara hai.
chi.DiyAghara meM loga rahate haiM.
jhUTa kI hameshA jIta hotI hai.
baMdaroM kI bArisha ho rahI thI.
chamakate hue tAroM ke sAtha mata khelo.
achAra me kacharA nahI hai.
rAtoM rAta hamane ronA shuru kiyA.
kaue ke sira para sonA milatA hai.
adhyApaka gAjara kA halavA banAteM haiM.
rAta meM adraka meMDhaka bana jAtA hai.
dInA ne upajAU ko javAba diyA.
mukAma se Age zamIna Ane lagI.
saudA mahInA ho gayA thA.
pa.DhanA likhanA Apake Ane se khusha haiM.
hazAra lAlacha shaitAna kyoM na ho.
zamIna becha bAchakara abhilAShA paidA huI.
gItoM se milA homavarka khiDaqI kholI hai.
rasoI meM makAna vAlI sunA rahI hai.
hara roza kI taraha devayAnI nAma hai.
samaya ke sAtha kauna pareshAna karatA hai.
jAna nA pahachAna garma kaॉfI chAhie.
khi.DakI ne kamAla kara dikhAyA thA.
kRRipayA tho.DI dera bAda kheda hai.
chi.DiyA ke mana meM saba khelate haiM.
ghara meM pravesha karate hI AnaMda kA tyohAra hai.
banAnA bahuta AsAna jhaga.DAlU hU.N.
virodha ke lie bhIkha meM milI AshA.
bhAlU kI pU.NCha, barfa meM jamane lagI.
chIMTI ne kahA,billI nIche khisaka gaI.
billI mausI mitra bana jAo.
barasAta ke pAnI ko ThIka karanA hai.
merA kharagosha, kha.De kha.De hI sotA hai.
chUhe ne jaldI se jAla kutara DAlA.
mela jola se tuma saba sukhI rahoge.
chUhA ne dekhA ki sUraja nikala AyA hai.
kauA tezI se u.Dakara bila se bAhara gayA.
apane baragada ke pAsa pahu.Ncha kara hI dama lo.
chi.DiyoM ko ghoMsale banAne kA adhikAra hogA.
garu.Da Ama ke pe.Da kI ora AI.
kuCha dinoM meM usake paMkha nikala Aye.
maiM aura dAnA lene jAtI hU.N.
vaha jaise Atmamugdha sI rahatI thI.
apane meM bharIpUrI aura tuShTa thI.
uThatA dhuA.N koI kaise ChupAye.
kyoM aba dekha bhI nahIM sakatA kyA.
use Aja bhI vishvAsa nahIM hotA hai.
usane jaMtara maMtara saba kuCha chATa DAlA.
vaha vasaMta kI hariyAlI muskAna nahIM thI.
usakI AMkha bachAkara nikala sakatA hai.
kaMghI tumhAre bUte ke bAhara hai.
pe.Da Ishvara ke banAe hue haiM.
eka sAla meM hariyAlI ho gaI.
pe.Da paudhoM kI tulanA meM yaha bahuta ChoTA thA.
do gha.DI chaढ़ne para chamakIlI dhUpa nikalI.
tumane paudhoM ko zarA sA bhI maukA nahIM diyA.
yaha jAne binA yAtrA para nikala pa.De.
AvAza sunakara a.NdhA gho.DA pahuMcha jAtA.
bA.De ke mAlika isalie nahIM Cho.Da dete.
duniyA ke desha nazara A jAyeMge.
bhUmi para svarga ho na ho.

eka nadI ke kinAre eka jAmuna ke pe.Da para, eka bandara rahatA thA, jisakI mitratA, usa nadI meM rahane vAle magaramachCha ke sAtha ho gayI. vaha bandara, usa magaramachCha ko bhI khAne ke lie jAmuna detA rahatA thA. ekadina usa magaramachCha ne, kuCha jAmuna apanI patnI ko bhI khilAye. svAdiShTa jAmuna khAne ke bAda, usane yaha sochakara, ki rozAnA aise mIThe phala khAne vAle kA dila bhI khUba mIThA hogA, apane pati se, usa bandara kA dila lAne kI zidda kI. patnI ke hAthoM majabUra hue magaramachCha ne bhI, eka chAla chalI, aura bandara se kahA, ki usakI bhAbhI, use milanA chAhatI hai, isalie vaha usakI pITha para baiTha jAye, tAki surakShita usake ghara pahu.Ncha jAe. bandara bhI apane mitra kI bAta kA bharosA kara, pe.Da se nadI meM kUdA, aura usakI pITha para savAra ho gayA. jaba ve nadI ke bIchoM bIcha pahuMche, magaramachCha ne sochA, ki aba, bandara ko sahI bAta batAne meM koI hAni nahIM, aura usane bheda khola diyA, ki usakI patnI usakA dila khAnA chAhatI hai. bandara ko dhakkA to lagA, lekina usane apanA dhairya nahIM khoyA, aura tapAka se bolA, oha, tumane ye bAta mujhe pahale kyoM nahIM batAI, kyoMki, maiMne to apanA dila jAmuna ke pe.Da kI khokhala meM sambhAla kara rakhA hai. aba jaldI se mujhe vApisa nadI ke kinAre le chalo, tAki maiM apanA dila lAkara, apanI bhAbhI ko, upahAra meM dekara use khusha kara sakUM. mUrkha magaramachCha bandara ko jaise hI nadI kinAre le kara AyA, bandara ne zora se jAmuna ke pe.Da para ChalAMga lagAI, aura krodha meM bharakara bolA, are mUrkha, dila ke binA bhI kyA koI zindA raha sakatA hai? jA, Aja se terI merI dostI samApta.

mitro, bachapana meM paढ़I yaha kahAnI, Aja bhI musIbata ke kShaNoM meM, dhairya rakhane kI preraNA detI hai, tAki hama kaThina samaya kA DaTa kara mukAbalA kara sakeM. dUsare, mitratA kA sadaiva sammAna kareM.

eka bAra, do gadhe apanI pITha para bojhA uThAye chale jA rahe the, unako kAfI laMbA safara taya karanA thA. eka gadhe kI pITha para namaka kI bhArI boriyAM ladI huI thIM, to eka kI pITha para, rUI kI boriyAM ladI huI thIM.

jisa rAste se vo jA rahe the, usa bIcha meM, eka nadI pa.DI, nadI ke Upara, reta kI boriyoM kA kachchA pula banA huA thA. jisa gadhe kI pITha para namaka kI boriyAM thIM, usakA paira burI taraha se phisala gayA, aura vaha nadI ke aMdara gira pa.DA. nadI meM girate hI namaka pAnI meM ghula gayA, aura usakA vazana halkA ho gayA. vaha ye bAta ba.DI prasannatA se dusare ko batAne lagA. dusare gadhe ne sochA, ki yaha to baढ़iyA yukti hai, aise meM to maiM bhI apanA bhAra kAfI kama kara sakatA hU.N, aura usane binA soche samajhe pAnI meM ChalAMga lagA dI, kintu rUI ke pAnI sokha lene ke kAraNa, usakA bhAra kama hone kI jagaha bahuta baढ़ gayA, jisa kAraNa vaha murkha gadhA pAnI meM DUba gayA.

eka saMta yaha sArA kissA, apane shiShyoM ke sAtha dekha rahe the, unhoMne apane shiShyoM se kahA, manuShya ko sadA apanA viveka jAgRRita rakhanA chAhie, binA apanI buddhi lagAe, dUsaroM kI nakala kara vaisA hI karane vAle, sadA upahAsa ke pAtra banate haiM.

mitroM, hamArI asala jiMdagI meM bhI yahI bAta lAgU hotI hai, hama kisI ko eka kShetra meM saphala hote dekha, use kaॉpI karanA shurU kara dete haiM, hame lagatA hai, ki yadi koI baMdA apane kShetra meM saphala ho gayA, to hame bhI usa kShetra meM saphalatA mila jAyegI, lekina hama shAyada yaha dhyAna nahIM dete, ki usake pITha para namaka vAlI borI hai, matalaba, usakA iMTaresTa alaga hai, aura bhUlavasha hama rUI kI borI ko lAde ChalAMga lagA dete haiM, matalaba, dUsarA TaileMTa yA iMTaresTa ko lAde usa kShetra meM saphala hone kA khvAba dekhate hai, aura aMtataH, hameM paChatAnA pa.DatA hai. isalie, dUsaroM ko dekhakara sIkhanA ThIka hai, para unakA a.NdhA anusaraNa karanA, usa mUrkha gadhe ke samAna vyavahAra karanA hai.

bahuta samaya pahale kI bAta hai, sudUra dakShiNa meM, kisI pratApI rAjA kA rAjya thA. rAjA ke tIna putra the, eka dina rAjA ke mana meM AyA, ki putroM ko kuCha aisI shikShA dI jAye, ki samaya Ane para vo rAja kAja sambhAla sakeM. isI vichAra ke sAtha, rAjA ne sabhI putroM ko darabAra meM bulAyA, aura bolA, putroM, hamAre rAjya meM nAshapAtI kA koI vRRikSha nahIM hai, maiM chAhatA hU.N, tuma saba chAra chAra mahIne ke aMtarAla para, isa vRRikSha kI talAsha meM jAo, aura patA lagAo ki vo kaisA hotA hai? rAjA kI Aj~nA pA kara, tIno putra bArI bArI se gae, aura vApasa lauTa Aye.

sabhI putroM ke lauTa Ane para rAjA ne punaH sabhI ko darabAra meM bulAyA, aura usa pe.Da ke bAre meM batAne ko kahA. pahalA putra bolA, pitAjI, vaha pe.Da to bilakula Teढ़A meढ़A, aura sUkhA huA thA. nahIM nahIM, vo to bilakula harA bharA thA, lekina shAyada usame kuCha kamI thI, kyoMki usapara eka bhI phala nahIM lagA thA. dusare putra ne pahale ko bIcha meM hI rokate hue kahA. phira tIsarA putra bolA, bhaiyA, lagatA hai Apa bhI koI galata pe.Da dekha Aye, kyoMki maiMne sachamucha nAshapAtI kA pe.Da dekhA, vo bahuta hI shAnadAra thA, aura phaloM se ladA pa.DA thA. aura tIno putra apanI apanI bAta ko lekara Apasa meM vivAda karane lage, ki tabhI rAjA apane siMghAsana se uThe aura bole, putroM, tumhe Apasa meM bahasa karane kI koI AvashyakatA nahIM hai, daraasala tuma tIno hI vRRikSha kA sahI varNana kara rahe ho. maiMne jAnabUjha kara, tumhe alaga alaga mausama meM vRRikSha khojane bhejA thA, aura tumane jo dekhA, vo usa mausama ke anusAra thA.

maiM chAhatA hU.N, ki isa anubhava ke AdhAra para, tuma tInoM bAtoM ko gA.NTha bA.Ndha lo. pahalI, kisI chIza ke bAre meM sahI aura pUrNa jAnakArI chAhie, to tumhe use lambe samaya taka dekhanA parakhanA chAhie. phira chAhe vo koI viShaya ho, vastu ho, yA phira koI vyakti hI kyoM na ho. dUsarI, hara mausama eka sA nahIM hotA, jisa prakAra vRRikSha mausama ke anusAra sUkhatA, harA bharA, yA phaloM se ladA rahatA hai, usI prakAra, manuShaya ke jIvana meM bhI, utAra chaDhAva Ate rahate haiM, ataH, agara tuma kabhI bhI bure daura se guzara rahe ho, to apanI himmata aura dhairya banAye rakho, samaya avashya badalatA hai. aura tIsarI bAta, apanI bAta ko hI sahI mAna kara usa para a.De mata raho, apanA dimAga kholo, aura dUsaroM ke vichAroM ko bhI jAno. yaha saMsAra j~nAna se bharA pa.DA hai, chAha kara bhI, tuma akele sArA j~nAna arjita nahIM kara sakate, isalie, bhrama kI sthiti meM, kisI j~nAnI vyakti se salAha lene meM saMkocha mata karo.

eka naujavAna chItA, pahalI bAra shikAra karane nikalA. abhI vo kuCha Age hI baढ़A thA, ki eka laka.DabagghA use rokate hue bolA, are ChoTU, kahA.N jA rahe ho tuma? maiM to Aja pahalI bAra khuda se shikAra karane nikalA hU.N!, chItA romAMchita hote hue bolA. laka.DabagghA haMsA, abhI to tumhAre khelane kUdane ke dina haiM, tuma itane ChoTe ho, tumhe shikAra karane kA koI anubhava bhI nahIM hai, tuma kyA shikAra karoge! laka.Dabagghe kI bAta sunakara chItA udAsa ho gayA, dina bhara shikAra ke lie vo bemana idhara udhara ghUmatA rahA, kuCha eka prayAsa bhI kiye, para saphalatA nahIM milI, aura use bhUkhe peTa hI ghara lauTanA pa.DA.

agalI subaha, vo eka bAra phira shikAra ke lie nikalA. kuCha dUra jAne para, use eka bUढ़e bandara ne dekhA, aura pUChA, kahA.N jA rahe ho beTA? baMdara mAmA, maiM shikAra para jA rahA hU.N. chItA bolA. bahuta achChe, bandara bolA, tumhArI tAkata aura gati ke kAraNa, tuma eka behada kushala shikArI bana sakate ho, jAo, tumhe jalda hI saphalatA milegI. yaha suna chItA utsAha se bhara gayA, aura kuCha hI samaya meM, usane ChoTe hirana kA shikAra kara liyA.

mitroM, hamArI zindagI meM, shabda bahuta mAyane rakhate haiM. donoM hI dina chItA to vahI thA, usame vahI phUrti aura vahI tAkata thI, para jisa dina use Diskareja kiyA gayA, vo asaphala ho gayA, aura jisa dina, enakareja kiyA gayA, vo saphala ho gayA.

eka sarovara me.N tIna divya maChaliyA.N rahatI thI.N. vahA.N kI tamAma maChaliyA.N, una tIno.N ke prati hI, shradhdA me.N ba.NTI huI thI.N. eka maChalI kA nAma, vyAvahArikabuddhi thA, dUsarI kA nAma, madhyamabuddhi, aura tIsarI kA nAma, atibuddhi thA. atibuddhi ke pAsa, j~nAna kA asIma bhaMDAra thA. vaha sabhI prakAra ke shAstro.N kA j~nAna rakhatI thI. madhyamabuddhi ko utanI hI dUra taka sochane.N kI Adata thI, jisase usakA vAstA pa.DatA thA. vaha sochatI kama thI, paraMparAgata DhaMga se apanA kAma kiyA karatI thI. vyavahArika buddhi, na paraMparA para dhyAna detI thI, aura na hI shAstra para. use jaba jaisI AvashyakatA hotI thI, nirNaya liyA karatI thI, aura AvashyakatA na pa.Dane.N para, kisI shAstra ke panne taka nahI.N ulaTatI thI.

eka dina kuCha maChuAre, sarovara ke taTa para Aye, aura maChaliyo.N kI bahutAyata dekhakara, bAte.N karane.N lage, ki yahA.N kAfI maChaliyA.N hai.N, subaha Akara, hama isame.N jAla DAle.Nge. unakI bAte.N maChaliyo.N ne.N sunI.N. vyavahArika buddhi ne.N kahA, hame.N faurana yaha tAlAba Cho.Da denA chAhie. patale soto.N kA mArga paka.Dakara, udhara jaMgalI ghAsa se Dhake hue jaMgalI sarovara me.N chale jAnA chAhiye. madhyamabuddhi ne.N kahA, prAchIna kAla se hamAre pUrvaja, ThaNDa ke dino.N me.N hI vahA.N jAte hai.N, aura abhI to vo mausama hI nahI.N AyA hai, hama hamAre varSho.N se chalI A rahI isa paraMparA ko nahI.N to.Da sakate. maChuAro.N kA khatarA ho yA na ho, hame.N isa paraMparA kA dhyAna rakhanA hai.

atibuddhi ne.N garva se ha.Nsate hue kahA, tuma loga aj~nAnI ho, tumhe.N shAstro.N kA j~nAna nahI.N hai. jo bAdala garajate hai.N, ve barasate nahI.N hai.N. phira hama loga eka hazAra tarIko.N se tairanA jAnate hai.N, pAnI ke tala me.N jAkara baiThane.N kI sAmarthyatA hai, hamAre pUMCha me.N itanI shakti hai, ki hama jAlo.N ko phA.Da sakatI hai.N. vaise bhI kahA gayA hai, ki sa.NkaTo.N se ghere hue ho, to bhI apane.N ghara ko Cho.Dakara paradesha chale jAnA achChI bAta nahI.N hai. avvala to ve maChuAre Aye.Nge nahI.N, Aye.Nge, to hama tairakara nIche baiTha jAye.NgI, unake jAla me.N Aye.Nge hI nahI.N, eka do pha.Nsa bhI gaI.N, to pu.NCha se jAla phA.Dakara nikala jAyeMge. bhAI! shAstro.N aura j~nAniyo.N ke vachano.N ke virUdhda, mai.N to nahI.N jAU.NgI. vyavahArikabuddhi ne.N kahA, mai.N shAstro.N ke bAre me.N nahI.N jAnatI, magara merI buddhi kahatI hai, ki manuShya jaise tAkatavara aura bhayAnaka shatru kI AshaMkA sira para ho, to bhAgakara kahI.N Chupa jAo. aisA kahate hue, vaha apane.N anuyAyioM ko lekara chala pa.DI.

madhyamabuddhi aura atibuddhi, apane.N para.NparA aura shAstra j~nAna ko lekara vahI.N rUka gayIM. agale dina, maChuAro.N ne.N pUrI taiyArI ke sAtha Akara vahA.N jAla DAlA, aura una dono.N kI eka na chalI. jaba maChuAre unake vishAla sharIra ko TAMga rahe the, taba vyavahArikabuddhi ne.N gaharI sA.Nsa lekara kahA, inake shAstra j~nAna ne.N hI dhokhA diyA. kAsha! iname.N tho.DI vyavahArika buddhi bhI hotI.

vyavahArika buddhi se hamArA Ashaya hai, ki kisa samaya meM hame.N kyA karanA chAhie, aura jo hama kara rahe hai.N, usa kArya kA pariNAma nikalane.N para, kyA samasyAye.N A sakatI hai.N, yaha sochanA hI, vyavahArika buddhi hai. bolachAla kI bhAShA meM, hama ise kaॉmana seMsa bhI kahate haiM, aura bhale hI hama ba.De j~nAnI nA hoM, moTI moTI kitAbeM nA paढ़IM hoM, lekina hama apanI vyvayahArika buddhi se, kisI paristhiti kA sAmanA AsAnI se kara sakate haiM.

eka bAra kI bAta hai, ki eka samRRiddha vyApArI, jo sadaiva apane gurU se parAmarsha karake kuCha na kuCha sukarma kiyA karatA thA, guru se bolA, gurudeva, dhanArjana hetu maiM apanA gA.Nva pIChe zarUra Cho.Da AyA hU.N, para hara samaya mujhe lagatA rahatA hai, ki vahA.N para eka aisA devAlaya banAyA jAye, jisameM devapUjana ke sAtha sAtha, bhojana kI bhI vyavasthA ho, achChe saMskAroM se logoM ko susaMskRRita kiyA jAye, asharaNa ko sharaNa mile, vastrahIna kA tana Dhake, rogiyoM ko davA aura chikitsA mile, bachche apane dharma ke vAstavika svarUpa se avagata ho sakeM. sunate hI guru prasannatApUrvaka bole, kevala gA.Nva meM hI kyoM, tuma aisA hI eka maMdira, apane isa nagara meM bhI banavAo. vyApArI ko sujhAva pasaMda AyA, aura usane do maMdira, eka apane gA.Nva, aura dUsarA apane nagara meM, jahA.N vaha apane parivAra ke sAtha rahatA thA, banavA die. donoM devAlaya shIghra hI logoM kI shraddhA ke keMdra bana gaye. lekina kuCha dina hI bIte the, ki vyApArI ne dekhA, ki nagara ke loga gA.Nva ke mandira meM Ane lage haiM, jabaki vahA.N pahu.Nchane kA rAstA kAfI kaThina hai. usakI samajha meM nahIM A rahA thA, ki aisA kyoM ho rahA hai?

kuCha bhArI mana se vaha guru jI ke pAsa gayA, aura sArA vRRittAMta kaha sunAyA. guru jI ne kuCha vichAra kiyA, aura phira use yaha parAmarsha diyA, ki vaha gA.Nva ke maMdira ke pujArI ko, nagara ke mandira meM sevA ke lie bulA le. usane aisA hI kiyA,  nagara ke pujArI ko gA.Nva, aura gA.Nva ke pujArI ko nagara meM sevA para niyukta kara diyA. kuCha hI dina bIte the, ki vaha yaha dekhakara stabdha raha gayA, ki aba gA.Nva ke loga nagara ke mandira kI ora rukha karane lage haiM. aba to use hairAnI ke sAtha sAtha pareshAnI bhI anubhava hone lagI. binA eka kShaNa kI derI ke, vaha gurujI ke pAsa jA kara hAtha jo.Da kara kahane lagA, ApakI Aj~nAnusAra maiMne donoM pujAriyoM kA sthAnAMtaraNa kiyA, lekina samasyA to pahale se bhI gambhIra ho chalI hai, ki aba to mere gA.Nva ke parichita aura parijana, kaShTa sahakara aura kirAyA bhA.DA kharcha karake, nagara ke devAlaya meM Ane lage haiM. mujhase yaha nahIM dekhA jAtA.

vyApArI kI bAta sunate hI guru jI sArI bAta samajha gaye, aura bole, hairAnI aura pareshAnI Cho.Do. daraasala, jo gA.Nva vAle pujArI haiM, unakA achChA svabhAva hI hai, jo loga usI devAlaya meM jAnA chAhate haiM, jahA.N ve hote haiM. unakA logoM se niHsvArtha prema, unake duHkha se dukhI honA, unake sukha meM prasanna honA, unase mitratA kA vyavahAra karanA hI, logoM ko unakI aura AkarShita karatA hai, aura loga svataH hI, unakI aura khiMche chale Ate haiM. aba sArI bAta vyApArI kI samajha meM A chukI thI.

mitroM, hameM bhI yaha bAta achChe se samajhanI chAhie, ki hamArA vyaktitva, hamAre bAharI raMga rUpa se nahIM, hamAre vyavahAra se nirdhArita hotA hai, bilakula eka samAna j~nAna aura vesha bhUShA vAle do pujAriyoM meM, loga kaShTa saha kara bhI usI ke pAsa gae, jo adhika saMvedanashIla aura vyavahArI thA. isI taraha, hama chAhe jisa kArya kShetra se ju.De hoM, hamArI saphalatA meM hamAre vyavahAra kA bahuta ba.DA yogadAna hotA hai. hama sabhI ko isa parama satya kA bodha honA chAhie, ki isa dharatI para, mAtra apane lie hI nahIM Aye haiM, hameM apane sukha duHkha kI chiMtA ke sAtha sAtha, dUsaroM ke dukha sukha ko zarUra bAMTanA chAhie, unase mitratApUrNa vyavahAra karanA chAhie, tAki hama jahA.N para upasthita hoM, vahA.N para svataH hI, eka achChA vAtAvaraNa banA rahe, aura sakArAtmakatA kI taraMgoM se, hamarA jIvana sAgara lahalahAtA rahe .

bahuta samaya pahale kI bAta hai, himAlaya ke jaMgaloM meM eka bahuta tAkatavara shera rahatA thA. eka dina, usane bArAsiMghe kA shikAra kiyA, aura khAne ke bAda apanI guphA ko lauTane lagA. abhI usane chalanA shurU hI kiyA thA, ki eka siyAra usake sAmane daMDavata karatA huA, usake guNagAna karane lagA. use dekha shera ne pUChA, are! tuma ye kyA kara rahe ho?
he jaMgala ke rAjA, maiM ApakA sevaka bana kara apanA jIvana dhanya karanA chAhatA hU.N, kRRipayA mujhe apanI sharaNa meM le lIjiye, aura apanI sevA karane kA avasara pradAna kIjiye, siyAra bolA.

shera jAnatA thA, ki siyAra kA asala makasada usake dvArA Cho.DA gayA shikAra khAnA hai, para usane sochA, ki chalo isake sAtha rahane se mere kyA jAtA hai, nahIM kuCha to, ChoTe moTe kAma hI kara diyA karegA. aura usane siyAra ko, apane sAtha rahane kI anumati de dI.

usa dina ke bAda se, jaba bhI shera shikAra karatA, siyAra bhI bhara peTa bhojana karatA. samaya bItatA gayA, aura roza mAMsAhAra karane se siyAra kI tAkata bhI ba.Dha gayI, isI ghamaMDa meM, aba vo jaMgala ke bAkI jAnavaroM para rauba bhI jhA.Dane lagA. aura eka dina to usane hadda hI kara dI.

usane shera se kahA, Aja tuma ArAma karo, shikAra maiM karU.NgA, aura tuma merA Cho.DA huA mAMsa khAoge. shera ye suna kara bahuta krodhita huA, para usane apane krodha para kAbU karate hue, siyAra ko sabaka sikhAnA chAhA. shera bolA, ye to ba.DI achChI bAta hai, Aja mujhe bhaiMsA khAne kA mana hai, tuma usI kA shikAra karo! siyAra turaMta bhaiMsoM ke jhuNDa kI tarafa nikala pa.DA, aura dau.Date hue eka ba.De se bhaiMse para jhapaTA, bhaiMsA satarka thA, usane turaMta apanI sIMgha ghumAI, aura siyAra ko dUra jhaTaka diyA. siyAra kI kamara TUTa gayI, aura vo kisI taraha ghisaTate hue shera ke pAsa vApasa pahuMchA.
kyA huA, bhaiMsA kahA.N hai? shera bolA.
huzUra, mujhe kShamA kIjiye, maiM bahaka gayA thA, aura khuda ko Apake barAbara samajhane lagA thA, siyAra giDagiDAte hue bolA.

dhUrta, tere jaise ehasAna farAmosha kA yahI hasra hotA hai, maiMne tere Upara dayA kara ke tujhe apane sAtha rakhA, aura tU mere Upara hI dhauMsa jamAne lagA, aura aisA kahate hue, shera ne apane eka hI prahAra se, siyAra ko Dhera kara diyA.

kisI ke kiye gae upakAra ko bhUla use hI nIchA dikhAne vAle logoM kA, vahI hasra hotA hai, jo isa kahAnI meM siyAra kA huA. hameM hameshA, apanI vartamAna yogyatAoM kA sahI AMkalana karanA chAhie, aura ghamaMDa meM Akara, kisI taraha kA mUrkhatApUrNa kArya nahIM karanA chAhie.

kisI shahara meM do bhAI rahate the. uname se eka shahara kA sabase ba.DA bizanesamaina thA, to dUsarA eka Draga eDikTa thA, jo aksara nashe kI hAlata meM logoM se mAra pITa kiyA karatA thA. jaba loga inake bAre meM jAnate, to bahuta Ashcharya karate, ki Akhira donoM meM itanA aMtara kyoM hai, jabaki donoM, eka hI mAtA pitA kI saMtAne haiM, eka jaisI shikShA prApta haiM, aura bilakula eka jaise mAhaula meM pale baDhe haiM. kuCha logoM ne isa bAta kA patA lagAne kA nishchaya kiyA, aura shAma ko bhAiyoM ke ghara pahuMche.

andara ghusate hI, unheM nashe meM dhuta eka vyakti dikhA, ve usake pAsa gae aura pUChA, bhAI, tuma aise kyoM o?. tuma bevajaha logoM se la.DAI jhagaDA karate ho, nashe meM dhuta apane bIvI bachchoM ko pITate ho, Akhira ye saba karane kI vajaha kyA hai?
mere pitA, bhAI ne uttara diyA.
pitA! vo kaise? logoM ne pUChA
bhAI bolA, mere pitA sharAbI the, ve aksara merI mA.N aura hama donoM bhAiyoM ko pITA karate the. bhalA tuma loga mujhase aura kyA ummIda kara sakate ho. maiM bhI vaisA hI hU.N.

phira ve loga dUsare bhAI ke pAsa gae, vo apane kAma meM vyasta thA, aura tho.DI dera bAda unase milane AyA. mAfa kIjiyegA, mujhe Ane meM tho.DI dera ho gayI. batAie, maiM ApakI kyA madada kara sakatA hU.N?
logoM ne isa bhAI se bhI vahI prashna kiyA, Apa itane sammAnita bizanesamaina haiM, ApakI hara jagaha pUCha hai, sabhI ApakI prashaMsA karate haiM, Akhira ApakI ina upalabdhiyoM kI vajaha kyA hai?
mere pitA, uttara AyA.
logoM ne Ashcharya se pUChA, bhalA vo kaise?

mere pitA sharAbI the, nashe meM, vo hameM mArA pITA karate the, maiM ye saba chupa chApa dekhA karatA thA, aura tabhI maiMne nishchaya kara liyA thA, kI maiM aisA bilakula nahIM bananA chAhatA. mujhe to eka sabhya, sammAnita aura ba.DA AdamI bananA hai, aura maiM vahI banA. bhAI ne apanI bAta pUrI kI.

baMdaroM kA saradAra apane bachche ke sAtha, kisI ba.De se pe.Da kI DAlI para baiThA huA thA. bachchA bolA, mujhe bhUkha lagI hai, kyA Apa mujhe khAne ke lie kuCha pattiyAM de sakate haiM? bandara muskurAyA, maiM de to sakatA hU.N, para achChA hogA, tuma khuda hI apane lie pattiyAM to.Da lo. lekina mujhe achChI pattiyoM kI pahachAna nahIM hai, bachchA udAsa hote hue bolA. tumhAre pAsa eka vikalpa hai, bandara bolA, isa pe.Da ko dekho, tuma chAho to nIche kI DAliyoM se purAnI ka.DI pattiyAM chuna sakate ho, yA Upara kI patalI DAliyoM para ugI tAzI narama pattiyAM to.Da kara khA sakate ho. bachchA bolA, ye ThIka nahIM hai, bhalA ye achChI achChI pattiyAM nIche kyoM nahIM uga sakatIM, tAki sabhI loga AsAnI se unheM khA sakeM? yahI to bAta hai, agara ve sabake pahu.Ncha meM hotIM, to unakI upalabdhatA kahA.N ho pAtI. unake baढ़ne se pahale hI unheM to.Da kara khA liyA jAtA, bandara ne samajhAyA. lekina ina patalI DAliyoM para chaढ़nA khataranAka ho sakatA hai, DAla TUTa sakatI hai, merA pA.Nva phisala sakatA hai, maiM nIche gira kara choTila ho sakatA hU.N, bachche ne apanI chiMtA jatAI. bandara bolA, suno beTA, eka bAta hameshA yAda rakho, hama apane dimAga meM khatare kI jo tasvIra banAte haiM, aksara khatarA usase kahIM kama hotA hai. para aisA hai to hara eka bandara una DAliyoM se tAzI pattiyAM to.Dakara kyoM nahIM khAtA? bachche ne pUChA. bandara kuCha socha kara bolA, kyoMki, zyAdAtara baMdaroM ko Dara kara jIne kI Adata pa.Da chukI hotI hai, ve sa.DI galI pattiyAM khAkara usakI shikAyata karanA pasaMda karate haiM, para kabhI khatarA uThA kara vo pAne kI koshisha nahIM karate, jo vo sachamucha pAnA chAhate haiM. para tuma aisA mata karanA, ye jaMgala tamAma sambhAvanAoM se bharA huA hai, apane Dara ko jIto, aura jAo, aisI zindagI jiyo, jo tuma sachamucha jInA chAhate ho! bachchA samajha chukA thA, ki use kyA karanA hai, usane turaMta hI apane Dara ko pIChe Cho.DA, aura tAzI narama pattiyoM se apanI bhUkha miTAI.

ajaya rAjasthAna ke kisI shahara meM rahatA thA. vo grejueTa thA, aura eka prAiveTa kaMpanI meM jaॉba karatA thA. para vo apanI zindagI se khusha nahIM thA. hara samaya, vo kisI na kisI samasyA se pareshAna rahatA thA, aura usI ke bAre meM sochatA rahatA thA.

eka bAra ajaya ke shahara se kuCha dUrI para, eka fakIra bAbA kA kAfilA rukA huA thA. shahara meM chAroM aura unhI kI charchA thI, bahuta se loga apanI samasyAeM lekara unake pAsa pahu.Nchane lage, ajaya ko bhI isa bAre meM patA chalA, aura usane bhI fakIra bAbA ke darshana karane kA nishchaya kiyA.
ChuTTI ke dina, subaha subaha hI, ajaya unake kAfile taka pahuMchA. vahAM saika.DoM logoM kI bhI.Da juTI huI thI, bahuta iMtazAra ke bAda ajaya kA naMbara AyA.

vo bAbA se bolA, bAbA, maiM apane jIvana se bahuta dukhI hU.N, hara samaya, samasyAeM mujhe gherI rahatI haiM, kabhI ऑfisa kI TeMshana rahatI hai, to kabhI ghara para anabana ho jAtI hai, aura kabhI apane sehata ko lekara pareshAna rahatA hU.N. bAbA koI aisA upAya batAiye, ki mere jIvana se sabhI samasyAeM Katma ho jAeM, aura maiM chaina se jI sakU.N?
bAbA muskurAye aura bole, putra, Aja bahuta derI ho gayI hai, maiM tumhAre prashna kA uttara kala subaha dUMgA, lekina kyA tuma merA eka ChoTA sA kAma karoge?
zarUra karU.NgA, ajaya utsAha ke sAtha bolA.

dekho beTA, hamAre kAfile meM sau UMTa haiM, aura inakI dekhabhAla karane vAlA Aja bImAra pa.Da gayA hai. maiM chAhatA hU.N ki Aja rAta, tuma inakA khayAla rakho, aura jaba sau ke sau UMTa baiTha jAeM, to tuma bhI so jAnA, aisA kahate hue bAbA apane tambU meM chale gae.
agalI subaha bAbA ajaya se mile, aura pUChA, kaho beTA, nIMda achChI AI.
kahA.N bAbA, maiM to eka pala bhI nahIM so pAyA, maiMne bahuta koshisha kI, para maiM sabhI UMToM ko nahIM baiThA pAyA, koI na koI UMTa kha.DA ho hI jAtA! ajaya dukhI hote hue bolA.
maiM jAnatA thA yahI hogA. Aja taka kabhI aisA nahIM huA hai ki ye sAre UMTa eka sAtha baiTha jAeM, bAbA bole.
ajaya nArAzagI ke svara meM bolA, to phira, Apane mujhe aisA karane ko kyoM kahA.

bAbA bole, beTA, kala rAta tumane kyA anubhava kiyA, yahI nA, ki chAhe kitanI bhI koshisha kara lo, sAre UMTa eka sAtha nahIM baiTha sakate. tuma eka ko baiThAoge, to kahIM aura koI dUsarA kha.DA ho jAegA. isI taraha, tuma eka samasyA kA samAdhAna karoge, to kisI kAraNavasha, dUsarI kha.DI ho jAegI. putra jaba taka jIvana hai, ye samasyAeM to banI hI rahatI haiM, kabhI kama, to kabhI jyAdA.
to hameM kyA karanA chAhie, ajaya ne jij~nAsAvasha pUChA.

ina samasyAoM ke bAvajUda, jIvana kA AnaMda lenA sIkho. kala rAta kyA huA, kaI UMTa rAta hote hote khuda hI baiTha gae, kaI tumane apane prayAsa se baiThA die, para bahuta se UMTa tumhAre prayAsa ke bAda bhI nahIM baiThe. aura jaba bAda meM tumane dekhA, to pAyA, ki tumhAre jAne ke bAda, uname se kuCha khuda hI baiTha gae. kuCha samajhe. samasyAeM bhI aisI hI hotI haiM, kuCha to apane Apa hI Katma ho jAtI haiM, kuCha ko tuma apane prayAsa se hala kara lete ho, aura kuCha, tumhAre bahuta koshisha karane para bhI hala nahIM hotIM. aisI samasyAoM ko samaya para Cho.Da do. uchita samaya para, ve khuda hI Katma ho jAtI haiM. aura jaisA ki maiMne pahale kahA, jIvana hai, to kuCha samasyAeM raheMgI hI raheMgI. para isakA ye matalaba nahIM, kI tuma dina rAta unhI ke bAre meM sochate raho. aisA hotA, to UMToM kI dekhabhAla karane vAlA kabhI so nahIM pAtA. samasyAoM ko eka tarafa rakho, aura jIvana kA AnaMda lo. chaina kI nIMda so. jaba unakA samaya AegA, vo khuda hI hala ho jAe.NgI. putra, Ishvara ke die hue AshIrvAda ke lie, use dhanyavAda karanA sIkho, pI.DAeM khuda hI kama ho jAeMgI, fakIra bAbA ne apanI bAta pUrI kI.

bahuta samaya pahale kI bAta hai, kisI gAvaM meM, ChaH aMdhe AdamI rahate the. eka dina gA.Nva vAloM ne unheM batAyA, are, Aja gAva.N meM hAthI AyA hai. unhoMne Aja taka basa hAthiyoM ke bAre meM sunA thA, para kabhI ChU kara mahasUsa nahIM kiyA thA. unhoMne nishchaya kiyA, bhale hI hama hAthI ko dekha nahIM sakate, para Aja hama saba chala kara, use mahasUsa to kara sakate haiM nA? aura phira vo saba usa jagaha kI tarafa ba.Dha chale, jahA.N hAthI AyA huA thA. sabhI ne hAthI ko ChUnA shurU kiyA.
maiM samajha gayA, hAthI eka khambhe kI taraha hotA hai, pahale vyakti ne hAthI kA paira ChUte hue kahA.
are nahIM, hAthI to rassI kI taraha hotA hai. dUsare vyakti ne pU.NCha paka.Date hue kahA.
maiM batAtA hU.N, ye to pe.Da ke tane kI taraha hai, tIsare vyakti ne sUM.Dha paka.Date hue kahA.
tuma loga kyA bAta kara rahe ho, hAthI eka ba.De hAtha ke paMkhe kI taraha hotA hai, chauthe vyakti ne kAna ChUte hue sabhI ko samajhAyA.
nahIM nahIM, ye to eka dIvAra kI taraha hai, pAMchave vyakti ne peTa para hAtha rakhate hue kahA.
aisA nahIM hai, hAthI to eka kaThora nalI kI taraha hotA hai, ChaThe vyakti ne apanI bAta rakhI.
aura phira sabhI Apasa meM bahasa karane lage, aura khuda ko sahI sAbita karane meM laga gae. unakI bahasa teza hotI gayI, aura aisA lagane lagA, mAno vo Apasa meM la.Da hI pa.DeMge.

tabhI vahAM se eka buddhimAna vyakti guzara rahA thA. vo rukA, aura unase pUChA, kyA bAta hai, tuma saba Apasa meM jhaga.Da kyoM rahe ho? hama ye nahIM taya kara pA rahe haiM ki Akhira hAthI dIkhatA kaisA hai, unhoMne uttara diyA. aura phira, bArI bArI se, unhoMne apanI bAta usa vyakti ko samajhAI. buddhimAna vyakti ne sabhI kI bAta shAMti se sunI, aura bolA, tuma saba apanI apanI jagaha sahI ho. tumhAre varNana meM aMtara isalie hai,  kyoMki tuma sabane, hAthI ke alaga alaga bhAga Chue haiM, para dekhA jAe, to tuma logo ne jo kuCha bhI batAyA, vo sabhI bAte, hAthI ke varNana ke lie sahI baiThatI haiM. achChA! aisA hai. sabhI ne eka sAtha uttara diyA. usake bAda koI vivAda nahIM huA, aura sabhI khusha ho gae, ki vo sabhI sacha kaha rahe the.

dostoM, kaI bAra aisA hotA hai, ki hama apanI bAta ko lekara a.Da jAte haiM, ki hama hI sahI haiM, aura bAkI saba galata hai. lekina ye saMbhava hai, ki hameM sikke kA eka hI pahalu dikha rahA ho, aura usake AlAvA bhI kuCha aise tathya hoM, jo sahI hoM. isalie hameM apanI bAta to rakhanI chAhie, para dUsaroM kI bAta bhI, sabra se sunanI chAhie, aura kabhI bhI,  bekAra kI bahasa meM nahIM pa.DanA chAhie. vedoM meM bhI kahA gayA hai, ki eka satya ko, kaI tarIke se batAyA jA sakatA hai. to, jaba agalI bAra Apa aisI kisI bahasa meM pa.DeM, to yAda kara lIjiyegA, ki kahIM aisA to nahIM, ki Apake hAtha meM sirfa pU.NCha hai, aura bAkI hisse kisI aura ke pAsa haiM.

eka bauddha bhikShuka, bhojana banAne ke lie jaMgala se laka.DiyA.N chuna rahA thA, ki tabhI usane, kuCha anokhA dekhA, kitanA ajIba hai ye, usane binA pairoM kI loma.DI ko dekhate hue mana hI mana sochA. Akhira isa hAlata meM ye jiMdA kaise hai? use Ashacharya huA, aura Upara se ye bilakula svastha hai.

vaha apane KayAloM meM khoyA huA thA, kI achAnaka chAro tarafa afarA tafarI machane lagI. jaMgala kA rajA shera usa tarafa A rahA thA. bhikShuka bhI tezI dikhAte hue eka U.Nche pe.Da para cha.Dha gayA, aura vahI.N se saba kuCha dekhane lagA.

shera ne eka hirana kA shikAra kiyA thA, aura use apane jaba.De meM dabA kara, loma.DI kI tarafa ba.Dha rahA thA, para usane loma.DI para hamalA nahIM kiyA, balki use bhI khAne ke lie, mAMsa ke kuCha Tuka.De DAla die.

ye to ghora Ashcharya hai, shera loma.DI ko mArane kI bajAye, use bhojana de rahA hai, bhikShuka budabudAyA. use apanI A.NkhoM para bharosA nahIM ho rahA thA, isalie, vaha agale dina phira vahI.N AyA, aura Chipa kara, shera kA iMtazAra karane lagA. Aja bhI vaisA hI huA, shera ne apane shikAra kA kuCha hissA, loma.DI ke sAmane DAla diyA.

yaha bhagavAn ke hone kA pramANa hai! bhikShuka ne apane Apa se kahA. vaha jise paidA karatA hai, usakI roTI kA bhI iMtazAma kara detA hai, Aja se isa loma.DI kI taraha, maiM bhI Upara vAle kI dayA para jIUMgA, ishvara mere bhI bhojana kI vyavasthA karegA. aura aisA sochate hue, vaha eka vIrAna jagaha para jAkara eka pe.Da ke nIche baiTha gayA.

pahalA dina bItA, para koI vahAM nahIM AyA, dUsare dina bhI, kuCha loga udhara se guzara gae, para bhikShuka kI tarafa kisI ne dhyAna nahIM diyA. idhara binA kuCha khAe pIye, vaha kamazora hotA jA rahA thA. isI taraha, kuCha aura dina bIta gae, aba to usakI rahI sahI tAkata bhI khatma ho gayI. vaha chalane phirane ke lAyaka bhI nahIM rahA. usakI hAlata, bilakula mRRita vyakti kI taraha ho chukI thI, kI tabhI eka mahAtmA udhara se guzare, aura bhikShuka ke pAsa pahuMche. usane apanI sArI kahAnI mahAtmA jI ko sunAI, aura bolA, aba Apa hI batAie, ki bhagavAn itanA nirdayI kaise ho sakate haiM, kyA kisI vyakti ko isa hAlata meM pahuMchAnA pApa nahIM hai? bilkula hai, mahAtmA jI ne kahA. lekina tuma itanA mUrkha kaise ho sakate ho? tuma ye kyoM nahIM samajhe, ki bhagavAn tumhe use shera kI taraha banate dekhanA chAhate the, loma.DI kI taraha nahIM!

dostoM, hamAre jIvana meM bhI aisA kaI bAra hotA hai, ki hameM chIzeM, jisa taraha samajhanI chAhie, usake viparIta samajha lete haiM. Ishvara ne hama sabhI ke andara, kuCha na kuCha aisI shaktiyAM dI haiM, jo hameM mahAna banA sakatI haiM, zarurata haiM, ki hama unheM pahachAne. usa bhikShuka kA saubhAgya thA, kI use usakI galatI kA ahasAsa karAne ke lie mahAtmA jI mila gae. para hameM khuda bhI chaukannA rahanA chAhie, kI kahIM hama shera kI jagaha, loma.DI to nahIM bana rahe haiM.

eka AdamI hameshA kI taraha, apane nAI kI dUkAna para bAla kaTavAne gayA. bAla kaTAte vaqta, aksara desha duniyA kI bAteM huA karatI thIM. Aja bhI ve sinemA, rAjanIti, aura khela jagata ityAdi ke bAre meM bAta kara rahe the, ki achAnaka bhagavAn ke astitva ko lekara bAta hone lagI.
nAI ne kahA, dekhiye bhaiyA, ApakI taraha maiM bhagavAn ke astitva meM yakIna nahIM rakhatA.
tuma aisA kyoM kahate ho? AdamI ne pUChA.

are, ye samajhanA bahuta AsAna hai, basa galI meM jAie, aura Apa samajha jAyeMge ki bhagavAn nahIM hai. Apa hI batAie, ki agara bhagavAn hote, to kyA itane loga bImAra hote? itane bachche anAtha hote? agara bhagavAn hote, to kisI ko koI darda koI takalIfa nahIM hotI, nAI ne bolanA jArI rakhA, maiM aise bhagavAna ke bAre meM nahIM socha sakatA, jo ina saba chIzoM ko hone de. Apa hI batAie, kahA.N hai bhagavAna?
AdamI eka kShaNa ke lie rukA, kuCha sochA, para bahasa baDhe nA, isalie chupa hI rahA.

nAI ne apanA kAma Katma kiyA, aura AdamI kuCha sochate hue, dukAna se bAhara nikalA, aura kuCha dUra jAkara kha.DA ho gayA. kuCha dera iMtazAra karane ke bAda,  use eka lambI dA.DhI mUCha vAlA adhe.Da vyakti, usa tarafa AtA dikhAI pa.DA. use dekhakara, lagatA thA mAno, vo kitane dinoM se nahAyA dhoyA nA ho.
AdamI turaMta nAI ki dukAna meM vApasa ghusa gayA, aura bolA, jAnate ho,  isa duniyA meM nAI nahIM hote!
bhalA kaise nahIM hote haiM? nAI ne savAla kiyA, maiM sAkShAta tumhAre sAmane hU.N!
nahIM, AdamI ne kahA, vo nahIM hote haiM, varanA kisI kI bhI lambI dA.DhI mUCha nahIM hotI. para vo dekho, sAmane usa AdamI kI kitanI lambI dA.DhI mUCha hai!
are nahIM bhAIsAhaba, nAI hote haiM, lekina bahuta se loga hamAre pAsa nahIM Ate, nAI bolA.

bilakula sahI, AdamI ne nAI ko rokate hue kahA, yahI to bAta hai. bhagavAna bhI hote haiM, para loga unake pAsa nahIM jAte, aura nA hI unheM khojane kA prayAsa karate haiM, isIlie duniyA meM itanA duHkha darda hai.

haMsoM kA eka jhuNDa, samudra taTa ke Upara se guzara rahA thA. usI jagaha eka kauvA bhI mauja mastI kara rahA thA. usane haMsoM ko upekShA bharI nazaroM se dekhA. tuma loga kitanI achChI u.DAna bhara lete ho! kauvA mazAka ke lahaje meM bolA, tuma loga aura kara hI kyA sakate ho, basa apanA paMkha pha.Dapha.DA kara u.DAna bhara sakate ho! kyA tuma merI taraha phUrtI se u.Da sakate ho? merI taraha havA meM kalAbAziyAM dikhA sakate ho? nahIM, tuma to ThIka se jAnate bhI nahIM, ki u.DanA kise kahate haiM!
kauve kI bAta sunakara eka vRRiddha haMsa bolA, ye achChI bAta hai, ki tuma ye saba kara lete ho, lekina tumhe isa bAta para ghamaMDa nahIM karanA chAhie.
maiM ghamaMDa vamaMDa nahIM jAnatA, agara tuma meM se koI bhI merA mukAbalA kara sakata hai, to sAmane Aye, aura mujhe harA kara dikhAe.

eka yuvA nara haMsa ne kauve kI chunautI svIkAra kara lI. yaha taya huA, ki pratiyogitA, do charaNoM meM hogI, pahale charaNa meM, kauvA apane karataba dikhAyegA, aura haMsa ko bhI vahI karake dikhAnA hogA, aura dUsare charaNa meM, kauve ko haMsa ke karataba doharAne hoMge.

pratiyogitA shurU huI, pahale charaNa kI shuruAta kauve ne kI, aura eka se ba.Dhakara eka kalAbAziyAM dikhAne lagA, vaha kabhI gola gola chakkara khAtA, to kabhI zamIna ChUte hue Upara u.Da jAtA. vahI.N haMsa usake mukAbale kuCha KAsa nahIM kara pAyA. kauvA, aba aura bhI ba.Dha cha.Dha kara bolane lagA, maiM to pahale hI kaha rahA thA, ki tuma logoM ko aura kuCha bhI nahIM AtA.

phira dUsarA charaNa shurU huA, haMsa ne u.DAna bharI, aura samudra kI tarafa u.Dane lagA. kauvA bhI usake pIChe ho liyA, ye kauna sA kamAla dikhA rahe ho, bhalA sIdhe sIdhe u.DanA bhI koI chunautI hai? sacha meM tuma mUrkha ho, kauvA bolA.

para haMsa ne koI javAba nahI diyA, aura chupa chApa u.DatA rahA. dhIre dhIre, ve zamIna se bahuta dUra hote gae, aura kauve kA baDa baDAnA bhI kama hotA gayA, aura kuCha dera meM,  bilakula hI baMda ho gayA. kauvA aba burI taraha thaka chukA thA, itanA, ki aba usake lie khuda ko havA meM rakhanA bhI mushkila ho rahA thA, aura vo bAra bAra pAnI ke karIba pahucha jA rahA thA. haMsa kauve kI sthiti samajha rahA thA, para usane anajAna banate hue kahA, tuma bAra bAra pAnI kyoM ChU rahe ho, kyA ye bhI tumhArA koI karataba hai? nahIM, kauvA bolA, mujhe mAfa kara do, maiM aba bilakula thaka chUkA hU.N, aura yadi tumane merI madada nahIM kI, to maiM yahIM dama to.Da dUMgA. mujhe bachA lo, maiM kabhI ghamaMDa nahIM dikhAUMgA.

haMsa ko kauve para dayA A gayI, usane sochA, ki chalo kauvA sabaka to sIkha hI chukA hai, aba usakI jAna bachAnA hI ThIka hogA, aura vo kauve ko, apane pITha para baiThA kara, vApasa taTa kI aura u.Da chalA.
bahuta samaya pahale kI bAta hai. kisI jaMgala meM, eka gadhA baragada ke pe.Da ke nIche leTa kara ArAma kara rahA thA.

leTe leTe usake mana meM bure KayAla Ane lage. usane sochA, yadi dharatI phaTa gayI, to merA kyA hogA? abhI usane aisA sochA hI thA, ki use eka zora ke dhamAke kI AvAza AyI. vaha, bhayabhIta ho uThA, aura chIkhane lagA, bhAgo bhAgo dharatI phaTa rahI hai, apanI jAna bachAo. aura aisA kahate hue, vaha pAgaloM kI taraha eka dishA meM bhAgane lagA.
use isa kadara bhAgatA dekhate hue eka anya gadhe ne usase pUChA, are kyA huA bhAI, tuma isa taraha badahavAsa bhAge kyoM jA rahe ho?
are tuma bhI bhAgo, apanI jAna bachAo, dharatI phaTa rahI hai, aisA chIkhate hue vaha bhAgatA rahA.
yaha suna kara dUsarA gadhA bhI Dara gayA, aura usake sAtha bhAgane lagA. aba to vo donoM eka sAtha chillA rahe the, bhAgo bhAgo dharatI phaTa rahI hai.

dekhate dekhate saika.DoM gadhe isa bAta ko doharAte hue usI dishA meM bhAgane lage. gadhoM ko isa taraha bhAgatA dekha, anya jAnavara bhI Dara gae. dharatI phaTane kI khabara, jaMgala meM lagI Aga kI taraha phailane lagI, aura jalda hI sabako patA chala gayA, kI dharatI phaTa rahI hai. chAro tarafa jAnavaroM kI chIkha pukAra macha gayI. sAMpa, bichChu, sIyAra, lomaDa, hAthI, gho.De, sabhI usa jhuNDa meM shAmila ho bhAgane lage.

jaMgala meM phaile isa ho halle ko sunakara, apanI guphA meM vishrAma kara rahA jaMgala kA rAjA shera bAhara nikalA, use apanI A.NkhoM para yakIna nahIM huA, ki sAre jAnavara eka hI dishA meM bhAge jA rahe haiM. vaha uChala kara sabake sAmane AyA, aura gUMjatI huI dahA.Da ke sAtha bolA, ye kyA pAgalapana hai? kahA.N bhAge jA rahe ho tuma saba?
mahArAja, dharatI phaTa rahI hai, Apa bhI apanI jAna bachAie, jhuNDa meM Age kha.DA bandara bolA.
kisane kahA ye saba? shera ne prashna kiyA

saba eka dUsare kA muMha dekhane lage, phira bandara bolA, mujhe to ye bAta chIte ne batAyI thI. chIte ne kahA, maiMne to ye pakShiyoM se sunA thA. aura aise karate karate patA chalA, ki ye bAta sabase pahale gadhe ne batAI thI.
gadhe ko mahArAja ke sAmane bulAyA gayA. tumhe kaise patA chalA ki dharatI phaTa rahI hai? shera ne gusse se pUChA.
maiMne apane kAno se dharatI ke phaTane kI AvAza sunI mahArAja, gadhe ne Darate hue uttara diyA.

ThIka hai chalo, mujhe usa jagaha le chalo, aura dikhAo ki dharatI phaTa rahI hai, aisA kahate hue shera, gadhe ko usa tarafa DhakelatA huA le jAne lagA. bAkI jAnavara bhI, unake pIChe ho lie, aura Dara Dara kara usa aura ba.Dhane lage. baragada ke pAsa pahucha kara gadhA bolA, huzUra, maiM yahIM so rahA thA, ki tabhI zora se dharatI phaTane kI AvAza AI, maiMne khuda uDatI huI dhUla dekhI aura bhAgane lagA.

shera ne Asa pAsa jA kara dekhA, aura sArA mAmalA samajha gayA. usane sabhI ko saMbodhita karate hue kahA, ye gadhA mahAmUrkha hai, daraasala, pAsa hI nAriyala kA eka U.NchA pe.Da hai, aura teza havA chalane se, usa para lagA eka ba.DA sA nAriyala nIche patthara para gira pa.DA, patthara sarakane se Asa pAsa dhUla u.Dane lagI, aura ye gadhA nA jAne kaise ise dharatI phaTane kI bAta samajha baiThA. shera ne bolanA jArI rakhA, para bhAiyoM, ye to gadhA hai, para kyA Apake pAsa bhI apanA dimAga nahIM hai, jAie, apane ghara jAiye, aura AindA se, kisI afavAha para yakIna karane se pahale, dasa bAra sochiyegA.

isalie, hameM kisI gadhe kI bAta meM yakIna karane se pahale, apanA dimAga zarUra lagA lenA chAhie, aura ye bhI samajhanA chAhie, ki agara saika.DoM loga bhI kisI galata chIza ko ba.DhAvA de rahe haiM, to bhI vo galata hI rahatI hai, aura usase bachane meM hI bhalAI hai.

eka maka.DI thI. usane ArAma se rahane ke lie eka shAnadAra jAlA banAne kA vichAra kiyA, aura sochA, kI isa jAle me khUba kI.DeM, makkhi phaseMgI, aura mai use AhAra banAuMgI, aura maze se rahUMgI. usane kamare ke eka kone ko pasaMda kiyA, aura vahA.N jAlA bunanA shurU kiyA. kuCha dera bAda AdhA jAlA buna kara taiyAra ho gayA. yaha dekhakara, vaha maka.DI kAfI khusha huI, ki tabhI achAnaka usakI nazara eka billI para pa.DI, jo use dekhakara ha.Nsa rahI thI.
maka.DI ko gussA A gayA, aura vaha billI se bolI, ha.Nsa kyo rahI ho?
ha.NsU nahI to kyA karU, billI ne javAba diyA, yahA.N makkhiyA.N nahI hai. ye jagaha to bilakula sAfa sutharI hai, yahA.N kauna AyegA tere jAle me.

ye bAta maka.DI ke gale utara gaI. usane achChI salAha ke liye billI ko dhanyavAda diyA, aura jAlA adhUrA Cho.Dakara, dUsarI jagaha talAsha karane lagI. usane Idhara Udhara dekhA. use eka khi.DakI nazara AyI, aura phira usame jAlA bunanA shurU kiyA. kuCha dera taka to vo jAlA bunatI rahI, tabhI eka chi.DiyA AyI, aura maka.DI kA mazAka u.DAte hue bolI, are maka.DI, tU bhI kitanI bevakUfa hai.
kyo? maka.DI ne pUChA.
chi.DiyA use samajhAne lagI, are yahAM to khi.DakI se teza havA AtI hai. yahA to tU apane jAle ke sAtha hI u.Da jAyegI.

maka.DI ko chi.DiyA kI bAta ThIka lagI, aura, vaha vahA.N bhI jAlA adhUrA banA Cho.Dakara sochane lagI, aba kahA.N jAlA banAyA.N jAye. samaya kAfI bIta chukA thA, aura aba use bhUkha bhI lagane lagI thI. aba use eka AlamArI kA khulA daravAzA dikhA, aura usane usI me apanA jAlA bunanA shurU kiyA. kuCha jAlA bunA hI thA, tabhI use eka kAkrocha nazara AyA, jo jAle ko acharaja bhare nazaro se dekha rahA thA.
maka.DI ne pUChA, isa taraha kyo dekha rahe ho?

kAkrocha bolA, are yahA.N kahA.N jAlA bunane chalI AyI, ye to bekAra kI AlamArI hai. abhI ye yahA.N pa.DI hai, kuCha dina bAda ise becha diyA jAyegA, aura tumhArI sArI mehanata bekAra chalI jAyegI. yaha suna kara maka.DI ne vahAM se haTa jAnA hI behatara samajhA.

bAra bAra prayAsa karane se,  vaha kAfI thaka chukI thI, aura usake aMdara jAlA bunane kI tAkata hI nahI bachI thI. bhUkha kI vajaha se vaha pareshAna thI. use paChatAvA ho rahA thA, ki agara pahale hI jAlA buna letI, to achChA rahatA. para aba, vaha kuCha nahIM kara sakatI thI, usI hAlata me pa.DI rahI.
jaba maka.DI ko lagA ki aba kuCha nahIM ho sakatA hai, to usane pAsa se guzara rahI chIMTI se madada karane kA Agraha kiyA.

chIMTI bolI, maiM bahuta dera se tumhe dekha rahI thI, tuma bAra bAra apanA kAma shurU karatI, aura dUsaroM ke kahane para use adhUrA Cho.Da detI. aura jo loga aisA karate haiM, unakI yahI hAlata hotI hai. aura aisA kahate hue, vaha apane rAste chalI gaI, aura maka.DI, paChatAtI huI, niDhAla pa.DI rahI.

eka bAra eka kisAna ne apane paDosI ko bhalA burA kaha diyA, para jaba bAda meM use apanI galatI kA ehasAsa huA, to vaha eka saMta ke pAsa gayA. usane saMta se apane shabda vApasa lene kA upAya pUChA.
saMta ne kisAna se kahA, tuma khUba sAre paMkha ikaThThA kara lo, aura unheM shahara ke bIcho bIcha jAkara rakha do. kisAna ne aisA hI kiyA, aura phira, saMta ke pAsa pahuMcha gayA.
taba saMta ne kahA, aba jAo, aura una paMkhoM ko ikaThThA kara ke vApasa le Ao.

kisAna vApasa gayA, para taba taka sAre paMkha havA se idhara udhara u.Da chuke the. aura kisAna, khAlI hAtha saMta ke pAsa pahuMchA. taba saMta ne usase kahA, ki ThIka aisA hI tumhAre dvArA kahe gae shabdoM ke sAtha hotA hai, tuma AsAnI se inheM apane mukha se nikAla to sakate ho, para chAha kara bhI vApasa nahIM le sakate.

eka bAra eka naujavAna la.Dake ne, sukarAta se pUChA, ki saphalatA kA rahasya kyA hai? sukarAta ne usa la.Dake se kahA, ki tuma kala mujhe nadI ke kinAre milo. vo mile. phira sukarAta ne naujavAna se, unake sAtha, nadI kI tarafa ba.Dhane ko kahA. jaba Age ba.Dhate ba.Dhate pAnI gale taka pahu.Ncha gayA, tabhI achAnaka sukarAta ne, usa la.Dake kA sara paka.Da ke pAnI meM Dubo diyA. la.DakA bAhara nikalane ke lie saMgharSha karane lagA, lekina sukarAta tAkatavara the, aura use taba taka Duboye rakhe, jaba taka kI vo nIlA nahIM pa.Dane lagA. phira sukarAta ne usakA sara pAnI se bAhara nikAla diyA, aura bAhara nikalate hI, jo chIza usa la.Dake ne sabase pahale kI, vo thI, hA.Nphate hA.Nphate tezI se sAMsa lenA.

sukarAta ne pUChA, jaba tuma vahA.N the, to tuma sabase zyAdA kyA chAhate the? la.Dake ne uttara diyA, sAMsa lenA. sukarAta ne kahA, yahI saphalatA kA rahasya hai. jaba taka tuma saphalatA ko utanI hI burI taraha se chAhoge, jitanA kI tuma sAMsa lenA chAhate the, to vo tumhe mila jAegI. isake AlAvA, aura koI rahasya nahIM hai.

eka samaya kI bAta hai, eka tAlAba ke kinAre eka kaChuA, aura do haMsa rahate the. kaChuA tAlAba meM rahatA thA. usakI haMsoM ke sAtha dostI ho gayI thI, jo usase milane hameshA tAlAba taka Ate rahate the. saba bahuta KushI KushI milajula kara rahate the.

eka sAla, vahAM AkAla pa.DA. bahuta dinoM taka bArisha nahIM huI. saba kheta khalihAna tAlAba sUkha gae. pAnI kA eka bU.Nda bhI nahIM bachA, kisIke pIne ke lie. sAre jAnavara pAnI ke AbhAva aura teza garmI kI vajaha se marane lage. taba bahuta sAre jAnavaroM ne dUsarI jagaha jAnA taya kiyA, jahA.N para pAnI bhI ho, aura kheta khalihAna hare bhare hoM.

tInoM dosta, kaChuA aura haMsoM ne bhI, usa tAlAba ko Cho.Da kara kahIM aura jAne kA faisalA kiyA, jahA.N bahuta pAnI ho, aura vahI.N hameshA ke lie basane kA vichAra kiyA. para dUsare jagaha jAnA bhI mushkila thA. haMsoM ke lie to AsAna thA, kyUMki unheM u.DanA AtA thA, para kaChuA ke lie, yaha bahuta hI mushkila kAma thA. kaChuA ko u.DanA to AtA nahIM thA, aura zamIna para utanI dUra chalanA bhI AsAna nahIM thA.

tInoM dostoM ne parAmarsha karake, isa pareshAnI kA hala nikAlane kI sochI. eka haMsa ne eka tarIkA sochA, kI agara kaChuA apane dAMtoM se, laka.DI kI DaMTe ko paka.Da le, to DaMTe ke donoM kinAroM ko haMsa, apane muMha meM davA kara, u.Da jAeMge. isameM kevala eka hI dikkata thI, kI kaChuA, kuCha nA bole nahIM to vo gira jAegA aura mara jAegA. donoM haMsa bahuta chiMtita the, kyU.Nki kaChuA ke lie chupa rahanA bahuta mushkila thA, vo bahuta bAtUnI thA. kaChue ko bAta samajha meM AI, aura usane pratij~nA lI kI vo pUre rAste chupa rahegA.

yAtrA shuru karane se pahale, haMsoM ne phira se apane mitra kaChuA ko samajhAyA, kI kisI bhI stithi meM apanA muMha nA khole. hidAyata de kara, haMsoM ne apane choMcha meM laka.DI ko paka.Da liyA, aura kaChue ne, laka.DI ke bIcha vAle hisse ko, dAMtoM meM paka.DA. aura isa taraha unakI yAtrA shuru huI. ve bahuta U.NchA U.NchA u.Date hue pahA.Da, kheta, maidAna ke Upara se jA rahe the. aMta meM eka shahara ke Upara se guzare.

shahara ke logoM ne aisA nazArA pahalI bAra dekhA thA. sabhI bahuta Ashcharyachakita hue. sabhI loga ha.Nsane lage, aura tAliyA.N bajAne lage, haMso aura kaChue ko ese u.Date dekha kara. loga zora zora se hallA karane lage aura ha.Nsane lage, yaha saba dekha kara, kaChue ko gussA Ane lagA. apanI jij~nAsA ko rokane ke jagaha para, vo bolane ke lie muMha kholA, aura usakI paka.Da ChUTa gayI, aura vo gira kara mara gayA. isa taraha, kaChuA apanI murkhatA, aura besabrI se mArA gayA.

eka samaya kI bAta hai, amarAsakti nAma kA eka rAjA, dakShiNa bhArata meM rAja karatA thA. usake tIna kAmachora putra the, jo usakI chiMtA ke kAraNa bana chuke the. jaba rAjA ko yaha j~nAta huA, kI usake putroM ko, kAma sIkhane meM koI rUchi nahIM hai, to rAjA, apane maMtriyoM ko bulA kara bolA, Apa logoM ko to patA hai, kI maiM apane putroM se khusha nahIM hU.N. j~nAnI puruShoM ne kahA hai, kI ajanmeM putra, mUrkha putra se behatara hote haiM. mUrkha putra, apane pitA ke lie apamAna kA kAraNa banatA hai. mai unheM apanA utarAdhikArI ke yogya kaise banAUM? merA mArgadarshana kareM.

eka maMtrI ne, viShNusharmA kA nAma batAyA, eka bahuta hI j~nAnI puruSha, jo apane sau se adhika shiShyoM ke sAtha rahatA hai. vo hI Apake putroM ko sahI shikShA de pAe.Nge. unakI sharaNa meM jAyeM, aura Apako bahuta jalda hI badalAva dikhegA.

rAjA ne viShNusharmA ko bulAvA bhejA, aura unase vinatI kI, he j~nAnI, mujha para dayA karo, aura mere putroM ko shikShA de kara, unheM bhI j~nAnI banAo, aura maiM, Apako sau gA.Nva kA mAlika banA dUMgA.
viShNusharmA bole, he rAjA, merI bAta suno. sau gA.Nva kA lAlacha mujhe nahIM hai, Apa Aja se Chaha mahIne kI ginatI karo. agara maiM Apake putroM ko j~nAnI na banA dUM, to merA nAma badala denA.

rAjA ne turaMta apane putroM ko bulA bhejA, aura unheM viShNusharmA ke supudra kara diyA. sharmA unheM apane Ashrama meM le gayA, aura pAMcha yojanA sikhAyI. apanI bAta rakhate hue, vo, apanA rAjA ke dvArA diyA huA kAma pUrA kara diyA. usake bAda se, paMchataMtra, pUrI duniyA meM, bachchoM ke mArgadarshana ke lie, prasiddha ho gayA.

bahuta samaya pahale kI bAta hai, vardhamAna nAma kA eka vyApArI, dakShiNa bhArata meM rahatA thA. eka dina, jaba vaha ArAma kara rahA thA, taba usake mana meM khayAla AyA, kI isa duniyA meM paisA hI sabakuCha hai, jitanA use milatA hai, vaha utanA hI saktishAlI hotA hai. dushmana bhI, amIra dosta DhUMDhate haiM. vRRiddha bhI, javAna ho jAte haiM, agara usake pAsa paisA hotA hai, aura javAna bhI vRRiddha ho jAtA hai, agara usake pAsa paisA nahIM hotA hai.

saba kuCha vichAra karake, vardhamAna, eka achChA dina dekha kara, apanI zarUrata kA sAmAna lene bAzAra kI khoja meM nikala pa.DA. usane apanI yAtrA, eka suMdara, sushobhita baila gA.DI meM, shurU kI. rAste meM lambA chalane kI vajaha se thakAna hone para, eka baila, jisakA nAma saMjIvAkA thA, chakkara khA kara jaMgala ke bIchoM bIcha, jamunA nadI ke kinAre gira pa.DA. phira bhI vyApArI ne, apanI yAtrA ko jArI rakhA, aura kuCha sevakoM ko, usa baila kA khayAla rakhane ke lie Cho.Da gayA. lekina usake naukara, mAlika ke jAne ke bAda, baila ko akelA Cho.Da kara chale gae, aura jaba, apane mailka se mile, to unheM batAyA kI baila to mara chukA thA.

apane rAjA kI aisI hAlata dekha kara, do siyAra, karAtAkA aura damanakA, unheM yaha samajha meM nahIM A rahA thA, kI unake mAlika ko kyA huA hai. jaMgala ke mAlika ko kyA huA hai, damanakA ne pUChA. dUsaroM kI bAtoM meM apanI nAka nahIM ghusanA chAhie, damanakA bolA.
hara sunI huI bAta para bharosA nahIM karanA chAhie. aura dUsaroM ke bAta se, apane ko dukhI nahIM karanA chAhie.

eka samaya kI bAta hai, meMDhakoM kA rAjA, gaMgAdattA, eka ba.De se kueM meM rahatA thA, jo usakA ghara bhI thA. apane gharavAloM se apamAna janaka bAteM suna kara, vo apanA rAjya Cho.Da kara, kueM meM rahane lagA.

jaba meMDhaka rAjA apane socha meM khoyA huA thA, usI samaya, usane eka ba.De se sAMpa ko pe.Da ke tane meM jAte hue dekhA, aura sochane lagA, hameM dushmana se la.Dane ke lie, dushmana kA sAtha hI lenA chAhie. tAkatavara AdamI hI tAkatavara se la.Da sakatA hai. dushmana kA nAsha hI, mere lie KushI lA sakatA hai.
apane Age lakShya ko dekha kara, vo pe.Da ke tane ke pAsa gayA, aura kobarA ko bulAyA, priyAdarsanA, kRRipayA bahAra AyeM.

kobarA sAvadhAna thA, usane sochA, yaha kauna mujhe AvAza de rahA hai? yaha merI jAtI ke to nahIM hai. aura maiM apanI jAtI ke bAhara, kisIse dostI nahIM karatA. maiM apane ghara ke aMdara hI rahatA hU.N, aura patA lagatA hU.N, kI yaha bulAne vAlA kauna hai. yaha koI jAdUgara ho sakatA hai, yA koI jo merI madada chAhatA ho, apane dushmana ko Katama karane ke lie.
taba, kobarA aMdara se hI chillA kara bolA, tuma kauna ho?
maiM gaMgAdattA hU.N, meMDhakoM kA rAjA, Apase madada lene AyA hU.N, usane javAba diyA.

maiM tuma para vishvAsa nahIM karatA. kyA kabhI sUkhI ghAsa aura Aga ke bIcha meM dostI ho sakatI hai? kyA tumane sunA nahIM hai, kI shikAra aura shikArI kabhI dosta nahIM bana sakate haiM? maiM tuma para vishvAsa nahIM kara sakatA hU.N, kobarA bolA.

he priyAdarsanA, jo maiM tumheM bola rahA hU.N, vo satya hai. tuma mere janama se dushmana ho. para maiM tumhAre pAsa madada ke lie AyA hU.N, apanI beyzatI kA badalA lene ke lie. kisI ne sacha kahA hai, jaba tumhArI zindagI para bana AtI hai, musIbata tumheM sAmane se dekhatI hai, apane dushmana ke hisAba se kAma karanA behatara hai, aura apanI zindagI aura ghara bachA sakate haiM.
tumhArI kisane beyzatI kI hai, kobarA ne pUChA.
vo mere rishtedAra haiM.
tuma kahA.N rahate ho? vaha eka kuA.N hai, yA tAlAba hai?
vo eka kuA.N hai, aura patthara kI dIvAreM haiM usakI.
para mere pAsa paira nahIM haiM. maiM kaise usa kueM ke pAsa pahu.Ncha kara tumhAre dushmana ko mAra sakatA hU.N?

Apa chiMtA mata karie. mujhe nA mata bolie. maiM Apako aMdara jAne kA rAstA dikhA dUMgA. usa kueM ke divAra para eka darAra hai. vo bilakula sahI jagaha hai, Apake Chupane ke lie. Aie, maiM Apako dikhatA hU.N, meMDhaka rAjA ne bolA.
taba kobarA ne sochA, aba maiM bU.DhA ho gayA hU.N. bahuta mushkila se aba mujhe meMDhaka khAne ko milatA hai. mujhe isake sAtha jAnA chAhie, aura pratidina, meMDhaka kA bhojana karanA chAhie.
phira meMDhaka rAjA ko kobarA ne kahA.N, ThIka hai, chalo.

para eka sharta hai, gaMgAdatta bolA, priyadarshanA, maiM Apako vahAM le jAU.NgA, aura jagaha dikhA dUMgA. para Apako una meMDhaka ko Cho.Da denA hogA, jo mere karIba haiM. kevala unako hI khAhoge, jinheM maiM bolU.NgA.
kobarA ne javAba diyA, aba tuma mere dosta ho. maiM tumheM apanI zabAna detA hU.N. maiM kevala unheM khAU.NgA, jinheM tuma bologe.

taba kobarA apane bila se nikalA, aura meMDhaka rAjA ke pIChe pIChe, kueM taka gayA. meMDhaka rAjA ne, usako kueM ki vo divAra dikhA di, jahA.N kobarA ArAma se Chupa kara baiTha sakatA thA. aura una rishtedAroM ko bhI dikhAyA, jinheM vo mAranA chAhatA thA. kobarA usa darAra meM Chupa kara baiTha gayA, aura samaya se pahale, una sAre meMDhaka ko khA gayA, jinheM unake rAjA ne batAyA thA. aba jaba sAre meMDhaka khattama ho gae, to kobarA meMDhaka rAjA ko bolA, maiMne tumhAre sAre dushmanoM ko khattama kara diyA hai. aba mujhe nayA shikAra dikhAo. tumhI mujhe yahA.N lAye ho.
gaMgAdatta bolA, Apane apanA kAma karake mujhe madada kI hai. aba, ye samaya hai, kI Apa isa jagaha ko Cho.Da kara chale jAyeM.
maiM yahA.N se kaise jA sakatA hU.N? kobarA ne inakAra kiyA. merI jagaha meM koI aura A jAyegA. maiM yahIM rahU.NgA. tuma mujhe pratidina, eka meMDhaka do, bhojana ke lie, apane rishtedAroM se.
paChatAte hue, kI apane dushmana se dostI karake gaMgAdatta ne galata kiyA, gaMgAdatta sochane lagA, kI behatara yahI hogA, kI pratidina, maiM apane eka rishtedAra ko de dUM.

phira, meMDhaka rAjA, pratidina eka meMDhaka, kobarA ko dene lagA. para duShTa kobarA, sAre meMDhaka ko nigala gayA. phira eka dina, yAmunAdAttA kI bArI thI, meMDhaka rAjA ke putra kI bArI thI. rAjA, apane beTe kI mRRityu para bahuta royA. usakI patnI ne, usase kahA kI aba rone kA koI fAyadA nahIM hai, aura yaha bolA, kI use vo jagaha Cho.Da kara chale jAnA chAhie, tabhI usa kobarA ke AtaMka kA aMta ho sakatA hai.

jaise dina guzarA, kobarA ne, meMDhaka rAjA ke, pUre kabile ko khatma kara diyA, aba kevala rAjA gaMgAdatta bacha gayA thA. isalie, vo gaMgAdatta se bolA, dekho dosta, aba yahA.N koI meMDhaka nahIM bachA hai, mere khAne ke lie. mujhe bahuta bhUka lagI hai. mujhe batAo, aba maiM kyA khAU, jisase merI bhUka miTa sake.

rAjA bolA, priyadarshanA, Apa khAne kI chiMtA mata karo, jaba taka maiM ApakA dosta hU.N. Apa mujhe isa kueM se nikalane meM madada karo. maiM jA kara aisA kuA.N dekhatA hU.N, jisameM sAre meMDhaka bhare hue hoMge. maiM usa logoM ko isa kueM ke pAsa Ane ke lie bolU.NgA, aura phira tuma apanA peTa bhara lenA.

mere dosta, tuma gaMgAdatta ko to jAnate hI ho. kRRipayA usake pAsa jAo, aura usako bolo, agara vo mere lie meMDhaka nahIM lA sakatA hai, to koI bAta nahIM, vo khuda vApasa A jAye. maiM itane achChe dosta ke binA nahIM raha sakatA hU.N.
gaMgAdatta bolA, bhUkhe AdamI ko kauna bharosA kara sakatA hai. tuma kRRipayA yahA.N se jAo.
aise logo se dostI mata karo, jo tumase kevala apanA matalaba nikAlanA chAhate haiM.
eka hAthI thA. usakA mitra baMdara thA. lekina eka dina, una donoM kI mitratA TUTa gaI. to hAthI aura baMdara alaga alaga ho gae.

eka dina baMdara ne hAthI ko chi.DhAyA. vaha bolA, laMbI sUMDa sUpA jaise kAna, moTe moTe paira. yaha sunakara hAthI ko gussA AyA, to vaha bhI baMdara ko chi.DhAne lagA. itanI laMbI pUMCha kAlA, muMha kA baMdara.

yaha sunakara baMdara ko bhI gussA AyA. usane hAthI ko nAkhUna ga.DA die, to hAthI ne usako sUMDa se paka.Dakara, gola gola ghumAkara nadIM meM pheMka diyA, to baMdara chillAne lagA. hAthI, mujhe bachAo bachAo. hAthI ko dayA A gaI, aura use pAnI se bAhara nikAla liyA. baMdara ne hAthI se mAfI mAMgI, mujhe mAfa kara do. hAthI ne baMdara ko mAfa kara diyA, aura donoM, phira se achChe se rahane laga gae.

purAne samaya kI bAta hai. eka jaMgala meM eka shera rahatA thA. gIda.Da usakA sevaka thA. jo.DI achChI thI. sheroM ke samAja meM to, usa shera kI koI izzata nahIM thI, kyoMki vaha javAnI meM, sabhI dUsare sheroM se yuddha hAra chukA thA, isalie vaha alaga thalaga rahatA thA. use gIda.Da jaise chamache kI sakhta zarUrata thI, jo chaubIsa ghaMTe usakI chamachAgirI karatA rahe. gIda.Da ko basa khAne kA jugA.Da chAhie thA. peTa bhara jAne para, gIda.Da usa shera kI vIratA ke aise guNa gAtA, ki shera kA sInA phUlakara duganA chau.DA ho jAtA.

eka dina shera ne, eka biga.Daila jaMgalI sAMDa kA shikAra karane kA sAhasa kara DAlA. sAMDa bahuta shaktishAlI thA. usane lAta mArakara shera ko dUra pheMka diyA, jaba vaha uThane ko huA, to sAMDa ne, shera ko sIgoM se eka peDa ke sAtha raga.Da diyA.

kisI taraha shera jAna bachAkara bhAgA. shera sIMgoM kI mAra se, kAfI zakhmI ho gayA thA. kaI dina bIte, lekina shera ke zakhma ThIka hone kA nAma nahIM le rahe the. aisI hAlata meM, vaha shikAra nahIM kara sakatA thA. svayaM shikAra karanA, gIda.Da ke basa kA nahIM thA. donoM ke bhUkhoM marane kI naubata A gaI. shera ko yaha bhI bhaya thA, ki khAne kA jugA.Da samApta hone ke kAraNa, gIda.Da usakA sAtha na Cho.Da jAe.

shera ne eka dina use sujhAyA, dekha, zakhmoM ke kAraNa maiM dau.Da nahIM sakatA. shikAra kaise karUM? tU jAkara kisI bevakUfa se jAnavara ko bAtoM meM phaMsAkara yahAM lA. maiM usa jhA.DI meM ChipA rahUMgA.

gIda.Da ko bhI shera kI bAta jaMcha gaI. vaha kisI mUrkha jAnavara kI talAsha meM ghUmatA ghUmatA, eka kasbe ke bAhara nadI ghATa para pahuMchA. vahAM use eka mariyala sA gadhA, ghAsa para muMha mAratA nazara AyA. vaha shakla se hI bevakUfa laga rahA thA.
gIda.Da, gadhe ke nikaTa jAkara bolA, bahuta kamazora ho gae ho, kyA bAta hai?
gadhe ne apanA dukha.DA royA, kyA batAUM bhAI, jisa dhobI kA maiM gadhA hUM, vaha bahuta krUra hai. dina bhara DhulAI karavAtA hai, aura chArA kuCha detA nahIM.
gIda.Da ne use nyautA diyA, chAchA, mere sAtha jaMgala chalo na, vahAM bahuta harI harI ghAsa hai. khUba charanA, tumhArI sehata bana jAegI.
gadhe ne kAna pha.Dapha.DAe, rAma rAma. maiM jaMgala meM kaise rahUMgA? jaMgalI jAnavara mujhe khA jAeMge.

chAchA, tumheM shAyada patA nahIM, ki jaMgala meM eka bagulA bhagatajI kA satsaMga huA thA. usake bAda, sAre jAnavara shAkAhArI bana gae haiM. aba koI kisI ko nahIM khAtA. gIda.Da bolA, aura kAna ke pAsa muMha le jAkara dAnA pheMkA, chAchU, pAsa ke kasbe se bechArI gadhI bhI apane dhobI mAlika ke atyAchAroM se taMga Akara, jaMgala meM A gaI thI. vahAM harI harI ghAsa khAkara, vaha khUba laharA gaI haiM, tuma usake sAtha ghara basA lenA.

gadhe ke dimAga para harI harI ghAsa aura ghara basAne ke sunahare sapane ChAne lage. vaha gIda.Da ke sAtha, jaMgala kI ora chala diyA. jaMgala meM gIda.Da, gadhe ko usI jhA.DI ke pAsa le gayA, jisameM shera ChipA baiThA thA. isase pahale ki shera paMjA mAratA, gadhe ko jhA.DI meM shera kI nIlI battiyoM kI taraha chamakatI AMkheM nazara A gaIM. vaha Darakara uChalA, gadhA bhAgA, aura bhAgatA hI gayA. shera bujhe svara meM gIda.Da se bolA, bhaI isa bAra maiM taiyAra nahIM thA. tuma use dobArA lAo, isa bAra galatI nahIM hogI.
gIda.Da dobArA usa gadhe kI talAsha meM, kasbe meM pahuMchA. use dekhate hI bolA, chAchA, tumane to merI nAka kaTavA dI. tuma apanI dulhana se Darakara bhAga gae?
usa jhA.DI meM mujhe do chamakatI AMkheM dikhAI dI thI, jaise shera kI hotI haiM. maiM bhAgatA na to kyA karatA? gadhe ne shikAyata kI.

gIda.Da nakalI mAthA pITakara bolA, chAchA o chAchA! tuma bhI nIre mUrkha ho. usa jhA.DI meM tumhArI dulhana thI. jAne kitane janmoM se vaha tumhArI rAha dekha rahI thI. tumheM dekhakara, usakI AMkheM chamaka uThI, to tumane use shera samajha liyA?

gadhA bahuta lajjita huA, gIda.Da kI chAla bharI bAteM hI aisI thI. gadhA phira usake sAtha chala pa.DA. jaMgala meM jhA.DI ke pAsa pahuMchate hI, shera ne nukIle paMjoM se use mAra girAyA. isa prakAra, shera va gIda.Da kA bhojana juTA.

eka samaya kI bAta thI, eka rAjA ne, eka pAlatU bandara ko apane sevaka ke rUpa meM rakhA huA thA. jahA.N jahA.N rAjA jAtA, vaha bandara bhI usake sAtha jAtA. rAjA ke darabAra meM, usa bandara ko rAjA kA pAlatU hone ke kAraNa, koI roka Toka nahIM thI. eka garmI ke mausama ke eka dina, rAjA apane shayana para vishrAma kara rahA thA. vaha bandara bhI, shayana ke pAsa baiTha kara, rAjA ko eka paMkhe se havA kara rahA thA. tabhI eka makkhI AI, aura rAjA kI ChAtI para Akara baiTha gayI. jaba bandara ne usa makkhI ko baiThA dekhA, to usane use u.DAne kA prayAsa kiyA. hara bAra, vo makkhI uDatI, aura tho.DI dera bAra, phira rAjA kI ChAtI para A kara baiTha jAtI. yaha dekha kara, bandara gusse se lAla ho gayA. gusse meM usane makkhI ko mArane kI ThAnI. phira vo bandara, makkhI ko mArane ke lie hathiyAra DhUMDane lagA. kuCha dUra hI, use rAjA kI talavAra dikhAI dI. usane vo talavAra uThAI, aura gusse meM, makkhI ko mArane ke lie pUre bala se talavAra rAjA kI ChAtI para mAra dI. isase pahale kI talavAra makkhI ko lagatI, makkhI vahA.N se u.Da gayI. bandara ke bala se kiye gae vAra se, makkhI to nahIM marI, magara usase rAjA kI mRRityu avashya ho gayI. isalie kahate hai, ki mUrkha ko apanA sevaka banAne meM koI bhalAI nahIM!

eka samaya kI bAta thI, eka pahA.Da kI UMchI choTI para, eka bAza rahatA thA. pahA.Da kI tarAI meM, baragada ke pe.Da para eka kauA apanA ghoMsalA banAkara rahatA thA. vaha ba.DA chAlAka aura dhUrta thA. usakA prayAsa sadA yahI rahatA thA, ki binA mehanata kie khAne ko mila jAe. pe.Da ke AsapAsa, khoha meM kharagosha rahate the. jaba bhI kharagosha bAhara Ate, to bAza UMchI u.DAna bharate, aura ekAdha kharagosha ko uThAkara le jAte.
eka dina kaue ne sochA, vaise to ye chAlAka kharagosha mere hAtha AeMge nahIM, agara inakA narma mAMsa khAnA hai, to mujhe bhI bAza kI taraha karanA hogA. ekAeka jhapaTTA mArakara paka.Da lUMgA.

dUsare dina kaue ne bhI eka kharagosha ko dabochane kI bAta sochakara, UMchI u.DAna bharI. phira usane kharagosha ko paka.Dane ke lie, bAza kI taraha zora se jhapaTTA mArA. aba bhalA kauA bAza kA kyA mukAbalA karatA. kharagosha ne use dekha liyA, aura jhaTa, vahAM se bhAgakara chaTTAna ke pIChe Chipa gayA. kauA apanI hIM jhoMka meM usa chaTTAna se jA TakarAyA. natIjA, usakI choMcha aura garadana TUTa gaI, aura usane vahIM ta.Dapa kara dama to.Da diyA. isalie kahate haiM, nakala karane ke lie bhI akala chAhie.
