eka bAra kI bAta hai, eka kharagosha, bahuta DhIMge mAra rahA thA, kI vo kitanA tIvra bhAga sakatA hai, aura vo jaMgala meM rahane vAle kaChue kA upahAsa kara rahA thA, kI vo kitanA dhImA hai. yaha suna kara, kaChue ne kharagosha ko dau.Da kI chunautI de dI. donoM ne dau.Da karane kA nirNaya liyA.

jaisA kI sabane sochA thA, kharagosha, dau.Da prAraMbha hote hI tIvratA se kaChuA se Age nikala gayA. abhI dau.Date dau.Date tho.DA hI samaya guzarA thA, ki kharagosha ne pIChe mu.Dakara dekhA, ki kaChuA kAfI pIChe raha gayA hai. usane sochA, ki kaChue kI chAla to bahuta hI dhImI hai, isalie maiM tho.DI dera vishrAma kara letA hU.N. vaha eka pe.Da kI ThaMDI ChA.Nva meM aisA soyA, ki kaChuA, dhImI chAla hone ke bAvajUda bhI, usase Age nikala kara apane gantavya taka pahu.Ncha kara dau.Da jIta gayA. jaba kharagosha nIMda se uThA, to use kaChuA dikhAI nahIM diyA. kharagosha dau.Da jItane ke lie gantavya kI ora dau.DA, aura Ashcharya meM, kaChue ko vahAM usakI pratIkShA karatA pAyA.

eka bAra kI bAta hai, eka pe.Da kI choTI para eka ghoMsalA thA, jisa me.N eka kauve kI eka jo.DI rahatI thI. lekina durbhAgya se usa pe.Da ke tala para, eka nAga bhI rahatA thA. jaba bhI mAdA kauvA koI anDA detIM, aura jaise hI kauve kI jo.DI pe.Da se dUra jAtI, tabhI, vo nAga reMgatA huA pe.Da ke Upara jAtA, aura ghoMsale meM rakhA kauve kA aMDA khA jAtA. jaba kauve kI jo.DI vApasa Ae, to yaha dekha bahuta dukhI hue, aura jaba ye bAra bAra huA, taba kauve kI jo.DI ne, usa nAga se ChuTakArA pAne kA nirNaya kara liyA.

kauve ne apane mitra siyAra se saMparka kiyA, aura usako sArI bAta batAI. siyAra kauve se bolA, kI tuma rAjA ke mahala jAo, aura vahAM se, eka maha.NgI vastu lAne, aura use nAga ke bila meM pheMkane ke lie kahA. kauA rAjA ke mahala gayA, aura usane rAnI ke kamare se usakA hAra churA liyA. rAnI ne yaha dekha liyA, aura mahala kI rakShaka ko, kauve se vo hAra vApasa lena ke lie kahA. rakShaka, kauve ke pIChe pIChe, jaMgala kI ora gayA. kauA jaba pe.Da ke pAsa paMhUchA, taba usane rAnI kA hAra, nAga ke bila meM pheMka diyA. rakShaka ne yaha dekha liyA, aura usa bila se hAra vApasa lene ke lie, rakShaka ne, bila meM rahane vAle nAga ko mAra diyA, aura bila se hAra vApasa le liyA. isa taraha se kauve kI jo.DI, nAga se ChuTakArA pAne meM saphala rahI.

kaMchanapura ke eka dhanI vyApArI ke ghara meM, rasoI meM eka kabUtara ne ghoMsalA banA rakhA thA. kisI dina eka lAlachI kauvA udhara se A nikalA. vahA.N maChalI ko dekhakara, usake muha meM pAnI A gayA. taba usake mana meM vichAra AyA, ki mujhe isa rasoI ghara meM ghusanA chAhie, lekina kaise ghusU, ye sochakara vo pareshAna thA. tabhI usakI nazara, vo kabUtaroM ke ghoMsale para pa.DI.

usane sochA, ki agara maiM kabUtara se dostI kara lU.N, to shAyada merI bAta bana jAe.N. kabUtara jaba dAnA chugane ke lie bAhara nikalatA hai, to kauvA usake sAtha nikalatA hai. tho.DI dera bAda kabUtara pIChe mu.Dakara dekhatA hai, to dekhA, ki kauvA usake pIChe hai. isa para kabUtara ne kauve se kahA, bhAI tuma mere pIChe kyoM ho. isa para kauve ne kabUtara se kahA, ki tuma mujhe achChe lagate ho, isalie maiM tumase dostI karanA chAhatA hU.N. isa para kauve se kabUtara ne kahA, ki hama kaise dosta bana sakate hai. hamArA aura tumhArA bhojana bhI to alaga alaga hai. maiM bIja khAtA hU.N, aura tuma kI.De. isa para kauve ne chApalUsI dikhAte hue kahA, kaunasI ba.DI bAta hai, mere pAsa ghara nahIM hai, isalie hama sAtha sAtha to raha hI sakate hai, aura sAtha hI bhojana khojane AyA kareMge, tuma apanA, aura maiM apanA.

ghara ke mAlika ne dekhA, ki kabUtara ke sAtha eka kauvA bhI hai, to usane sochA ki chalo kabUtara kA mitra hogA, isalie usane, usa bAre meM adhika nahIM sochA. agale dina kabUtara khAnA khojane ke lie sAtha chalane ko kahatA hai, to kauve ne peTa darda kA bahAnA banA kara manA kara diyA. isa para kabUtara, akelA hI chalA gayA, kyoMki kauve ne ghara ke mAlika ko ye kahate hue sunA thA, naukara ko, ki Aja kuCha mehamAna A rahe haiM, isalie tuma maChalI banA lenA. udhara kauvA naukara ke rasoI se bAhara nikalane kA intazAra hI kara rahA thA, ki usake jAte hI kauve ne thAlI jhapaTI, aura maChalI uThAkara ArAma se khAne lagA. naukara jaba vApisa AyA, to kauve ko maChalI khAte dekha, gusse se bhara gayA, aura usane kauve ko paka.Da kara gardana maro.Da kara mAra DAlA. jaba shAma meM kabUtara vApisa AyA, to usane kauve kI hAlata dekhI, to sArI bAta samajha gayA. isalie kahA gayA hai, duShTa prakRRiti ke prANI ko, usake kiye kI sazA avashya milatI hai.
eka totA thA, mIThUrAma. piMjarA hI mIThUrAma kA ghara thA, aura vahI usakI duniyA. mIThUrAma kI AvAza ba.DI achChI thI, para vaha sirfa rAta ko hI gAtA thA.

eka rAta jaba mIThUrAma gAnA gA rahA thA, to udhara se eka chamagAda.Da nikalA. chamagAda.Da ne dekhA, ki mIThUrAma kI AvAza bahuta hI mIThI hai, to usane pUChA, ki kyoM bhaI, tumhArI AvAza itanI mIThI hai, to tuma sirfa rAta ko hI kyoM gAte ho?

mIThUrAma ne isakI vajaha batAte hue kahA, ki eka bAra jaba maiM jaMgala meM dina ke samaya gAnA gA rahA thA, to eka shikArI udhara se nikalA. usane merI AvAza sunI, aura usI kAraNa, usane mujhe paka.Da liyA. tabase abhI taka maiM isa piMjare meM kaida hUM.

yaha batAkara, mIThUrAma bolA, ki isake bAda se maiMne yaha sIkha liyA hai, ki dina meM gAnA musIbata kA kAraNa bana sakatA hai, aura isalie aba maiM rAta ko hI gAtA hUM. yaha sunakara chamagAda.Da bolA, ki mitra, yaha to tumheM paka.De jAne se pahale sochanA chAhie thA.

sacha bhI hai, ki kaI bAra hama galatiyAM karane ke bAda hI usase kuCha na kuCha sIkhate haiM. para zarUrI nahIM hai, ki hara bAra sIkhane ke lie galatI hI kI jAe. kaI martabA, kisI kAma ko karane se pahale, kuCha sAvadhAniyAM barata kara hama galatiyoM se bacha sakate haiM, aura nukasAna se bhI. to yAda rakhie, buddhimAna vahI hotA hai, jo socha vichArakara kAma karatA hai.

eka desha meM akAla pa.DA. pAnI kI kamI se, sArI fasaleM mArI gaIM. deshavAsI, apane lie eka vakta kI roTI bhI nahIM juTA pAte the. aise samaya kauvoM ko roTI ke Tuka.De milane baMda ho gae. ve jaMgala kI ora u.Da chale.

unameM se eka kauvA kauvI ne, pe.Da para apanA baserA kara liyA. usa pe.Da ke nIche eka tAlAba thA, jisameM jalakauvA rahatA thA. vaha sAre dina pAnI meM kha.De rahakara, kabhI maChaliyAM paka.DatA, kabhI pAnI kI sataha para paMkha phailAkara, laharoM ke sAtha nAchatA nazara AtA.

pe.Da para baiThe kaue ne sochA, maiM to bhUkha se bhaTaka rahA hUM, aura yaha chAra chAra maChaliyAM eka sAtha gaTaka kara AnaMda meM hai. yadi isase dostI kara lUM, to mujhe maChaliyAM khAne ko zarUra mileMgI.

vaha u.Dakara tAlAba ke kinAre gayA, aura shahada sI mIThI bolI meM kahane lagA, mitra, tuma to bahuta chusta durusta ho. eka hI jhaTake meM maChalI ko apanI choMcha meM phaMsA lete ho, mujhe bhI ye kalA sikhA do.
tuma sIkhakara kyA karoge? tumheM maChaliyAM hI to khAnI haiM. maiM tumhAre lie paka.Da diyA karUMgA.

usa dina ke bAda se, jalakauvA Dhera sArI maChaliyAM paka.DatA, kuCha khuda khAtA, aura kuCha apane mitra ke lie kinAre para rakha detA. kauvA unheM choMcha meM dabAkara pe.Da para jA baiThatA, aura kauvI ke sAtha svAda le lekara khAtA.
kuCha dinoM ke bAda usane sochA, maChalI paka.Dane meM hai hI kyA! maiM bhI paka.Da sakatA hUM. jalakauve kI kRRipA para palanA zyAdA ThIka nahIM.
aisA mana meM ThAnakara, vaha pAnI meM utarane lagA.
are dosta! yaha kyA kara rahe ho? tuma pAnI meM mata jAo. tuma thala kauvA ho, jala kauvA nahIM. tuma jala meM maChalI paka.Dane ke dAMvapeMcha nahIM jAnate, musIbata meM pa.Da jAoge.
yaha tuma nahIM, tumhArA abhimAna bola rahA hai. maiM abhI maChalI paka.Dakara dikhAtA hUM. kauve ne aka.Da kara kahA.

kauvA ChapAka se pAnI meM ghusa gayA, para Upara na nikala sakA. tAlAba meM kAI jamI huI thI. kAI meM Cheda karane kA use anubhava na thA. usa bechAre ne usameM Cheda karane kI ko{}shisha bhI kI, Upara se tho.DI sI choMcha dikhAI de rahI thI, para nikalane ke lie ba.DA sA Cheda honA thA. natI jatana, usakA aMdara hI aMdara dama ghuTane lagA, aura vaha mara gayA.
kauvI kauve ko DhUMDhatI huI jalakauve ke pAsa AI, aura apane pati ke bAre meM pUChane lagI.

bahana, kauvA merI nakala karatA huA pAnI meM maChalI paka.Dane utara pa.DA, aura prANoM se, hAtha dho baiThA. usane yaha nahIM sochA, ki maiM jalavAsI hUM, aura zamIna para bhI chala sakatA hUM, para vaha kevala thalavAsI hai. maiMne use bahuta samajhAyA, para usane eka na sunI.

eka vana meM hAthiyoM kA eka jhuMDa rahatA thA. jhuMDa ke saradAra ko, gajarAja kahate the. vo vishAlakAya, lambI sUMDa, tathA lambe moTe dAMtoM vAlA thA. khaMbhe ke samAna usake moTe moTe paira the. jaba vo chiMghA.DatA thA, to sArA vana gUMja uThatA thA.

gajarAja apane jhuMDa ke hAthiyoM se ba.DA pyAra karatA thA. svayaM kaShTa uThA letA thA, para jhuMDa ke kisI bhI hAthI ko kaShTa meM nahIM pa.Dane detA thA, aura sAre ke sAre hAthI bhI, gajarAja ke prati ba.DI shradghA rakhate the.

eka bAra jalavRRiShTi na hone ke kAraNa, vana meM zoroM kA akAla pa.DA. nadiyAM, sarovara sUkha gae, vRRikSha aura latAeM bhI sUkha gaIM. pAnI aura bhojana ke abhAva meM, pashu pakShI vana ko Cho.Dakara bhAga kha.De hue. vana meM chIkha pukAra hone lagI, hAya hAya hone lagI. gajarAja ke jhuMDa ke hAthI bhI, akAla ke shikAra hone lage. ve bhI bhojana aura pAnI na milane se, ta.Dapa ta.Dapakara marane lage. jhuMDa ke hAthiyoM kA burA hAla dekhakara, gajarAja ba.DA dukhI huA. vaha sochane lagA, kauna sA upAya kiyA jAe, jisase hAthiyoM ke prANa bacheM.
eka dina gajarAja ne, tamAma hAthiyoM ko bulAkara unase kahA, isa vana meM na to bhojana hai, na pAnI hai! tuma saba, bhinna bhinna dishAoM meM jAo, bhojana aura pAnI kI khoja karo.

hAthiyoM ne gajarAja kI Aj~nA kA pAlana kiyA. hAthI, bhinna bhinna dishAoM meM ChiTaka gae. eka hAthI ne lauTakara, gajarAja ko sUchanA dI, yahAM se kuCha dUra para, eka dUsarA vana hai. vahAM pAnI kI bahuta ba.DI jhIla hai. vana ke vRRikSha, phUloM aura phaloM se lade hue haiM. gajarAja ba.DA prasanna huA. usane hAthiyoM se kahA, ki aba hameM dera na karake turaMta usI vana meM pahuMcha jAnA chAhie, kyoMki vahAM bhojana aura pAnI donoM haiM. gajarAja, anya hAthiyoM ke sAtha, dUsare vana meM chalA gayA. hAthI vahAM bhojana aura pAnI pAkara ba.De prasanna hue.

usa vana meM kharagoshoM kI eka bastI thI. bastI meM, bahuta se kharagosha rahate the. hAthI, kharagoshoM kI bastI se hI hokara, jhIla meM pAnI pIne ke lie jAyA karate the. hAthI jaba kharagoshoM kI bastI se nikalane lagate, to ChoTe ChoTe kharagosha, unake pairoM ke nIche A jAte the. kuCha kharagosha mara jAte the, kuCha ghAyala ho jAte the.

roza roza kharagoshoM ko marate aura ghAyala hote dekhakara, kharagoshoM kI bastI meM halachala macha gaI. kharagosha sochane lage, yadi hAthiyoM ke pairoM se ve isI taraha kuchale jAte rahe, to vaha dina dUra nahIM, jaba unakA khAtmA ho jAegA.

apanI rakShA kA upAya sochane ke lie, kharagoshoM ne eka sabhA bulAI. sabhA meM bahuta se kharagosha ikaTThe hue. kharagoshoM ke saradAra ne hAthiyoM ke atyAchAroM kA varNana karate hue kahA, kyA hamameM se koI aisA hai, jo apanI jAna para khelakara hAthiyoM kA atyAchAra baMda karA sake?

saradAra kI bAta sunakara eka kharagosha bola uThA, yadi mujhe kharagoshoM kA dUta banAkara gajarAja ke pAsa bhejA jAe, to maiM hAthiyoM ke atyAchAra ko baMda karA sakatA hUM. saradAra ne kharagosha kI bAta mAna lI, aura kharagoshoM kA dUta banAkara, gajarAja ke pAsa bheja diyA.

kharagosha, gajarAja ke pAsa jA pahuMchA. vaha hAthiyoM ke bIcha meM kha.DA thA. kharagosha ne sochA, vaha gajarAja ke pAsa pahuMche, to kisa taraha pahuMche. agara vaha hAthiyoM ke bIcha meM ghusatA hai, to ho sakatA hai hAthI use pairoM se kuchala de. yaha sochakara, vaha pAsa hI kI eka UMchI chaTTAna para chaढ़ gayA. chaTTAna para kha.DA hokara, usane gajarAja ko pukArakara kahA, gajarAja, maiM chaMdramA kA dUta hUM. chaMdramA ke pAsa se tumhAre lie eka saMdesha lAyA hUM.

chadramA kA nAma sunakara, gajarAja kharagosha kI ora AkarShita huA. usane kharagosha kI ora dekhate hue kahA, kyA kahA tumane? tuma chadramA ke dUta ho? tuma chaMdramA ke pAsa se mere lie kyA saMdesha lAe ho?

kharagosha bolA, hAM gajarAja, maiM chaMdramA kA dUta hUM. chaMdramA ne tumhAre lie saMdesha bhejA hai. suno, tumane chaMdramA kI jhIla kA pAnI gaMdA kara diyA hai. tumhAre jhuMDa ke hAthI kharagoshoM ko pairoM se kuchala kuchalakara mAra DAlate haiM. chaMdramA, kharagoshoM ko bahuta pyAra karate haiM, unheM apanI goda meM rakhate haiM. chaMdramA tumase bahuta nArAza haiM. tuma sAvadhAna ho jAo. nahIM to chaMdramA, tumhAre sAre hAthiyoM ko mAra DAleMge.

kharagosha kI bAta sunakara gajarAja bhayabhIta ho uThA. usane kharagosha ko sachamucha chaMdramA kA dUta, aura usakI bAta ko sachamucha chaMdramA kA saMdesha samajha liyA, usane Dara kara kahA, ye to ba.DA burA saMdesha hai. tuma mujhe turaMta chaMdramA ke pAsa le chalo. maiM unase apane aparAdhoM ke lie kShamA yAchanA karUMgA.

kharagosha gajarAja ko chaMdramA ke pAsa le jAne ke lie taiyAra ho gayA. usane kahA, maiM tumheM chaMdramA ke pAsa le chala sakatA hUM, para sharta ye hai, ki tuma, akele hI chaloge. gajarAja ne kharagosha kI bAta mAna lI.

pUrNimA kI rAta thI. AkAsha meM chaMdramA haMsa rahA thA. kharagosha, gajarAja ko lekara jhIla ke kinAre gayA. usane gajarAja se kahA, gajarAja, milo chaMdramA se. kharagosha ne jhIla ke pAnI kI ora saMketa kiyA. pAnI meM pUrNimA ke chaMdramA kI paraChAIM ko hI chaMdramA mAna liyA.
gajarAja ne chaMdramA se kShamA mAMgane ke lie apanI sUMDa pAnI meM DAla dI. pAnI meM lahareM paidA ho uThIM, paraChAIM adRRishya ho gaI. gajarAja bola uThA, dUta, chaMdramA kahAM chale gae?
kharagosha ne uttara diyA, chaMdramA tumase nArAza haiM. tumane jhIla ke pAnI ko apavitra kara diyA hai. tumane kharagoshoM kI jAna lekara pApa kiyA hai, isalie chaMdramA tumase milanA nahIM chAhate.
gajarAja ne kharagosha kI bAta sacha mAna lI. usane Dara kara kahA, kyA aisA koI upAya hai, jisase chaMdramA mujhase prasanna ho sakate haiM?

kharagosha bolA, hAM hai. tumheM prAyashchita karanA hogA. tuma kala savere hI, apane jhuMDa ke hAthiyoM ko lekara yahAM se dUra chale jAo. chaMdramA tuma para prasanna ho jAeMge. gajarAja, prAyashchita karane ke lie taiyAra ho gayA. vaha dUsare dina hAthiyoM ke jhuMDa sahita vahAM se chalA gayA.
isa taraha kharagosha kI chAlAkI ne, balavAna gajarAja ko dhokhe meM DAla diyA, aura usane apanI budghimAnI ke bala se hI, kharagoshoM ko mRRityu ke mukha meM jAne se bachA liyA.

do mitra, dharmabuddhi aura kubuddhi, himmata nagara meM rahate the. eka bAra kubuddhi ke mana meM eka vichAra AyA, kyoM na maiM mitra dharmabuddhi ke sAtha, dUsare desha jAkara, dhanopArjana karrU.N. bAda meM kisI na kisI yukti se, use Thaga kara, sArA dhana ha.Dapa kara, sukha chaina se pUrI jiMdagI jIu.N.
isI niyati se, kubuddhi ne dharmabuddhi ko, dhana aura j~nAna prApta hone kA lobha dete hue, apane sAtha bAhara jAne ke lie rAzI kara liyA.

shubha muhUrta dekhakara, donoM mitra eka anya shahara ke lie prasthAna kiye. jAte samaya, apane sAtha kaI sAmAna lekara gaye, tathA mu.NhamA.Nge dAmoM para bechakara, khUba dhanopArjana kiyA. aMtataH, prasanna mana se gA.Nva kI tarafa lauTa gaye.

gA.Nva ke nikaTa pahu.Nchane para kubuddhi ne, dharmabuddhi ko samajhAte hue kahA, mere vichAra se, gA.Nva meM eka sAtha sArA dhana le jAnA uchita nahIM hai. kuCha logoM ko hamase IrShyA hone lagegI, to kuCha loga, karza ke rupa meM paisA mA.Ngane lageMge. saMbhava hai, ki koI chora hI ise churA le. usane rAya dete hue kahA, mere vichAra se, kuCha dhana hameM jaMgala meM hI kisI surakShita sthAna para gA.Dha denI chAhie. anyathA, sArA dhana dekhakara, sanyAsI va mahAtmAoM kA mana bhI Dola jAtA hai. sIdhe sIdhe dharmabuddhi ne, punaH kubuddhi ke vichAra meM apanI sahamati jatAI.

vahIM kisI surakShita sthAna para, donoM ne gaDढ़e khodakara, apanA dhana dabA diyA, tathA ghara kI ora prasthAna kara gaye. bAda meM maukA dekhakara, eka rAta kubuddhi ne vahA.N ga.De sAre dhana ko chupake se nikAlakara hathiyA liyA.
kuCha dinoM ke bAda, dharmabuddhi ne kubuddhi se kahA, mujhe kuCha dhana kI AvashyakatA hai. ataH Apa mere sAtha chalie. kubuddhi taiyAra ho gayA.

jaba usane dhana nikAlane ke lie gaDढ़e khode, to vahA.N kuCha bhI nahIM milA. kubuddhi ne turaMta rone chillAne kA abhinaya kiyA. usane dharmabuddhi para, dhana nikAla lene kA ilzAma lagA diyA. donoM la.Dane jhaga.Date nyAyAdhIsha ke pAsa pahu.Nche.
nyAyAdhIsha ke sammukha donoM ne apanA apanA pakSha prastuta kiyA. nyAyAdhIsha ne satya kA patA lagAne ke lie, divya parIkShA kA Adesha diyA.

nItivAna sanyAsI. eka jaMgala meM hiraNyaka nAmaka chUhA, tathA laghupatanaka nAma kA kauvA rahatA thA. donoM meM pragA.Dha mitratA thI. laghupatanaka hiraNyaka ke lie, hara dina khAneM ke lie kahIM na kahIM se lAtA thA. apane upakAroM se, usane hiraNyaka ko RRINI banA liyA thA. eka bAra hiraNyaka ne, laghupanaka se dukhI mana se kahA, isa pradesha meM akAla pa.Da gayA hai. logoM ne pakShiyoM ko pha.NsAne ke lie apane ChatoM para jAla DAla diyA hai. maiM kisI taraha bacha pAyA hU.N. ataH, maiMne isa pradesha ko Cho.Dane kA nishchaya kiyA hai.

laghupanaka ne batAyA, dakShiNa dishA meM durgama vana hai, jahA.N eka vishAla sarovara hai. vahA.N merA eka atyaMta ghaniShTa mitra rahAtA hai. usakA nAma maMtharaka kaChuA hai. usase mujhe maChaliyoM ke TUka.De mila jAyA kareMge.

hiraNyaka ne vinatI kI, ki vaha bhI laghupatanaka ke sAtha vahIM jAkara rahanA chAhatA hai. laghupatanaka ne use samajhAne kI koshisha kI, ki use apanI janmabhUmi, va sukhada AvAsa ko nahIM Cho.DanA chAhie. isa para hiraNyaka ne kahA, ki aisA karane kA kAraNa, vaha bAda meM batAegA.

donoM mitroM ne sAtha jAne kA nishchaya kiyA. hiraNyaka, laghupatanaka ke pITha para baiThakara, usa sarovara kI ora prasthAna kara gayA. nishchita sthAna para pahu.Nchakara, kauve ne chUhe ko apanI pITha se utArA, tathA tAlAba ke kinAre kha.De hokara, apane mitra, maMtharaka ko pukArane lagA.

maMtharaka tatkAla jala se nikalA. donoM eka dUsare se milakara prasannachita the. isI bIcha, hiraNyaka bhI A pahu.NchA. laghupanaka ne maMtharaka se hiraNyaka kA parichaya karAyA, tathA usake guNoM kI prashaMsA bhI kI.
maMtharaka ne bhI, hiraNyaka se usake janmasthAna se vairAgya kA kAraNa jAnanA chAhA. donoM ke Agraha ko sunakara, hiraNyaka apanI vyathA kathA sunAne lagA.

nagara ke bAhara, sthita shiva maMdira meM, tAmrachU.Da nAmaka eka sanyAsI rahatA thA. vaha nagara meM bhikShA mA.Ngakara, sukhadapUrvaka apanA jIvana vyatIta kara rahA thA. khAne pIne se bache anna dhAnya ko, vaha pratyeka dina, eka bhikShA pAtra meM DAlakara, rAtri meM khU.NTI para laTakAkara so jAyA karatA thA. subaha subaha, use maMdira ke bAhara baiThe, bhikhAriyoM meM bA.NTa detA thA. isa saba bAtoM kI sUchanA, hiraNyaka ko bhI milI. use yaha bhI patA chalA, ki ye svAdiShTa sAmagrI, U.NchAI para hone ke kAraNa, anya chUhoM ko dikkata hotI hai.

hiraNyaka ne batAyA, ki apanI sAthI kI bAta sunakara, eka rAta maiM vahA.N AyA, tathA khU.NTI para laTakI hAMDI para ChalAMga lagA diyA, tathA hA.NDI ko nIche girA diyA, tathA sAthiyoM ke sAtha, svAdiShTa bhojana kA AnaMda liyA. aba yaha hamArA, hara rAta kA niyama sA bana gayA.
pareshAna hokara sanyAsI eka phaTe bAMsa kA DaMDA lekara AyA. DaMDe kI AvAza se, hama loga Dara jAte the, lekina usake so jAte hI, punaH haMDiyA sAfa kara dete the.

eka bAra sanyAsI kA mitra, vRRihatasphika tIrthATana ke uparAMta, usase milane AyA. rAta meM sote samaya, vRRihatasphika ne, tAmrachU.Da ko apane tIrtha kA vivaraNa sunAne lagA. isa daurAna bhI, tAmrachU.Da, phaTe bA.Nsa kA DaMDA bajAtA rahA, jisase, vRRihatAsphika ko burA lagA. taba tAmrachU.Da ne use DaMDA bajAne kI asalI vajaha batAI.

vRRihatasphika ne, jij~nAsA dikhAte hue pUChA, chUhe kA bila kahA.N hai? tAmrachU.Da ne, anabhij~natA darshAyI, lekina yaha spaShTa thA, ki zarura hI yaha bila kisI khazAne para hai. dhana kI garamI ke kAraNa hI, yaha chUhA, utanA adhika U.NchAI taka kUda sakatA hai. vRRihatAsphika ne, eka kudAla ma.NgavAyA, tathA nishchita hokara rAta meM donoM so gae.

hiraNyaka ne, sunAnA jArI rakhA. prAtaHkAla, vRRihatAsphika apane mitra ke sAtha, hamAre padachinhoM kA anusaraNa karate hue, hamAre bila taka A hI pahU.Nche. kisI taraha maiMne apanI jAna bachA lI, paraMtu aMdara Chipe koSha ko nikAla liyA. koSha ke lUTa jAne se merA utsAha shithila ho gayA. isake bAda, maiMne usa khU.NTa taka pahu.Nchane kI kaI bAra koshisha kI, lekina, asaphala rahI.

maiMne dhana ko punaH prApta karane kI kaI koshisha kI, lekina ka.DI nigarAnI ke kAraNa, mujhe vo vApasa nahIM mila pAyA. isa kAraNa mere parijana bhI, mujhase kannI kATane lage the. isa prakAra, maiM daridratA, tathA apamAna kI ziMdagI jI rahA thA.

eka bAra maiMne punaH saMkalpa liyA. kisI taraha takiye ke nIche rakhe dhana ko lA rahA thA, ki vaha duShTa saMnyAsI kI nidrA bhaMga ho gayI. usane DaMDe se mere Upara bhayaMkara prahAra kiyA. maiM kisI taraha jIvita bacha pAyA. jAna to bacha gayI, lekina parivAra ke logoM ke sAtha rahanA sammAnajanaka nahIM lagA. aura isIlie, maiM apane mitra, laghupatanaka ke sAtha yahA.N chalA AyA.

hiraNyaka kI Apa bItI sunakara, maMtharaka ne kahA, mitra, niHsaMdeha, laghupatanaka ApakA sachchA va hitaiShI mitra hai. saMkaTa kAla meM, sAtha nibhAnevAlA hI, sachchA mitra hotA hai. samRRiddhi meM to sabhI mitra hote haiM.
dhIre dhIre hiraNyaka bhI, apane dhana kI kShati ko bhUla gayA, tathA sukhapUrvaka jIvana yApana karane lagA.

eka bAra kI bAta hai, eka jaMgala meM eka shera thA. vaha shera, bahuta gamaMDI aura gusse vAlA thA. vaha apanI bhUkha ke lie hI nahIM, apitu, apane manoraMjana ke lie jantuoM kI hatyA kiyA karatA thA. sAre jantuoM ne, shera ke isa prakopa se pareshAna hokara, yaha nirNaya liyA, kI unheM isa viShaya para shera se bAta karanI chAhie. unhoMne eka bAra shera ko nimaMtraNa para bulAyA. vahA.N sAre jaMtu bhI ekatrita hue. vahA.N hAthI, kharagosha, hiraNa, bhAlU, bandara, loma.DI, chUhA, gAya, baiMsa, gilherI, bArAsiMgA Adi the. unhoMne shera se kahA, kI agara shera, isI taraha se jaMgala meM jantuoM kA shikAra karatA rahA, to vaha dina dUra nahIM, jaba sAre jantu, jaMgala se lupta ho jAyeMge. unhoMne shera ke sAmane eka prastAva rakhA. prastAva ke anusAra, eka eka kara, hara eka dina eka jaMtu shera ke bhojana ke lie usakI guphA meM bheja diyA jAyegA. eka taraha shera apane bhojana ke AlAvA, jantuoM kA shikAra nahIM kara pAyegA. isa prastAva se, jantuoM ko bhI chena milegA. shera ne yaha prastAva, svIkAra kara liyA. shera ke lie, ye sahI bhI thA, kyU.Nki aba use shikAra karane ke lie apanI guphA se bAhara bhI nahIM jAnA pa.DegA. usa dina ke bAda se, hara dina eka jaMtu, shera ke lie bhejA jAne lagA.

eka bAra eka kharagosha kI bArI AI. vaha kharagosha bahuta chatura thA, aura use eka upAya sUjhA. vaha kharagosha, shera ke pAsa kuCha dera se gayA. isa para shera bahuta gussA huA, aura jaba usane eka ChoTe se kharagosha ko dekhA, to usase aura bhI gussA AyA. shera gusse meM bolA, kI mai sAre jantuoM ko khA jAUMgA. kharagosha bolA, kI isameM usakA koI doSha nahIM hai. usake bhojana ke lie pAMcha kharagosha bheje gae the, magara rAste meM chAra kharagoshoM ko, eka dUsarA shera khA gayA, aura vaha, eka lotA kharagosha apanI jAna bachA kara usake pAsa AyA. isa para shera bolA, usa jaMgala meM kevala vahI shera hai, aura kharagosha, use usa jagaha para lekara jAye, jahA.N usane dUsarA shera dekhA thA. kharagosha, usa shera ko eka kueM ke pAsa lekara chalA gayA, aura bolA, kI usane dUsare shera ko usa kueM ke andara dekhA thA. shera ne jaba usa kueM meM dekhA, to use apanI Chavi dikhAI dI. apanI Chavi dekha kara, shera ko lagA kI usa kueM meM dUsarA shera hai. shera ne usase la.DAI kara, use apane jaMgala se bAhara karane kI sochI, aura yaha socha kara, usa kueM meM ChalAMga lagA dI. aisA kara, shera ne apanI jAna gavA dI. isa taraha kharagosha ne na kevala apanI, parantu dUsare jantuoM kI bhI jAna bachA lI.
isalie kahate haiM, kI bala se buddhi ba.DI hotI hai!

eka rAjA ke shayanakakSha meM, maMdarIsarpiNI nAma kI jUM ne DerA DAla rakhA thA. roza rAta ko jaba rAjA jAtA, to vaha chupake se bAhara nikalatI, aura rAjA kA khUna chUsakara, phira apane sthAna para jA ChipatI. saMyoga se eka dina agnimukha nAma kA eka khaTamala bhI, rAjA ke shayanakakSha meM A pahuMchA. jUM ne jaba use dekhA, to vahAM se chale jAne ko kahA. use apane adhikAra kShetra meM, kisI anya kA dakhala sahana nahIM thA. lekina khaTamala bhI kama chatura na thA, dekho, mehamAna se isa taraha bartAva nahIM kiyA jAtA, maiM Aja rAta tumhArA mehamAna hUM.
jUM antataH khaTamala kI chikanI chupa.DI bAtoM meM A gaI, aura use sharaNa dete hue bolI, ThIka hai, tuma yahAM rAtabhara ruka sakate ho, lekina rAjA ko kAToge to nahIM, usakA khUna chUsane ke lie.
khaTamala bolA, lekina maiM tumhArA mehamAna hai, mujhe kuCha to dogI khAne ke lie. aura rAjA ke khUna se ba.DhiyA bhojana aura kyA ho sakatA hai.

ThIka hai. jUM bolI, tuma chupachApa rAjA kA khUna chUsa lenA, use pI.DA kA AbhAsa nahIM honA chAhie. jaisA tuma kahogI, bilakula vaisA hI hogA. kahakara khaTamala, shayanakakSha meM rAjA ke Ane kI pratIkShA karane lagA.

rAta Dhalane para rAjA vahAM AyA, aura bistara para pa.Dakara so gayA. use dekha, khaTamala saba kuCha bhUlakara rAjA ko kATane lagA, khUna chUsane ke lie. aisA svAdiShTa khUna, usane pahalI bAra chakhA thA, isalie vaha rAjA ko, zora zora se kATakara usakA khUna chUsane lagA. isase rAjA ke sharIra meM, teza khujalI hone lagI, aura usakI nIMda uchaTa gaI. usane krodha meM bharakara apane sevakoM se khaTamala ko DhUMDhakara mArane ko kahA.
yaha sunakara chatura khaTamala to palaMga ke pAe ke nIche Chipa gayA, lekina chAdara ke kone para baiThI jUM, rAjA ke sevakoM kI nazara meM A gaI. unhoMne use paka.DA, aura mAra DAlA.

eka la.DakA roza jaMgala meM bhe.DeM charAne ke lie jAtA thA. vaha ba.DA shaitAna thA. apanI shaitAniyoM dvArA, dUsaroM ko pareshAna karane meM use ba.DA mazA AtA thA. magara jaMgala meM akelA hone ke kAraNa, vaha ukatA jAtA thA. yahAM kise aura kaise pareshAna kare, yahI sochatA rahatA thA. jaMgala se lagate, kuCha kisAnoM ke kheta the. ve subaha subaha Akara, apane khetoM meM kAma karane meM juTa jAte the.
eka dina use kisAnoM ke sAtha shaitAnI karane kI sUjhI. vaha sochane lagA, ki aisA kyA kiyA jAe ki sAre kisAna pareshAna ho jAeM.
achAnaka usake dimAga meM khurAfAta A hI gaI.
vaha zora zora se chillAne lagA, bachAo, bachAo! bhe.DiyA AyA. bhe.DiyA AyA!

kisAnoM ne la.Dake kI AvAza sunI, to ve apanA apanA kAma Cho.Dakara, la.Dake kI madada ke lie dau.Da pa.De. jo bhI hAtha lagA, sAtha le Ae. koI phAva.DA le AyA, koI darAMtI, to koI haMsiyA. magara jaba ve la.Dake ke pAsa pahuMche, to unheM kahIM bhe.DiyA dikhAI nahIM diyA.
kisAnoM ne la.Dake se pUChA, kahA.N hai bhe.DiyA?
unakA savAla sunakara la.DakA haMsa pa.DA, aura bolA, maiM to mazAka kara rahA thA, bhe.DiyA AyA hI nahIM thA. jAo. tuma loga jAo.
kisAna la.Dake ko DAMTa phaTakAra kara lauTa Ae. unake jAne ke bAda, vaha apane Apase bolA, vAha! kaisA bevakUfa banAyA. mazA A gayA.

kuCha dinoM bAda, la.Dake ne phira aisA hI kiyA. AsapAsa ke kisAna phira madada ke lie dau.Da Ae. la.DakA phira haMsakara bolA, maiM mazAka kara rahA thA. Apa logoM ke pAsa koI aura kAma nahIM hai, jo mAmUlI sI chIkha pukAra sunakara dau.De chale Ate ho.

kisAnoM ko ba.DA gussA AyA. eka bAra phira unhoMne use DAMTa phaTakAra lagAI. magara DhITha la.DakA haMsatA rahA. lekina aba kisAnoM ne dRRi.Dha nishchaya kara liyA, ki isa la.Dake kI madada ko kabhI nahIM AeMge.

kuCha samaya bAda, eka dina sachamucha hI bhe.DiyA A pahuMchA. la.DakA dau.Dakara eka pe.Da para cha.Dha gayA, aura madada ke lie chillAne lagA. isa bAra usakI madada ke lie koI nahIM AyA. sabhI ne yahI sochA, ki vaha badamAsha la.DakA, pahale kI taraha mazAka kara rahA hai. bhe.Diye ne, kaI bhe.DoM ko mAra DAlA. isase la.Dake ko apane kie para dukha huA.

golU aura molU, pakke dosta the. golU jahAM dubalA patalA thA, vahIM molU, moTA gola maTola. donoM eka dUsare para jAna dene kA dama bharate the, lekina unakI jo.DI dekhakara logoM kI haMsI ChUTa jAtI. eka bAra, unheM kisI dUsare gAMva meM rahane vAle mitra kA nimaMtraNa milA. usane unheM apanI bahana ke vivAha ke avasara para bulAyA thA.
unake mitra kA gAMva, koI bahuta dUra to nahIM thA, lekina vahAM taka pahuMchane ke lie, jaMgala se hokara guzaranA pa.DatA thA. aura usa jaMgala meM, jaMgalI jAnavaroM kI bharamAra thI.

donoM chala die. jaba ve jaMgala se hokara guzara rahe the, to unheM sAmane se eka bhAlU AtA dikhA. use dekhakara, donoM bhaya se, thara thara kAMpane lage. tabhI dubalA patalA golU, tezI se dau.Dakara, eka pe.Da para jA cha.DhA, lekina moTA hone ke kAraNa molU, utanA teza nahIM dau.Da sakatA thA. udhara bhAlU bhI nikaTa A chukA thA, phira bhI, molU ne sAhasa nahIM khoyA. usane suna rakhA thA ki bhAlU, mRRita sharIra ko nahIM khAte. vaha turaMta zamIna para leTa gaye, aura sAMsa roka lI. aisA abhinaya kiyA, ki mAno sharIra meM prANa haiM hI nahIM. bhAlU ghuraghurAtA huA molU ke pAsa AyA, usake chehare va sharIra ko sUMghA, aura use mRRita samajhakara Age ba.Dha gayA.
jaba bhAlU kAfI dUra nikala gayA, to golU pe.Da se utarakara molU ke nikaTa AyA, aura bolA, mitra, maiMne dekhA thA. bhAlU tumase kuCha kaha rahA thA. kyA kahA usane?
molU ne gusse meM bharakara javAba diyA, mujhe mitra kahakara na bulAo. aura aisA hI kuCha, bhAlU ne bhI mujhase kahA. usane kahA, golU para vishvAsa na karanA, vaha tumhArA mitra nahIM hai.
sunakara golU sharmindA ho gayA. use abhyAsa ho gayA thA, ki usase kitanI bhArI bhUla ho gaI thI. usakI mitratA bhI, sadaiva ke lie samApta ho gaI.

eka ghane jaMgala meM, eka ba.DA sA nAga rahatA thA. chi.DiyoM ke aMDe, me.Dhaka, tathA ChipakaliyoM jaise ChoTe ChoTe jIva jaMtuoM ko khAkara, apanA peTa bharatA thA. rAtabhara, vaha apane bhojana kI talAsha meM rahatA, aura dina nikalane para, apane bila meM jAkara so jAtA. dhIre dhIre vaha moTA hotA gayA, hAlata yaha ho gaI, ki vaha itanA moTA ho gayA, ki bila ke aMdara, bAhara AnA jAnA bhI dUbhara ho gayA.

AkhirakAra usane bila ko Cho.Dakara, eka vishAla pe.Da ke nIche rahane kI sochI. lekina vahIM pe.Da kI ja.Da meM, chIMTiyoM kI bAMbI thI, aura unake sAtha rahanA, nAga ke lie asaMbhava thA. so, vaha nAga una chIMTiyoM kI bAMbI ke nikaTa jAkara bolA, maiM sarparAja nAga hUM, isa jaMgala kA rAjA. maiM tuma chIMTiyoM ko Adesha detA hUM, ki yaha jagaha Cho.Dakara chale jAo. vahAM aura bhI jAnavara the, jo usa bhayaMkara sAMpa ko dekhakara Dara gae, aura jAna bachAne ke lie idhara udhara bhAgane lage. lekina chIMTiyoM ne nAga kI isa dhamakI para koI dhyAna na diyA.

ve pahale kI taraha apane kAma kAja meM juTI rahIM. nAga ne yaha dekhA, to usake krodha kA pArAvAra na rahA. vaha gusse meM bharakara bAMbI ke nikaTa jA pahuMchA. yaha dekha, hazAroM chIMTiyA.N, usa bAMbI se nikala pa.DI, aura nAga se lipaTakara, usake sharIra para kATane lagIM. unake kaMTIle DaMkoM se pareshAna nAga bilabilAne lagA. usakI pI.DA asahanIya ho chalI thI, aura sharIra para ghAva hone lage the. nAga ne chIMTiyoM ko haTAne kI bahuta koshisha kI, lekina asaphala rahA. kuCha hI dera meM, usane vahIM ta.Dapa ta.Dapa kara jAna de dI.
